translation.en: Ekiti police nab 2 serial burglars
translation.pcm: Ekiti Police don catch 2 big tif.

translation.en: The Ekiti State Police Command Rapid Response Squad (RRS) has arrested two persons, Abbar Wasiri and Aribisala Timileyin, for burglary along Adebayo area of the state capital.
translation.pcm: Di Rapid Response Squad (RRS) for Etiki Police Command don arrest two pipo, Abbar Wasiri and Aribisala Timileyin, say dem go thief for Adebayo area wey dey di capital of di state.

translation.en: The suspects stole N210,000 and other valuables, when they burgled three different houses on Monday, at about 1:30 am.
translation.pcm: Dem tif N210,000 and some plenti things wey dey valuable, as dem enta three house for Monday around dat kain 1:30am.

translation.en: The police said on May 9, 2021, at about 1:30pm, one Barrister Ayo Oguntuase, in Ado-Ekiti, came to the RRS office, Ado-Ekiti, and reported that some unknown persons burgled his office and two other houses at night in Adebayo Area, Ado-Ekiti, on May 8, and made away with N210,000 cash, two sets of computer system and many other items.
translation.pcm: Di police tok say for May 9, 2021, around 1:30pm, one pesin wey be Barrister Ago Oguntuase for Ado-Ekiti, kom di RRS office wey dey Ado-Ekiti kom repot give dem  say some pipo wey im no sabi kon tif for im office and dem tif for two house join for dat night for Adebayo area for Ado Ekiti, for May 8 and dem carry N210,000, two computa and plenti tins go.

translation.en: The police command said upon the receipt of the information, the RRS operatives immediately moved into action and arrested the two suspects based on intelligence gathered.
translation.pcm: Dem Police  as dem hear di information, di RRS go arrest di two pipo wey dem dey think say na dem do am as per wetin dem don hear before.

translation.en: The Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO), ASP Sunday Abutu, said during interrogation, the two suspects confessed to the crime and led operatives to their houses where items such as 265 different types of children and adult clothes, 14 pairs of children and adult canvas shoes, two complete sets of computers, one ceiling fan, and two law report books belonging to different complainants were recovered.
translation.pcm: Di PRO for Police (PPRO), ASP Sunday Abutu, wen dem dey follow am took, tok say di two pipo don gree say na dem do di tin and dem carry di police go dia house wey dem see 265 cloth wey be for pikin and adult dem, 14 canvas wey be for pikin and adult, two computa wey dey complete, one ceiling fan and two law report book wey be for different different complain pipo kolet back

translation.en: Abutu added that a further investigation revealed that one of the suspects, Abbar Wasiri, is one of the security guards employed to guard one of the places burgled.
translation.pcm: Abutu still tok say as dem touch line di mata more more dem kom see say one of di pipo wey dem catch na be sekuriti wey dem kolet to dey guard wia  dem go thief.

translation.en: According to the PPRO, investigation is ongoing and when concluded, the suspects shall be charged to court.
translation.pcm: As di PPRO don tok, dem still dey touch line di mata and wen dem do finish, dem go carry di pipo go court.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the Ekiti State Commissioner of Police, Mr. Tunde Mobayo, has called on everyone in the state to be security-conscious and promptly report any strange and suspicious persons found in their environs to the police.
translation.pcm: Mellawella, Di Oga Commissioner for di Police for Ekiti State, Mr.Tunde Mobayo, don call evribodi for di state to dey sekuriti conscious and make dem dey tell di police if dem see pesin wey dem no sabi for dia area.

translation.en: Five matches that won Atletico Madrid La Liga title
translation.pcm: Five match wey make Atletico Madrid win La Liga.

translation.en: Atletico Madrid won the La Liga for the second time in eight years on Sunday as a 2-1 victory over Real Valladolid crowned them Spanish champions.
translation.pcm: Atletico Madrid don win di LA Liga for di second time for inside eight years on Sunday as dem win 2-1 over Real Valladolid wey make dem be di Champion for Spain.

translation.en: Here are five matches that secured Atletico the title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Barcelona, November 21
translation.pcm: Na di five match wey make Atletico be Chapoion for Spain be dis:Atletico Madrid 1- 0 Barcelona, for November 21

translation.en: Yannick Carrasco scored the winner as Atletico registered their first La Liga win over Barcelona in more than a decade and stretched their unbeaten run to 24 matches.
translation.pcm: Na Yannick Carrasco score wey make Atletico win Barcelona for di first time for more dat ten years and push dia unbeaten enta 24 matches.

translation.en: It would be this result that eventually gave Atletico a better head-to-head record over Barca, who were left 10th in the table and without the injured Gerard Pique for three months.
translation.pcm: E go be dis result wey give Atletico beta head to head record pass Barca, wey dey number 10 on top table without Gerard Pique wey don get injury for three months.

translation.en: Elche 0-1 Atletico Madrid, May 1
translation.pcm: Elche 0-1 Atletico Madrid, for May1.

translation.en: Atletico were inches away from surrendering victory and their lead at the top of the table to Real Madrid as Elches
translation.pcm: E don remain small make Atletico surrender say dem no fit win Elchessay and dia lead ontop table give Real Madrid

translation.en: Fidel Chaves missed a dramatic 91st-minute penalty.
translation.pcm: Fidel Chaves miss one penalty for 91 minutes.

translation.en: Fidels shot struck the post as Atletico held on for a 1-0 win that kept them two points ahead of Real Madrid and also in front of Barcelona going into a crunch meeting at Camp Nou.
translation.pcm: Fidel shot hit post wey make Atletico hold dat 1-0 wey give dem two point pass Real Madrid and dem still dey front of Barcelona wey dem go meet for Camp Nou.

translation.en: Barcelona 0-0 Atletico Madrid, May 8
translation.pcm: Barcelona 0-0 Atletico Madrid for May 8.

translation.en: Barcelona had the chance to shift the dynamic of the title race on their home turf but Atletico dominated the first half and Barca never did quite enough in the second.
translation.pcm: Barcelona get chance to comot di title for Atletico hand as dem dey home but na Atletico dey carry di first half and Barca no even try for di second half.

translation.en: The stalemate ended up being an even better result for Atletico after Real Madrid were held by Sevilla a day later, Atletis two-point lead preserved at the end of what many had circled as a pivotal weekend.
translation.pcm: E kon dey beta for Atletico afta Sevilla beat Real Madrid for di second day, di twopoint wey Atletico dey dey lead kon still dey like dat for di weekend.

translation.en: Atletico Madrid 2-1 Osasuna, May 16
translation.pcm: Atletico Madrid 2-1 Osasuna, for May16.

translation.en: With nine minutes left, Atletico trailed Osasuna 1-0 at the Wanda Metropolitano and Real Madrid
translation.pcm: As e remain nine minute, Atletico score Osasuna 1- 0 for di Wanda Metropolitano and Real Madrid.

translation.en: were going top of La Liga, the title in their hands, with a win against Athletic Bilbao.
translation.pcm: Dey go ontop for LA Liga, di title for dia hand as dem win Athletic Bilbao.

translation.en: But Atletico pulled off an incredible turnaround, Renan Lodi equalising in the 82nd minute and Suarez scoring the winner in the 88th, with hundreds of fans celebrating outside in the stadium car park.
translation.pcm: But Atletico kom change evrithing  as Renan Lodi equalise for 82 minutes and Suarez score for 88 minute and plenti fans dey joli outside for di car park for di stadium.

translation.en: The victory kept Atleti top and left them one more win away.
translation.pcm: Na dis one make Atletico dey on top and e kon remain only one game wey dem go win.

translation.en: Real Valladolid 1-2 Atletico Madrid, May 22 Atletico knew victory would win them the title regardless of how Real Madrid fared against Villarreal
translation.pcm: Real Valladolid 1-2 Atletico Madrid, for May 22, Atletico sabi say na to win go give dem di title even if to say Real Madrid win Villarreal or dem no win.

translation.en: but they did it the hard way, coming from behind after Valladolid took a shock lead through Oscar Plano.
translation.pcm: But dem do am for di way wey dey hard, dem from back kom win afta Valladolid don dey win before as Oscar Plano score.

translation.en: But Angel Correa equalised and then Suarez scored the winner, a nervy title race decided by a nail-biting victory.
translation.pcm: But Angel Correa kon equalise and Suarez score di winning goal, na strong race wey kon finish wit winning wey tight.

translation.en: Wanted Abia major drug supplier arrested with 100kg cocaine, cannabis
translation.pcm: Dem arrest Abia big drug supplier wey dem dey find since wit 100kg of cocaine and weed.

translation.en: The National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) has arrested Chibuike Apolos, a notorious major supplier of illicit drugs in Abia State, during an early morning raid on his hideout at Mbawsi in Isialangwa North area of the state.
translation.pcm: Di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) don catch Chibuike Apolos, wey be one of di main pipo wey dey always dey supply drugs for Abia state, for one early mono raid for di place wey im dey always hide for Mbawsi for Isialangwa North area for di state.

translation.en: Spokesman of the agency, Femi Babafemi, said on Wednesday in Abuja that Apolos has been on the wanted list of the Abia State Command of the NDLEA since February following the arrest of one Chima Ukeleonu, the suspect behind the video that went viral in January 2021, showing a young man hawking illicit drugs on the street.
translation.pcm: Di pesin wey tok for di agency, Femi Babafemi, tok for Wednesday for Abuja say dem don dey find Apolos for NDLEA Abia State Command since February afta dem catch one China Ukeleonu, wey dey for di video wey dey evriwia for January 2021 wey show one man wey dey sell drug for di street.

translation.en: According to him, it was due to the development that the 38-year-old Apolos was put on the wanted list.
translation.pcm: As e take tok, na bikos for di development dem kon dey find Aplos wey be 38 years.

translation.en: Following his arrest in the early hours of Wednesday, the Abia State government has already marked his house which serves as his hideout for demolition, Babafemi said.
translation.pcm: Afta dem don catch am, di goment  for Abia state don mark him house wey e dey hide say dem go break am down, na Babafemi tok am.

translation.en: He also quoted the Commander Abia State Command of the NDLEA, Bamidele Akingbade, as saying that The command has been on his trail since February this year.
translation.pcm: He still tok say di Oga commander for di Abia State Command NDLEA, Bamidele Akingbade, dey tok say dem don dey follow am since February for dis year.

translation.en: Fortunately, we got a tip-off that he just received some quantities of cannabis from Edo State.
translation.pcm: As God dey do tins, we kon hear say e just collect plenti weed for Edo state.

translation.en: Notwithstanding the tense security situation in the South East, especially Abia State, the command still embarked on the operation which culminated in the arrest of one Chibuike Apolos with 10 bags of cannabis weighing 100kg, 1.6 grammes of cocaine, one gramme of heroin and five grammes of methamphetamine.
translation.pcm: Even as sekuriti wahala dey for di South East especially for Abia, State, di command still go for di operation wey make dem arrest Chibuike Apolos wey get 10 bags of weed wey weigh 100kg, dem see 1.6 grams for cocaine, one gram of heroine and five gram for methamphetamine.

translation.en: In a similar development, the Taraba State Command of the Agency has arrested 61-year-old Lawan Gambo Umar for trafficking 58.50kg of Cannabis Sativa.
translation.pcm: Inside dis kain one, di Command for di Agency for Taraba State don catchcatch one Lawan Gambo wey be 61 years old say e carry 58.50kg of Cannabis Sativa.

translation.en: According to the state Commander of NDLEA, Suleiman Ajadi, The suspect was taking the skunk concealed inside sacks of beans chaff used to feed animals to Fune in Yobe State when our men intercepted him.
translation.pcm: As di state commander for NDLEA, Suleiman Ajadi take tok, di pesin dey carry skunk wey dem put inside plenti sack of beans doti wey dey dey give animals chop inside Yobe state wen awa  men catch am.

translation.en: Rep lauds NDLEA over illicit drugs seizures
translation.pcm: Di rep dem dey greet NDLEA say dem well done for di drugs wey dem seize.

translation.en: The member representing Ado/Ogbadibo/Okpokwu Federal Constituency, Dr Francis Ottah Agbo, has commended the chairman of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, NDLEA, Brig-Gen.
translation.pcm: Di pesinwey dey represent Ado/Ogbadibo/Okpokwu Federal Constituency, Dr. Francis Ottah Agbo, don greet di chairman for di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, NDLEA, Brig-Gen say e well done.

translation.en: Mohammed Buba Marwa (rtd) for his renewed anti-drugs fight which has led to large scale seizures across the country.
translation.pcm: Mohammed Buba Marwa (rtd) for di new way wey e dey take fight drug wey don help am seize plenti drug for di country.

translation.en: The lawmaker, who is also the Chairman of the Narcotic Drugs Committee, particularly praised Marwa for sanitizing the health sector by intercepting large quantities of narcotic and substandard drugs across the country.
translation.pcm: Di lawmaker, who still be di Chairman for di Narcotic Drug Committee, don praise Marwa as e dey clean di health sector as e dey stop plenti narcotics and drugs wey no reach standard for di country.

translation.en: The lawmaker, in a statement by his Media Aide, Andrew Agbese, on Wednesday, said the NDLEA boss had in less than six months of assuming office, succeeded in getting the agency back on track by busting many drug rings and syndicates, as well as seizing and destroying large quantities of illicit drugs.
translation.pcm: Di lawmaker inside one tok wey im media pesin, Andrew Agbese, tok for Wednesday, tok say di NDLEA Oga, before e reach six month wey e enta office, don carry di agency leg put for track to dey burstburst plenti place wey dem dey sell drug and to sieze and destroy plenti bad drug.

translation.en: Agbo, who is also the spokesman of the Minority Caucus, said NDLEA, under the leadership of the former Military Administrator of Lagos State, is reminiscent of the days of Prof Dora Akunyili in NAFDAC when fake, expired drugs and substandard food brands were reduced to the admiration of all and sundry.
translation.pcm: Agbo, wey be di tok pesi for di Minority Caucus, tok say NDLEA for di leadership of di foma Military Administrator for Lagos State, dey remember di time wey Prof. Dora Akunyili dey NAFDAC wey fake medicine, di one wey don expire and di food wey no reach standard no plenti.

translation.en: I have been an advocate of optimum, staffing, equipping and funding the NDLEA to achieve its statutory mandate due to the menace of substance abuse and drug addiction in the country.
translation.pcm: I don dey always tok say make dem do beta, carry plenti pipo join, and put moni ontop NDLEA to fit do wetin im suppose do to tanda wit drug abuse and pipo wey like drug for di kontri

translation.en: I have said several times that the NDLEA needs all the support to carry out its mandate
translation.pcm: I don tok am plenti time say di NDLEA go nid plenti support to fit do dia work.

translation.en: but Im surprised that even with the little on the ground, the agency, under the able leadership of Gen. Buba Marwa, has been able to achieve a lot by taking the fight to the criminals and this has given me the confidence as chairman of the Narcotic Drugs Committee to further push for the necessary incentives for the agency to function at an optimal level.
translation.pcm: But I dey surprise say even wit di small we dey ground, di agency, as e dey under di leadership of Gen. Buba Marwq, don achieve plenti time as dem dey carry fight criminals and dis one don give me strong chest as di Chairman for di Narcotic Drugs Committee say make I still dey push for wetin go make di agency fit work wella

translation.en: It is very clear that Marwa is the new Sheriff in town and he has proved this by clearing the doubt of drug barons, syndicates and traffickers, he said.
translation.pcm: E dey very clear say Marwa na di new Sheriff for town and e don prove am as e dey comot all di drug baron, syndicate and di traffickers dem, Na so e tok.

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that the agency had in recent times made large scale seizures and arrested suspects across the country.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust tok say d agency for recent time don sieze plenti drug and dem don catch plenti pipo for di kontri.

translation.en: Bayelsa vigilantes arrest 4 for buying stolen phones
translation.pcm: Di vigilante for Bayelsa don catch 4 pipo wey go buy phone wey dem tif.

translation.en: Bayelsa Vigilante Security Service has nabbed a phone repairer and three others for allegedly buying phones snatched at gunpoint in the state.
translation.pcm: Di Vigilante for Bayelsa don catch one pesin wey dey repair phone and anoda three pipo wey dey buy phone wey dem collect wit gun for pipo for di state.

translation.en: The state government-owned security outfit, led by its chairman, Doubiye Alagba, over the weekend, arrested four suspects, including a popular phone repairer, for buying a phone that was allegedly stolen at gunpoint in Yenagoa.
translation.pcm: Di sekuriti wey be for di state follow di Chairman, Doubiye Alagba, for weekend, catch four pipo and one repairer wey pipo sabi wella, say dem dey buy phone wey dem thief wit gun for Yenagoa.

translation.en: It was gathered that men of the vigilante were acting on a tip-off that one Mr. Lawrence Oworodo was robbed of his phone and other belongings at gunpoint, when they traced the mobile phone to one Audu John in Biogbolo axis of the state capital.
translation.pcm: We hear say di vigilante dey work as dem don hear say dem rob one Mr. Lawrence Oworodo and dem collect him phone and sometins wit gun, and as dem trace di phone reach one Audu John for Biogbolo for di state capital.

translation.en: Investigation by the security body also led to the arrest of three other suspects who are said to be involved in buying stolen phones in the state.
translation.pcm: As di sekuriti don look ground, na why dem arrest three pipo wey dem dey suspect who dem tok say dem dey among di pipo wey don dey buy phone wey dem thief for di state.

translation.en: Alagba, in a statement made available to newsmen in Yenagoa, gave the names of the arrested suspects as Audu John, Dominic Diezibe, James Believe and David Emmanuel.
translation.pcm: Alagba, as e dey yarn di news pipo for Yenagoa, tell dem di name of di pipo wey dem catch, Audu John, Dominic Diezibe, James Believe and David Emmanuel.

translation.en: We picked interest in this case because the owner of the phone was robbed at gunpoint.
translation.pcm: We kon like dis mata bikos say na gun dey take rob di for di pesin wey get di phone.

translation.en: One of the challenges we face in the streets of Yenagoa today is pocket crime like this.
translation.pcm: One of di problem wey dey Yenagoa today na pick pocket crime like dis one.

translation.en: I call it a pocket crime because these criminals go about with these locally made pistols to steal valuables from innocent citizens who go about their normal daily hustles.
translation.pcm: I call am pocket crime bikos say all dis criminal go dey waka about wit gun wey dem do for Nigeria and dem go use am thief beta tin from pipo wey just dey go dia work dey hustle evriday.

translation.en: These four suspects were arrested through the help of a phone tracking device.
translation.pcm: Na one phone tracker dem use arrest all di four suspect.

translation.en: The phone was tracked to one Audu John, who resides at Biogbolo, Yenagoa, who led us to arrest other suspects including a popular phone repairer in Amarata, Mr. David Emmanuel.
translation.pcm: Dem track di phone reach one pesin wey be Audu John, wey dey live for Biogbolo for Yenagoa, and na im carry us go arrest di remaining pipo wit one phone repairer Amarata, Mr. David Emmanuel.

translation.en: Police spokesman in Bayelsa State SP Asinim Butswat confirmed the arrest, saying they are in police custody and investigation was on.
translation.pcm: Police tok pesin for Bayelsa State, SP Asinim Butswat, confam say dem don arrest dem say dem dey police custody and dem bin dey do investigation.

translation.en: Ministry, CODE to track N6bn Kaduna projects
translation.pcm: Ministry, CODE wan track Kaduna N6bn project.

translation.en: The Ministry of Budget and National Planning will partner with Follow The Money of the Connected Development (CODE) to track constituency projects in Kaduna valued at N6 billion in the 2020 and 2021 budgets.
translation.pcm: Di ministry for budget and di National Planning go join bodi wit Follow di moni for di Connected Development (CODE) to track di constituency project for Kaduna wey be N6 billion for di 2020 and 2021 budget.

translation.en: The Minister of Budget and National Planning, Prince Clem Agba, who is also co-chair of the Open Government Partnership (OGP), said this while receiving Follow The Money activists in his office recently.
translation.pcm: Di minister for Budget and Planning, Prince Clem Agba, who still be co-chair for di Open goment  Partnership (OGP), nah in tok dis one as dem Follow di moni kom im office.

translation.en: He said The Eye Mark App, a secured web and mobile-based application will be launched by the ministry to enable citizens to update information about community projects and their status.
translation.pcm: E tok say di Eye Mark App, one website and application for phone go soon comot wey go dey make citizen dem dey write any tin wey consine di project of dia community and wia di work reach.

translation.en: Programmes Associate, Mr Kingsley Agu, who led the team said CODE in collaboration with the MacArthur Foundation was setting the pace to initiate governance and budgeting reforms through a campaign to deepen citizens interest in governments spending and address accompanying corrupt practices.
translation.pcm: Di Programmes Associate, Mr. Kingsley Agu, wey lead di team tok say CODE join bodi wit di MacAurthur Foundation dey set di pace wey go start governance and budgeting reforms from one campaign to take deep citizen interest for goment spending and tackle any tiin wey corrupt.

translation.en: Agu added that collaboration with the ministry was a strategic move to collectively combat corruption, illicit financial flows and track to completion, development projects in rural areas so people can have access to potable drinking water, standard healthcare and even primary education.
translation.pcm: Agu add join say di colabo wit d ministry dey good for to joinbodi fight corruption, illict financial flow and to dey track  to finish, development of projects for village make di pipo fit dey see good water, standard health care and primary education sef.

translation.en: WikiLeaks founder Assange denied bail despite US extradition block
translation.pcm: Di pesin wey get WikiLeaks, Asange don dey deny for bail even as di US extradition block.

translation.en: WikiLeaks founder, Julian Assange must remain in custody in Britain, while the US appeals a court decision to block his extradition to face charges there for leaking secret documents, a judge in London ruled Wednesday.
translation.pcm: Di pesin wey get WikiLeaks, Julian Asange, must to dey custody for Britian as di US dey appeal say one court decision wey fit block im extradition to face di charges say e leak secret document, na one Judge tok am for Monday.

translation.en: Judge Vanessa Baraitser, who on Monday refused to grant his extradition, told Westminster Magistrates Court that if released there were substantial grounds to suspect Assange would fail to surrender for future appeal hearings.
translation.pcm: Judge Vanessa Baraistser, wey no gree give am extradition for Monday, tell di Magistrate wey dey Westminster Court say if dem am, Assange no go wan surrender for di gearing for future.

translation.en: Mr Assange still has an incentive to abscond from these as yet unresolved proceedings, she said.
translation.pcm: Mr. Assange still get how im go run comot before all di hearing process go finish, she tok.

translation.en: As a matter of fairness the United States must be able to challenge my decision.
translation.pcm: Make mata no too bad, di United States suppose fit change my mind.

translation.en: If Mr Assange absconds during this process then they will have lost the opportunity to do so.
translation.pcm: If Mr. Asange run comot before dem finish to dey hear, dem go don loose di opportunity wey go make dem do am.

translation.en: Outside court, lawyer Stella Morris, Assanges fiancee and the mother of two of his children, called the decision a huge disappointment and urged the US Justice Department to drop the charges.
translation.pcm: For outside di court, Laywer Stella Morris, wey be Asange fiancee and pesin wey don born two pikin, tok say di decision na big disappointment say make di US Justice Department comot di charges.

translation.en: A lawyer for the US government earlier urged Baraitser not to release the controversial Australian publisher, and detailed how it planned to challenge her decision to block his extradition on mental health grounds.
translation.pcm: One lawyer for di US goment  don begged Baraitser before say make im no release di Australian publisher, kom tell am how e take plan to challenge im decision to block block im extradition on top mental problem.

translation.en: We respectfully submit on behalf of the United States that there are insurmountable hurdles to Mr Assange being granted bail, Clair Dobbin said.
translation.pcm: We don submit on behalf of di United States say som tins dey wey dey stop bail for Mr. Asange, na Clair Dobbin tok am.

translation.en: She added there were no conditions that could guarantee his surrender in future.
translation.pcm: She kon tok say no condition fit guarantee im surrender for future.

translation.en: The history of his attempts to evade extradition to the United States demonstrate that he is capable of going to any length to avoid that possibility, Dobbin said.
translation.pcm: Im history to  dodge di extradition go United State don show say e fit do any tin to see say e no apun. Na so Dobbin tok.

translation.en: The court should be under no doubt about his resources to abscond and pointed to offers of political asylum, notably from Mexico, she added.
translation.pcm: Di court suppose dey under no doubt say im wan run comot and say e point finger to go political asylum, wey be bigfish from Mexico, she add join.

translation.en: Motive to abscond
translation.pcm: Mind to run comot.

translation.en: Assange attended court wearing a suit and mask over his mouth, two days after the unexpected decision to deny his removal to the United States on the basis the risk of his suicide there was too great.
translation.pcm: Asange wear suit and mask for him mouth go court, two days afta dem don deny say make dem carry am go United State on to say e fit kill him sef for dia.

translation.en: Edward Fitzgerald, his lawyer, argued he should be freed after spending 15 months in custody awaiting the extradition proceedings.
translation.pcm: Edward Fitzgerald, wey be him lawyer, tok say dem suppose free am afta im don use 15 months to dey wait for di extradition proceedings.

translation.en: Baraitsers decision on Monday certainly changes any motive to abscond, he added.
translation.pcm: Baraitser decision on  Monday don change any mind wey im get to run comot. E add join.

translation.en: The court has given a decision and the decision has been that he should be discharged.
translation.pcm: Di court don tok and wetin dem tok be say make dem free am.

translation.en: Assange is wanted in Washington to face 18 charges relating to the 2010 release by WikiLeaks of 500,000 secret files detailing aspects of military campaigns in Afghanistan and Iraq.
translation.pcm: Dem dey find Asange for Washington wia e go face 18 charges wey consine di 500,000 secret file wey dey tok about dem military campaign for Afghanistan and Iraq for 2010.

translation.en: The US claims he helped intelligence analyst Chelsea Manning steal the 2010 documents before exposing confidential sources around the world.
translation.pcm: Di US dey claim say nah im help di intelligence analyst, Chelsea Manning, tif di 2010 document before im put di confidential sources outside for di world.

translation.en: He faces a possible 175-year sentence if convicted but Assange and his lawyers have long argued the case against him is politically motivated.
translation.pcm: E dey risk 175 years be dat, if dem send am to prison, but Asange and im Lawyer dem don tok am say politics don enta di mata

translation.en: He has been held at the high-security Belmarsh prison in southeast London.
translation.pcm: Dem don keep am fordi high sekuriti prison for SouthEast London.

translation.en: A previous request for bail in March on the grounds he was vulnerable to Covid-19 behind bars was rejected.
translation.pcm: Dem no answer dem one time wey dem tok say make dem give am bail say e fit go catch Covid-19

translation.en: Assange sought sanctuary in Ecuadors embassy in 2012, after Sweden issued an arrest warrant in connection with sexual assault allegations.
translation.pcm: Asange don see wia im go hide for di Ecuador embasi for 2021, afta Sweeden don tok say make dem arrest am say im get case for sexual assault.

translation.en: He spent seven years at the South American countrys London mission until the government in Quito revoked his citizenship.
translation.pcm: E don spend seven years for di South American countrys London mission before di governmoemt for Quito tok say im no be dia citizen again.

translation.en: British police dragged him out and arrested him in 2019.
translation.pcm: Di British Police drag am comot con arrest am for 2019.

translation.en: He was then sentenced to 50 weeks in jail for breaching his bail terms in connection with the Swedish case, which was later dropped due to lack of evidence.
translation.pcm: Dem put am for prison for 50 weeks say e don breach im bail term as e take consine di case for Sweeden, wey dem later drop bikos say beta evidence no dey.

translation.en: The UN called the sentence disproportionate.
translation.pcm: Di UN tok say di sentence no good.

translation.en: Unnecessarily cruel
translation.pcm: E dey wicked for no reason.

translation.en: Assanges long-running legal woes have become a cause celebre for media freedom, even though the judge hearing the case said he did have a case to answer.
translation.pcm: Di enemy dem for Asange don cause make célèbre dey for media freedom even as di Judge wey dey hear di case don tok say e no get case to answer.

translation.en: Baraitser on Monday said he would have been well aware of the effects of his leaking of secret documents, and his actions went well beyond the role of a journalist.
translation.pcm: For Monday, Baraitser tok say e go don sabi wetin fit hapun before e leak di secret document kom outside, and wetin e do pass di work of a journalist.

translation.en: But she said extradition would be oppressive as his mental health would probably deteriorate in the US penal system, causing him to commit suicide.
translation.pcm: But she tok say di extradition go dey oppress am and e fit affect im brain for di US penal system, wey fit make am kill him sef.

translation.en: She rejected US experts testimony that Assange would be protected from self-harm, noting that others such as disgraced US financier Jeffrey Epstein had managed to kill themselves in custody despite supervision.
translation.pcm: She no gree wit wetin di US experts tok say dem go keep Asange make e no do any tin to im sef say oda pipo like di US financier, Jeffrey Epstein, wey dem disgrace, don manage kill dia sef even as dem dey always dey watch dem.

translation.en: UN rapporteur on torture
translation.pcm: Dem dey torture one UN reporter.

translation.en: Nils Melzer applauded the decision to block his extradition, and said he should be freed and compensated for his ordeal, which amounted to arbitrary detention.
translation.pcm: Nils Melzer dey clap as dem block im extradition, e kon tok say make dem free am and give am som tin for wetin im eyes don see, wey make dem put am for detention wey no get any reason.

translation.en: But he said Baraitser had effectively confirmed the rationale behind the US case, which effectively amounts to criminalising national security journalism.
translation.pcm: But e tok say Baraitser don confam wetin dey for di US mata wey be say dem dey make di national journalist be like criminal.

translation.en: The United States has called the ruling extremely disappointing and has faced calls from WikiLeaks, as well as rights and media freedom groups to drop the appeal.
translation.pcm: Di United States don tok say di ruling no dey good say dem don dey receive call from WikiLeaks and di right and media freedom group say make dem drop di appeal.

translation.en: Media advocacy group Reporters Without Borders said Wednesdays denial of bail was unnecessarily cruel.
translation.pcm: Di group wey dey always fight for di media pipo, Reporters Without Borders, tok say as dem no give am bail for Wednesday na wickedness.

translation.en: Wikileaks editor-in-chief Kristinn Hrafnsson urged outgoing US President Donald Trump and his successor Joe Biden to pardon Assange, while expressing confidence justice will prevail.
translation.pcm: Di editor-in-chief for WikiLeaks, Kristinn Hrafnsson, tok say make di president  for US wey dey go, Donald Trump, and di pesin wey go dey dia afta, Joe Biden say make dem release Assange, as im dey sure dem say justice go prevail.

translation.en: Ahmed Musa set to make NPFL return against Adamawa Utd
translation.pcm: Ahmed Musa wan make di NPFL kom back against Adamawa Utd.

translation.en: Kano Pillars have said their new signing, Ahmed Musa will make his debut against relegation bound Adamawa United on Sunday, May 16.
translation.pcm: Kano pillars don tok say dia new signing, Ahmed Musa, go play im first match against Adamawa Utd wey don dey relegation for Sunday, May 16.

translation.en: This was disclosed on Sunday in a statement by Pillars Spokesman, Alhaji Idris Rilwanu Malikawa immediately after their 1-1 draw against Warri Wolves in Ozoro.
translation.pcm: Na wetin tok pesin fot Pillars, Alhaji Rilwanu Malikawa,  tok for Sunday as dem play draw draw wit Warri Wolves for Ozoro.

translation.en: Pillars who were reduced to 10-men in the first half of the match took the lead through Auwalu Malam Ali in the 58th minute before Mark Daniel scored the equaliser for the hosts from the spot in the 86th minute to force the former Nigerian champions to a 1-1 draw.
translation.pcm: Di Pillars wey dem reduce to 10 player dem for di first half carry di lead wit Auwalu Malam Ali for 58 minute before Mark Daniel kom score di equalizer for di host for 86 minute wey make di forma Nigeria Champion carry 1-1 draw.

translation.en: Malikawa said Pillars have since returned to Kano where they would intensify preparations for their next match against Adamawa United.
translation.pcm: Malikawa tok say di Pillars don go back Kano wia dem go go prepare wella for di next match wey dem get wit Adamawa United.

translation.en: The Spokesman also quoted the Technical Adviser of Pillars, Ibrahim Musa as saying The next thing for us is to go and concentrate on match day 21 against Adamawa United FC at Ahmadu Bello stadium kaduna next week.
translation.pcm: Di tok pesin tok wetin di Technical Adviser for Pillars, Ibrahim Musa tok, say di tin wey remain for us na to go focus on top di match wey we get wit Adamawa United FC for day 21 for Ahmadu Bello Stadium for wey dey Kaduna next week.

translation.en: Playing against a relegated team is not easy but we would do our best to win the maximum points in order to consolidate on our position and target for the season.
translation.pcm: To dey follow relegatin team play no dey easy but we go try say make we win plenti point so we go fit stay for wia we dey and watin we dey targer for di season.

translation.en: Varsity workers to FG: Campus security men need guns
translation.pcm: Pipo wey dey work for University tell di FG say: Campus sekuriti men nid gun.

translation.en: The president of the Senior Staff Association of Nigerian Universities (SSANU), Mohammed Ibrahim Haruna, says his members are no long safe on campuses.
translation.pcm: Di Oga pata pata for di Senior Staff Association for Nigeria Universities (SSANU), Mohammed Ibrahim Haruna, tok say im pipo no dey safe for campus again.

translation.en: He called on the Federal Government to license the use of guns for local security men on various campuses to protect the institutions.
translation.pcm: E call di Federal goment  make dem register gun for di sekuriti men wey dey all di campus to dey protect di school.

translation.en: He was addressing newsmen in Abuja at the weekend after the National Executive Council (NEC) meeting of the association.
translation.pcm: E dey follow di nes pipo tok for Abuja for di weekend afta dem finish di Natioanl Executive Council (NEC) meeting for di association.

translation.en: He said this would help all the established security agencies already overwhelmed with security challenges.
translation.pcm: E tok say e go help all di sekuriti agency wey work don dey choke.

translation.en: Were here to deliberate on a wide range of issues.
translation.pcm: We dey here to tok mata wey plenty.

translation.en: Topmost among those issues is the security of our members who work in the university environment.
translation.pcm: Di mata wey big pass na di sekuriti mata for we pipo who dey work for inside di university.

translation.en: Our members cant travel freely, they cant move around with ease, anytime they do so, they get kidnapped.
translation.pcm: Our pipo no fit travel as dem like, dey no fit waka around as dem like, anytime wey dem do am, dem dey kidnap dem.

translation.en: This is unacceptable!
translation.pcm: E no dey acceptable!

translation.en: Were calling on the federal government to license our security men on campuses who are our members, train and re-train them from time to time and monitor them.
translation.pcm: We dey call di Federal goment  make dem put license for awa  sekuriti pipo wey dey for campus, make dem dey train dem evri time and dey monitor dem.

translation.en: By doing this, security challenges in our institutions will reduce, Haruna said.
translation.pcm: If dem do dis tin, di sekuriti problem for awa  school dem go reduce, na wetin Haruna tok.

translation.en: He cautioned the government against paralyzing academic activities in tertiary institutions again with its lackadaisical attitude towards the implementation of the Memorandum of Action (MoA)
translation.pcm: E warn di goment  make dem no kill di academic activities for di tertiary institution again as dem dey do like say di Memorandum of Action (MoA)  no consine dem.

translation.en: both parties signed.
translation.pcm: Na di two of dem sign.

translation.en: He explained only three of their eight demands had been addressed partially by the government.
translation.pcm: E tok say na only three tin out of di eight tin wey dem don ask n aim goment don do small for inside.

translation.en: He said the association might resume its suspended strike soon if the issues that had continued to make members poorer than expected were not quickly addressed.
translation.pcm: E tok say di association fit continue di strike wey dem stop if dem no settle di mata wey dey make dia pipo dey  bikom  poorer as we no expect.

translation.en: Biden makes history, declares century-old killing of Armenians genocide
translation.pcm: Biden don make history as he tok say di kilin, wey don be like one century, of di Armenians na genocide.

translation.en: President Joe Biden has formally recognized the Ottoman Empires killing and deportation of Armenians over a century ago as a genocide.
translation.pcm: Presido Joe Biden don recognize di Ottoman Empire kilin and as dem deport di Armenians like one century ago say na genocide.

translation.en: The declaration is a break from his predecessors and risking inflaming tensions with Turkey, a NATO ally.
translation.pcm: Di declaration na break from hin predecessors and be  risking inflaming tensions wit dem Turkey, natoally

translation.en: Biden had pledged as a presidential candidate to recognize the Armenians treatment, which took place in modern-day Turkey, as genocide.
translation.pcm: Biden don tok say aspesident candidate him go recognize di Armenian treatment, wey take place for modern day Turkey, as genocide

translation.en: Armenian-Americans have long called on U.S. presidents to do so, but Turkey, a key NATO ally, has warned the U.S. against it, long maintaining that the violence was part of bloody clashes during World War I.
translation.pcm: Americans don long call U.S president make him do am so, but  Turkey, wey be key natoally,don warn U.S against am,long maintaing say di violence dey part of bloody clashes during world war I

translation.en: The Turkish government of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has not yet responded to Bidens designation, but its foreign minister warned earlier this week a declaration would make relations worse.
translation.pcm: DI  Turkish goment wey be President Recep Tayyip Erdogan neva respond to Biden designation, but hin foreign miniters don warn before for dat week say declaration go make relation worse

translation.en: for dia first call for Biden tenure and convey him interest for constructive bilateral relationship wit expanded area of cooporation and effective management and disagreementBidens tenure ” and conveyed his interest in a constructive bilateral relationship with expanded areas of cooperation
translation.pcm: Ties wey dey between di two allies don increase for recent years, although Biden don finally tok to Erdogan on Friday

translation.en: Biden used the word genocidein a statement to mark Armenian Remembrance Dayon Saturday ” 106 years after the events that the Armenian diaspora considers the start of the genocide.
translation.pcm: Biden don tok say aspesident candidate him go recognize di Armenian treatment, wey take place for modern day Turkey, as genocide

translation.en: Previous presidents had avoided using the label even as they made the traditional, annual proclamation honouring the anniversary.
translation.pcm: Previous presidents don avoid to dey use di label even as dem don make di traditional,annual proclamation honawaing anniversary

translation.en: Each year on this day, we remember the lives of all those who died in the Ottoman-era Armenian genocide and recommit ourselves to preventing such an atrocity from ever again occurring,Biden said in the statement.
translation.pcm: each year on dis Friday, we remember di lives of all those ho kpeme for Ottoman era Armenian genocide and recommit awaselves to prevent dat kind atrocity from apuning again Biden tok am for him statement

translation.en: Beginning on April 24, 1915, with the arrest of Armenian intellectuals and community leaders in Constantinople by Ottoman authorities,
translation.pcm: Beginning on April 24, 1915, wit di arrest of Armenian intellectual and community leader for Constantinople by Ottoman authories

translation.en: one and a half million Armenians were deported, massacred, or marched to their deaths in a campaign of extermination.
translation.pcm: One and half million Armenians na hin dey deport, massacre, or marched to dia death for one campaign of examination

translation.en: The statement was expected, especially after then-candidate Biden marked last years remembrance day by saying, Silence is complicity.
translation.pcm: Di statement dey expected, especially afta wen before candidate Biden mark last year remembrance day by saying silence na complicity

translation.en: If we do not fully acknowledge, commemorate, and teach our children about genocide, the words never again lose their meaning,he wrote, pledging to back a congressional resolution that recognized the Ottoman Empires actions as genocide.
translation.pcm: we no too fully acknowlege, commemorate, and teach awa pikin about genocide, di word neva again lose dia meaning him write, con pledge to back congressional resolution wey recognise di Ottoman Empireal action as genocide

translation.en: Resolutions to recognize the genocide passed the House and Senate in 2019, but
translation.pcm: Resolution to recognize di genocide pass di house and senate for 2019, but

translation.en: former President Donald Trump, like his predecessors, never joined them.
translation.pcm: Former President Donald Trump, like him predecessors,neva join am

translation.en: On Wednesday, over 100 bipartisan members of Congress sent a letter to Biden calling on him to use his proclamation to officially label what happened a genocide.
translation.pcm: On Wednesday, na over 100 bipartisan members for congress send letter to Biden wey dem dey call on am make him use him proclamation to officailly label atin apun for genocide

translation.en: The Ottoman Turks deported around 2 million Armenians starting in 1915.
translation.pcm: Di Ottoman Turks deport around 2 million Armenians wey start for 1915

translation.en: Around 1.5 million Armenians are estimated to have been killed.
translation.pcm: Around 1.5 million Armenians na hin dey estimate wey dem don kill

translation.en: The Turkish government has agreed that fighting during the war killed many, but it has long denied that the treatment of the Christian Armenians by the Muslim Ottomans amounted to genocide and says that the death toll was lower.
translation.pcm: Di Turkish goment agree say fight during di war kill many, but e don long denie say di treatment of di christian Armenians by di Muslim Ottomans amount to genocide and tok say di death toll dey lower

translation.en: Over two-dozen countries have recognized the atrocities as genocide, according to the Armenian National Institute, a Washington-based group that advocates for the genocide designation.
translation.pcm: over two dozen kontri don recognise di atrocities as genocide , according todi Armenian National institute, wan Washington base group ey advote for di genocide destination

translation.en: Bidens statement carries no legal implication, and even if the State Department were to follow up with a formal declaration, there are no automatic sanctions or other penalties that kick in.
translation.pcm: Biden statement carry no legal implication, and even if di state deparment dey follow up wit a formal declaration, automatic sanction or oda penaltie ey kick in

translation.en: On its final day with former President Donald Trump in office, the Trump administration declared the Chinese governments treatment of Uighurs and other Muslim ethnic minorities as genocide, without implementing sanctions.
translation.pcm: For hin final day wit former President Donald Trump for office, di Trump administration declare di Chinese goment treatment of Uighurs and oda Muslim ethnic minority as genocide, witout implementing sanctions

translation.en: But the comments will rattle U.S.-Turkish relations, already on ice over a litany of disagreements, and could damage relations between Biden and Erdogan, who had a warm relationship with Trump.
translation.pcm: But di comment wey shake U.S Turkish relation already dey on ice over litany of disagreement, and wey fi damage relations between Biden and Erdogan, wey get good relationship wit Trump

translation.en: Trump often touted his friendshipwith the strongman president and repeatedly pulled punches against his government until his hand was forced by political pressure, including from congressional Republicans.
translation.pcm: Trump dey always tout hin friendship wit di strong president and repeatedly pull punches against hin goment until hin hand dey force by political pressure,includin from congressional Republicans

translation.en: Minneapolis reaches $27m settlement with Floyd family
translation.pcm: Minneapolis don reach $27m settlement wit Floyd family

translation.en: The family of George Floyd, the Black man who died while being arrested by a white police officer in Minneapolis, has reached a $27 million settlement with the Minnesota city, lawyers for the family announced Friday.
translation.pcm: Di family of George Floyd, di Black man wey kpeme wen white police officer for Minneapolis arrest am, don reach $27 million settlement wit di Minnesota city, di family lawyer dem announce am on Friday

translation.en: The settlement is the largest pre-trial settlement in a civil rights wrongful death case in US history,the family lawyers said in a statement.
translation.pcm: Di settlement na di largest pre trial settlement for one civil right wrongful death case for US history; na di family lawyer tok di statement

translation.en: Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin is currently on trial facing murder and manslaughter charges in connection with Floyds
translation.pcm: Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin dey currently face trial wey dey face murder and manslaugher charges wey dey get connection wit Floyd

translation.en: Three other officers also face charges.
translation.pcm: Three oda officer dey also face di charges

translation.en: Prince Philip interred in royal vault of St Georges Chapel
translation.pcm: Dem bury Prince Philip for royal vault wey dey St Georga chapel

translation.en: Prince Philips coffin has been interred in the royal vault of St Georges Chapel.
translation.pcm: Prince Philip cofffin na hin inter for di royal vault of St Georga chapel

translation.en: It was placed on a catafalque on a marble slab and lowered into the vault by an electric motor.
translation.pcm: Na on top catafalque on top marble slab sey put am and  eletric motorput am inside di vault.

translation.en: The vault was created between 1804 and 1810 for George III, who died in 1820 and is one of three kings buried there.
translation.pcm: Di vault na hin dem create between 1804 and 1810 for George III, wey kpeme for 1820 and hin dey one of di three king wey dem bury der.

translation.en: The other two are George IV and William IV.
translation.pcm: Di order two na George IV and William IV

translation.en: Horns were played as his coffin was lowered down.
translation.pcm: Dem play horn as hin coffin dey go down

translation.en: A blessing was given by the Archbishop of Canterbury before the choir sang the national anthem, God Save the Queen.
translation.pcm: Archbishop of Canterbury give blessin before di choir sing di national anthem, make God save di Queen

translation.en: The members of the royal family looked up as the choir sang while the queen bowed her head.
translation.pcm: Di member of di royal family look up as di choir sing wen di queen bow her head

translation.en: The 94-year-old monarch was then led out of the church by the archbishop and followed by her family members.
translation.pcm: Dey con lead di 94 year old king comot for di church, by di archbishop di family member kom follow

translation.en: Prince William, her grandson, was seen glancing back at the vault as he left his pew.
translation.pcm: Prince William, her grandson na hin dey see dey glance back for di vault as him leave hin pew

translation.en: In the funeral procession which departed Windsor Castle to the chapel was Queen Elizabeth II, who was driven in a car.
translation.pcm: For di funeral procession wey comot from Windsor Castle do di chapel na hin Queen Elizabeth II, wey dem carry wit car

translation.en: It was her first appearance in public since the death of her husband.
translation.pcm: Na her first appearance for public since di death of her husband

translation.en: Philips coffin had been draped with his personal standard and was driven in a green military Land Rover Defender.
translation.pcm: Philip coffin na hin dey drap wit hin personal standard and dey con drive for one green military Land Rover Defender

translation.en: The children of Queen Elizabeth and Prince Philip “ Prince Charles, Prince Andrew, Princess Anne and Prince Edward “ walked behind the Land Rover.
translation.pcm: Di pikin of Queen Elizabeth and Prince Charles, Prince Anne and Prince Edward waka for di back of di Land Rover

translation.en: Also in the procession were the Earl of Wessex, Prince Harry, Peter Phillips, Prince William, Vice Admiral Tim Lawrence, and the Earl of Snowdon.
translation.pcm: Earl of Wessex, Prince Harry, Peter Philips, Prince William, Vice Admiral Tim Lawrence, and di Earl of Snowdon sef follow for di procession

translation.en: Queen Elizabeth II followed behind in a car.
translation.pcm: Queen Elizabeth II follow dey back of di car

translation.en: For the eight-minute procession, a gun was fired by the Kings Troop Royal Horse Artillery from the East Lawn of Windsor Castle.
translation.pcm: For di eight minute procession, na hin di king Troop Royal Horse Artillery wey dey East lawn of Windsor Castle dey fire gun

translation.en: Farmer murdered in FCT community
translation.pcm: Dem farmer wey dem kil for FCT community

translation.en: A 32-year-old farmer, Yusufa Adamu, has been hacked to death by at Gada-Biyu village in Kwali Area Council of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT).
translation.pcm: 32 years old farmer, Yusufa Adamu, na hin dem hack to death for Gada Biyu village for Kwali Area Council for di Federal Capital Territory FCT

translation.en: A resident of Gada-Biyu, Abdullahi Yahaya, said the incident happened on Friday evening when the Adamu was returning from his farm and was attacked with a machete.
translation.pcm: Wan resident of Gada Biyu, Abdullahi Yahaya tok say di incident apun for Friday evenin wen di Adamu dey com from hin farm wey dey kom attack am wit machete

translation.en: According to him, the family of the deceased raised alarm after he was not seen at home on Friday and that members of the vigilante mobilised to the farm on Sunday where they discovered the decomposing body of the farmer with machete cuts.
translation.pcm: Accordin to am, di family of di decease raise alarm afta wey dem see am for house for Friday and say member of di vigilante mobilise go di farm for Sunday wia dem discover di bodi of di farmer wit machete cut

translation.en: The spokesperson of the FCT Police Command, ASP Maryam Yusuf, was yet to reply to a text message sent to her phone to confirm the incident.
translation.pcm: Di tok tok pesin wey dey FCT Police Command, ASP Maryam Yusuf, neva reply to di text message wey dem send to confirm di incident

translation.en: Another INEC office set ablaze in Imo
translation.pcm: Anode INEC office na hin dey throw fire for Imo

translation.en: Another office of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) have been set ablaze in Imo State.
translation.pcm: Anode office wey be Independent National Electoral Commission INEC own na hin dey set ablaze for Imo state

translation.en: Daily Trust gathered that the located at Okwudor in Njaba Local Government Area of the state was burnt down on Sunday morning.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust gather say di location wey dey Okwudor for Njaba Local goment Area for di state na hin dey burn down for Sunday mornin

translation.en: The incident is coming less than 24 hours after Atta police station, customary and high courts were burnt down in the same local council.
translation.pcm: Di incident dey apun less dan 24 hours afta dey burn Atta police station, customary and high court down for dat same local council

translation.en: INEC Public Relations Officer in the state, Mrs. Emmanuella Opara, confirmed the development.
translation.pcm: INEC Public Relation officer for di state, Mrs Emmanuel Opera, confirm di development

translation.en: Last week, INEC had raised an alarm over the burning of its offices nationwide, saying the action might undermine the conduct of future elections.
translation.pcm: last week, INEC raise alam ova di burnin of dia office nationwide, dey tok say di action fit undermine di conduct of future election

translation.en: The commission said no fewer than 41 INEC offices have been burnt this year alone.
translation.pcm: Di commission tok say no fewer dan 41 INEC office na hin dey burn for only dis year

translation.en: How support tools, others can uplift 41.5m MSMEs
translation.pcm: How support tool, order fit uplift 41.5m MSMEs

translation.en: Nigerias Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) industry is not being optimised as it should be in spite of its critical role in national development.
translation.pcm: Nigeria Micro, small and Medium Enterprises MSMEs industry no dey optimise as e suppose be upon dia critical role for national development

translation.en: Although MSMEs contribution to the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) has not been clear because of the lack of structure and data, the narrative is fast changing.
translation.pcm: although MSMEs contribution for di Gross Domestic Product GDP neva clear bikos of lack structure and data, di narrative dey change fast

translation.en: According to data by the Small and Medium scale Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria (SMEDAN) and the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS), there are about 41.5 million MSMEs in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Accordin to data wey di small and Medium scale Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria SMEDAN and di National Bureau of Statistics NBS, e dey about 41.5million MSMEs for Nigeria

translation.en: Collectively they account for about 50 percent of Nigerias GDP.
translation.pcm: Togeda, dia account na about 50 percent for Nigeria GDP

translation.en: There is growing consciousness of the critical role MSMEs play in economic development.
translation.pcm: To dey grow  consciousness na critical role MSMEs play for economic development

translation.en: Beyond job creation, MSMEs are critical to improving the living standards of citizens as well as important local capital formation.
translation.pcm: Afta job creation, MSMEs dey critical to dey improve di livin standard of citizen  wey local capital formation

translation.en: They also help drive innovation and competition in developing economies.
translation.pcm: Dey kom hep drive innovertion and competition for developin economies

translation.en: Towards boosting the growth of MSMEs, there have been several MSMEs-supported programmes by the federal government through the Development Bank of Nigeria (DBN), Bank of Industry (BOI), Bank of Agriculture (BOA), SMEDAN and the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) which has been the biggest enabler of small businesses.
translation.pcm: As dey wan boost di growth of MSMEs, plenti MSMEs-supported programmes don dey from di federal goment thru di Development Bank of Nigeria (DBN), Bank of Industry (BOI), Bank of Agriculture (BOA), SMEDAN and di Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) wey don be di  biggest enabler of small small business dem.

translation.en: The CBN intervenes with soft loans disbursed through the deposit money banks and the microfinance banks, especially the NIRSAL Microfinance bank.
translation.pcm: Di CBN intervene wit di growth of MSMEs,

translation.en: Aside from the public sector-sponsored initiatives, there are private sector entities striving to support MSMEs sector.
translation.pcm: Apart from say public sector sponsor initiative, private sector entities dey wey dey strive to support MSMEs sector

translation.en: One of these is the MTN Revv programme which helps small businesses rethink and re-learn their operations to enable them to mitigate the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: One of dis na di MTN Revv programme wey dey hep small business think well, make learn dia operation well join so e go allow dem mitigate di effect of COVID-19 pandemic.

translation.en: This year, 200 MSMEs were selected to be a part of MTNs accelerator programme, Yello 200, from across the country.
translation.pcm: Dis year, 200 MSMEs na hin dey select make e be part of MTN accelerator programme, yello 200, from across di kontri

translation.en: The participants had a series of 11 master-classes by seasoned facilitators across various subsectors of the economy.
translation.pcm: Di participant don get series of 11 master class by season facilitator pass various subsector for di economy

translation.en: At the graduation ceremony recently, some beneficiaries and the coordinators spoke about the programme.
translation.pcm: For di graduation ceremony recently, some beneficiaries and coodinator speak for di programme

translation.en: Olubukola Ogunmola, CEO of Wanbuk and Device which produces pap, said he has benefited immensely.
translation.pcm: olubukola Ogunmola wey be di CEO of Wanbuk and Device wey dey produce pap, tok say him get plenti benefit

translation.en: Our workforce has also grown to enable us to meet the demands of our growing customers.
translation.pcm: awa workforce don dey grow to allow us meet di demand of awa growin customers

translation.en: Another beneficiary, Daniel Ikwong, CEO of Future IDEAS said: I have been well equipped with best practices and thoroughly enjoyed every bit of the Yello 200 onboarding experience; the business has not been the same again.
translation.pcm: Anoda beneficiary, Daniel Ikwong, CEO of Future IDEAS tok say: I been dey well equipped wit best practices dem and I enjoy every bit of the Yello 200 onboardin experience wella; di business no go be di same again.

translation.en: Also, Raheem Yusuff Olatunji, CEO, Yutex Entertainment said for him, the programme was a rewarding experience.
translation.pcm: Also, Raheem Yusuff Olatunji wey be di CEO, Yutex Entertainment tok say for am, di programme na for rewardin experience

translation.en: Im now a better manager of my business.
translation.pcm: now I be beta manager for my business

translation.en: It couldnt have happened at a better time because the effect of the COVID-19 pandemic on my company was enormous.
translation.pcm: E fit don apun for beta time bikos di effect of Covid 19 pandemic  wey dey on top my company plenti

translation.en: The Chief Enterprise Business Officer, MTN Nigeria,
translation.pcm: Di chief Enterprise Business Officer, MTN Nigeria

translation.en: Lynda Saint-Nwafor, said, With MSMEs accounting for 94% of all businesses in Nigeria and 84% of employment.
translation.pcm: Lynda Saint Nwafor tok say wit MSMEs wey go dey account for 94% for all business for Nigeria and 84%  for employment

translation.en: So our goal is to empower MSMEs with the tool to make them thrive in the economy.
translation.pcm: awa goal na to empower MSMEs wit di tool to make dem thrive for di economy

translation.en: Modupe Kadri, Chief Financial Officer, MTN Nigeria, said: We have always believed SMEs are the wheels that drive any economy and that positioning them for growth means empowering and enabling them with the right digital solutions.
translation.pcm: Modupe Kadri, Chief Financial Officer, MTN Nigeria, tok say: We don always believe SMEs as wheels wey dey drive any economy and if you position dem for growth, e mean say you dey empower and you wan enable dem wit di right digital solutions.

translation.en: Equally, Coca-Cola Nigeria Limited and the Whitefield Foundation recently empowered over 20,000 individuals with business skills across the 36 states of Nigeria through the Special Intervention Programme (SIP).
translation.pcm: Make we no do ojoro, Coca Cola Nigeria Limited and di Whitefield Foundation, e no tey wey dem empower pass 20,000 person wey get business skil for di 36 state of Nigeria through di special intervention programme SIP

translation.en: They said through SIP, they have been able to support the livelihood of young Nigerians following the economic effects of the COVID-19 pandemic which hit in 2020.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say through SIP, dey don fi support di livelihood of young Nigeria pipo wey dey follow di economic effect of Covid 19 pandemic wey hit 2020

translation.en: By the end of the programme in April, the participants had completed three different stages of courses anchored by seasoned facilitators.
translation.pcm: By di end of di programme for April, di pipo don complete thre different stage of course wey season facilitors dem dey do

translation.en: During the graduation ceremony recently, the Director, Public Affairs, Communications and Sustainability of the firm, Nwamaka Onyemelukwe said: We recognized that unemployment rates were on the rise with the poverty rates reaching a peak, and as a socially-responsible company focused on refreshing the world, we are also committed to making a difference in the lives of people and communities.

translation.en: Reasons Katsina zobo farmers recorded poor harvest
translation.pcm: Reason why Katsina farmers dem record poor harvest

translation.en: Hibiscus roselle (zobo) farmers in Katsina State have recorded a decline in production despite fair rainfall this year.
translation.pcm: Zobo farmer for Katsina State don record decline for product even as small rain fall dey dis year

translation.en: The farmers said the poor harvest was as a result of the absence of affordable fertiliser from the beginning of the rainy season, and the invasion of their farms by herdsmen from Niger Republic.
translation.pcm: Di farmers tok say di poor harvest na as bikos of di absence of affordable fertiliser from di beginnin wey rain season and invasion of dia farm by di herdsmen wey kom from Niger Republic

translation.en: They also lamented that the continued relocation of some of their markets and lack of government support were part of their major challenges this year.
translation.pcm: Dey kom dey lament continue say di relocation of some of dia market and lack of goment support dey part of dia major challenge dis year

translation.en: They observed that the heavy rainfall recorded towards the end of the season did not favour the roselle plant to grow up to its usual height, which would have enabled it to produce good seeds that would eventually produce the blossom red seed coat or cover, popularly known as zobo.
translation.pcm: Dey kom observe say di heavy rain wey fall, wey dem record toward end of season no favour di roselle plant, e no make dem grow to dia usual height, wey go don enable am to produce seed wey good wey fi produce zobo

translation.en: A renowned farmer, Malam Abdullahi Kwangwama
translation.pcm: farmer wey dem sabi wella Malam Abdullahi Kwangwama

translation.en: Malam Abdullahi Kwangwama, a zobo farmer in Mani Local Government Area of the state, in an interview with Daily Trust, disclosed that from the beginning of last season there was no manure or fertiliser to apply to the plant, a situation that slowed down its growth.
translation.pcm: Malam Abdullahi Kwangwana, wey be zobo farmer for Mani Local goment Area for di state,  for wan interview wey Daily Trust do, tok say from di beginnin of last season na hin manure or fertiliser to apply to plant no dey, situation wey slow down hin growth

translation.en: Malam Kwangwama said, We did not get any fertiliser from the government throughout the season, and that made it difficult for the plant to grow early.
translation.pcm: Malam Kwangwama tok say,we no get any fertiliser from goment truout di season, and na dat one make am difficult for plant grow early

translation.en: The few bags we were able to buy from the market at N12,000 per bag came late, and it couldnt help it to grow up to the height of my chest, which is its normal height; therefore, it couldnt produce much seeds.
translation.pcm: Di  small bag wey we fi buy for market for N12,000 per bag kom late and e no fi help grow high reach chest, wey e dey normally high reach so tey e go fit produce plenti seed

translation.en: I did not plant much food crops this year.
translation.pcm: No too plant plenti food crop dis year

translation.en: And I am only able to harvest 60 bags of hibiscus this season, as against 85 bags I got last year.
translation.pcm: And I only fit harvest 60 bag of hibiscus dis season, against 85 bag wey I get last year

translation.en: I have two wives and eight children; six of them are in school, and this is my only hope of feeding them and paying their school fees.
translation.pcm: I get two wife and eight pikin, six of dem dey school, and na di only hope wey I get to feed dem and to dey pay dia school fee

translation.en: If government wants to support us to produce zobo in commercial quantity for domestic use in Nigeria and export, all they need to do is make adequate plans for the provision of fertiliser at cheaper prices and support farmers to access non-interest loans that can enable us hire and cultivate more farmlands.
translation.pcm: goment wan support us to dey produce zobo for commercial quantity for domestic use for Nigeria and export, wetin dey need do na to make adequate plan to provide plan for di provision of fertiliser for cheap price and support farmer to dey access loan wey no get interest wey fi allow us hire pipo, kom cultivate more farmland

translation.en: This is because buyers are always waiting for the produce, and we are ready to do more as well.
translation.pcm: Na bikos say buyers dey always wait for produce, and wey dey to do well

translation.en: The roselle seed coat or cover is used in producing the popular zobo juice in Nigeria, which is considered useful in the treatment of stomach upset, high blood pressure, weight loss, among others.
translation.pcm: Di roselle seed coat or cover na hin dem dey use produce d popular zobo juice for Nigeria, wey dey consider use for di treatment of stomach pain, high blood pressure, weight loss, among odas

translation.en: In some countries, it is used in tea production, colouring, dyeing, drug production and cosmetics.
translation.pcm: For some kontri, dem dey use am for tea production, colourin, dyein, drug production and bicosmetic

translation.en: Another farmer and merchant of zobo, Ali Makeri, complained that one of the challenges they were facing was the relocation of the market by the authorities of Mashi Local Government Area, which he said was affecting patronage.
translation.pcm: anoda farmer and merchant of zobo, Ali Makeri, complain say one of di challenge wey dem face na di relocation of di market by di authority of Mashi Local goment Area, wey am tok say e dey affect patronage

translation.en: According to him, the market has been relocated severally to various places, which are far away from the Mashi main market.
translation.pcm: Accordin to am, di market don relocate plenti time to different place, wey far from Mashi main market

translation.en: He further said, Even though we pay revenue to the local government and create jobs, for over five times they have been relocating us from one bushy area to another.
translation.pcm: Hin later tok say even if we pay revenue to di local goment kom create job for ova five time dem dey relocate us from one bushy area to anoda

translation.en: Once they discovered that we had settled and developed a particular place, they would come overnight and take us to another isolated area.
translation.pcm: Once wey dem discover say we don settle, kom develop one particular place, dey go don kom ovanight kom take us go anoda place wey neva open

translation.en: The last one was this year when they brought us here, close to the Mashi Ultra-Modern Market.
translation.pcm: Di last one na for dis year wen dey bring us kom here, close to di Mashi Ultra Modern Market

translation.en: It is far away from the main market and our customers are scared to come here, for security purposes.
translation.pcm: E dey far from di main market and awa customer dey fear to kom here, for security purpose

translation.en: Therefore, we are appealing to the chairman to reason with us and allocate a permanent and convenient place close to the main market because most of our customers come from different parts of the country; and they will be comfortable if we are close to the main market.
translation.pcm: Therefore, we dey beg di chairman make he reason wit us and make he give us permanent and convenient place wey go dey close to di main market because most of our customers kom from different parts of di kontri; and dey go dey comfortable if we dey close to di main market.

translation.en: On whether zobo farmers in Katsina State have the capacity to produce large quantities for export, Makeri said, Why not?
translation.pcm: On top di mata say whether zobo farmer for Katsina State get di capacity to produce large quantity for export, Makeri tok say; why dey no fit

translation.en: There are hundreds of men and women hibiscus farmers in Katsina State because it is lucrative.
translation.pcm: Na hundreds of man and woman wey be hibiscus farmer dey for Katsina State bikos say e dey bring moni.

translation.en: Last year alone, we sold it at N8,000 per bag from the beginning, and at some point, it reached N20,000 per bag.
translation.pcm: Last year alone, we sell am for N8,000 per bag from di beginnin, and for some point, e reach N20,000 per bag

translation.en: All we need is support.
translation.pcm: wetin we need na support

translation.en: If government can attract investors here and build a factory that can supply us with fertiliser, equipment and loans to hire more lands, I can assure you that we will generate more revenue for Nigeria.
translation.pcm: If goment fit attract investor here and dey kom build factory wey fit supply us wit fertiliser, equipment and loan to hire more pipo, I fit assure you say we go generate more revenue for Nigeria

translation.en: Another farmer, Malam Yusuf Gwani Gobirawa in Kaita Local Government Area complained that herdsmen from neighbouring Niger Republic invaded their farms before they could finish harvesting this year.
translation.pcm: anoda farmer, Malam Yusuf Gwani Gobirawa for Kaita Local goment Area complain say herdsmen from neighbourin Niger Republic invade dia farm before dey fi finish harvest dis year

translation.en: He said, Our hibiscus did not ripe very well when we noticed that herdsmen from Niger Republic arrived and started pushing their animals into our farms.
translation.pcm: Him tok say awa hibiscus no ripe well wen we notice di herdsmen from Niger Republic arrive kom start to dey push dia animal for awa farm

translation.en: However, the member representing us in the House of Assembly intervened through traditional rulers and we were asked to quickly harvest anything remaining in our farms in order to avoid clashes with the herdsmen.
translation.pcm: Howeva, di member wey dey represent us for House of Assembly intervene through awa tradition ruler and dey kom tell us say make we quick harvest anythin wey remain for awa farm in order to avoid clash wit dem herdsmen

translation.en: I got only 45 bags as against the 70 to 80
translation.pcm: I get only 45 bag instead of 70 to 80

translation.en: I expected this year.
translation.pcm: I dey expect dis year

translation.en: Our borders are porous.
translation.pcm: awa borders no dey secure

translation.en: Government needs to check the activities of these herdsmen from Niger Republic by closing the border, especially when it comes towards the end of seasons so that we can peacefully harvest our farm produce.
translation.pcm: goment need check di activity of dis herdsmen from Niger Republic by closin di border, especially if e kom towards di end of season so we go fit peacefully harvest awa farm produce

translation.en: You know we largely depend on local manure from our domestic cattle.
translation.pcm: You no say wetin we dey depend on pass na local manure from awa domestic cattle

translation.en: But now, we cannot keep our animals away from home.
translation.pcm: But now, we no fit carry awa animal comot from home

translation.en: Even at home, we are having sleepless nights to protect them from being stolen.
translation.pcm: Even for house, we dey get sleepless night to protect dem so dem no go steal dem

translation.en: We are really helpless in the hands of the rustlers.
translation.pcm: We dey helpless for di hand of di rustlers

translation.en: Zobo is sold in Dankama, Mashi and Maiadua markets in the state.
translation.pcm: dem dey sell zobo for Dankama, Mashi and Maia adua market for di state

translation.en: The current market price is between N7,500 and N8,000 per bag.
translation.pcm: Di current market price dey between 7,500 and N8,000 per bag

translation.en: It is expected to reach N20,000 before the beginning of next season.
translation.pcm: E dey expected ro reach N20,000 before di beginnin of next season

translation.en: The major producers of the crop in Nigeria are Katsina, Kano, Bauchi, Borno, Gombe and Jigawa states.
translation.pcm: Di major producer of di crop for Nigeria na dem Katsina, Kano, Bauchi, Borno, Gombe and Jigawa State

translation.en: In 2017 the Nigerian Agricultural Quarantine Service (NAQS) disclosed that the country generated $35million within nine months in 2017 from zobo export.
translation.pcm: For 2017 di Nigerian Agricultural Quarantine Service NAQS disclose say di county generate $35million witin nine month for 2017 from zobo export

translation.en: Lagos East: Court of Appeal upholds Abirus victory
translation.pcm: Lagos East Court of Appeal uphold Abiru victory

translation.en: The Court of Appeal has dismissed the appeal filed by the candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in the December 5 Lagos East Senatorial by-election, Babatunde Olalere Gbadamosi.
translation.pcm: Di court of Appeal don dismiss di appeal wey  di candidate of di People's Democratic parti PDP don file for December 5 lagos East Senatorial by election, Babatunde Olalere Gbadamosi

translation.en: The presiding judge, Justice Daniel Kallio dismissed the prayers of the appellants seeking to upturn the victory of the All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate, Senator Mukhail Adetokunbo Abiru, for lacking in merit.
translation.pcm: Di judge wey dey preside, Justice Daniel Kallio dismiss di prayers of di pesin wey dey appell wey wan upturn di victory of di All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate, Senator Mukhail Adetokunbo Abiru, bikos dey no get merit.

translation.en: In the ruling delivered virtually, the court said PDP and its candidates appeal was unmeritorious.
translation.pcm: For di rulin wey dey hear virtually, the court said PDP and its candidate dem appeal no get merit .

translation.en: It subsequently affirmed the judgment of the Federal High Court, Lagos.
translation.pcm: E later affirm di judgment of di Federal High Court, Lagos.

translation.en: In dismissing the appeal, the Court of Appeal held that the residency of a candidate to an election is not a qualifying or disqualifying factor.
translation.pcm: As dem use dismiss di appeal , di Court of Appeal tok say di residency of candidate to election no bequalifyin or disqualifyin factor.
