translation.en: Why Abia prefers dry port to airport ” Gov. Ikpeazu

translation.en: The Governor of Abia State, Dr. Okezie Ikpeazu has said that the state under his administration would prefer to build a dry port instead of an airport.
translation.pcm: Di goment of Abia state, Dr Okezie Ikpeazu don tok say di state under him admistration go like build dry port instead airport

translation.en: As governor of this state, I am thinking of a dry port.
translation.pcm: As governor of di state I dey think of dry port

translation.en: I have heard people ask why not an airport
translation.pcm: I don hear pipo dey ask why e no fit be airport

translation.en: and I want to seize this opportunity to officially respond to the issue of an airport.
translation.pcm: I wan take dis opportunity to officially respond to di issue of airport

translation.en: For me, the need for a dry port will serve the economic interest of my people better than the need for an airport
translation.pcm: for me, di need for dry port go serve di economic  interest of my pipo beta dan di need to airport

translation.en: I am happy to acknowledge the fact that neighbouring states to Abia have airports.
translation.pcm: I dey hapi to acknowlege di fact say neigbourin state to Abia get airport

translation.en: What that means is that within 100 kilometres radius, Abia will have access to airport, but what you cannot find within a hundred kilometres radius is a dry port,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say; wetin dis mean na say witin 100 kilometres radius, Abia go get access to airport,  wetin u no fi find witin hundred kilometres radius na dry port

translation.en: The Governor said an airport in Abia would likely serve less than 10 per cent of the Abia populace and business interest, considering that such airport would not have an operational international cargo status.
translation.pcm: Di governor tok say airport for Abia go serve less than 10 per cent of di Abia populace and business interest, to dey consider say dat kind airport go get operational cargo status

translation.en: So, I think the way to go is to look at what will serve my people, about 95 per cent of goods you find at the seaport in Apapa and Onne ports including those that are delayed for three months belong to my people here in Abia.
translation.pcm: Be like say di way to go na to look wetin go serve pesin, na 95 per cent of good u go find for di seaport for Apapa and One ports include di one wey dem delay for three month wey dey for pipo of Abia

translation.en: As the governor, the question I ask myself is, can I in any way lift this burden when I bring them to a point of importing or exporting goods to or from Abia?
translation.pcm: As di governor, di question  wey I ask myself na, I fit for any way wey I fit lift dis burden wen I bring dem to point to dey import or export goods of Abia

translation.en: That is why I think that a dry port will serve the business interest of my people than an airport,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say; Na way I think say na dry port go serve di business interest of my pipo pass airport

translation.en: Inflation rate drops to 18.12%, first in 20 months
translation.pcm: Inflation rate don drop to 18.12%, first for 20 months

translation.en: Inflation rate has dropped to 18.12 percent in April from 18.17 percent recorded in March, the latest report said.
translation.pcm: Inflation rate don drop to 18.12 percent  for April from 18.17 percent wey dey record fo March, na e di last report tok

translation.en: The decline in inflation rate which is slightly at 0.5 percent, is the first in the last 20 months since the country recorded a steady rise.
translation.pcm: Di decline inflation rate wey dey slightly for 0.5 percent na di first for di last 20 months since di kontri record steady rise

translation.en: The rural index also rose by 0.95% in April, down by 0.57% from the 1.52% recorded in March 2021.
translation.pcm: Di rural index rise by 0.95% for April, down by 0.57% from di 1.52% wey dem record for March 2021

translation.en: Food inflation rate declined to 22.75% in April from 22.95% in March.
translation.pcm: Food inflation rate don decline to 22.75% for April from 22.95% for march

translation.en: The rise in the food index was caused by an increase in prices of coffee, tea, coca, bread and cereals, soft drinks, milk, cheese and eggs, among others, it noted.
translation.pcm: Di raise for food index na price of coffee,tea, coca, bread and cereals, soft drinks, milk, cheese and egg na e kos am we don notice am

translation.en: On a month-on-month basis, the food sub index increased by 0.99% in April 2021, down by 0.91% points from 1.90% recorded in March 2021.
translation.pcm: For Evri month, food sub index increase from 0.99% for April 2021, down to 091% point from 1.90% wey dem record for March 2021

translation.en: Analysis of the report showed that food inflation in April was highest in Kogi at (30.52%), Ebonyi (28.07%) and Sokoto (26.09%).
translation.pcm: Analysis of di report show say di food inflation for April dey high for Kogi for (30.52%), Ebonyi(28.07%) and Sokoto(26.09%)

translation.en: The following states recorded the least food inflation: Abuja (18.63%), Akwa-Ibom (18.51%), and Bauchi (17.64%).
translation.pcm: Di followin state record di last food inflation Auja(18.63%), Akwa-Ibom(18.51%) and Bauchi(17.64%)

translation.en: The highest increases were recorded in prices of pharmaceutical products, vehicle spare parts, hairdressing salons, and personal grooming establishments, major household goods, fuel and lubricants among others.
translation.pcm: Di increase wey high pass na hin dey record for price of pharmaceutical product, vehicle spare part, and personal groomin wey dem establish, major household good, fuel and lubricant among odas

translation.en: Gov Sule throws weight behind Keffi Polo tourney
translation.pcm: Gov Sule throw weight for back of Keffi Polo  tourney

translation.en: The Governor of Nasarawa State, Engineer Abdulahi Sule has thrown his weight behind the 2021 Keffi Polo tournament billed for 21-28 of June in Keffi.
translation.pcm: Di Governor of Nasarawa state, Engineer Abdulahi Sule don throw hin weight for back of 2021 Keffi Polo tournament wey dem bill for 21-28 for June for Keffi

translation.en: Sule said sports is not only a veritable tool for fostering friendship, national unity and cultural understanding but also a magnet for international diplomacy and global investment.
translation.pcm: Sule tok say sport no be di only veritable tool for fosterin friendship, national unity and cultural understandin but also magnet for international diplomacy and global investment

translation.en: He said the state is proud to host and support the Keffi Ranch and its choice sport of polo as a way of showcasing to the world that the state welcomes prospective investors.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di state dey proud to host and support di Keffi Ranch and e be choice sport for polo as way to showcase to di world say di state welkom prospective investor

translation.en: Sule also commended the founder of Keffi Polo Ranch, Hon.
translation.pcm: Sule also commend di founder of Keffi Polo Ranch, Hon

translation.en: Ahmed Wadada for his tenacity, zeal and commitment to the promotion of the game in the state.
translation.pcm: Ahmed Wadada of hin tenancity, zeal and commitment to di promotion of di game for di state

translation.en: Ive always believed in giving back to society.
translation.pcm: Always believe to dey give back to di society

translation.en: Its a huge pleasure to champion the birth of polo here and use the proceeds to benefit the orphanages and education in Nasarawa State
translation.pcm: Na huge pleasure to champion di birth of polo for here and kom use di proceed benefit di orphange and education for Nasarawa state

translation.en: and Ive been lucky my little efforts are yielding results,he said.
translation.pcm: I don dey lucky my little effort dey yield result hin tok

translation.en: Tournament Manager, Bashir Mohammed told Polo Royals that the 2021 edition would be better as he disclosed that many teams have indicated interest to vie for top laurels during the weeklong fiesta.
translation.pcm: Tournament manager, Bashir Mohammed tell Polo Royals say di 2021 edition go beta as hin tok say many team don indicate interest to di for top laurel for di week-long fiesta

translation.en: Wike, Amaechi bicker over cause of insecurity in Rivers
translation.pcm: Wike, Amaechi bicker on top insecurity for Rivers

translation.en: Rivers State Governor Nyesom Wike has countered transport minister Rotimi Amaechis claim linking insecurity in Rivers to unemployment.
translation.pcm: River state Governor Nyesom Wike don counter transport minister Rotimi Amaechi claim say hin link insecurity for River to Unempolyment

translation.en: Amaechi had made the comments during the defection of two former commissioners in Wikes administration to the APC in Port Harcourt.
translation.pcm: Amaechi don make di comment wen di defection of two former commissioner for Wike administration to di APC  for Port Harcourt

translation.en: He had also countered the imposition of a curfew in Rivers arguing that he took the war to the camp of criminals terrorising the state when he was governor.
translation.pcm: Hin don counter di imposition of  curfew for Rivers argurin say hin take di war to di camp of dem criminal wey dey terrorize di state wen hin be governor

translation.en: In a statement issued by Wikes special assistant on media, Kevin Ebiri, the governor called the ministers comments disingenuous.
translation.pcm: for one statement way Wike tok, special assistant on media, Kevin Ebiri, di governor call di minister comments out

translation.en: Is unemployment fuelling insecurity in Kaduna, Plateau, Borno, Yobe, Ondo, Ebony, Imo, Niger States governed by the All Progressives Congress (APC),he queried.
translation.pcm: unemployment  wey dey fuel insecurity for Kaduna, Plateau, Borno, Yobe, Ondo, Ebony, Imo, Niger state wey dem All Progressive Congress APC him query

translation.en: He said if the minister, who is the immediate past governor of the state has any modicum of sincerity, he will attest to the fact that security is the sole responsibility of the federal government.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di minister, who be di governor wey just comot for di state get any modicum of sincerity, hin go attest to di fact say security na di sole responsiblity of di federal goment

translation.en: It is a well-known fact that Amaechi is the one who appoints every Commissioner of Police that has been posted to Rivers State since 2015.
translation.pcm: E dey know say Amaechi na di wan wey appoint Evri Commissioner of Police wey dem post to River state since 2015

translation.en: So, if there is any security failure, he is to blame,he pointed out.
translation.pcm: so, if security failure dey, na hin we go blame, hin point out

translation.en: Governor Wike described the ministers utterance on the current imposition of curfew in the State, following the recent attacks on police formations, as rather unfortunate.
translation.pcm: Governor Wike describe di minister yan on top di current imposition of curfew for di state, followin di recent attack of police formations, as unfortunate

translation.en: Perhaps, the minister is happy that members of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) are killing innocent policemen, who were protecting lives and property.
translation.pcm: Maybe, di minister dey hapi say di member of di proscibed indigious pipo of Biafra(IPOB) dey kill innocent policemen, wey dey protect live and property

translation.en: Is Amaechi happy that the weapons of this slain security personnel were carted away by the hoodlums?
translation.pcm: so Amaechi dey hapi say di weapon of dis slain security personnel na hin dem hoodlums carry comot

translation.en: Amaechi, from all indications, has lost focus and is now frustrated,he stated.
translation.pcm: hin tok say; Amaechi, from all way, hin don lose focus and hin don dey frustrate

translation.en: Diet and brain training help Mickelson to major history
translation.pcm: Diet and brain trainin na hin hep Mickelson for hin major history

translation.en: Phil Mickelson is not the first middle-aged person to change his diet and engage in brain training in a quest to feel and perform better, but he is the first to win a major golf championship after turning 50.
translation.pcm: Phil Mickelson no be di first middle age person to change hin Diet and kom engage for brain trainin for quest to feel and perform beta, but hin first to win major golf championship afta wen hin be 50

translation.en: While Mickelsons performance at the PGA Championship will provide further that it is not too late to pad those career resumes with another major victory.
translation.pcm: Wen Mickelson performance for PGA Championship go provide more wey no too late to pad dem career resume wit anoda major victory

translation.en: Theres no reason why golf can't be the game for a lifetime if you take care of your body and do it the right way,the Californian said after beating Brooks Koepka and Louis Oosthuizen by two strokes at Kiawah Island on Sunday.
translation.pcm: E no get any reason why golf no fit be di gamewey pesin fit play for life if you dey take care of your body and you do am di right way, di Californian tok dat one afta hin beat Brooks Koepka and Louis Oosthuizen by two strokes for Kiawah Island on Sunday.

translation.en: US based group plans to revive baseball in Nigeria
translation.pcm: Group wey base for US plan to receive basefall for NIGERIA

translation.en: The International Sports Association (ISA), a US-based global sports body, has indicated its readiness to revive baseball and softball games in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di international Sport Association (ISA) global sports bodi wey base for US, don indicate hin readiness to wake baseball and softball game for Nigeria

translation.en: To this end, it has concluded plans to build a baseball sports academy in Ilorin in its first phase of the audacious project expected to gulp millions of dollars across the country to develop young talents.
translation.pcm: To dis end,  e don finish plan to build baseball sports academy for Ilorin for di first phase of di audacious project wey dem dey expect to gulp million dollars pass di kontri to develop young talents

translation.en: Speaking with journalists in Ilorin, the president of the ISA, Jason Alan Charles, who led other members of the organization to the state said the development programme would train indigenous coaches who are expected to bring out the best in the young lads.
translation.pcm: Di president of the ISA, as he dey follow journalists tok, Jason Alan Charles, wey lead di members of the organization to di state tok say development programme go train indigenous coach dem wey dem dey expect make dem bring out di best for di young pikin dem.

translation.en: We intend to achieve all these through the construction of academies, training of indigenous coaches through coaching clinic, courses, classes, online video and manuals among others to avail them requisite knowledge and ability to excel and produce world-class talents in baseball, he noted.
translation.pcm: He tok say; We get intension to achieve all dis one with di construction of academics,to dey train indigenous coach dem through coachin clinic, courses, classes, online video and manual among oda to avail dem requisite knowledge and ability to excel and produce world-class talents in baseball.

translation.en: According to him, the programme, expected to kick-start in August in Kwara state, would focus on scouting for young talents in baseball across the state from age six to university undergraduates.
translation.pcm: Accordin to ham, di programme, wey dem dey expect make e start for August for Kwara state, go focus on to dey find young talents for baseball across di state from age six to university undergraduates

translation.en: Also speaking, the states Director of Sports, Ibrahim Alarape, praised ISA for the choice of Kwara state to pilot the baseball game development programme, saying that the sports academy would also propel enthusiasm among lovers of the game.
translation.pcm: Di state Director of Sports, Ibrahim Alarape sef tok, He praised ISA for di choice of Kwara state make dem control dibaseball game development programme, he tok say di sports academy go bring enthusiasm among lovers of di game.

translation.en: Team Nigeria Japan camp opens July 3 for Tokyo Olympics
translation.pcm: Team Nigeria Japan camp dey open for July 3 for Tokyo Olympics

translation.en: The Federal Ministry of  Youth and Sports Development has unveiled a comprehensive plan for Team Nigeria towards winning medals at the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.pcm: Di Federal Ministry for Youth and Sport Development don show comprehensive plan for Team Nigeria to win medals for di Tokyo Olympics

translation.en: According to the roadmap released by the Permanent Secretary of the ministry, Nebeolisa Anako on Thursday, the final stage of local camping will take place from May 15 to July 6 in Bayelsa, Abuja, Lagos and Port Harcourt.
translation.pcm: Accordin to di road map wey di Permanent Secretary of di ministry release, Nebeolisa Anako for Thursday, di final stage of local campin go apun for May 15 to July 6 for Beyelsa, Abuja, Lagos and Port Harcourt

translation.en: Track and Field National Olympics Trials will take place between June 17 and July 19, while the African Athletics Championship takes centre stage from June 22 to 26.
translation.pcm: Track and Field National Olympics Trails go apun for June 17 and July 19, as di Africa Athlectic Championship go take stage from June 22 to 26

translation.en: The last phase of the camping will be in Kisarazu, Japan, from July 3 to 23, when the first batch of athletes will enter the Games Village for the Olympics proper.
translation.pcm: Di last phase of di campin go be for Kisarazu, Japan, from July 3 to 23, wen di first batch of dem athletes go enter di Game Village for di Olympics proper

translation.en: Nigeria will present about 80 athletes in 10 Sports at the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.pcm: Nigeria  go present like 80 athletes for 10 sport for Tokyo Olympics

translation.en: Wrestling, taekwondo, table tennis, male and female basketball are some of the events Nigeria have qualified.
translation.pcm: Wrestlin, taekwondo, table tennis, male and female baseball go dey part of di event wey Nigeria don qualify for

translation.en: Others are track and field, weightlifting and rowing, canoeing and sailing.
translation.pcm: Order na track and field, weighliftin and rowin, canoein and sailin

translation.en: Nigeria decided to narrow down her participation to sports where she has competitive advantage in winning medals.
translation.pcm: Nigeria decide to narrow down her participation to sport wia she get competitive advantage to win medals

translation.en: Minister of Youth and Sports Development Sunday Dare has maintained that Team Nigeria will improve on her performance of the last two Olympics, where she won only two bronze in football and Track and Field.
translation.pcm: Miniter  for Youth and Sport Development Sunday Dare don maintain say Team Nigeria go improve for her performance of di last two Olympics, wia she win only two bronze for football track and field

translation.en: Meanwhile, the Nigeria female Rowing team departed for Lucerne,  Switzerland, on Wednesday to participate in the final Qualifiers for the Regatta event of the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, di Nigeria female rowin team depart from Lucerne, Switzerland, on Wednesday to participate for di fnal Qualifiers for di Regatta event for di Tokyo Olympics

translation.en: Ahmed Musa may leave Pillars in June

translation.en: Super Eagles captain, Ahmed Musa, has given a hint that he may leave Kano Pillars in June.
translation.pcm: Super Eagles captain, Ahmed Musa, don give hint say hin fit comot for Kano Pillars for June

translation.en: The former CSKA Moscow and Leicester City striker joined Pillars temporarily having been without a club for months.
translation.pcm: Di former CSKA Moscow and Leicester City striker join Pillars temporary bikos say hin no get club for months

translation.en: Although he refused to disclose his next destination, he said by next month, it will be known.
translation.pcm: Although him refuse to say hin di next place wey hin dey go hin tok say next month, hin go know

translation.en: In an interview he granted on Wednesday, Musa also said he is not the one to advise Nigerian players based in Europe to return to the NPFL.
translation.pcm: For one interview wey hin do for Wednesday, Musa tok say no be ham go advise Nigerian players wey dey Europe to return NPFL

translation.en: I cant speak for everyone.
translation.pcm: I no fi tok for Evribodi

translation.en: I can only speak for myself.
translation.pcm: Na only myself I fi tok for

translation.en: I am very happy to come back to Nigeria to play football.
translation.pcm: I dey hapi to kom back Nigeria to kom play ball

translation.en: It is a matter of time.
translation.pcm: Na mata of time

translation.en: Maybe in the next one month, I may not be in Nigeria again.
translation.pcm: Maybe for di next month, I fit dey for Nigeria again

translation.en: Right now, I am happy coming back home to play.
translation.pcm: I dey hapi say I kom back house kom play

translation.en: For now, I dont have any concrete information but by next month, you will know,said Musa about his next destination.
translation.pcm: for now I no get concrete information but for next month, you go sabi Musa tok about di next place wey hin dey go

translation.en: Rabiu Ali, a hero
translation.pcm: Rabiu Ali, na hero

translation.en: Musa lauded his teammate, Rabiu Ali, for honouring him with Kano Pillars captains armband.
translation.pcm: Musa praise  hin teammate, Rabiu Ali, say hin honour am wit Kano Pillars captain arm band

translation.en: Few seconds before Kano Pillars week 21 clash with Adamawa United last Sunday, Ali handed over the captains band to Musa who eventually propelled the team to a 1-0 victory.
translation.pcm: Small seconds before Kano Pillars week 21 clash wit dem Adamawa United for last Sunday, Ali give di Musa captian band wey kom make di team win 1-0

translation.en: Musa who described Rabiu as Kano Pillars legend, said he felt honoured by the kind gesture of the player who is popularly called Pele.
translation.pcm: Musa wey describe Rabiu wey be Kano Pillars legend, say hin dey honour for di good thin wey player wey dem sabi as Pelea do

translation.en: He said: I have so much respect for Rabiu Ali.
translation.pcm: Him tok say hin get plenti respect for Rabiu Ali

translation.en: He is one of my legends.
translation.pcm: Hin be one of hin legend

translation.en: I played along with him back then in Kano Pillars.

translation.en: And coming back to play with him, I really respect him a lot

translation.en: and I want to say a big thank you to him for what he did the other day.

translation.en: I really want to thank him.

translation.en: Tsitsipas to meet Norrie in Lyon final
translation.pcm: Tsitsipas go meet Norrie for Lyon final

translation.en: World number five Stefanos Tsitsipas came from a set down to beat Lorenzo Musetti 4-6, 6-3, 6-0 on Saturday and reach the final of the ATP event in Lyon.
translation.pcm: World number five Stefanos Tsitsipas kom from set down to kom beat Lorenzo Musetti 4-6,6-3,6-0 for Sunday and kom reach ATP final for Lyon

translation.en: In Sundays final, the 22-year-old Greek will face Britains Cameron Norrie who raced past Karen Khachanov 6-1, 6-1 in the other semi-final.
translation.pcm: For Sunday final, di 22 years old Greek go face Britain Cameron Norrie wey race pass Karen Khachanov 6-1,6-1 for semi final

translation.en: Norrie, 25, had already played on Saturday morning having beaten French hope Arthur Rinderknech 6-3, 3-6, 6-3 in a quarter-final suspended overnight with the last set still to play.
translation.pcm: Norrie,25 don play for Saturday morning afta wey hin beat French hope Arthur Rinderknech 6-3,3-6,6-3 for quarter final wey dem suspend ovanight wit di  last set wey neva still play

translation.en: Musetti, 19, came into the event as an alternate but made the most of his chance with wins over seventh seed Felix Auger-Aliassime, Sebastian Korda and Aljaz Bedene.
translation.pcm: Musetti,19, kom inside di event as alternate but make di plenti of hin chance wit win over seventh seed Felix Auger-Aliassime, Sebastian Korda and Aljaz Bedene

translation.en: The Italian teenager grabbed the first set but Tsitsipas gradually took charge.
translation.pcm: Di Italian teenager grab di  first set but Tsitsipas kom small small take charge

translation.en: It was important I had a match like this,said Tsitsipas on the court after the match.
translation.pcm: E dey important say I get dis kind match, Tsitsipas tok ham for place wey dem follow play afta di match

translation.en: It makes me stay humble and focus on some detailed things I can potentially improve and get better at on clay.
translation.pcm: E make am dey humble and focus on top some detail thin wey hin fi improve kom beta on top for clay

translation.en: I had to stay calm.
translation.pcm: I gats stay calm

translation.en: It was difficult to be a set down and have to kind of refresh myself and come anew in the second set.
translation.pcm: E dey difficult make pesin dey set down and kom go refresh hinsef and kom anew for second set

translation.pcm: Dem fans want make dem sack Osho as Enyimba comot for Confed Cup

translation.pcm: Fans of Enyinba don call make dem sack di technical adviser, Coach Fatai Osho afta wey di pipo elephant comot for dis year CAF Confederation Cup for Sunday

translation.en: After suffering a 4-1 loss in the first leg, Enyimba forced Pyramids of Egypt to a 1-1 draw in the return leg in Aba to exit the competition on a 2-5 aggregate.
translation.pcm: Afta wey dem suffer 4-1 loss for di first leg, Enyimba  by force play Pyramid of Egypt 1-1 draw for dia return leg for Abia wey dem use comot di competition for 2-5 aggregate

translation.en: Immediately after the match, fans of Enyimba expressed their disappointment while calling for the sack of the coach.
translation.pcm: Immediately afta di match, fans of Enyimba express dia disappointment as dem dey call for di sack of di coach

translation.en: An ardent fan, Austin Ihenacho said I think we Enyimba fans are tired of putting up with osho and his local tactics.
translation.pcm: Austin Ihenacho wey bi dia fan wey dem sabi too much tok say hin think Enyimba fans don tire to dey put wit osho and hin local tactics

translation.pcm: How tactic for football for di 21st century

translation.en: It shows he doesnt have any other trick up his sleeves.

translation.en: Ugo Udogu said Enyimba is so bad, below amateur level and with no structure.
translation.pcm: Ugo Udogu tok say Enyimba too bad, pass amateur level and wit no structure

translation.en: With Fatai Osho, Enyimba have fallen from grace to grass.
translation.pcm: Wit Fatai Osho, Enyimba don fall from grace to grass

translation.en: He should leave.
translation.pcm: Make hin comot

translation.en: On his part, Agbai Michael said the management of Enyimba shouldnt take the fans for granted.
translation.pcm: for hin part, Agbai Michael tok say make di management of Enyimba no take fans for granted

translation.en: If the current coach is not living up to expectations, show him the door.

translation.en: TAJBank expands, opens 3 branches in Abuja
translation.pcm: TAJBank expand, dey open 3 branch for Abuja

translation.pcm: TAJBank, na no interest bank, wey dem open three branch for Abuja as dey drive financial inclusion wen  dem dey offer innovertive financial service to dia customers

translation.pcm: Wuse market, di bank Chairman Alhaji Tanko Isiaku Gwamna tok say branch dey part of di bank mission to serve as catalyst for dem Micro, small and Medium Enterprises(MSME)

translation.pcm: Since di bank don open for December 2019, e don record  plenti feat wey include record profit for hin first year operation

translation.en: It plans to quickly expand its branch networks and extend its services to the six geopolitical zones.
translation.pcm: Hin plan to quick expand hin branch network and extend hin service to six geopolitical zone

translation.pcm: NALDA go engage 2,000 fish farmer, 1,040 wey be soil scientist for Borno

translation.pcm: Di maize pyramid don return too

translation.en: These pyramids have dotted the skylines in states like Kebbi, Niger, Katsina, Jigawa, Ekiti, and a host of others.
translation.pcm: Dis dem pyramid don dot di skylines for state like Kebbi, Niger, Katsina, Jigawa, Ekiti, and di rest

translation.en: For some others like Lagos, Edo, Rivers and more, there are CBN financed industries maximizing the farm produce to make products.
translation.pcm: for oda like Lagos, Edo, River and di rest, CBN finance industry dey wey dey maximize di farm produce to make somethin

translation.en: Recall that the pyramids were hitherto lost in Nigeria until the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) under the leadership of Mr Godwin Emefiele, initiated a refreshing focus on agriculture, industries, small and medium scale enterprises and other areas of the real sector.
translation.pcm: Remember say di pyramid dem dey dat time lose for Nigeria until di Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) wey Mr Godwin Emefiele dey lead, initiate new focus on top agriculture, industries, small and medium scale enterprise dem and oda area of di real sector.

translation.en: In fact, young adults in Nigeria of about 30 years never witnessed any agriculture produce pyramids until recently when the CBN made that happen.
translation.pcm: Adults for Nigeria wey still young wey dey for dat kind 30years neva see any agriculture produce pyramids until wey e no tay wey CBN make ham apun

translation.en: When the CBN launched the Anchor Borrowers Programme (ABP) over five years ago, it perhaps did not anticipate the scale of success the programme would record and the impact across the country.
translation.pcm: Wen CBN launch di Anchor Borrower programme ABP for five year wey we don use comot, e no for true anticipate di scale of success di programme go record and di impact across di kontri

translation.en: But five years down the line, Nigerias agricultural landscape has changed for good and no one single region or state is left behind.
translation.pcm: Five years wey we don use pass, Nigeria agricultue landscape don change from good and e no get region or state wey dey behind

translation.en: Also, it is significant to note that the benefits have been almost evenly distributed from the north to the south from the about N700 billion released for the targeted crops and animals, and their value chains.
translation.pcm: E dey significant to note say di benefit don almost distribute from di north to di south pass N700 billion wey dey don release for di target crop and animal, and dia value chain

translation.en: Speaking recently in Ado Ekiti at the public unveiling of the Ekiti rice pyramid project and flag-off of the wet season rice cultivation, the CBN Governor, Mr Emefiele, said over N300bn of the about N700bn already distributed for agriculture, has been disbursed to the southern part of country including Lagos, Edo, Ekiti, and Ondo states.
translation.pcm: As he dey tok recently for Ado Ekiti for di public unveilin of the Ekiti rice pyramid project and flag-off of di wet season rice cultivation, di CBN Governor, Mr Emefiele, tok say ova N300bn of di moni wey almost reach N700bn wey dey don already distribute on top agriculture, dey don share am for di southern part of country includin Lagos, Edo, Ekiti, and Ondo state dem.

translation.en: He said 21 agricultural commodities have been the most targeted, among which included rice, maize, wheat, oil palm, cocoa and several others.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say 21 agriculture commodity na e dey target pass di rest wey be Rice, maize, wheat, oil palm, cocoa and di rest

translation.en: From inception till date, we have financed 3,107,890 farmers for the cultivation of 3,801,397 hectares across 21 commodities through 23 Participating Financial Institutions in the 36 States of the Federation and FCT,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say;From di beginnin till date, we don give 3,107,890 farmers moni for di cultivation of 3,801,397 hectares across 21 commodity through 23 Participatin Financial Institutions for di 36 State of the Federation and FCT.

translation.en: Emefiele noted that the positive impact of the Anchor Borrowers Programme can be seen in all our agrarian communities as it has brought hope to the farming population through the timely delivery of agricultural inputs and the provision of a guaranteed market for their outputs at a market determined price.
translation.pcm: Emefiele tok say dem fit see di positive impact of di Anchor Borrower Programme or all ourr agrarian community as e don bring hope kom di farmin population through di timely delivery of agricultural inputs and di provision of  market wey get guarantee for dia outputs for price wey di market go determine.

translation.en: He said the ABP has been able to support some of our macroeconomic objectives by enabling more employment opportunities, driving financial inclusion and improving access to finance in our rural communities.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say ABP don fit support some of awa macro economic objective as to dey allow employment opportunity wey dey drive financial inclusion and to dey provide access to finance for awa rural community

translation.en: Under the 2020 wet season RIFAN-CBN partnership, he said CBN financed 221,450 farmers for the cultivation of 221,450 hectares in 32 States.
translation.pcm: For under 2020 wet season RIFAN CBN partnership, hin tok say CBN finance 221, 450 farmer for di cultivation of 221,450 hactare for 32 state

translation.en: The pyramids being unveiled today are part of the harvest from the various fields from the South-West and other neighbouring States to demonstrate the spread of the movement and provide evidence that rice production is viable in all States of the Federation.
translation.pcm: Di pyramidswey dem open today dey part of di harvest from di different field from di South-West and oda neighbourin States to demonstrate di spread of di movement and provide evidence say rice production dey viable for all di State wey dey di Federation.

translation.en: He said beyond RIFAN, the CBN supported a number of prime/private anchors.
translation.pcm: hin tok say pass RIFAN, CBN support number of prime/private anchor

translation.en: Omoluabi Farms (Ekiti), Time Sellers (Ogun), Truechem (Ogun), Wems Agro (Ondo) and many more awaiting disbursements for the 2021 wet season.
translation.pcm: Omoluabi farm( Ekiti), time seller(Ogun), Wems Agro(Ondo) and di rest dey wait disbursement for 2021 season

translation.en: Thus, CBNs huge support for agriculture is ensuring food sufficiency, empowerment of peasant farmers and helping to save foreign exchange for Nigeria as less food imports happen.
translation.pcm: CBN big support for agriculture na to ensure say food dey sufficient, empowerment for dem small farmer and to dey help save foriegn exchange for Nigeria as small food import dey apun

translation.en: The CBN has continued to rev up investments in the agricultural space.
translation.pcm: CBN don continue to carry up investment for di agriculture space

translation.en: It has commenced the 2021 wet season farming investments.
translation.pcm: E don start di 2021 wet season farm investment

translation.en: Emefiele said: We have a very optimistic outlook for the 2021 wet season.
translation.pcm: Emefiele tok say we get optimistic outlook for di 2021 wet season

translation.en: We will bring to bear our learning experiences over the past years, adoption of hybrids and high yielding varieties, timely supply of inputs to take advantage of the planting seasons, and good market linkages to sustain our effort at increasing production.
translation.pcm: We go bring to bear our learnin experience ova di past years, adoption of hybrids dem and high yieldin varieties dem, supply of inputs wey go dey on time to take advantage of di plantin seasons dem, and good market linkage use sustain our effort to dey increase production.

translation.en: We have planned a minimum one million hectares of rice through a combination of RIFAN farmers and prime/private anchors for each planting season in 2021.
translation.pcm: We don plant minimum one million hactares of rice through combination of RIFAN farmer and prime/private anchors for each plantin seeason for 2021

translation.en: Our backward integration drive with rice millers is also gaining momentum as we intend to finance some millers to grow their own paddy during this wet season.
translation.pcm: awa backward integration dey drive wit rice millers e dey also gain momentum as we intend to finance some millers to grow dia own paddy for dis wet season

translation.en: We also have aggressive production plans for maize, wheat, soybeans, cassava, sorghum and cassava,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say; We get aggressive production plans for maize, wheat, soybeans, cassava, sorghum and cassava,

translation.en: The governor also indicated that the CBN will be helping states with funds to clear land as land clearing is a huge problem to farming.
translation.pcm: Di governor sef indicate say di CBN go dey hep states wit moni to clear land as land clearin na big problem for farmin.

translation.en: Land clearing, access to irrigation, and availability of high yielding seeds have remained the greatest challenge to increased agricultural production in the South and we have provided long term financing options targeted at unlocking more land for agricultural production nationwide.
translation.pcm: Land clearin, access for irrigation, and availability of high yieldin seeds don remain di greatest challenge to increase agricultural production for di South and we don provide long term finance option dem wey go dey give more land for agricultural production nationwide.

translation.en: The Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (AADS) and the Private-Sector Led Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (P-AADS) were established to address this concern for the State Government and Private Sector players respectively.
translation.pcm: Dem create di Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (AADS) and di Private-Sector Led Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (P-AADS) say make dem solve dis issue for di State Goment and Private Sector players respectively.

translation.en: The provision of other farm related infrastructure like irrigation facilities, rural access road, mechanization services, logistics and post-harvest handling activities can be accommodated under these interventionshe stated.
translation.pcm: He tok say; Di provision of oda farm wey relate to di infrastructure like irrigation facilities, rural access road, mechanization services, logistics and post-harvest handlin activities fit dey under dis intervention.

translation.en: He also said if farmers pay their loans, the CBN could intervene in more areas thus urging the farmers who benefited from the loans to pay back.
translation.pcm: He tok sef say if farmers pay dia loans, CBN fit put hand for more areas thus urgin di farmers wey benefit from the loans make dem pay back.

translation.en: Loan repayment is the hallmark of every credit cycle and the sustainability of the programme is hinged on farmers ability and willingness to repay their loans, and we are constantly engaging with them to enhance their trust in the system.
translation.pcm: Loan repayment na di hallmark of every credit wey pipo collect and the sustainability of di programme dey on top farmers ability and willingness to repay dia loan, and we dey engage dem wella wit dem to increase dia trust for di system.

translation.en: The pyramids being unveiled today are harvests from the financed fields that have been submitted as part of loan repayment by farmers under the RIFAN-CBN programme.
translation.pcm: The pyramid dem wey dey unveil  today na harvests from di financed fields dem wey dem been submit as part of loan repayment by farmers dem under di RIFAN-CBN programme.

translation.en: To further create value and transfer these gains across the value chain, we have mapped rice millers to off-take the paddies, and we will track the release of their outputs to the market, as we strive to manage inflation and grow the rice value chain in Nigeria,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say;To further create value and transfer dis gain across di value chain, we don map rice millers wey go dey off-take di paddies, and we go track di release of dia outputs to di market, as we dey strive to manage inflation and grow di rice value chain in Nigeria.

translation.en: In support of the growth recorded in this drive to attain self-sufficiency in food production and to moderate prices of agricultural commodities, Mr President has approved the resuscitation of the Nigeria Commodity Exchange (NCX).
translation.pcm: To support di growth wey dem record for dis drive to attain self-sufficiency for food production and to moderate price dem of agricultural commodities, Mr President don approve di resuscitation of di Nigeria Commodity Exchange (NCX).

translation.en: A vibrant commodity exchange will significantly enhance post-harvest handling, guarantee effective pricing for farmers, minimize the adverse effect of middlemen and commodity hoarders and ultimately transfer the gains from primary production to other nodes of the value chain.
translation.pcm: A vibrant commodity exchange enhance post-harvest handlin, guarantee effective pricin for farmers dem, minimize di adverse effect of middlemen and commodity hoarders and ultimately transfer to gains from primary production  oda nodes of di value chain.

translation.en: Considering the huge market and high population of Nigeria with the urgent need to eradicate poverty, it has successfully demonstrated the need to look inwards by taking advantage of the available fertile land, perennial river bodies and human resources for the production of rice.
translation.pcm: Considerin di kind huge market and high population of Nigeria wit di urgent nid to end poverty, it don successfully demonstrate di nid to luk inside by takin advantage of di available fertile land, perennial river bodies and human resource dem for di production of rice.

translation.en: The first two years of the programme (2015 to 2017) recorded significant increase in rice production with resultant decrease in rice importation.
translation.pcm: Di first two year of di programme(2015 reach 2017) record significant increase for rice production wit decrease for rice importation

translation.en: For instance, rice importation from Thailand fell from 644,131 metric tonnes in September 2015 to 20,000 metric tonnes in September 2017, which accounts for a drop of over 90%.
translation.pcm: For example to dey carri rice kom kontri from Thailand fall 644,131 metric tone for September 2015 to 20,000 matric tone for September 2017, wish account for drop pass 90%

translation.en: The success so far recorded was made possible because of the Anchor borrowers program introduced by the Federal government in conjunction with the Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) that has not only improved rice production but has also enhanced the quality through de-stoning.
translation.pcm: Di success so far record dey possible bikos of di Anchor borrowers program wey Federal goment introduce for conjunction wit di Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) dat one no not only improve rice production but don also enhance di quality through de-stoning.

translation.en: It has also seen the increase in the number of local rice mills,he stated.
translation.pcm: hin tok say; E don see di increase for di number of local rice mills

translation.en: He said the federal government disbursed money to the Anchor and in conjunction with the participating States, for land clearing, provision of seeds for planting, inputs such as knapsack sprayers, tube wells, pumping machines, ploughs, combined harvesters, rice milling machines and production lines, packaging were also provided.
translation.pcm: He tok say federal goment share di moni to di Anchor and in conjunction wit di participatin States, for land clearin, provision of seeds for plantin, inputs like  knapsack sprayers, tube wells, pumpin machines, ploughs, combined harvesters, rice millin machines and production lines, packagin na hin dey provide.

translation.en: Furthermore, analysis of the ABP programme indicates that funds provided at low interest made possible: easy access to rice farmers; economies of scale as large clusters of farmers are enlisted into the programme; enhanced the rice value chain in the form of finance to primary producers to processors “ handlers “ wholesalers “ storage “ marketing (branding) “ export; improvement in farmers fortunes; and employment generation.
translation.pcm: Furthermore, analysis of di ABP programme show say funds wey dem provide for low interest make am possible: easy access to rice farmers dem; economies of scale as plenti of farmers na hin dem enlist into di programme; enhance di rice value chain in form of finance for primary producers go processors “ handlers “ wholesalers “ storage “ marketin (branding) “ export; improvement of farmers dem fortunes; and employment generation.

translation.en: The others are food sufficiency, thereby banishing poverty and insecurity; generation of revenue as farmers will now pay taxes; and improvement in the economy as naira gains value.
translation.pcm: Di remainin na food sufficient, so tey poverty banish and insecurity, generation of revenue as farmer go pay tax and improvement for economy as naira gain value

translation.en: He also noted that this ease of production of rice -the most valued staple in Nigeria- has been successfully practiced and celebrated in some states like Kebbi, Jigawa, Sokoto, Niger, Kwara, Ebonyi etc.
translation.pcm: Hin kom note say di ease of production of rice wey be di staple wey get value pass for Nigeria don successful practice and celebrate for some state like Kebbi, Jigawa, Sokoto, Niger, Kwara, Ebonyi

translation.en: It is gratifying that today, Ekiti State is now joining the train as a participant in the Anchor Borrowers Programme of the CBN, in partnership with the National body of Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria led by Alhaji Goronyo.
translation.pcm: E dey grate say today , Ekiti State don now join di train as participant for di Anchor Borrowers Programme of di CBN, wey dey partnership wit National bodi Rice farmer Association of Nigeria wey Anchor Borrower lead

translation.en: Bode George describes Constitution review as a charade
translation.pcm: Bode George describe constitution review as charade

translation.en: Former Deputy National Chairman of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Chief Olabode George, has described the ongoing constitutional review by the National Assembly as a charade.
translation.pcm: former Deputy National Chairman of di pipo Demcratic paryi (PDP)Chief Olabode George, don describe di constitution review wey dey go  by di National Assembly as charade

translation.en: He said the unanimous position of the Nigerian people is the total overhaul of the present constitution, adding, Nothing else will do.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di position wey dey unanimous of di Nigeria pipo na total overhaul of di present constitution addin, nothin else go do

translation.en: According to him, a genuineremedy would be to revisit the report of the 2014 Constitutional Conference which he noted has been generally applauded for the sweeping breadth of its equity and democratic balance in rectifying the prejudicial and unworkable structures that are on the ground now.
translation.pcm: Accordin to am, genuine remedy make dem go check di report of di 2014 Constitutional Conference again, wey he note say dey don generally applaud sake of di sweepin breadth of hin equity and democratic balance to correct di prejudicial and unworkable structures wey dey ground now.

translation.en: In an open letter to the Senate President, George also faulted the process of the ongoing constitution review, especially the public hearing held last week, noting that many people were deliberately denied the openness of democratic contributions.
translation.pcm: For one open letter to  Senate President, George fault di process of di constitution review wey dey go on, especially di public hearin wey apun last week, as he note say plenti pipo na hin dey purposely deny di openness of democratic contributions.

translation.en: He said, The hearing was stage-managed, anchored in prejudice, framed in puppeteering identification.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di hearing dey stage manage, anchored for prejudice, frame for puppeteerin indentification

translation.en: Alternative views were cast aside, flung into the pits.
translation.pcm: Alternative view na e dey cast aside, fling inside pit

translation.en: This is not right.
translation.pcm: Dis one no correct

translation.en: This is not just.
translation.pcm: Dis no dey just

translation.en: It is obvious that the Committee is not interested in true and thorough representation of the will of the Nigerian people.
translation.pcm: e really dey show say di Committee no dey ready  for true and thorough representation wey be di will of Nigeria pipo

translation.en: It appears to be working with a script towards a predetermined end.
translation.pcm: e appear say to dey work wit script near predetermined end

translation.en: The contributions were narrow, overtly partisan, one-sided, lacking in plural contributory logic.
translation.pcm: di contribution dey narrow, over partisan, one side, lackin for plural contribution logic

translation.en: This is not acceptable to the Nigerian people.
translation.pcm: Nigeria pipo no dey gree am

translation.en: The structure of the present constitution is so biased, so flawed and so mangled with inequities that a mere review will not be sufficient to correct all the glaring wrongs afflicting the Nigerian state.
translation.pcm: Di structure of di present contitution too get ojoro, e get flaw and e dey mingle wit inequities, he say mare review no go dey enough to correct all di glarin wrong wey dey afflict Nigeria state

translation.en: The PDP leader said as a believer in the unity of the Nigerian state, he stated that the nation can emerge stronger and better only when all the component units that make up our nation have a sense of belongingness and general accommodation regardless of tribe or sectarian belief, when everyone is treated equally without ethnic bias, when merit is the sole determinant of public positions.
translation.pcm: PDP leader tok say as a believerfor di unity of di Nigerian state, he tok say di nation fit emerge stronger and better only wen all di component units form our nation fit get sense of belongingness and general accommodation wey em no go dey look tribe or sectarian belief, wen evribodi  go be di same witout ethnic bias, wen merit na di sole determinant of public positions.

translation.en: This can only be achieved with a peoples constitution.
translation.pcm: We fit only achieve am wit dem pipo and constitution

translation.en: This is indeed what we should work for rather than the charade and the present jamboree that is chaired by Senator Ovie Omo “ Agege.
translation.pcm: Na wetin we suppose work for be dis instead charade and present jamboree wey Senator Ovie omo Agege

translation.en: Enough of this false and misleading engagement.
translation.pcm: E don do for all dis false and misleadin engagement

translation.en: Lets renew our nation through the pursuit of the truth and the resolve on the fairness doctrine.
translation.pcm: Make we renew awa nation through as we dey pursuit di truth and resolve on di fairness doctrine

translation.en: Their-in resides the national salvation,he added.
translation.pcm: Dia in reside di national salvation; hin add

translation.en: A love letter to Mallam Nasir el-Rufai (I)
translation.pcm: Wan love letter wey dem write give Mallam Nasir el-Rufa

translation.en: I had made up my mind to write to you openly before I saw the viral video by Dr Shadi Sabeh in which he appealed to you passionately to temper your actions with a human facewith regard to the proposed sacking of 20,000 staff of the Kaduna State Government.
translation.pcm: I been don make my mind up to write give you openly before I see di viral video by Dr Shadi Sabehwey dey beg you do wetin you wan d wit human feelins regardin di 20,000 staff of the Kaduna State Goment wey you propose to sack.

translation.en: I do not quite agree with Dr Sabeh that people should be kept in service just to pay them as a social service.
translation.pcm: I too agree wit Dr Sabeh say pipo say make dem kip pipo for service just to play dem as social service

translation.en: Nigeria cannot afford that for now.
translation.pcm: Nigeria no fit afford am now

translation.en: Our economy is not a 10th as developed as the US economy
translation.pcm: awa Economy no dey develop 10th as US economy take be

translation.en: was in the 1930s when it went through the Great Depression.
translation.pcm: Na 1930s wen e go through di Great Depression

translation.en: However, Dr Sabeh is right to the extent that Keynesianism is back world over and a government must necessarily think about the impact of its policies on the people it serves.
translation.pcm: Howeva, Dr Sabeh dey right to extend say Keynesianism don back world ova and goment must necessary think about di impact of hin policy on di pipo wey hin dey service

translation.en: We know that in Nigeria, governments unfortunately do not believe they are here to serve the people, but it is our duty to work together to change that unfortunate misunderstanding and disconnection.
translation.pcm: We know say for Nigeria, goment unfortunately no  believe say dey kom here kom serve di pipo, but na awa duty to work togeda to change dat unfortunate misunderstandin and disconnection

translation.en: There are other issues coming up in Kaduna State presently.
translation.pcm: E get oda issue wey dey kom from Kaduna state presently

translation.en: Indeed, the state under your governance has again been mentioned as one of the best governed and we hear of your achievements in infrastructural development.
translation.pcm: For true di state under your goment dey don again mention am as one of di best governed and we hear of your achievement for infrastructural development

translation.en: The dangers of travelling to Kaduna has hampered many of us from coming to see those achievements, but most people know that El-Rufai is a man of achievement and a stickler for standards.
translation.pcm: Di danger to dey travel to Kaduna don hamper many of us to kom see dem achievement, but most pipo know say El-Rufai na man of achievement and stickler for standards

translation.en: The Federal Capital Territory (FCT) cannot forget you in a hurry.
translation.pcm: Di Federal Capital Territory(FCT) no fit forget you in hurry

translation.en: Many people rue your absence as minister.
translation.pcm: plenti pesin rue your absence as minister

translation.en: A lot more remember you in dread.
translation.pcm: plenti go remember you for dread

translation.en: Unfortunately, many of the villages you cleared and many of the shanties you demolished are back “ this time with a vengeance.
translation.pcm: Unfortunately, plenti of di village wey you clear and plenti of di shanties wey you demolish don kom back dis time wit vengeance

translation.en: Why?
translation.pcm: wetin?

translation.en: The governments over time have made no plans for these poor folks, and human beings “ like water “ must find their levels.
translation.pcm: Di goment over time don make no plan for dis poor folks, and human being  like water and must find dia level

translation.en: If you are flying into Abuja at any point in time, look down from the window of your aeroplane and you will see just how badly shanties have metastasized since youve been gone.
translation.pcm: If u dey fly go Abuja for any point for time, make you look down from di window of your aeroplane and u go see how bad shanties don metastasize since you don comot

translation.en: Any minister who will try and correct this anomaly will have millions of refugees on his hands.
translation.pcm: Any minister wey go try and correct dis anomaly go get millions of dem refugees for hin hand

translation.en: In your time, it was 500,000 refugees we had.
translation.pcm: for your time, na 500,000 refugees we don get

translation.en: As at 2006, Nigeria had the second highest number of displaced people in the world “ after Iraq “ due to your actions.
translation.pcm: For 2006, Nigeria get di second highest number of displace pipo for di world afta wey Iraq due to hin action

translation.en: I recall writing to you then through my Daily Trust column, and appealing for the same thing that Dr Sabeh is now calling for; human face.
translation.pcm: I remember say I write give you den through my Daily Trust column, dey appeal for di same thin wey Dr Sabeh dey call for human face

translation.en: I quoted timeless Chinese wisdom by reminding you If your vision is one year, cultivate flowers.
translation.pcm: I quote timeless Chinese wisdom as dey remind you your vision na one year, kom cultivate flowers

translation.en: If it is 10, cultivate trees.
translation.pcm: If na 10, cultivate trees

translation.en: But if it is eternity, cultivate humans.
translation.pcm: But if na eternity, cultivate human

translation.en: The idea then was that you should go easy on you hard rhetoric that anyone earning less than N50,000 should return to their village, because Abuja is not for the poor.
translation.pcm: Di idea den na say make e go easy on you hard rhetoric say anyone wey dey earn less  dan N50,000 make e return to village, bikos Abuja no dey for di poor

translation.en: You said this on national TV and it was most unfortunate and unfeeling.
translation.pcm: You tok say dis na national TV and e dey unfortunate and unfeelin

translation.en: It was perhaps the most bourgeoisie thing ever said by someone in office.
translation.pcm: Na for sure say most bourgeoisie thin wey pesin don eva tok for office

translation.en: If anybody was to lay claim to Abuja as their inheritance, it should have been those Gwaris displaced from their ancestral land, many times without compensation.
translation.pcm: If anybodi wan lay claim say Abuja be dia inheritance, e for be dose Gwaris wey dem displace from dia ancestral land, plenti time witout compensation

translation.en: At what point did Abuja become a playground/inheritance for the nouveau riche?
translation.pcm: For what point Abuja bikom playground/inheritance for di nouveau riche

translation.en: While we watched on TV in 2006, whole families displaced in the thick of the rainy season, with their mattresses on their heads and their little toddlers in their hands, we heard of stories of people who committed suicide because both their homes and their businesses were demolished same day.
translation.pcm: As we dey watch TV for 2006, families wey no get place to stay inside rainy season, wit dia mattress on dia head and dia little pikin for dia hand, we hear di storie of pipo wey kil diasef bikos both dia house and dia business na hin dey destroy di same day.

translation.en: I learnt from one lady, who acted as secretary to some of your meetings back then, how much you took delight in displacing those poor folks and that in one instance, the appeals from Drs Oby Ezekwesili and Okonjo-Iweala could not dissuade you and you were jokingly called a sadist even as you departed the meeting to go and have another demolition.
translation.pcm: I learn from one lady, who dey act as secretary to some of your meetin dem dat time , how you take enjoy displacin dose poor pipo at once, how Drs Oby Ezekwesili and Okonjo-Iweala dey beg you no change your mind and dem use style call you sadist as you comot for di meetin go demolish anoda place.

translation.en: It sounded much like those folks in the south of the USA who used to take delight in hanging themselves another negro.
translation.pcm: E sound much like di folks dem for di south of di USA wey dey take joy to dey hang demsef anoda negroa

translation.en: Kaduna not only has a bloated civil service (as is), but also a problem with indiscriminate building of all sorts of structures where they shouldnt be “ like everywhere else in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Kaduna no only get bloat civil service but also problem wit indiscriminate buildin of all kind structure wia dey suppose be like Evri wia for Nigeria

translation.en: Abuja claims to have a master plan which no one is supposed to see, thus making it a political plan not a geographical one.
translation.pcm: Abuja claim to get master plan which no one suppose see, derfore making am political plan no be geographical one

translation.en: Kaduna is NOT Abuja, and the people there may not have the mettle to withstand Hurricane Nasir, as we did here in Abuja up till 2007 under your iron grip.
translation.pcm: Kaduna no be Abuja, and di pipo wey dey der fi no get di mettle to sand Hurricane Nasir, as we take do here for Abuja till 2007 under your Iron grip

translation.en: You know you can easily get crazy once turned on.
translation.pcm: You know say u fit easily craze wen dey turn you on

translation.en: You confess to this yourself.
translation.pcm: You confess am yoursef

translation.en: You dont care whose ox is gored and this can be a good attribute to turn around a country such as ours, but it could also be deadly to a great many poor folks, especially in a Kaduna which is basically an agrarian and civil service state.
translation.pcm: You no care which pesin ox dem kill and dis fit be good attribute to turn like our kontri around , but e fit dey deadly for plenti plenti poor folks, especially for Kaduna wey be simply agrarian and civil service state.

translation.en: Is there any compensation for example, for those whose houses and shops you will demolish?
translation.pcm: Compensation go dey for example dose one wey u go demolish dia house and shop

translation.en: Is anyone listening to their stories of how they came about the land or spaces or have they been told to go to hell and back?
translation.pcm: Anyone dey hear dia tor iof how dey kom about di land or space or dey don tell dem to go back hell?

translation.en: Is it true that we should strive to achieve a glistening city in order to achieve accolades from far and near, not minding the human costs?
translation.pcm: Na True say make we strive to achieve glistenin city in in oda to achieve accolades from far and near, no to mind di human coasts

translation.en: Look at Banana Island and Turnbull Street in Ikoyi.

translation.en: The other day, the well-fed owners of properties there pushed a video wherein they filmed how their pristine space has been encroached by poor invaders.
translation.pcm: Di oda day, di well feed owners of property der push one video wia dey fiilm how dia pristine space don encroach by poor invader
