translation.en: As educated as we claim to be, we choose not to learn the nuanced lessons from the places we visit abroad.
translation.pcm: As educated wey we claim be, we no choose to learn di nuance lessons from di place wey we visit for abroad

translation.en: How can anyone think that the model of Banana Island will work forever when there is no provision for how the servants, drivers, gardeners and other dregs of the earth who serve these Lords of the Manor will get around; how they will eat their lunch, how they will survive and sleep close to where they are supposed to resume at 4am every day?
translation.pcm: How anybodi fit think say di model of Banana Island go work foreva wen provision no dey on how servants, drivers, gardeners and oda low pipo weey dey dis oga for mansion dem go survive; how dem go eat dia lunch, how them go live and sleep close to wer dey suppose resume for 4am evri day?

translation.en: Style and tech in 2021 Nissan Ariya
translation.pcm: Style and tech for 2021 Nissan Ariya

translation.en: More auto firms are investing heavily in electric vehicle production described as the future of automobiles.
translation.pcm: more auto firms dey investigate heavily for electric vehicle production wey dem describe as di future of automobiles

translation.en: One of the recently revealed EV offerings is the Nissan Ariya.
translation.pcm: One of di EV offerin wey dem just reveal na di Nissan Ariya

translation.en: This is a high-tech electric SUV with a 310-mile range.
translation.pcm: Dis na high tech electic SUV wit 310 mile range

translation.en: It comes with styling thats not changed dramatically from the 2019s
translation.pcm: E kom wit stylin wey no change dramatically from 2019

translation.en: concept car of the same name.
translation.pcm: concept car wey get di same name

translation.en: Nissan joined the SUVs market segment in 2016 with the launch of the Qashqai.
translation.pcm: Nissan join di SUVs market segment for 2016 wit di launch of di Qashqai

translation.en: The company however in its latest statement, said the Ariya is the ultimate expression of style and technology.
translation.pcm: Di company for hin last statement, say di Ariya na di ultimate expression of style and technology

translation.en: Power and Range
translation.pcm: Power and Range

translation.en: Power comes from two electric motors, but their output, range and how many wheels they drive depends on which model you choose.
translation.pcm: Power kom from two electric motors, but dia output, range and how plenti wheels dey drive depend on which model dem choose

translation.en: Even the entry-level two-wheel drive 63 kilowatts hour (kWh) model can take you 223 miles between charges and punts out 215bhp, though.
translation.pcm: Even di entry-level two-wheel drive 63 kilowatts per hour(kWh) model fit take you 233 miles between charge and punt comot 215bhp

translation.en: Theres an 87kWh version of the Ariya above that, with range increased to 310 miles and power boosted to 239bhp, and then versions of both cars with Nissans new e-4orce four-wheel drive system (and lower ranges consequently) too.
translation.pcm: 87kWh version of Ariya dey above dat one, wit range wey increase go 310 miles and power wey boost reach to 239bhp, and den versions of di two cars wit Nissan new e-4orce four-wheel drive system (and lower ranges later) sef.

translation.en: Then at the very top of the range sits the Ariya e-4orce 87kWh Performance, which offers up to 389bhp and a range of 248 miles.
translation.pcm: Den for di top of di range sit  di Ariya e-4orce 87kWh performance, wey offer reach 389bhp and range of 248 mile

translation.en: In terms of charging, lower-powered versions of the Ariya include a 7.4kW charging cable, while the more powerful versions come with a 22kW three-phase charger.
translation.pcm: for term of chargin, low power versions of di Ariya include 7.4kW charging cable, wey di more powerful versions kom wit 22kW three phase charger

translation.en: The Ariya can also support charging up to 130kW.
translation.pcm: Di Ariya fit support chargin for 130kW

translation.en: The Ariya comes with a V-Motion grille which features a 3D pattern with the brands new logo that lightens up thanks to 20 LEDs.
translation.pcm: Di Ariya kom wit V-Motion grille wey feature 3D pattern wit di brand new logo wey light up thank you 20 LEDs

translation.en: For even more style, Nissan is offering six two-tone paint and four full-body colour combinations, among them the signature Copper paint.
translation.pcm: for more style, Nissan dey offer six two tone paint and fawa full-bodi colawa combination, wey dey part of dem na di signature Copper paint

translation.en: A black roof is included with two-tone paint.
translation.pcm: Black roof dey part wit two-tone paint

translation.en: A set of sporty 19-inch aluminium wheels come standard and the 20-inches are optional.
translation.pcm: Set of sporty 19-inch aluminium wheel kom strandard and di 20-inches dey optional

translation.en: Space and Price
translation.pcm: Di space and di price

translation.en: Two-wheel drive versions of the Ariya have 466 litres of space available in their boots enabling the user to pack more holiday luggage but the four-wheel drive versions of the Ariya have less space.
translation.pcm: Two-wheel drive version of di Ariya get 466 litre of space available for dia boots to allow user to pack more holiday luggage but di four-wheel drive versions of di Ariya get small space

translation.en: Within the interior, there are two large 12.3-inch displays for the infotainment screen and drivers instrument gauge cluster.
translation.pcm: for di interior, two large 12.3 inch display for di infotainment screen and drive instrument gauge cluster

translation.en: It comes with Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and Amazon Alexa.
translation.pcm: E kom wit Apple Carplay, Android Auto, and Amazon Alexa

translation.en: The slim profile Zero Gravity seats help provide additional legroom for both front- and rear-seat passengers.
translation.pcm: Di slim profile Zero Gravity seat dey hep provide additional legroom for both front and back seat passenger

translation.en: The Ariyas EV platform made it easy for engineers to free up cabin space in unique ways, such as mounting the climate control system under the hood where a combustion engine would have been.
translation.pcm: Di Ariya EV platform make am easy for dem engineer to free up cabin space for unique ways, as to dey mount di climate control system under di hood wia combustion engine go don be

translation.en: A transmission tunnel also isnt necessary with EVs and the Ariyas flat floor generates even more passenger and cargo space.
translation.pcm: Transmission tunnel no dey necessary wit Evs and di Ariya flat floor dey generate plenti passenger and cargo space

translation.en: Verily its time to ask for help
translation.pcm: Verily na time to ask for help

translation.en: In view of their accomplishments over the years, many readers would hardly come to terms with what had befallen the military in the last many years, particularly as it affects the fight against the Boko Haram insurgents, bandits and the insolent kidnappers.
translation.pcm: Sake of dia accomplishments ova di years, many readers not fit really understand  wetin apun to di military for di last many years, particularly as e dey affect di fight against di Boko Haram insurgents, bandits and di insolent kidnappers dem.

translation.en: Our military have had a distinguished record in the field starting in regional and international peace keeping.
translation.pcm: awa military don get distinguish record for di field startin for regional and international peace kipin

translation.en: At independence in 1960 when we joined the United Nations, we immediately started to contribute our armed forces personnel to peace keeping efforts.
translation.pcm: For independence for 1960 wen we join di United  Nations, we don immediately start to contribute awa armed force personnel to peace kipin efforts

translation.en: Our troops were said to have acquitted themselves creditably in Congo 1960-64, Tanzania 1960-62 and Pakistan 1965-66.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say awa troop don acquit dimsef creditable for Congo 1960-64, Tanzania 1960-62 and Pakistan 1965-66

translation.en: By the time our civil war broke out in 1967 our troops have already had some fighting experience which probably came to help to crush a well-armed and determined secessionist movement in a mere 30 months.
translation.pcm: By di time wey awa civil war break out for 1967, awa troop don already get fightin experience wey fi don kom to help crush well armed and determin secessionist movement for mere 30 month

translation.en: Thereafter, this prowess of our troops made them very much sought-after by the United Nations whenever and wherever there was a conflict, to contribute to a peace keeping force and or international military observatories.
translation.pcm: afta, dis prowess  of awa troop make dem dey very sought afta by di United Nation weneva and wiaeva conflict dey, to contribute to peace kipin force and international military contribution

translation.en: Our troops served everywhere.
translation.pcm: awa troops don serve Evriwia

translation.en: In 1978 we were in Lebanon as part of UNFIL, Chad in 1981, along Iran-Iraq border UNIMOG in 1988, Kuwait UNICOM in 1991, Angola 91, Namibia 89, Cambodia 92, Yugoslavia 92, etc.
translation.pcm: For 1978 we dey Lebanon as part of UNFIL, Chadfor 1981, wit Iraq border UNIMOG for 1988, Kuwait UNICOM for 1991, Angola 91, Namibia 89, Cambodia 92, Yugoslavia 92

translation.en: Of course nearer home in Sierra Leonne and Liberia, our troops and the resources Nigeria committed made the difference in those countries from falling apart or remaining intact.
translation.pcm: Na true near home for Sierra Leonne and Liberia, awa troop and di resource Nigeria commit make di difference for those kontris to fall apart or to remain intact

translation.en: In 2007 this country was in such a confident position in the ability of our Army as a can-do force that it voiced opposition to AFRICOM, a combatant command that USA created as an outfit to watch over Al Qaeda and other terrorists operations in Africa.
translation.pcm: For 2007 dis kontri dey position wet we fit get confidence for di ability of our Army as force wey strong, say hin be voiced opposition to AFRICOM, one combatant command wey USA create to dey watch ova Al Qaeda and oda terrorists operations for Africa.

translation.en: The USA had to back down from establishing the command post on an African soil, because Nigeria, South Africa and Libya voiced their loud opposition to the plan.
translation.pcm: Di USA back down to dey establish di command post for Africa soil, bikos Nigeria,  South Africa and Libya voice dey loud opposition to di plan

translation.en: In fact, Nigeria was so belligerent in its opposition that the government spokesman said that we did not only reject AFRICOM on Nigerias soil but also would not want to see it in any African country.
translation.pcm: In fact, Nigeria too dey belligerent for hin opposition say di goment tok tok pesin tok say we no only reject AFRICOM for Nigeria soil but also e no go wan see am for Africa kontri dem

translation.en: The rejection was loud and clear and the US had to accede to let AFRICOM berth in Stuttgart, Germany where it had maintained other combatant commands, since the close of World War 2.
translation.pcm: Di  rejection dey loud and clear and di US gats accede, make dem allow AFRICOM berth for Stuttgart, Germany wia e go maintain oda combatant command, since dey don close world war II

translation.en: But honestly we must admit that things have turned awry for our armed forces in the last 10 or so years.
translation.pcm: But honestly we must admit say thins don turn away for awa armed force for di last 10 years

translation.en: The fight against the Boko Haram armed insurgents has run into a quagmire.
translation.pcm: Di fight against Boko Haram armed insurgent don run inside quagmire

translation.en: Not only that but other forms of insurgencies have cropped up in the form of a wholesale flourishing kidnapping industry and other forms of banditry.
translation.pcm: no be only dat one but oda form of insurgency  don crop up for di form of wholesale to dey flourish kidnappin industry and oda form of bandit

translation.en: Nobody has been able to accurately pinpoint why the fight against the Boko Haram insurgents, whom many considered as a ragtag assemblage, has confounded our armed forces.
translation.pcm: nobodi fi don dey able to accurately pinpoint why di fight against di Boko Haram insurgents wey plenti consider as ragtag assemblage, don confound awa armed force

translation.en: We thought our forces lacked material and the whole nation rose in unison to support the President when he wanted billions direct from the Federation Account to buy arms.
translation.pcm: we think say awa force don lack material and di whole nation raise for unison to support di President wen dey want billions direct from Federation Account to buy arms

translation.en: The money was drawn, spent and probably arms were bought but conditions merely deteriorated with the insurgency now precariously spreading across the nation.
translation.pcm: dey draw moni, dey spend am and maybe dey buy arm but condition merely deteriorate wit insurgency kom precarious kom dey spread across di nation

translation.en: That much was said by Governor Sani Bello when he warned that the Boko Haram fighters have raised their infamous flags in his domain and are within walking distance of Abuja the federal capital.
translation.pcm: Governor Sani Bello tok plenti wen hin warn Boko Haram fighter don raise dia infamous flag for hin domain and dey walkin distance of Abuja. di Federal Capital

translation.en: Mohammed Ali Ndume, the Senator representing Borno South has been everywhere in the media lately decrying the deficits in the war effort.
translation.pcm: Mohammed Ali Ndume, wey be di senator wey dey represent Borno South don dey Evriwia for di media lately, dey decry say di deficits for di war effort

translation.en: Senator Ndume should know, because he is the Chairman of the Senate Committee on the Army.
translation.pcm: Senator Ndume suppose know, bikos hin be di chairman of di Senate Committee for di Army

translation.en: Vibrant and passionate, Ndume has never been short of words advancing the cause of his constituency that is presently besieged by Boko Haram insurgents.
translation.pcm: Vibrant and Passionate, Ndume neva don dey dey short of  word advancin di kos of hin constituency wey dey presently besieged by Boko Haram insurgent

translation.en: He had put it plainly across that the entire armed forces lack the material to accomplish the myriad of assignments before them.
translation.pcm: Hin gah put am plainly across say di entire arm force lack di of material to accomplish di myriad of assigment before dem

translation.en: On top of that they lack the numbers required.
translation.pcm: on top dat dey lack di number wey dey need

translation.en: That would probably explain why despite their pedigree our armed forces are bogged down by a number of ragtag brigands.
translation.pcm: dat go maybe explain why despite dia pedigree, awa arm force dey bogged down by number of ragtag brigands

translation.en: To worsen matters, the casualties are rising by the day.
translation.pcm: To kom worse mata, di casualties dey raise by di day

translation.en: The gory statistics given a few days ago by Samuel Aruwan, Kaduna State Commissioner of Internal Affairs and Internal Security, are frightening enough.
translation.pcm: Di glory statistics wey Samuel Aruwan, give few days ago, Kaduna state commissioner of internal Affairs and International Security, dem dey fear reach

translation.en: He reported that in only three months between January and March 2021, bandits terrorising Kaduna State have killed 323 and abducted 949 citizens.
translation.pcm: Hin report say for three month between January and March 2021, bandit wey dey terrorise Kaduna State don kill 323 and don con abduct 949 citizen

translation.en: I guess similar figures might show up from neighbouring Katsina, Niger and Zamfara States if they kept statistics.
translation.pcm: I think say similar figure fit show up from neighbour wey dey Katsina, Niger and Zamfara State if dey kip  statistics

translation.en: It is time for a change of heart to probably do what would have been unthinkable some years ago.
translation.pcm: Time don kom for change of heart, maybe do wetin fit don dey unthinkable  some year ago

translation.en: I am glad that the President has lately been won over to this argument.
translation.pcm: I dey hapi say dey don win di President for di argument

translation.en: This became evident when at a televised virtual meeting with the US Secretary of State Antony Blinken he specifically asked the US to reconsider relocating the US Africa Command (AFRICOM) from Stuttgart to Africa so as to bring it nearer to the theatre of operations and help to strengthen the ongoing efforts to check the security situation.
translation.pcm: Dis one sho wella wen for one televised virtual meetin wit di US Secretary of State, Antony Blinken he specifically ask di US make dem reconsider relocatin the US Africa Command (AFRICOM) from Stuttgart go Africa so e go dey close to di theatre of operations and e go hep strengthen di ongoin efforts to check di security situation.

translation.en: I watched the exchanges closely and clearly saw the President grimace when he came to the point in his speech where he asked the US to move AFRICOM to Africa.
translation.pcm: I see di exchange close and clear I see di President grimace wen hin kom to di point for hin speech wia hin ask di US to move AFRICOM  kom Africa

translation.en: It is the kind of surrender only Generals understand, as a painful duty to save a territory, fighting men and material.
translation.pcm: Na di kind surrender wey only Generals understand, as painful duty to save territory, fightin men and material

translation.en: 42nd Kaduna fair: KADCCIMA strategises to develop economy
translation.pcm: 42nd Kaduna fair KADCCIMA don strategise to develop economy

translation.en: The Kaduna Chamber of Commerce Industry Mines and Agriculture (KADCCIMA) Monday organised a seminar to discuss strategies that will aid in the development of the nations economy through domestic production.
translation.pcm: Di Kaduna Chamber of Commerce Industry Mines and Agriculture(KADCCIMA)for Monday dey organise seminar to discuss strategies wey go aid for di development of di nation economy through domestic production

translation.en: Speaking at the seminar on Monday as part of actives lined up for the ongoing 42nd Kaduna International Trade Fair with them, Promoting Domestics Production to Mitigate the Current Economic Challenges, the chairman of the occasion and the Managing Director of the Bank of Industry Lagos branch, Dr Aliyu Dikko, said there is no white-collar job anymore.
translation.pcm: As he dey tok for di seminar on Monday as part of as wetin dey don plan do for di ongoin 42nd Kaduna International Trade Fair wit them, Promotin Domestics Production to use Mitigate di Current Economic Challenge dem, di chairman of di occasion and di Managin Director of di Bank of Industry Lagos branch, Dr Aliyu Dikko, tok say white-collar job no dey again.

translation.en: He, therefore, urged Nigerians especially the youth to embrace entrepreneurship as there are many opportunities in the private sector.
translation.pcm: Hin,derfore,advise Nigerians especially di youth to embrace entrepreneurship as plenti opportunity dey for private sector

translation.en: The Guest Speaker and Executive Chairman, Adhama Textiles and Garment Industries, Kano, Alhaji Saidu Dattijo Adhama assured that there are a lot of jobs in the private sector that will make one earn money.
translation.pcm: Di Kaduna Chamber of Commerce Industry Mines and Agriculture(KADCCIMA)for Monday dey organise seminar to discuss strategies wey go aid for di development of di nation economy through domestic production

translation.en: Alhaji Adhama pointed that textile industries have faced major setbacks due to many challenges such as lack of electricity and advocated that Nigeria needs modern restructuring such as super restructuring to address the lingering challenges.
translation.pcm: Alhaji Adhama point say textile industry don face major set back due to say plenti challenge like electricity and advocate say Nigeria need mordern restructurin like restructurin wey dey  super

translation.en: He there urged the government and the private sectors to look back and figure out where the problem emerged from so as to treat the problems and find a lasting solution.
translation.pcm: Hin con urge di goment and di private sector to look back kom figure out wia di problem take start from so as to treat di problem kom find lasting solution

translation.en: The Governor of Kaduna State, Nasir El-Rufai who was reported led by the Permanent Secretary, Kaduna State Ministry of Business, Innovation and Technology, Dr Haliru Musa Soba said the theme of the 42nd Trade Fair was apt as many businesses are still trying to survive from the setback poised from COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: Di Governor of Kaduna State, Nasir El-Rufai wey dey report say Permanent Secretary led, Kaduna State Ministry of Business, Innovation and Technology, Dr Haliru Musa Soba tok say di theme of di 42nd Trade Fair fit am wella as many businesses still dey try survive from di setback wey COVID-19 pandemic kos.

translation.en: He said the ministry has established business clinics so as to attend to businesses by regularising businesses.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di ministry don establish business clinic so as to attend businesses  to dey regularise cusinesse

translation.en: Akwa Utd reclaim top spot despite barren draw with Rangers
translation.pcm: Akwa Utd reclaim top spot as dey draw wit Rangers

translation.en: Akwa United yesterday played out a goalless with Enugu Rangers in Uyo in the 2021 Nigeria Professional Football League, NPFL week 22 fixture but reclaimed the top spot with superior goal difference.
translation.pcm: Akwa United for yesterday play goaless wit Enugu Rangers for Uyo for 2021 Nigeria Professional Football League, NPFL week 22 fixure but claim di top spot wit superior goal difference

translation.en: On Sunday, Kano Pillars who were forced to 1-1 draw at Katsina United moved to the top of the table with 41 points while Akwa United who were yet to play Rangers came down to second position with 40 points.
translation.pcm: For Sunday, Kano Pillars wey dem force to draw 1-1 for Katsina United move go di top of di table wit 41 point wen Akwa United wey neva play Ranger kom down enter second position wit 40 point

translation.en: Therefore, the draw in yesterdays ill-tempered tie with Rangers returned the Promise keepers to the top of the table with 41 points as Pillars who have inferior goal diference of plus 8 dropped to second position.
translation.pcm: Na e make am be say, di draw for yesterday ill-tempered draw wit Ranger return di Promise kiper to di top of di table wit 41 point for Pillars wey get inferior goa difference wey be plus 8  drop go second

translation.en: Going by the recent performance of Rangers which saw them suffer a 0-1 loss at home against Rivers United last Sunday, Akwa United were favoured to win the maximum points.
translation.pcm: To go by di recent performance wey Rangers, wey make dem see suffer 0-1 for dia against Rivers United for last Sunday, Akwa United see favour to win di maximum point

translation.en: After a fruitless first half, Akwa United made triple substitutions in the 65th minute taking off Mfon Udoh, Ubong Friday and Ikechukwu Nwani for Nasiru Jibril, Wisdom Fernando and Ibrahim Abubakar Aliyu.
translation.pcm: Afta wey dem play fruitless first half, Akwa United make triple substitution for di 65th minute wey dey use comot Mfon Udoh, Ubong Friday and Ikechukwu Nwani for Nasiru Jibril, Wisdom Fernado and Ibrahim Abubakar Aliyu

translation.en: The introduction of the trio proved impactful as Akwa United turned the heat on Rangers defence as substitute Aliyu forced a save off Mutawakilu Seidu in the 66th minute.
translation.pcm: Di introduction of di trio prove impactful as Akwa United turn di heat on Rangers defence as pesin wey dem carry enta Aliyu force save Mutawakilu Seidu for di 66th minute

translation.en: Rangers also had their chance in the 80th minute when they were awarded a free kick at the arc after Dare Ojo fouled Ibrahim Olawoyin but Kelvin Itoya fired it straight at Akwa Uniteds wall.
translation.pcm: Ranger kom get dia chance for di 80th minute wen dey give free kick  for di arc afta wey Dare Ojo foul Ibrahim Olawoyin but Kelvin Itoya fire am straight for Akwa United wall

translation.en: The visitors then ended the match with 10-men following the marching order to their Ivorian import, Issif Traore who fouled Charles Atshimene at the edge of the box.
translation.pcm: Di  visitor kom end di match wit 10-men followin di marchin oda to dia Ivorian import, Issif Traore wey foul Charles Atshimene for di edge of di goalie

translation.en: The resultant free kick in added time was wasted by Olisa Ndah who shot wide from close range.
translation.pcm: Di resultant free kick for added time na hin Olisa Ndah waste wey hin shot am wide from close range

translation.en: As access to fertiliser dims Farmers devise means of generating manure from neem
translation.pcm: As access to fertiliser dimsa farmer devise means to dey generate manure from neem

translation.en: As the hope of getting governments subsidised fertiliser this farming season dims further, some farmers in Jigawa State have adopted the technique of turning neem leaves into fertiliser.
translation.pcm: As di hope to dey get goment subsidise fertiliser dis farmin season dim further, some farmer for Jigawa State don adopt di technique to dey turn neem leaves inside fertiliser

translation.en: The farmers, especially those in Maigatari Local Government Area, said they decided to shift attention towards using local methods of enriching their soils for better productivity as a result of the spike in the price of inorganic fertilisers.
translation.pcm: di farmers especially those for Maigatari Local goment Area say dem decide to shift attention towards usin local methods of enrichin dia soils for beta productivity as a result of di spike in di price of inorganic fertilizers

translation.en: NPK fertiliser now costs over N12,000 per 50kg bag in the open market, and the usually subsidised ones by the federal government which usually sold for N5,500 may not be feasible this year.
translation.pcm: NPK fertiliser now bi costs over N12,000 per 50kg in di open markert, and di usually subsidised one by di federal goment which usually sold for N5,000 may not be feasible dis year

translation.en: The Minister of Agriculture, Mohammed Sabo Nanono, had said that the federal government would, from this year, hands off buying and selling of fertiliser but would play a supervisory role.
translation.pcm: Di Minister of Agriculture, Mohammed Sabo Nanono, don tok say di federal, goment go, from dis year, hands off for buying and selling of fertiliser but go play a supervisory role

translation.en: Many stakeholders have interpreted the minister stand to mean government withdrawal of fertiliser subsidy, thereby leaving farmers with no option than to buy from the open market.
translation.pcm: Plenti stakeholder don interprete di minister stand to mean goment witdrawal of fertiliser subsidy, so tey  farmers no get option dan to buy from di open market

translation.en: With the onset of the rainy season in many parts of the country, farmers are now forced to source for manure by any means.
translation.pcm: as di rainy season don be for plenti part of di kontri, farmers dey forced to find manure by any means

translation.en: This seems to be the major reason for the new innovation among the Jigawa farmers.
translation.pcm: Dis na di major reason wey make new innovertion dey among di Jigawa farmers

translation.en: How farmers use neem leaves for manure
translation.pcm: how farmers take use neem leaves for manure

translation.en: Neem leaves that fall from the tree are heaped by the farmers and put in gutters and drains and left to decompose.
translation.pcm: neem leaves wey fall from di tree dey heep by di farmers dem kom put for inside gutters and drains kom leave am to decompose

translation.en: One of the farmers said the decomposed leaves are brought out for drying before they are finally taken to the farm.
translation.pcm: One of di farmers tok say dem dey dry di decomposed leaves before dem finally take am go farm

translation.en: Scores of farmers in the town agreed that although the practice caused blockage of their drains, it had appreciable impacts on their soil.
translation.pcm: Many farmers wey dey for town agree as although di practice kos blockage of dia drains, e get beta impact for dia soil

translation.en: Mallam Imrana Adamu, a farmer in Maigatari, said he had been into the practice for some time now and was satisfied with the way the compost was helping him maintain the fertility of his soil.
translation.pcm: Mallam Imrana Adamu, one farmer for Maigatari tok say him don dey into di practice for some time now and him dey satisfied wit di way di compost dey help am maintain di fertility for him soil

translation.en: But unlike some farmers in the town who use drains in carrying out the process, Mallam Imrana said he used his premises in composting the organic fertiliser.
translation.pcm: But unlike some farmers for di town wey use drains dey carryout di process, Mallam Imrana tok say him use him side dey decompose di organic fertiliser

translation.en: He said, I mix the dried neem leaves with ash, sprinkle water on the mixture and allow the process to take its course.
translation.pcm: Him tok say, mix di dry neem leaves wit ash, con sprinkle water put for di mixture con allow di process take hin course

translation.en: I can assure you that this is very effective in enriching the soil.
translation.pcm: I fit assure you say e dey veri effective for di enrichin of di soil

translation.en: I have practised it and seen positive result; I am still practising it.
translation.pcm: I don dey practice am dey see positive result, I still dey pracrtice am

translation.en: On the efficacy and effectiveness of this practice, Dr Yunusa Muhammad Shuaibu, a lecturer with the Department of Crop Production, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University (ATBU), Bauchi, said the practice was a form of composting that sped up mineralisation and consequently enriched the soil by supplying nutrients such as phosphorus and calcium to it.
translation.pcm: On top di efficacy and effectiveness of dis practice, Dr Yunusa Muhammed Shuaibu, lecturer for di Department of Crop Production, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University (ATBU), Bauchi, tok say di practice na form of decompostin wey speed up mineralisation con enrich di soil as e dey supply nutrients like phosporus wit calcium to am

translation.en: Rilwan, a corps member, contributed this piece from Jigawa State.
translation.pcm: Rilwan, wey be Corp member, contribute dis piece from Jigawa State

translation.en: Pinnick inaugurates NFF Technical and Development Committee
translation.pcm: Pinnick been inaugurate NFF Technical and Development Committee

translation.en: The president of the Nigeria Football Federation, Mr Amaju Pinnick on yesterday inaugurated the Technical and Development of the federation, with a charge to the members to constantly dig deep into their pouch of quality knowledge and experience to steer Nigeria Football to higher levels of excellence.

translation.en: Understanding Nigerias democracy, dictatorship and spirit of nationalism in Chad

translation.en: Khalid Yusuf Tebo
translation.pcm: Kalid Yusuf Tebo

translation.en: The operation of political parties in democracy is systematic, flexible and elastic when compared with political parties outside democracy.
translation.pcm: Di operation of political parties for democracy na systematic, flexible and elastic wen dem compare am wit political parties outside democracy

translation.en: However, political parties in democratic states are distinctive with those in non-democratic states, especially by their mode of operations.
translation.pcm: Howeva, political parties for democratic state dey distinctive wit dose for non-democartic states, especially for dia mode of operations

translation.en: Sometimes, they share partial similarities and roles.
translation.pcm: Sometimes, dem share partial similarities and roles

translation.en: Yet, the roles of those in democracy are not distinguishable from advocating transparency, accountability, integrity and quality of choosing representatives in favour of national interest.
translation.pcm: Yet, di roles for dose wey dey democracy no dey distinguishable from to advocate transparency, accountability, integrity wit quality of choosing representatives for favour of national interest

translation.en: Nevertheless, in Nigeria, Buhari is the president and commander-in-chief of the armed forces.
translation.pcm: Nevadiless, for Nigeria, Buhari na di president and commander-in-chief for di army forces.

translation.en: He had to go through a rigorous democratic political partys process before he would emerge victorious in pre-primary, primary and post primary elections.
translation.pcm: Him been go through rigorous democratic political parti process before him go emerge victorious for pre-primary, primary and post primary elections

translation.en: As a member of a political party, he is like any other member and possesses no legal proceedings to influence the serving governor, serving senator and member house of reps under the impression of the same political party in democracy as far as good governance is the matter of the day.
translation.pcm: As member of political parti, him be like any oda member and possess no legal proceedin use influence di servin governor, servin senator and member house of reps for under di impression of di same political parti for democracy as far as say good governance na di mata of di day

translation.en: This has to do with a partys political exercise in ruling over the affairs of its members when the need arises.
translation.pcm: Dis gats do wit parti political exercise for rulin ova di affairs of hin members wen di need kom

translation.en: Contrastingly, Buharis participation in decision making is minimal compared to the late DÃ©by of Chad because of their political system differences and leadership modus operandi.
translation.pcm: Contrastingly, Buhari participation for decision to make hin minimal compare to di late by Chad bikos of dia policital system differences and leadership modus operandi

translation.en: Buhari is less sensitive in governance, less powerful over some national affairs and less effective legislatively.
translation.pcm: Buhari dey less sensitive for governance, hin dey less powerful over some national affairs and hin dey effective legislatively

translation.en: Not like DÃ©by who was more sensitive, very powerful and strong because of his non-democratic identity and political ideology.
translation.pcm: No be like by pesin wey dey sensitive, wey dey powerful and wey dey strong bikos of hin non democratic identity and policitical ideology

translation.en: Moreover, the edge of governance in Chad is said to have self-centered features without collective effort made by the people who are being ruled.
translation.pcm: make we say, di edge of governance for Chad na e dey say e get sef center feature witout collective effort wey di pipo make wey dem dey rule

translation.en: In fact, the system accommodates a larger portion of corruption and manipulation of single interest, meanwhile silencing the voices of its members during political discourse, public opinions and decision making.
translation.pcm: In fact, di system allow larger portion of corruption and manipulation of single interest, meanwhile silencin di voice of dia member durin policital tok, public opinion and to dey make decision

translation.en: For the sake of democracy and a sense of nationalism in Nigeria, no one can or will  personally decide to do anything between executive, legislature and judiciary
translation.pcm: for di sake of democracy, and sense  of nationalism for Nigeria, no one fi or go personally decide to do wetin anythin between executive, legislature and judiciary

translation.en: no matter how patriotic someone is.
translation.pcm: no mata how patriotic di persin fit be

translation.en: One must act according to the constitutional guidelines as well as passing his ideas to the three tiers of government for critique, suggestions and support.
translation.pcm: one most act accordin to di constitutional guideline as well as to dey pass hin idea to di three tiers of goment for critique, suggestion and support

translation.en: For instance, If Buhari is eager to die in the battlefield; he must first identify the legality of sacrificing his life constitutionally as a president of Nigeria who wants to fight Boko Haram in favour of national interest.
translation.pcm: for example, if Buhari dey eager to kpeme for di battlefield, hin must first identify di legality of sacrificin hin life constitutionally as President of Nigeria wey wan fight Boko Haram in favor of national interest

translation.en: He must understand his eligibility politically and democratically before he pays the price.
translation.pcm: Hin must understand say hin ability politically and democratically before hin go pay di price

translation.en: Anyway, Nigeria is not like Chad; here, we operate democracy not militarism and dictatorship.
translation.pcm: Anyway, Nigeria no be Chad, for here we dey operate democracy no be military and dictatorship

translation.en: In Chad, DÃ©by adopted a political party in a unitary system of government that is linked to dictatorship.
translation.pcm: for Chad, by say dem adopt political parti for unitary system of goment wey dey link to dictatorship

translation.en: By the way, the system he enjoyed deliberately lacked check and balanceif compared with the bicameral legislature.
translation.pcm: By di way, di system wey hin enjoy delibrately lack  check and balance if dey compare wit di bicameral legislature

translation.en: If you may recall, the DÃ©bys political party is Patriotic Salvation Movement; the party is built on a spirit of nationalism and the aim is to produce patriotic mindsets with sophisticated ideology and spiritual high sense of nationalism.
translation.pcm: If you fit remember, di Dbys political party na Patriotic Salvation Movement; di party dey built on spirit of nationalism and di aim na to produce patriotic mindsets wit sophisticated ideology and spiritual high sense of nationalism.

translation.en: Astonishingly!
translation.pcm: wetin dey surprise

translation.en: DÃ©by remained one; and he answered the clarion call of his party, MPS.
translation.pcm: by di one wan remain and hin answer di clarion call of hin parti MPS

translation.en: A true nationalist indeed!
translation.pcm: True nationalist for tru tru

translation.en: Why we must address food price instability “ CBN
translation.pcm: why we go address food price instability CBN

translation.en: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) has warned that its economic and financial policies would amount to nothing if the issues around food prices volatility could not be addressed as a nation.
translation.pcm: Di Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN) don warn say hin economic and financial policies go amount to nothin if di problem wey dey around food price volatility fit no address as nation

translation.en: The governor of the apex bank, Mr Godwin Emefiele, made this remark in a message to the input distribution flag-off and loan recovery drive under the RIFAN-CBN Anchor Borrowers Programme (ABP).
translation.pcm: Di governor of di bank wey high pass, Mr Godwin Emefile,make ham for remark for message to di input distribution flag off and loan recovery drive under di RIFAN-CBN Anchor Borrower Programme (ABP)

translation.en: Emefiele, whose message was delivered by Mr Edward Adamu, CBNs Deputy Governor, Corporate Services, noted that With a population of about 200 million people, importation of any major food item will continually drain the countrys external reserves, export our jobs to countries where those food items are produced and distort our commodity value chains as we will not be able to guarantee the supply of raw materials for the agro-allied companies.
translation.pcm: Emefiele, Mr Edward Adamu deliver hin message, CBN Deputy Governor, Corporate Services, note say wit population of about 200 million people, to dey import any major food item will continue to dey drain di kontri external reserves, export our jobs go kontris dem wer dem dey produce di food items and spoil our commodity value chains as we no go dey able to guarantee di supply of raw materials for di agro-allied companies.

translation.en: The CBN governor, who stressed the commitment of the present administration to attain self-sufficiency in rice production by the end of 2020 dry season, noted that the Anchor Borrowers Programme has proven to be a game-changer in the financing of smallholder farmers in Nigeria as it has revolutionised agricultural financing and remained the fulcrum of the countrys agricultural transformation initiatives.
translation.pcm: The CBN governor, wey dey stress di commitment of di present administration make dem get sef-sufficiency for rice production by di end of 2020 dry season, note say di Anchor Borrowers Programme don prove to be game-changer for di financin of smallholder farmers for Nigeria as e don change agricultural financin and e still be di heart of di kontri agricultural transformation initiatives.

translation.en: He said the programme, beyond being a tool for economic empowerment, job creation and wealth redistribution, has also galvanised financial inclusion in rural communities.
translation.pcm: Hin tok for di programme say, pass to dey be tool for economic empowerment, job creation and weak redistribution, don galvanise financial inclusion for rural communities

translation.en: On loan recovery, Emefiele said despite the devastation caused by numerous flood incidents in the 2018 wet season, farmers have been submitting produce and cash as part of their loan repayment but pleaded with the association to intensify efforts in that regard in the spirit of the partnership and sustainability of the programme.
translation.pcm: On loan recovery, Emefiele tok say despite di devastation wey plenti flood incidentsfor di 2018 wet season kos, farmers been dey submit produce and cash as part of dia loan repayment but dem beg di association make dem intensify efforts for dat side sake od di partnership and sustainability of di programme.

translation.en: The CBN governor said beyond rice, the Commodity Association Window has been expanded to cover more commodities like maize, cassava, sorghum, soybean, ginger etc and hoped that the efforts would contribute to the national aggregates and galvanise its drive to economic diversification.
translation.pcm: The CBN governor tok say afta rice, the Commodity Association Windowdon expand to cover more commodities like maize, cassava, sorghum, soybean, ginger etc and e hopesay di efforts go contribute to the national aggregates and hep hin drive go economic diversification.

translation.en: We all can be forces for good in the space of gender equality
translation.pcm: Dem fit force all of us for good for di space of ginger equality

translation.en: Femi Adeyomo
translation.pcm: Femi Adeyemo

translation.en: It is an undisputed fact that for the most part of history, women have not enjoyed equal rights.
translation.pcm: Na undisputed fact say for di history part wey plenti pass, women neva enjoy equal right

translation.en: Only several decades back, the general belief surrounding womens roles were restricted to duties at home, childbearing, and work in the kitchen.
translation.pcm: Na only sevaal decades wey don pass, di general belief wey dey surround women role dey restricted to duties for house, to dey born pikin and to dey work for kitchen

translation.en: This perception brought a tremendous amount of disregard and prejudice against women, not only at the family and community level, but glaring misrepresentations and stereotypical portrayals in mainstream media.
translation.pcm: Dis perception bring plenti amount of disregard and prejudice against women, no be only for di family and community level, but glarin misrepresentation and stereotypical portrayals for mainstreal media

translation.en: Above all, women were prohibited from important decision-making, leadership positions; access to higher education and professional aspiration.
translation.pcm: Pass all, dey no allow women to dey make important decision makin, leadership position, access to high education and professional aspiration

translation.en: Perhaps one of the most notable shifts in the movement for womens rights was the Womens Strike for Equality on August 26, 1970.
translation.pcm: Make we say one of di notable shifts for di movement for woman right na di Women Strike for Equality for August 26, 1970

translation.en: The strike took place in the United States to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the passing of the 19th Amendment, which effectively gave women in America the right to vote.
translation.pcm: Di strike wey take place for di United State to celebrate di 50th anniversary of di passin of di 19th Amendment, wey effectively give women for America di right to vote

translation.en: About 50,000 women gathered for the protest, and at that time, it was noted to be the largest gathering on behalf of women in history.
translation.pcm: Na like 50,000 woman gadther for di protest, and for dat time, e dey noted to be di largest gatherin wey dey represent  women for history

translation.en: The strike had specific goals, including equal opportunity in the workforce and free child care.
translation.pcm: Di strike get specific goal, wit equal opportunity for di workforce and free child care

translation.en: Today, it is viewed as a movement responsible for political rights for women, social equality in relationships and income equality in the United States and all over the world.
translation.pcm: For today, movement wey dey respoonsible for political rights for women na hin dey use view ham, social equality for relationship and inkom equality for di United State and for di world

translation.en: In Nigeria, gender inequality has heavily pervaded society.
translation.pcm: For Nigeria, gender inequality don heavily pervaded society

translation.en: Women constitute about 49.33 per cent of the Nigerian population, approximately 99.13 million in total.
translation.pcm: Woman carry like 49:33 per cent of di Nigeria population, wey dey approximate to 99.13 million for total

translation.en: However, female participation in formal and informal structures, processes and key decision making remains insignificant.
translation.pcm: Howeva, female participation for formal and informal structure, get and kom carry key decision makin remain insignificant

translation.en: This is largely because of discriminatory social norms, marginalization and economic disparity, which dictates the lives of women in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Dis dey largely bikos of discriminatory social norms, marginalization and economic disparity, wey dictate di live of women for Nigeria

translation.en: According to NOI Polls, which sought to identify socio-economic challenges faced by women, the results revealed that 42 per cent lacked financial empowerment, 35 per cent were poor, 33 per cent lacked access to quality education , 19 per cent had experienced domestic and sexual abuse, and 17 per cent faced gender discrimination in employment.
translation.pcm: Accordin to NOI Polls, wey wan identify socio-economic challenges wey women dey face, di result show say 42 per cent no get financial empowerment, 35 per cent no get moni, 33 per cent no get access to good education , 19 per cent don dey domestic and sexual abused, and 17 per cent face gender discrimination for employment.

translation.en: However, recent developments in Nigeria and across the globe, are proof that things are changing.
translation.pcm: howeva, recent development for Nigeria and pass di world, na proof say thins dey change

translation.en: A few years ago, if you had told people that a woman would hold executive positions in organizations or political institutions, many would have shown disbelief.
translation.pcm: year wey pass, if u don tell pipo say woman do hold executive position for organisation or political institution, plenti go don show disbelief

translation.en: On March 1, 2021, Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, a Nigerian political figure and economist, became the first woman and first African to serve as the Director-General of the World Trade Organization, a landmark achievement for women and Africans all over the world.
translation.pcm: On March 1, 2021, Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, wey be one Nigeria political figure and economist, bikom di first woman and first African wey go serve as di Director-General of di World Trade Organization, na landmark achievement for women and Africans evriwer for di world.

translation.en: This victory, and many others, have become a clear sign that female empowerment, equality, and leadership are necessary to foster positive change in society.
translation.pcm: Di victory,and plenti oda, don bikom clear sign say female empowerment, eqality, and leadership dey necessary to foster positive change for society

translation.en: We need all hands on deck to close gender gaps.
translation.pcm: we need all hand for deck to close gender gap

translation.en: We have made great progress on gender equality and we cant allow it to be eroded.
translation.pcm: We don make great progress for gender equality and we no fit allow ham make e erod

translation.en: We need to act now to ensure that while we continue responding to the health and economic crisis, we find ways to progress womens economic empowerment and equality, in education, in the home and in the workplace.
translation.pcm: we need act now to ensure say wen we continue to dey respond to di health and economic crisis, we go kom find way to progress women economic empowerment and equality, for education, for house and for workplace

translation.en: At P&G, we will keep using the voice of our company in forums such as #WeSeeEqual to drive discussion and action on the issues that matter.
translation.pcm: For P&G, we go kip to use di voice of awa company for forum as we see equal to drive tok and action for issue wey mata

translation.en: Those were the words of Adil Farhat, the Managing Director of Procter & Gamble Nigeria, during the company flagship gender equality summit, #WeSeeEqual Summit, in partnership with the UNWomen.
translation.pcm: Na wetin Adil Farhat tok, di Managin Director pf Procter and Gamble Nigeria, for di company flagin of gender equality summit, WeSeeEqual Summit, wey dem dey partnership wit di UN Women

translation.en: During the summit, Dr Zainab Bagudu, the First Lady of Kebbi State described the #WeSeeEqual Summit as an inspiring platform to motivate change in Nigeria towards gender inequality, stating the importance of collaboration between private and public institutions in the fight against gender inequality.
translation.pcm: During di summit, Dr Zainab Bagudu, di First Lady of Kebbi State describ di #WeSeeEqual Summit as platform wey dey inspire to motivate change for Nigeria towards gender inequality, as she dey tok di importance of collaboration between private and public institutions for di fight against gender inequality.

translation.en: It is important for individuals and organizations to recognize that we can all be forces for good in the space of gender equality.
translation.pcm: E dey important make individual and organization make dem recognize say we fit dey force for good for di space of gender equality

translation.en: Our combined efforts as citizens, neighbours and humans will ensure that the opportunities and resources needed to secure and preserve gender equality.
translation.pcm: awa joint effort as citizen wey we be, neighbours and humans go ensure say di opportunity and resource wey we need to secure and preserve gender equality

translation.en: We need new, radical collaborations that dont just focus on the financial sources, but bring together all partners at the start.
translation.pcm: We need new, radical collaboration wey fi focus on di financial source, but make dem bring all awa partners for di start

translation.en: Looking at the 70s, 80s and even a large part of the 90s, it can be said that there is now a significant improvement in reducing gender inequalities in Nigeria, no denying that we are still well behind it.
translation.pcm: make we  look 70s, 80s and even large part of di 90s, we fit tok am as say na significant improvement to dey reduce gender inequality for Nigeria, no delay  we still dey for back

translation.en: When you look at the 17 action points of the Sustainable Development Goals, which is the most comprehensive global roadmap to shared human progress, it is impossible to overlook the centrality of its call for gender equality and reducing inequalities.
translation.pcm: Wen you luk di 17 action points of di Development Goals wey dey fit sustain, wey be di global roadmap wey you fit understand pass to shared human progress,e dey impossible to overlook di centrality of hin call for gender equality and to dey reduce inequalities.

translation.en: Indeed, it is improbable that the world could attain significant success in almost any action area of the SDGs “ from ensuring quality health care, education and sanitation for all to reducing poverty, ending hunger, providing productive employment or enabling strong institutions “ without achieving strongly in gender equality and reducing inequalities.
translation.pcm: Indeed,E no dey probable say di world fit reach significant success for almost any action area of SDGs “ as dem dey ensure quality health care, education and sanitation for evribodi to reduce poverty, end hunger, provide productive employment or enable strong institutions “ witout say dem achieve wella for gender equality and dey reduce inequalities.

translation.en: Private organisations must play their part in facilitating gender equality.
translation.pcm: Private organisation gas play dia part to facilitate gender equality

translation.en: Also, there is the need for everyone to take up space and amplify gender equality, to secure a better future for all women.
translation.pcm: Also, need go dey make evribodi take space and amplify gender equality, to see say beta future for all woman

translation.en: Mr Femi writes from Lagos
translation.pcm: Mr Femi na hin write from Lagos

translation.en: EU leaders sign Brexit deal as UK MPs debate ratification
translation.pcm: EU leader na hin sign Brexit deal as UK MPs debate ratification

translation.en: European Union leaders have signed have their post-Brexit trade deal with Britain and dispatched it to London on an RAF jet Wednesday, setting their seal on a drawn-out divorce just hours before the UK brings its half-century European experiment to an end.
translation.pcm: European Union leaders dem don signed, get dia post-Brexit trade deal wit Britain and dey send am go London on top one RAF jet on Wednesday,as dey put dia seal on one drawn-out divorce hours before di Ukend dia half-century European experiment.

translation.en: EU chiefs Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel, the heads of the European Commission and European Council, smiled at a brief televised ceremony to put their names to the 1,246-page Trade and Cooperation Agreement.
translation.pcm: Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel wey dia two be UE chiefs, di head of di European Commission and European Council, smile for one brief televise ceremony to put dia name to di 1,246 page Trade and  Cooperation and agreement

translation.en: It has been a long road.
translation.pcm: Di road too far

translation.en: Its time now to put Brexit behind us.
translation.pcm: Time don reach make we put Brexit  for awa back

translation.en: Our future is made in Europe,von der Leyen said.
translation.pcm: Von der Leyen na hin tok say; Na for Europe dem make awa future

translation.en: Britain will leave the European single market and customs union at 11:00pm (2300 GMT) on Thursday, the end of a difficult year and of a post-Brexit transition period marked by intense and tortuous trade negotiations.
translation.pcm: Britain go comot for Europe single market and custom union by 11:00pm(2300GMT)for Thursday, di end of hard year and of post-Brexit transition period wey dey mark by serious and tortuos trade negociation

translation.en: But first the hefty document, bound in blue leather, was flown by the Royal Air Force to London for Prime Minister Boris Johnson to add his signature, as the UK parliament began a rushed debate on the deal before the looming deadline.
translation.pcm: but first di hafty document, wey dem bound for blue leather, na hin dey fly wit Royal Air Force go London for Prime Minister Boris Johnson to join hin signature, as di UK parliament begin rush debate on top di deal before dey rish deadline

translation.en: Introducing the legislation to ratify it, Johnson told lawmakers it heralded a new relationship between Britain and the EU as sovereign equals, joined by friendship, commerce, history, interests and values.
translation.pcm: Introducin di legislature make dem ratify ham, Johnson tell lawmaker hin herald new relationship wey dey between Britain and EU as sovereign equal, wey friendship join dem, commerce, history, interest and value

translation.en: With this bill we are going to be a friendly neighbour, the best friend and ally the EU could have,he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say; Wit dis bill we dey go be friendly neighbour, we go be friend and ally di EU fi have

translation.en: London and Brussels would work hand in glove whenever our values and interests coincide, while fulfilling the sovereign wish of the British people to live under their own sovereign laws made by their own sovereign parliament, he added.
translation.pcm: He add say; London and Brussels go work togeda weneva our value and interests na di same, as we dey fulfil di sovereign wish of di British pipo make dem stay under dia own sovereign laws wey dia own sovereign parliament do.

translation.en: Anxious wait
translation.pcm: dem dey anxious as dem dey wait

translation.en: Michel echoed the sentiment in Brussels, vowing the two sides would work shoulder to shoulderon major issues, including climate change and future health pandemics.
translation.pcm: Michal echo di sentiment for Brussels, as he dey vow say two side go work shoulder to shoulder on top major issues, includin climate change and future health pandemic

translation.en: Johnsons government only published the accompanying UK legislation on Tuesday afternoon, less than 24 hours before the debate began in parliament and an hour after the EU signing.
translation.pcm: Johnson goment only publish di accompanyin UK  legislation for Tuesday afternoon, e no reach 24 hours before dey start di debate for parliament and one hour afta wey EU sign

translation.en: The government intends to ram all stages of the 85-page European Union (Future Relationship) Bill through the Commons and the House of Lords in one day, before Queen Elizabeth II formally signs it into law.
translation.pcm: Di goment wan ram all stage of di 85 page Europe Union(Future Relationship) Bill through di Commons and House of Lord for one day, before Queen Elizabeth II go formally sign am for law

translation.en: The last-ditch deal averted the prospect of a cliff-edge separation which would have seen quotas and tariffs slapped on all cross-Channel trade, exacerbating strains in the middle of the coronavirus pandemic, which has hit Britain harder than most.
translation.pcm: Di last-ditch deal comot di prospect of one cliff-edge separation wey go don see quotas and tariffs slapped on top all cross-Channel trade, exacerbatin strains for di middle of di coronavirus pandemic, wey hold Britain pass most oda place dem.

translation.en: But British fishermen have accused the government of selling them out, while services ” accounting for 80 percent of the UK economy ” were largely omitted.
translation.pcm: But di British fisherman don accuse di goment say dem sell dem out, as service wey dey account for 80 percent  of di UK economy dey largely omitted

translation.en: The City of London faces an anxious wait to learn on what basis it can continue dealing with Europe in the future.
translation.pcm: Di city of London don face anxious wait to learn on di kind basis wey e fit continue to deal wit Europe for di future

translation.en: Theresa May, whose three-year Brexit-dominated premiership ended in 2019 after she failed to win support for a closer future relationship with the bloc, voiced her unease at the agreement.
translation.pcm: Theresa May, wey for three year Brexit dominate premiership end for 2019 afta wey she fail to win support for close future relationship wit di bloc, wey she voice her unease for di agreement

translation.en: We have a deal in trade which benefits the EU, but not a deal in services which would have benefited the UK,she told MPs.
translation.pcm: We get deal for trade wey  benefit di EU, but no be all deal for service go benefit di UK na hin she tell MPs

translation.en: Thin deal
translation.pcm: Deal wey dey thin

translation.en: The legislation is set to pass, however, after an influential faction of arch-Brexiteers in Johnsons
translation.pcm: Di legislation don dey ready to pass, as e go be, afta wey influential faction of arch-Brexiteers for Johnson

translation.en: ruling Conservatives gave their blessing to the EU agreement on Tuesday, and the main opposition Labour party signalled its reluctant backing.
translation.pcm: ruling Conservative give dia blessin to di EU agreement for Tuesday, and di main opposition Labour parti give signal to hin reluctant backin

translation.en: Despite misgivings among some of his own MPs, who plan to abstain or vote against the agreement, Labour leader Keir Starmer said neutrality was not an option given the stakes for Britain.
translation.pcm: upon say misgivin wey dey among sone of hin own MPs, wey plan to comot or vote against di agreement, Labour leader Keir Starmer tok say neutrality no be option to give stake for Britain

translation.en: This is a thin deal, its got many flaws, but a thin deal is better than no deal,Starmer told MPs.
translation.pcm: Dis na thin deal, I get plenti flaw, but thin deal dey beta pass make deal no dey. Starmer tell MPs

translation.en: Lawmakers from the pro-European Liberal Democrats and Scottish National Party (SNP) said they would vote against it ” with the SNP using the issue to push for a fresh referendum on independence for Scotland.
translation.pcm: Dem lawmaker wey kom from di pro-Europe Liberal Democrat and Scottish National parti(SNP) tok say dem go vote against am wit di SNP using di issue to push for fresh referendum for di independence of dem Scotland

translation.en: The only way to regain the huge benefits of EU membership is to become an independent state at the heart of Europe once more,its leader in the UK parliament, Ian Blackford, said.
translation.pcm: Di only way to regain di plenti benefit of EU membership na to bikom independent state for di art of Europe one more time, dia leader for UK parliament, Ian Blackford na hin tok ham

translation.en: The agreements impact will play out in the coming months, with UK businesses braced for customs red tape they have avoided for decades in cross-Channel trade.
translation.pcm: Di agreement impact go play out for di comin month, wit UK business brace for custom red tape wey dey don avoid for decade for cross-Channel trade

translation.en: Meanwhile from January 1, there will no longer be free movement of people from Britain to the EU or vice versa.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile from January 1, free movement of pesin from Britain to di EU or kom Britain no go dey again

translation.en: Under the compressed legislative calendar, the European Parliament will debate the Brexit deal after the New Year, but they are expected to eventually nod it through.
translation.pcm: For under di compress legislative calender, di European Parliament go debate di Brexit deal afta New Year, but dem expect dem make dem nod am pass

translation.en: Pending that, EU member states gave their green light on Monday for the accord to take provisional effect before Thursdays deadline.
translation.pcm: Pendin dat wan, EU member state give dia green light for Monday for di accord to take provisional effect before e rish Thursday deadline

translation.en: FG launches new national policy on virtual meeting
translation.pcm: FG don launch new national policy on top virtual meetin

translation.en: The Federal Government on Monday formally launched the national policy on virtual engagements in public institutions.
translation.pcm: Di Federal goment for Monday don formally launch di national policy on top virtual engagement for public insttution

translation.en: It also commissioned an Emergency Communications Centre and four more digital economy centres across the country.
translation.pcm: E even commission Emergency Communication Centre wit four digital economy centre pass di kontri

translation.en: The Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Isa Ali Ibrahim Pantami, who launched the new policy and commissioned the projects virtually in Abuja, said the paradigm shift to virtual engagements in official circles globally, occasioned by the COVID 19 pandemic, necessitated the need for a policy to give legal impetus to the practice in public institutions.
translation.pcm: Di Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Isa Ali Ibrahim Pantami, wey launch di new policy, kom commission di projects virtually for Abuja, tok say tins don shift to virtual engagements for official circles dem for di world, bikos of COVID 19 pandemic, e kom make dineed for a policy make dem give legal impetus to dey thins virtually for public institutions dey necessary.

translation.en: The policy which was approved by the Federal Executive Council on the 14th of October, 2020 was developed in collaboration with the Office of the Head of the Civil Service of the Federation, Pantami said.
translation.pcm: Di policy wey dem approve by di Federal Executive Council for 14th of Octomber, 2020 na hin dey develop wit collaboration wit di office of di Head of di Civil Service of di Federation na hin Pantami tok

translation.en: He said that the policy would institutionalise frameworks and standards within Ministries, Departments and Agencies of governments as well as
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di policy go institutionalise framework and standard wey dey witin Ministry, Deparment and Agencies of goment as well

translation.en: government -owned companies using virtual engagement as an administrative procedure in service and significantly reduce the cost of governance.
translation.pcm: Companies wey goment get wey dey use virtual engagement as administrative procedure for service and significantly reduce bcause of governance

translation.en: He said in line with the National Digital Economy Policy and Strategy, the facilities commissioned under the auspices of the National Information Technology Development Agency and the Nigerian Communications Commission would enhance security, create digital jobs, promote knowledge-based economic growth, increase productivity and enhance commercial and administrative methods.
translation.pcm: He tok say in line wit National Digital Economy Policy and Strategy, di facilities wey dey commission under di National Information Technology Development Agency and the Nigerian Communications Commission supervision go enhance security, create digital jobs, promote knowledge-based economic growth, increase wetin pipo dey produce and e go improve commercial and administrative methods.

translation.en: He said all digital economy projects are carefully thought out and executed efficiently with a view to ensure the sustainable growth of Nigerias digital economy.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say digital economy project na hin dem dey carefully teach and execute efficiently wit view to see say di sustainable growth  of Nigeria digital economy

translation.en: Activists fight dirty over mismanagement of millions meant for Odumakins burial
translation.pcm: Dem activist don fight dirty on top mismanagement of millions wey dey for Odumakin burial

translation.en: The controversy over the burial funds of late activist, Mr. Yinka Odumakin, deepened on Thursday as the memorial committee slammed members of the accountability committee over alleged mismanagement of N10 million raised for the burial.
translation.pcm: Di controversy wey dey for burial moni of late activist, Mr. Yinka Odumakin, go deep again on Thursday as di memorial committee slammed members of di accountability committee sake of di N10 million wey dem feel say dey no manage well, wey pipo raise for di burial.

translation.en: The committee described the accountability committee members as self-seeking infiltrators masquerading as Civil Society Activists.
translation.pcm: Di committee describe di accountability comitee member as say self seekin infiltrator masqueradin as Civil Society Activist

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that a few days after the burial of Odumakin in Ife Moro, Osun State, some members of the burial committee questioned the management of the funds.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust report say few days afta di burial of Odumakin for Ife Moro, Osun State, some members of di burial committee question di management on top di moni

translation.en: The burial took place on April 24.
translation.pcm: Di burial wey take place on April 24

translation.en: They subsequently set up an accountability committee known as Odumakin Accountability Resolution Committee which indicted the Memorial Planning Committee (MPC) and asked it to refund N7.9m to Odumakin family.
translation.pcm: Dey subsequent set up accountability committee wey we know as Odumakin  Accountability Resolution Committee wey indicate di memorial Plannnng Committee(MPC)  and tell am make im refund N7.9m to Odunmakin family

translation.en: But reacting to the accountability committee report, Comrade Awa Bamiji of the Civil Society and Pro-Democracy Movement Memorial Initiative, 2021, dismissed the allegations.
translation.pcm: To dey react to di accountability committee report, Comrade Awa Bamiji of di Civil Society and Pro-Democracy Movement Memorial Initiave, 2021, dismiss di allegation

translation.en: He warned members of the accountability committee to desist from their divisive reactionary orchestration of disaffection within the movement or be ready to face the wrath of the majority and genuine Leaders and Elders of the Civil Society Movement.
translation.pcm: He warn members of di accountability committee make dem stop dia divisive reactionary orchestration of disaffection wey dey witin di movement or make dem ready face di wrath of di majority and genuine Leaders and Elders dem wey dey di Civil Society Movement.

translation.en: He described one Declan Ihekaire as one of the key actors behind the issue, alleging that Ihekaire specifically requested and collected N20,000 to fuel his personal car to and from Osun State.
translation.pcm: Hin describe one Declan Iheakaire as one of di key actor wey dey behind di issue, alleging we Ihekaire specially request and collect N20,000 fuel hin personal car reach and from Osun state

translation.en: Allegation of illegal disbursement of N5m
translation.pcm: Na allegation wey be illegal disbursement wey be N5m

translation.en: He also accused others of cornering and sharing N5m, saying this is part of the evidence already compiled with the help of their Legal Associates.
translation.pcm: Him also con accuse oda cornerin and to dey share N5m, say dis na part of di evidence already wey comply wit di help of dia Legal Associate

translation.en: To this end, we have already instructed our legal advisers to approach the Law Court immediately to press charges of willful defamation, Obtaining by Force under duress and Physical Assault against them and their cohorts at large if they continue in their nefarious and malicious ways of unprovoked assault and smear campaign dubbed as resolutions of their dubious accountability gang.
translation.pcm: To reach here, we don already instruct our legal advisers maka dem approach di Law Court immediately to press charge for willful defamation, Obtainin by Force under duress and Physical Assault against dem and dia pipo sef if dey continue dia wicked and malicious ways of assault wey no get reason and smear campaign wey dem call as resolutions of dia dubious accountability gang.

translation.en: As the conscience of the country, the leadership of the Civil Society and Pro “ Democracy Movement hereby vehemently condemns, disowns and distances itself from the divisive activities of these bunch of pretenders and Infiltrators who are of no significant reputation and scruples.
translation.pcm: As di conscience of di kontri, di leadership of di Civil Society and Pro “ Democracy Movement na hin dey strongly condemn, disown and e distance hinsef from di divisive activities of dis pretenders and Infiltrators dem, wey no get significant reputation and scruples.

translation.en: When contacted yesterday, Comrade Ihekaire said Awa Bamiji who signed the statement should be arrested.
translation.pcm: wen dey contact dem yesterday, Comrade Ihekaire tok say Awa Bamji wey sign di statement na hin make dem arrest

translation.en: He said he was brought into the committee as a sub-committee member
translation.pcm: Hin tok say dem bring am kom inside di committee as sub-committee member

translation.en: and he was never part of any meeting held by the Memorial Committee where issues of the disbursement of funds were raised.
translation.pcm: and him no dey part of any meetin wey di Memorial Committee hold wey be say issue of di disbursement of funds na hin dey raise

translation.en: Ihekaire noted that many people were shut out of the platform because the committee didnt want to give account of the funds received.
translation.pcm: Ihekaire note say plenti pipo na hin dey shut comot from di platform bikos say di committee no wan give account of di fund wey dem receive

translation.en: He said some of them opened Odumakin Real Accountability Platformand added Awa Bamiji and Comrade Wale Okunniyi
translation.pcm: Him tok say some of dem open Odumakin Real Accountability Platform kon add Awa Bamiji and Comrade Wale Okunniyi

translation.en: but they left.
translation.pcm: but dey comot

translation.en: But he stated that the committee did their work and found out they actually embezzled N7m plus.
translation.pcm: But him state say di committee do dia work kom find out say dey actually embezzle N7m plus

translation.en: They have gone begging people to give them soft landing and the committee members are saying, no, we are not backing down.
translation.pcm: Dey don go to dey beg pipo to give dem  soft landin and di committee member dey say no dem no dey back down

translation.en: We are going to address a press conference on this.
translation.pcm: We go address press conference on top dis

translation.en: He also said he was not moved by the threat of legal action against him even as he dismissed the allegation of cornering N5m.
translation.pcm: Him even tok say hin no dey move by di threat of legal action wey dey against am even as hin dismiss di allegation N5m wey dey corner corner

translation.en: He had threatened that earlier and now petitions have been written against them to the EFCC, Force CID and people have been begging on their behalf.
translation.pcm: Him don threaten earlier and now dey don write petition against dem to EFCC, Force CID and pipo don dey beg on dia behalf

translation.en: We have to call those that have been begging on their behalf that they have not shown any remorse.
translation.pcm: We suppose call di pipo wey don dey beg on dia behalf say dem neva show any kind remorse

translation.en: I have just told you the truth and nothing but the truth.
translation.pcm: I just tell u di truth and nothing wey pass di truth

translation.en: We need to sanitize civil society.
translation.pcm: we go need sanitize dem civil soiety

translation.en: They should just feel remorse and come out to say we are sorry.
translation.pcm: dey suppose feel remorse and kom out kon say dem dey sorry

translation.en: It was even suggested that they should be ostracized from the activities of civil society,he said.
translation.pcm: Dey even suggest say dey suppose ostractize from di activity of civil society hin tok

translation.en: Attempt to implicate Odumakin family
translation.pcm: Na attempt to implicate Odumakin family

translation.en: The accountability committee later issued another statement, saying the claim made by Bamiji was an unsubstantiated story designed to implicate Odumakin family.
translation.pcm: Di accountability committee later kom issue anoda statement, say di claim wey Bamji make na unsubstantiated tori wey dem design to implicate Odumakin family

translation.en: It insisted that the sum of N9.3m out of N9.9m raised by the committee was blown on burial jamboree.
translation.pcm: e insist say di sum of N9.3m wey dey out of di N9.9m wey di committee raise na e dem blow on top burial jamboree

translation.en: On the N5m alleged to have been cornered, it said, The only place where the sum of N5m was mentioned is in the budget itself and was listed as donation by the Lagos State Government towards the burial of late Comrade Yinka Odumakin.
translation.pcm: on top N5m wey dey tok say dey don corner, hin tok say,di only place wey di sum of N5m wey dey mention dey di budget and na e dem list as donation by Lagos State goment toward di burial of late Odumakin

translation.en: Other South West Governors of  Ekiti and Osun States made donations of a  staggering N1, 000,000.00k and N2.500.000.00k respectively for the same purpose.
translation.pcm: Oda South West Governor wey dem be Ekiti and Osun State make donation of staggerin N1,000,000.00k and N2.500.000.00k respectively on top di same purpose

translation.en: Details of the income and expenditures analysis as submitted by Wale Okunniyi and Awa Bamiji, shall be affixed here under for our perusal.
translation.pcm: Details of di income and thins wey dem buy analysis as Wale Okunniyi and Awa Bamiji submit am, go dey here wer we go fit peruse am.
