translation.en: Meanwhile, the total amount donated by three (3) South West Governors, (N8.5m naira only in total) was all listed as part of the total money lavishly wasted on frivolous expenses, multiple charges for same items, heavily padded relevant and irrelevant materials, overloading and highly overcharged provisions for non existing expenditures
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, di total amount wey three (3) South West Governors donate, (N8.5m naira only for total) na him dey list as part of di total money wey dem waste on top yeye thins, multiple charges for di same thin, heavily padded relevant and irrelevant material dem, overloadin and  provisions wey dey don too ovacharge for non existin expenditures

translation.en: That is,  if there was any at all, the statement added.
translation.pcm: Dat is, if any dey, di statement go add

translation.en: UPDATED: Bayern win ninth Bundesliga title in a row
translation.pcm: As e dey hot: Bayern don win dia ninth Bundesliga for  row

translation.en: Bayern Munich have been confirmed as Bundesliga champions for the ninth straight season Saturday after England winger Jadon Sancho netted twice in Borussia Dortmunds 3-2 win over second-placed RB Leipzig.
translation.pcm: Bayern Munich na hin dey don confirm say na dem be Bundesliga champion for di ninth straight season for Saturday afta wey England winger Jadon Sancho score twice for Borussia Dortmund wit 3-2 win wey dey win for di second place for RB Leipzig

translation.en: The result in Dortmund meant Bayern become champions before their home game against Borussia Moenchengladbach on Saturday evening.
translation.pcm: Di result for Dortmund mean say Bayern be champion before dia home game wey dem go play against Borussia Moenchengladbach for Saturday evenin.

translation.en: England winger Jadon Sancho netted twice in Dortmunds home win which crowned Bayern as champions without kicking a ball before their home game against Borussia Moenchengladbach later on Saturday.
translation.pcm: England winger Jadon Sancho na hin score twice for Dortmund house win wey crown Bayern as champion even wen dey no kick ball for dia house game against Borissia Moenchengladbach for Saturday

translation.en: Before they even kick off, Bayern have an unassailable 71 points to Leipzigs 64.
translation.pcm: Before dey even start wella, Bayern don get unassailable 71 point to Leipzig 64

translation.en: I dont think anyone has ever become champions before while in the team bus on the way to the stadium!
translation.pcm: be like say anyone don eva bikom champion before wen team bus for di way go  stadium

translation.en: Dortmund head coach Edin Terzic said in congratulating Bayern.
translation.pcm: Dortmund head coach Edin Terzic congratulate Bayern

translation.en: Julian Nagelsmann, the 33-year-old coach who will leave RB Leipzig to take over at Bayern next season, offered a terse congratulations on a deserved titleto his future employers.
translation.pcm: Julian Nagelsmann, di  33 year old coach wey go comot RB Leipzig to take over for Bayern next season, offer tense congratulation for title wey hin deserve to hin future employer

translation.en: The victory lifted Dortmund into the Champions League places, but Eintracht Frankfurt can knock them out of fourth place if they beat Mainz on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Di victory na e lift Dortmund enta di Champions League place, but Eintracht Fankfurt fit knock dem comot for di fourth place if dey beat Mainz for Sunday

translation.en: Even without star striker Erling Braut Haaland, Dortmund were 2-0 up at the start of the second half thanks to goals from Marco Reus and Sancho.
translation.pcm: Even witout dia star stricker Erling Braut Haaland, Dortmund dey 2-0 up for di start of di second half thanks to di goal from Marco Reus and Sancho

translation.en: Leipzig fought back with a Lukas Klostermann header before Dani Olmo equalised only for Sancho to grab the winner with superb footwork.
translation.pcm: Leipzig fight back wit Lukas Klostermann header before Dani Olomo kon return am back only make Sancho carry di winner wit superb footwork

translation.en: The clubs meet again on Thursday in the German Cup final at Berlins Olympic Stadium.
translation.pcm: Di club meet again for Thursday for di German Cup final for Berlina Olympic Stadium

translation.en: We showed a lot of morale, the game had absolutely nothing to do with the final in Berlin, but of course we want to win on Thursday too,said goal-scorer Reus.
translation.pcm: We show plenti morale, di game sef no get anythin to do wit di final for Berlin,  but tru tru, we wan win for Thursday too, Reus wey score na hin tok am

translation.en: Dortmund hope to have Haaland back from a thigh injury before the cup final and even with their top-scorer watching in the stands, the hosts still raced into the lead after only seven minutes.
translation.pcm: Dortmund get hope to get Haaland kom back from thigh injury before di cup final and even wit dia top-scorer wey dey watch for wia hin sit down, di host still race inside di lead afta only seven minute

translation.en: Reus span out of Lukasz Piszczeks pass, sprinted behind the defence and took a beautiful back-heeled ball from Thorgan Hazard before sweeping his shot past Leipzig goalkeeper Peter Gulacsi.
translation.pcm: Reus span out Lukasz Piszczek pass, sprint for back of defence and take beautiful back-heel ball from Thorgan Hazard before hin sweep hin shot past Leipzig goalkiper Peter Gulacsi

translation.en: Dortmund goalkeeper Marwin Hitz did not come out for the second half after being injured colliding with his centre-back Manuel Akanji just before the break and was replaced by Roman Buerki.
translation.pcm: Dortmund goalkiper Marwin Hitz no comot for di second half afta wey hin get injury wen hin collide wit hin centre back Manuel Akanji before di break wey dem replace am wit Roman Buerki

translation.en: Dortmund doubled their lead just six minutes after the break with a superb piece of skill from Sancho, who cut back inside after a Raphael Guerreiro pass and fired his shot in off the far post with superb accuracy.
translation.pcm: Dortmund double dia lead six minute afta wey dem get break wit  superb piece of skil wey Sancho do, wey cut back inside afta wey Raphael Guerreiro pass and kon fire hin shot for far post wit superb accuracy

translation.en: The visitors pulled a goal back on 63 minutes when Emil Forsberg floated in a corner and Lukas Klostermann steered his header past Buerki.
translation.pcm: Di visitor return one goal back for 63 minute wen Emil Forsberg float ball from corner wey Lukas Klosterman steer hin header pass Buerki

translation.en: Leipzig drew level when South Korea striker Hwang Hee-chan broke clear of Dortmund defender Mats Hummels and squared for Olmo who tapped home from close range.
translation.pcm: Leipzig draw level wen South Korea striker Hwang Hee-chan break clear for Dortmund defender Mat Hummel and square am for Olmo wey tap house from place wey near

translation.en: However, Sancho grabbed the winner when he flicked the ball to Guerreiro, took a return pass and tapped home to hand Bayern the title.
translation.pcm: Howeva, Sancho grab di winner wen hin flick di ball give Guerreiro, take return pass and tap house to give Bayern di title

translation.en: Ndidi, Iheanchos Leicester City win first FA Cup after Tielemans screamer
translation.pcm: Ndidi, Iheancho Leicester City win dia first FA Cup afta wey Tieleman scream

translation.en: Youri Tielemans struck a sensational winner to clinch Leicester City their first FA Cup in a 1-0 victory over Chelsea on Sunday, in front of 21,000 fans at Wembley “ with Ben Chilwells 89th-minute effort ruled out by VAR for offside.
translation.pcm: Youri Tielemans hit sensational winner to hep Leicester City get dia first FA Cup for one 1-0 victory ova Chelsea on Sunday, in front of 21,000 fans at Wembley “ wit Ben Chilwells 89th-minute effort wey VAR  tok say na offside.

translation.en: It was the biggest gathering of supporters inside a stadium since the coronavirus pandemic began “ and they were treated to incredible drama in the 140th FA Cup final.
translation.pcm: Na di biggest gatherin of dem supporters for inside stadium since coronavirus pandemic don start and dey treat dem kon show some kind drama for di 140th FA Cup final

translation.en: Leicester fans had the perfect view as Tielemans fired a brilliant shot into the top corner of the goal at their end on 63 minutes.
translation.pcm: Leicester fans don get perfect view as Tielemans fire brilliant shot inside top corner of di goal for dia end for 63 minute

translation.en: It was a goal worthy of winning any final and capped a superb performance from the Belgian.
translation.pcm: Na goal wey worth winnin any final cap superb performance from Belgian

translation.en: It had been a game of few clear chances up until that point but Kasper Schmeichel was then forced into two fantastic saves at the other end, pushing a Chilwell header onto the post and then pulling off another wonderful stop to deny Mason Mount, as Chelsea desperately searched for a response.
translation.pcm: Na game of small clear chances up e be until dat point but dey kom force  Kasper Schmeichel into two fantastic saves at di oda end, pushin a Chilwell header onto di post and then pullin off anoda wonderful stop to deny Mason Mount, as Chelsea dey desperate to find response

translation.en: Former Leicester defender Chilwell thought hed done just that, when Caglar Soyuncus clearance went in off him, but VAR rightly spotted the Chelsea man had strayed marginally offside in the build-up.
translation.pcm: Former Leicester defender Chilwell think say hin don do am, wen Caglar Soyuncu clearance go comot am, but VAR rightly sort di Chealsea man don stray marginally offside for di build up

translation.en: Leicester, who lost key defender Jonny Evans to injury midway through the first half, held on and, 52 years after their last appearance in a FA Cup final, were able to hold the trophy aloft for the first time, adding another remarkable chapter to their story, following their 2015/16 Premier League triumph.
translation.pcm: Leicester, wey lose key defender Jonny Evans sake of injury midway thru first half, still dey and, 52 years afta dia last appearance one FA Cup final, dey able to carri di trophy up for di first time, as dey add anoda remarkable chapter join dia story, followin dia 2015/16 Premier League triumph.

translation.en: Pakistan blocks social media amid anti-France protests
translation.pcm: Pakistan don block social media amid anti-france protest

translation.en: Pakistan on Friday blocked social media platforms amid fears that activists of a radical Islamist group might use the technology to stoke violent protests against last years depiction of the Prophet Muhammad in France.
translation.pcm: Pakistan on Friday block social media platforms dem sake of fear say activists of one radical Islamist group fit use di technology kos violent protests against last year depiction of di Prophet Muhammad in France.

translation.en: Followers of far-right Tehreek-e-Labaik Pakistan (TLP), a group that supports the countrys controversial blasphemy laws, have blocked roads and chocked streets at deadly protests that started on Monday.
translation.pcm: followers of far- right Tehreek-e-Labaik Pakistan(TLP) one group wey support di kontri controversial blasphemy law, don block road kom choke streets for deadly protests wey start on Monday

translation.en: The protesters were demanding that the government fulfill an earlier promise to expel the French ambassador by April 20, over the publication of a cartoon depicting the prophet last year.
translation.pcm: di protesters wey demand say di goment fulfil early promise to expel di French ambassador by April 20, ova di publication of cartoon wey dey show di prophet last year

translation.en: At least five people including two police officers have been killed in the protests, which have prompted the France embassy in Islamabad to urge French nationals to leave Pakistan temporarily.
translation.pcm: At least 5 pipo wit two police officer don kpeme inside di protest, wey don prompt di France embassy inside Islamabad make French nationals comot for Pakistan for some time

translation.en: Social media has been blocked for a few hours so that troublemakers cannot use it during Friday prayers congregations,an official told dpa.
translation.pcm: Dem don block social media for few hours make troublemakers no use am for Friday prayer wey pipo go gather, one official tell dpa

translation.en: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp and TikTok are inaccessible across the country, including the capital Islamabad.
translation.pcm: Facebook, twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp wit TikTok dey inaccessible for inside di kontri, wit Islamabad di capital join

translation.en: Political parties, Islamist groups and militant organisations like Pakistani Taliban heavily rely on social media platforms to connect with their followers.
translation.pcm: Political parties, Islamist groups wit militant organisation like Pakistan Taliban wey rely on social media platform use connect wit dia followers

translation.en: How young farmer grew 350 chickens into N750m farm
translation.pcm: How young farmer use 350 fowl take make N750m farm

translation.en: Popularly called Farmer in Suit,his story tells how hard work, innovation, passion and determination can make one break away from the loop of poverty.
translation.pcm: As dem take dey call am Farmer in suit, him tori tell us as hard work, innovation, passion, wit determination fit make person break comot from inside poverty

translation.en: The story of Usman Ali Lawan, who also suffered from daunting challenges confronting most Nigerian youths, is an inspiration for others.
translation.pcm: Di tori of Usman Ali Lawan, wey suffer plenty challenge wey dey face  most Nigerian youth, na inspiration for odas

translation.en: Last week, our reporter visited Lawans farm on the outskirts of Keffi, Nasarawa State, and his story explained his journey so far.
translation.pcm: Last week, awa reporter visit Lawan farm for di outskirts of Keffi, Nasarawa State, him tori explain him journey as e don be

translation.en: After his first degree in Business Administration from the Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, and a stint in oil and gas, Lawan used his savings to go for a masters degree in Energy Studies in the United Kingdom (UK), with the hope that a job would be waiting for him whenever he returned home; but that did not happen.
translation.pcm: afta him first degree for Business Administration from di Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, kom start stint for inside oil and gas, Lawan use him savings take do master degree for Energy Studies for di United Kingdom (UK) wit hope say job go dey wait for am

translation.en: I was broke, broken, homeless and indebted.
translation.pcm: dey broke, broken, no get house con dey owe join

translation.en: It was hard to look for a good job, so I started applying for every opening.
translation.pcm: E been hard to find beta job, so I start dey apply for all jobs

translation.en: Within the first six months after my return from the UK, I applied for 500 jobs in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Inside di first six months afta I return from (UK), I apply for 500 jobs inside Nigeria

translation.en: I asked people for help.
translation.pcm: I been ask pipo for help

translation.en: I was looking for any job,he said.
translation.pcm: I been dey find any job, him tok

translation.en: Within the period of joblessness, this grandson of a peasant farmer remembered that he could actually do something in agriculture.
translation.pcm: Inside di period of joblessness, dis grandson of one peasant farmer remember say him fit do somethin for agriculture

translation.en: That was when I started making efforts and preparing myself to become a farmer.
translation.pcm: Na dat time I start to make efforts kom dey prepare mysef bikom farmer

translation.en: And I wanted to be a farmer that would be able to support other smallholder farmers to engage in sustainable and profitable farming.
translation.pcm: and I wan be farmer wey go fit support oda small small farmers join hand for sustainable wit profitable farmin

translation.en: That was what informed the establishment of my farm, USAIFA Agro-Allied Limited, which started operations on April 3, 2013, with 350 birds,he narrated.
translation.pcm: Dat na wetin inform di establishment of my farm, USAIFA Agro-Allied Limited, wey start operation on April 3, 2013, wit 350 fowl, him tok

translation.en: Today, the farms capacity has grown from 350 birds to 28,000.
translation.pcm: Today di farmer capacity don grow from 350 fowl enter 28,000

translation.en: On fishery, it has the capacity for 100,000 of 1.5kg fish, 45 tonnes of processed fish and 200,000 fingerlings monthly.
translation.pcm: For fishery, e get di capacity for 100,000 of 1.5kg fish, 45 tonnes of fish wey dem process wit 200,000 fingerlings monthly

translation.en: Facilities for goat farming, heliciculture (snails) and cuniculture (rabbits) are under construction.
translation.pcm: facilities wey dem use do goat farmin, heliciculture (snails) wit cuniculture (rabbits) dey under construction

translation.en: The farm has modern meat and fish processing facilities, with substantial structures for offices, feed mills, meeting rooms, cold room and a warehouse.
translation.pcm: di farm get modern meat wit fish processin facilities, wey get substantial structures for office, feed mills, meetin room, cold room wit warehouse

translation.en: The farm has developed a circle where the waste product of one process serves as an input for another.
translation.pcm: di farm don develop circle wey di waste product of one process fit do input for anoda

translation.en: For instance, when the poultry and fish use feed, all the wastes from them are collected and used to make organic fertiliser.
translation.pcm: for instance, wen di poultry and fish use feed, dem go collect all di waste take do organic fertiliser

translation.en: By this, we ensure that every waste product on the farm is used as input for another process to create an ecosystem where waste is reduced to the barest minimum,Lawan explained.
translation.pcm: dis, we ensure say Evri waste product for di farm dem go use am as input for anoda process to use create ebikosystem wey waste go dey reduced pata pata, Lawan explain

translation.en: Lawan also has another plan for the farm: We are now not only a commercial farm but also an agri-business institute so that other young farmers will be able to have access, not only to see how a farm works but also learn and be able to have the knowledge they need.
translation.pcm: Lawan get anoda plan for di farm sef. We don ready no be for only commercial farm, for agric-business institute so oda young farmer dem go fit get access to see as farm dey work, kom learn get di knowledge join

translation.en: When asked the worth of the farm, he said, We did evaluation recently and the business as a whole is valued at a little over N700million.
translation.pcm: wen dem ask di farm worth, him tok say, we do evaluation recently and di business get worth wey pass N700million

translation.en: The assets and the facilities are valued at N350m.
translation.pcm: Di asset of di facilities get value of N350m

translation.en: Of course when you put the goodwill, our experience, brand, all the validation, and of course, our turnover in the last seven or eight years, plus the projected turnover in the next five years, then the business is valued at N750m.
translation.pcm: wen you put di goodwill, awa experience, brand, all di validation and awa turnover for inside seven or eight years, plus di turnova wey dem project inside di next five years, den di business get value of N750m

translation.en: He further said, Money is important in business, but I never actually saw it as a key driver because I knew from the beginning that if I put that in mind I would not be able to go far.
translation.pcm: him further tok say, moni dey important for di business, but I neva actually see am as key driver bikos I sabi from di beginnin day if I put dat for mind I no go fit go far

translation.en: That you think you need money to do everything
translation.pcm: say you think say you need moni do Evrithin

translation.en: and you dont have
translation.pcm: and you no get

translation.en: it is a spirit killer.
translation.pcm: na spirit killer

translation.en: Entrepreneurship is a lonely journey, so you dont want anything that will discourage you.
translation.pcm: enterpreneurship na lonely journey, so you no go want anythin wey go discourage you

translation.en: You want to be able to keep moving.
translation.pcm: you go wan dey move ahead

translation.en: So I thought my snag for problem-solving was the most important factor and hinged on that.
translation.pcm: so I think say my snag for problem solvin na him important pass so I hold am tight

translation.en: I tried to look at alternative means of getting money.
translation.pcm: I try look for alternative means use get moni

translation.en: Although he did not get funding from any bank, he was able to use other means like bootstrapping.
translation.pcm: Although him no get any fundin from any bank, hin been use oda means like bootstrappin

translation.en: He explained, Bootstrapping simply means using the resources you have to create something of value “ whether it is getting invoice sales from suppliers or advance payment from customers.
translation.pcm: him explain Bootstrappin as simply means wey you go use di resource you get to use create somethin wey get value weda na to get invoice sale from suppliers or advance payment from customers

translation.en: Those are some of the methods we use to be able to make sure our cash flow stays strong.
translation.pcm: those na some of di methods we use to make sure say cash flow stay strong

translation.en: And we are able to grow the business, but most importantly, leverage on fellowships and grant opportunities.
translation.pcm: and we been grow di business, but di one wey important pass, na levarage onntop fellowship and grant opportunities

translation.en: In the next 10 years, Lawan wants to have a 10,000-hectare farm estate for growing maize, soybeans and groundnut, to prove to young people that they can actually make a living and decent income from farming.
translation.pcm: inside di next 10 years, Lawan wan get 10,000-hectare farm estate to use grow maize, soybeans and groundnut, take prove say young pipo fit actually make livin wit decent inkom from farmin

translation.en: You can wear a suit in a farm instead of the banking hall,he said.
translation.pcm: you fit wear suit for farm instead of for banking hall, him tok

translation.en: Nigeria to partner Egypt for youth and sports development
translation.pcm: Nigeria to partner wit Egypt for youth and sport development

translation.en: The Minister of Sports, Sunday Dare has said Nigeria will partner with Egypt to explore areas of mutual benefits for youth and sports development.
translation.pcm: Di Minister of Sports, Sunday Dare don tok say Nigeria go partner wit Egypt use explore area of mutual benefit for youth and sport development

translation.en: The Minister who made this known yesterday on the sidelines of the
translation.pcm: Di Minister wey make us know yesterday on top di sidelines of di

translation.en: General Assembly of the Association of National Olympics Committee of Africa, ANOCA, in Cairo reiterated the fact that sports plays key role in international relations as well as unity and youth empowerment.
translation.pcm: General Assembly of di Association of National Olympics Committee of Africa, ANOCA, for Cairo tok am again say di fact say sport dey play key role inside international relations wit unity and youth empowerment

translation.en: As two pacesetters on the continent, the youths of Nigeria and Egypt can get a lot of mileage, if we explore areas that are mutually beneficial to us.
translation.pcm: As two pacesetters for di continent, di youths of Nigeria and Egypt fit get plenty milage, if we explore area wey dey mutually beneficial for us

translation.en: This meeting is quite timely because it is coming at a time we are preparing for the Olympics,said Dare.
translation.pcm: Dis meetin dey timely bikos e dey kom for time wey we dey prepare for di Olympics, Dare tok

translation.en: Responding, Egypts Minister of Youth and sports Development, Professor Ashraf Sobhy said at lot can be achieved, if youths are properly mobilised using sports.
translation.pcm: to answer, Egypt Minister of Youth and sport Development, Professor Ashraf Sobhg tok plenti dey to achieve if youths dey properly mobilized wit sports

translation.en: The future lies in our Youths, so they must be properly trained to meet the challenges of a new world order,he said.
translation.pcm: Di future dey youths hand so dem must dey get proper trainin to use meet di challenge of new world orders, him tok

translation.en: Dare also seized the opportunity to introduce the DEEL, which is a digital skills programme, assuring that the two countries could collaborate to benefit from the initiative.
translation.pcm: Dare use opportunity use introduce di DEEL, wey be digital skil programme, dey assure say di two countries fit collaborate to use benefit for di initiative

translation.en: Food security: Expert canvases urban farming
translation.pcm: Food security; Egypt canvas urban farmin

translation.en: The country coordinator, Open Forum for National Biotechnology in Africa, Nigeria chapter, Dr Rose Gidado, has appealed to the federal government to promote urban agriculture to mitigate food scarcity.
translation.pcm: Di kontri coordinator, Open Forum for National Biotechnology for Africa chapter, Dr Rose Gidado don beg federal goment make dem promote urban agriculture to use mitigate food scarcity

translation.en: Gidado, a deputy director, National Biotechnology Development Agency, Abuja, made the call in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) in Lagos.
translation.pcm: Gidado, wey be deputy director, National Biotechnology Development Agency, Abuja, make di call for interview wit di news Agency of Nigeria (NAN) for Lagos

translation.en: She said urban agriculture would address issues surrounding insecurity in many parts of the country.
translation.pcm: she tok say urban agriculture go address issues wey dey surround insecurity for plenti part of di kontri

translation.en: Gidado said that hydroponics, aeroponics and aquaponics were all new urban agriculture techniques that should be promoted.
translation.pcm: Gidado tok say hydroponics, aeroponics and aquaponics na all new urban agriculture techniques wey dem suppose promote

translation.en: She said greenhouse farming technology should be promoted to boost food production and self-sufficiency.
translation.pcm: she tok say dem suppose promote greenhouse farmin technology for to use boost food production wit self-sufficiency

translation.en: According to her, hydroponics is a technology for growing plants in nutrient solutions that supply all nutrient elements needed for optimum plant growth.
translation.pcm: as she take tok, hyfroponics na technology dem dey use grow plants for inside nutrient solution wey dey supply all nutrient elements for plant to take grow

translation.en: It is done with or without the use of an insert medium, such as gravel, vermiculite, rock wool, peat moss, sawdust, coir dust and coconut fiber.
translation.pcm: dem dey do celt weda dem use or dem no use insert medium, like gravel, vermiculite, rock wool, peat moss, sawdust, coir dust wit coconut fiber

translation.en: Aeroponics is an innovative technique of misting the roots, which are suspended in the air, with hydroponic solution.
translation.pcm: Aeroponics na innovertixe technique dem dey use mist roots, wey dem go suspend for air wit hydroponia solution

translation.en: Plants are supported by tailor made holes in Styrofoam panels.
translation.pcm: plant get support wit hole dem make inside styrofoam panel

translation.en: Aquaponics means raising fish and plants in the same water source.
translation.pcm: Aqia[pmocs, mean say make dem raise fish wit plant for di same water source

translation.en: The fish actually provide the fertiliser for the plants and the plant roots filter the water for the fish.
translation.pcm: Di fish dey provide di fertilizer for di plant and di plant root dey filter di water for di fish

translation.en: Greenhouse is a type of farming in which crops are cultivated under protected and enclosed environment.
translation.pcm: Greenhouse na type of farmin wey crops dem dey cultivate crop inside place wey dem protect con cover

translation.en: Its advantage is to keep out pests and diseases.
translation.pcm: di advantage of celt na to pursue pest and disease

translation.en: It also has a comparable yield advantage to open filed cultivation of crops.
translation.pcm: e get comparable yield advantage to crop dem grow for open

translation.en: Urban agriculture will enable people practise farming within their homes and environment, thereby increasing food production.
translation.pcm: Urban agriculture go allow pipo dey practice farmin for inside dem house and enviroment and dat one go increase food production

translation.en: We have urban agriculture, and it should be promoted by the government.
translation.pcm: We get urban agriculture, and goment suppose promote am

translation.en: Urban agriculture will mitigate against issues of herdsmen, Boko Haram, banditry and the likes.
translation.pcm: Urban agriculture go mitigate against issue of herdsmen, Boko Haram, banditry and di remainin one

translation.en: All we need is to promote urban agriculture.
translation.pcm: wetin we go need do na to promote urban agriculture

translation.en: People need to be taught how to farm on top of their rooftops, in containers and polythene bags,she said.
translation.pcm: Dey need  teach pipo how to farm for on top dia rooftop,for container and polytine bag; na wetin she tok be dat

translation.en: Sallah: Edo traders make brisk business
translation.pcm: Sallah wey be Edo trader dey make brisk business

translation.en: Despite the economic downturn occasioned by COVID-19, traders at the Benin Eid praying ground along the Benin-Auchi Road made brisk business as Muslims celebrated Sallah.
translation.pcm: Even as di economy  don downturn wey COVID-19 kos, trader wey dey Benin prayin ground for Benin-Auchi Road dey make brisk business as dem Muslims dey celebrate Sallah

translation.en: The traders who sold caps, clothing, mats, beverages and other items said business was good and that they did not regret coming to the area to sell their items.
translation.pcm: Di trader wey dey sell cap, clothin mats, beverages and oda items tok say business dey good and say dem no regret to kom di area to sell dia item

translation.en: One of the traders, Muhammed Kabir, said he made good money within a short period.
translation.pcm: One of di trader  wey be Muhammed Kabir, tok say hin  make plenti moni for short time

translation.en: Kabir, who sells prayer garments (jallabiya), said, Within a short period I sold 10 pieces of them.
translation.pcm: Kabir, wey dey sell garment wey dem dey use for prayer tok say for short period him  10 pieces of dem

translation.en: This was what I usually battled to sell in a day.
translation.pcm: Na wetin I dey usually battle to sell for di day be dis

translation.en: Another trader, Abdullaihi Abubakar, who sells caps, said, If every other day were today, I would never complain of a bad market.
translation.pcm: Anoda trader wey be Abdullahi Abubakar, wey dey sell cap, tok say if evri oda day be like today, I no go complain of bad market

translation.en: Today is an Eid day and people do come to the prayer ground without caps, so I seized the opportunity to make good business.
translation.pcm: Today na Eid day and pipo dey kom to di prayer ground wey dem no go wear cap, so I use di opportunity to make good business

translation.en: Before the commencement of the prayers, I sold 17 caps which ranged from N1,500 to N3,000.
translation.pcm: Before dey start prayer, I sell 17 cap wey range from N1,500 go N3,000

translation.en: According to him, he barely managed to sell 10 caps any other day, adding that he would have money to celebrate the Sallah.
translation.pcm: Accordin to am, him barely manage to sell 10 cap for any oda day, addin say hin go get moni to celebrate Sallah

translation.en: On an ordinary day, I manage to sell 20 caps or so, he said.
translation.pcm: For Ordinary day, I dey manage to sell 20 caps or so him tok

translation.en: On his part, Musa Koro who sells mats thanked Allah for the Eid el-Fitr, saying, I made good sales today.
translation.pcm: For him part, Musa Koro wey dey sell mats thank Allah for di Eid el-Fitr, him tok say him make good sale today

translation.en: Many worshippers didnt come to the prayer ground with mats, so they ended up buying from us.
translation.pcm: Plenti worshipper no kom di prayer ground wit mat so dey kom end up to buy from us

translation.en: I made a profit of over N5,000 within a short period.
translation.pcm: I make profit wey dey over N5,000 for short period

translation.en: Many other traders such as ice cream, sachet water and beverages sellers said the market was good and that they were smiling home.
translation.pcm: Oda trader wey dey sell ice cream,  sachet water and bevarages  tok say di market dey good and say dem dey smile go house

translation.en: They had also wished the Sallah would be every day for their businesses to thrive with such a high rate of turnover.
translation.pcm: Dey also wish say e go be evri day for dia business to thrive wit  for dat kind high rate of turnova

translation.en: CBN tasked on funding road transport devt
translation.pcm: CBN don task to dey fund road transport

translation.en: The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and the Ministry of Finance, Budget and National Planning, have been tasked on creating a special intervention fund to develop road transportation infrastructure.
translation.pcm: Di Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN) and di Ministry of Finance, Budget and National Plannin, dey don task dem to dey create special intervention wey dem find to develop road transportation infrastucture

translation.en: Speaking on Monday at the Nigeria Transportation Commissioners Forum and Federal Ministry of Transportation Annual Retreat 2021, the Minister of State, Transportation, Sen. Gbemisola Saraki, said, We understand the difficulties involved in accessing funding, especially given the high-interest rate regime.
translation.pcm: As e dey tok on Monday for di Nigeria Transportation Commissioners Forum and Federal Ministry of Transportation Annual Retreat 2021, di Minister of State, Transportation, Sen. Gbemisola Saraki, tok say, We understand how e difficult to involve to dey access fund, especially wit di high-interest rate regime.

translation.en: We are exploring with the CBN and the Ministry of Finance an intervention fund dedicated to the road transport sector similar to what obtains for Aviation and other sectors of the economy.
translation.pcm: We dey explore wit CBN and di Mnistry of  Finance intervention fund dedicate  to road transport sector wey dey similar to wetin obtain for Aviation and oda sector of di economy

translation.en: She also said the ministry with relevant stakeholders are working to have an environmentally sustainable transport sector.
translation.pcm: She kom tok say di ministry wit relevant stakeholder dey work to get environmental sustainable transport sector

translation.en: She also said the ministry is aggressively promoting the use of technology within the road transport sector.
translation.pcm: She kom tok say di ministry dey aggressive to promote di use of technology wey dey road transport sector

translation.en: The minister also said the NITT this year embarked on a National Transport Databank project, which will be the beginning of developing our national intelligent transport infrastructure.
translation.pcm: Di minster kom tok say di NITT dis year  dey embark for National Transport Data bank project, wey go dey di beginnin to dey develop awa national intelligent trasport infrastructure

translation.en: The acting Chairperson of Transportation Commissioners Forum, Rahmatu Mohammed Yaradua said the Forum was necessary due to the need to effectively implement various resolutions of the National Council on Transportation, coupled with the desire to coordinate activities of various groups of the Nigerian Transport Sector.
translation.pcm: Di actin Chairperson of Transportation Commissioners Forum, Rahmatu Mohammed Yar'adua tok say di Forum dey necessary dat time bikos of di nid to effectively implement various resolutions of di National Council on Transportation, coupled wit di desire to coordinate activities of plenti groups of Nigerian Transport Sector.

translation.en: She also said there is a need to adopt technology in road transport operations to reduce accidents.
translation.pcm: She kom tok say e need to adopt technology for road transport operation make e reduce accident

translation.en: Why Nigeria must adopt proposed dairy policy “ Agric minister
translation.pcm: Why Nigeria go need adopt dairy policy wey dem proposeAgric minister

translation.en: The Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, Alhaji Muhammad Sabo Nanono, has said that high dependence on imported dairy products necessitated the urgent need for farmers to adopt the proposed diary policy when implemented.
translation.pcm: Di Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, Alhaji Muhammad Sabo Nanono, don tok say high dependence on top dairy products wey dem import na hin make di urgent need for farmers make dem adopt di proposed diary policy dey necessary wen dey implement am.

translation.en: During a stakeholders meeting organized by Sahel Consulting through the Advancing Local Dairy Development in Nigeria (ALDDN), Nanono noted that with 60 per cent of the dairy products consumed in the country imported, the proposed dairy policy would unlock the sectors potential and induce renewed interest in its development.
translation.pcm: For one stakeholder meetin wey Sahel Consultin organize thru di Advancin Local Dairy Development for Nigeria (ALDDN), Nanono note say wit 60 per cent of di dairy products wey pipo consume for di kontri na imported, di dairy policy wey dem propose go unlock di sector potential and e go put renewed interest for hin# development.

translation.en: A statement by Sahel Consulting stated that the event, which was held late last month, was to ensure a wider stakeholder engagement in the Nigerian dairy sector to critically review and provide recommendations to the draft national dairy policy.
translation.pcm: One statement wey Sahel Consultin tok for dat event wey apun last month na be say, make dem ensure a stakeholder engagement wey wide wella for di Nigerian dairy sector to critically review, make dem provide recommendation to di draft national dairy policy.

translation.en: It stated that the ALDDN programme implemented by the group is utilizing a systematic approach to catalyze a vibrant local dairy sector by improving the productivity of local breeds while promoting local sourcing of milk.
translation.pcm: hin state di ALDON programme implement wey di group dey utilize systematic approach to catalyze vibrant local dairy sector to dey improve di productivity of local breeds wen dem dey promote local source milk

translation.en: Issues highlighted by Mrs Winnie Lai-Solarin, the Acting Director, Department of Animal Husbandry Services (DAHS), Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development are the reflection of the strategic areas the ALDDN programme is working on to unlock the potentials in the dairy sector.
translation.pcm: Issues wey Mrs Winnie Lai-Solarin highlight, di Actin Director, Department of Animal Husbandry Services (DAHS), Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development na di reflection of di strategic areas di ALDDN programme dey work on top to use unlock di potentials for di dairy sector.

translation.en: During the breakout sessions with various stakeholders, extensive discussions and recommendations were provided to improve the proposed dairy policy.
translation.pcm: For di breakout session wit various stakeholder, extensive discussion and recommendation wey dem provide to improve di propose dairy policy

translation.en: It was pointed out that commercial feed and fodder production in Nigeria is essential in intensifying and facilitating the development of the value chain through strengthening the demand and supply along the value chain.
translation.pcm: Dey point am out say commercial feed and fodder production for Nigeria dey essential to intensify and facilitate di development of di value chain thru how dem go strengthen di demand and supply along di value chain.

translation.en: The Sahel Consulting statement noted that the programme has engaged 140 commercial fodder producers to cultivate 400 hectares of land through farming of several kinds of cereal, grasses and legumes to produce silage and hay.
translation.pcm: Di Sahel Consultin statement note say di programme done engage 140 commercial fodder producers dem to cultivate 400 hectares of land through farmin of plenti kind of cereal, grasses and legumes to use produce silage and hay.

translation.en: This policy, when implemented, will encourage farmers to adopt commercial production of fodder and market it at affordable price to smallholder dairy farmers for the improvement of animal health, productivity and household income.
translation.pcm: Wen dey implement diis policy, e go encourage farmers dem make dem adopt commercial production of fodder and make dem dey sell am for affordable price give smallholder dairy farmers to dey improve di animal health, productivity and household income.

translation.en: This dairy production component of the policy also aligns with one of the targets of the ALDDN programme “ to increase the milk yield of at least 75,000 cows from 15,000 dairy households by at least 30 per cent through genetics and breeding improvement, increased access to animal health services and training of smallholder dairy farmers on improved dairy farming practices.
translation.pcm: Dis dairy production component of di policy dey also align wit one of di targets of di ALDDN programme “ to increase milk yield of at least 75,000 cows from 15,000 dairy house dem wit like 30 per cent thru genetics and breedin improvement, increase access to animal dem health service dem and to dey train smallholder dairy farmers on dairy farmin practices wey dey improved.

translation.en: Turaren Wuta: A booming trade for the northern woman
translation.pcm: Turaren Wuta: trade wey dey boom for di northern woman

translation.en: The art of making incense, popularly known as Turaren Wuta, is no new tradition to those who come from the Northern region of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di art to dey make incense, wey dem popularly know as Turaren Wuta, na di new tradition to dose wey kom from di Northern region of Nigeria

translation.en: However, turaren wuta has now become a popular household item and is used by people of different tribes across the country.
translation.pcm: Howeva, turaren Wuta don bikom popular household item wey pipo from different tribe for di kontri dey use

translation.en: In this report, Daily Trust Saturday x-rays how profitable the business of selling Turaren Wuta has become.
translation.pcm: For dis report, Daily Trust Saturday show how profit dey di business to dey sell Turaren Wuta don bikom

translation.en: Although incense is mostly used for freshening homes and neutralising odours, it also serves other different purposes.
translation.pcm: Although incense na dem dey too use to dey freshen house and neutralise odours, e also serve oda different purpose

translation.en: Some traditions believe that the smoke from the incense fortifies the home against evil spirits “ like the ones used in the Catholic church, while others believe its scents can be used to attract men or women.
translation.pcm: Some tradition believe say di smoke from di incense dey fortify di house against evil spirit like di one wey dem dey use for Catholic church, wen odas believe say hin scent na hin dey fi use attract man and woman

translation.en: Some women also believe that the consistent use of Dhukkhan (a particular type of incense) serves as an aphrodisiac and can help in sexual exploits.
translation.pcm: Some woman kom believe say di consistent use of Dhukkhan ( one type of incense) serve as aphrodisaic and e fit help for sexual exploit

translation.en: The popularity of the use of incense has grown to the extent that is it not only appreciated by the northern tribe but by almost all tribes around the country.
translation.pcm: Di popularity wey dey use of incense don grow reach di extent wey dem no dey appreciate by di northern tribe but na almost all di tribe wey dey di kontri

translation.en: Locally made incense or turaren wuta as it is popularly known in the northern region of Nigeria has become a very profitable business in Nigeria, especially for those in the northern region as some of the ingredients needed are naturally grown there.
translation.pcm: Incense or turaren wuta wey dem make locally

translation.en: Turaren wuta is used in aromatherapy and as fragrance for the home, body or clothes.
translation.pcm: Dem dey use Turaren wuta as aromatherapy and as fragrance wey dem dey use for house, bodi or cloth

translation.en: Aromatherapy is the use of holistic healing treatment that uses natural plant extracts to promote health and well-being.
translation.pcm: Aromatherapy na hin dem dey use for holistic healin treatment wey dey use natural plant extract to promote health and well being

translation.en: They are different types of turaren wuta available and they are made from a variety of different materials.
translation.pcm: E get different type of turaren wuta wey dey available and na from  variety of different material dem use make am

translation.en: In Nigeria, the most common scents are sandal oud, grounded Kajiji, Hawee balls, sandal sticks, etc.
translation.pcm: For Ngeria, di scent wey common pass na sandal wod, Kajiji wey dem ground, Hawee ball, sandal stick

translation.en: The grounded Kajiji is a plant that grows in Maiduguri, while Hawee sticks can be gotten from Kano.
translation.pcm: Di Kajiji wey dem dey ground na plant wey grow for Maiduguri, wen Hawee stick na hin dem dey get from Kano

translation.en: Asides from smelling good, the business side of turaren wuta has been part of human existence for ages.
translation.pcm: Apart say dem dey smell good, di business side of turaren wuta don dey aprt of human existence  for ages

translation.en: Fatima Kannike is an indigene of Maiduguri and specialises in the making of turaren wuta.
translation.pcm: Fatima Kannike na indigene of Maiduguri and hin specialise to dey make of turaren wuta

translation.en: She tells Daily Trust Saturday how profitable the business is in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: She be tell Daily Trust Saturday how di business take get profit for Nigeria

translation.en: In Maiduguri, out of ten houses on the street, its most likely that 6 or 7 families are involved in the turaren wuta business,says Fatima.
translation.pcm: Fatima tok say; For Maiduguri, out of ten house wey dey street, e dey likely say 6 or 7 family dey involve for di turaren wuta business.

translation.en: When making her turaren wuta, Fatima mentions that some of her ingredients are locally sourced and some come from Senegal, India, Pakistan, etc.
translation.pcm: Wen dem dey make turaren wuta, Fatima tok say some of di ingredient na hin dem dey locally source and some dey kom from Senegal, India, Pakistan like dat like dat

translation.en: She further explained that the most expensive turaren wuta are the ones which contain sandalwood and firche which is gotten from crocodile skin.
translation.pcm: She kom further explain  say di turaren wuta wey dey expensive pass na di one  wey get sandalwood and  firche wey dem dey get from crocodile skin

translation.en: Oftentimes, people believe that Prophet Mohammed (SAW) stepped on the very ground where the sandal wood tree grows, therefore it is considered sacred by many,she said.
translation.pcm: she tok say; plenti time , pipo believe say Prophet Mohammed(SAW) step on top very good ground wey di  sandal wood tree dey grow, therefore dey consider say e dey holi

translation.en: When making her turaren wuta, Fatima prefers using exquisite scented oils in order to make the scents from the turaren wuta last for a longer period of time, which could be between 6-8 hours and most of her oils are sourced from Dubai.
translation.pcm: Wen she dey make her turaren wuta,Fatima prefer to use exquisite scented oils so e go make dey scent for di turaren wuta last for long time, wey fit be like 6-8 hours and most of her oil na from dubai

translation.en: After mixing my turaren wuta, I like to seal it and leave it for weeks to allow the ingredients marinate and become more potent.
translation.pcm: afta wen dey don mix my turaren wuta, I like to dey seal ham and kom leave ham for weeks to allow di ingredient marinate kom bikom more potent

translation.en: When asked what the process entails, Fatima narrates: Making turaren wuta is easy for me.
translation.pcm: Wen dem ask me how di process dey be, Fatima tok say to dey make turaren wuta dey very easy for am

translation.en: As far as all my ingredients are available, I can do it in the comfort of my home.
translation.pcm: So far say all my ingredient dey available, I fit do am for di comfort of my house

translation.en: It involves making a sugar syrup and frying the incense woods before adding the oils needed for the fragrance.
translation.pcm: To dey make sugar syrup and to dey fry di incense woods e involve  before we go kom dey add di oil wey go need for di fragrance

translation.en: However, Fatima mentions that when making turaren wuta, its often better to use firewood and the local frying pans in order to perfect the mixture.
translation.pcm: Howeva, Fatima don tok say wen dem dey make turaren wuta, e dey good to dey always use firewood and di local fryin pan in oda to perfect di mixture

translation.en: She also advises to put on a face mask to avoid catching a cold and hand gloves to avoid your hands from being burnt.
translation.pcm: She kom advise make dem dey wear face mask to avoid catchin cold and hand glove so di hand no go burn

translation.en: When asked how she gets her customers, she explains that, often times, when burning her incense at home, her neighbours are always interested in knowing where she gets such incense that smells good, same thing also happens when she burns it at her shop.
translation.pcm: Wen ask her say how she dey get her customers dem, she tok say, most times, as she dey burn her incense for house, her neighboursdey get interest on top say dey wan know wer she dey buy incense wey dey smell good, di same thin dey apun for her shop.

translation.en: Fatimas customer base is mostly women from the North as most times they believe that turaren wuta gives off the scent of a wealthy Arabian and also believe that it helps to attract men.
translation.pcm: Fatima customer base be mostly women from di North as plenti time dey believe say turaren wuta dey give di scent of Arabian wey get moni and dey kom believe say e dey help to dey attract man

translation.en: Where I come from, turaren wuta is considered an important gift on your wedding for the women, even more important than getting a fridge or TV,she said.
translation.pcm: she tok say for di place wey I kom from, turaren wuta na hin dey consider say e be important gift for women dem weddin, e even dey important pass to dey get fridge or TV

translation.en: However, Fatima notes that in recent times, she has also received a lot of female customers from the eastern part of the country.
translation.pcm: Howeva, Fatima note say for recent time, she don receive female customers wey plenti wey dem kom from di eastern part of di kontri

translation.en: Although her customer base is mostly women, she also has male customers who buy the body oils and incense for their cars.
translation.pcm: Make we say dem her customer na woman, she get male customer too wey dey buy di bodi oil and incense for dia car

translation.en: Turaren wuta (sandal oud, grounded kajiji and halut)
translation.pcm: Turaren wuta(sandal wood, kajiji wey dem ground and halut)

translation.en: Fatima has turaren wuta of different price range and sizes, depending on the ingredients used.
translation.pcm: Fatima get turaren wuta for different price and size, dependin on di ingredient wey dem use

translation.en: Fatima also sells her turaren wuta in litres for those who may like to join the business and not want to go through the stress of making it themselves.
translation.pcm: Fatima dey sell her turaren wuta sef for litre for di pipo wey fit like join di business  and no go wan go through di stress to dey make am demsef

translation.en: Depending on how big you want to start, getting into the business doesnt need that much capital.
translation.pcm: E depend on how big you wan start, to dey do di business no too nid plenti capital

translation.en: For instance, with 100,000 naira you can get two to three varieties of turaren wuta in litres to resale, with another sum of 400,000
translation.pcm: for example, wit like 100,000 naira you fi get two or three varities wey be turaren wuta for litres to reselk, wit anoda moni wey be like 400,000

translation.en: you can purchase three to five varieties of scents.
translation.pcm: If you go fit buy three to five varieties of di scent

translation.en: Asides the turaren
translation.pcm: Apart say di turaren dey there

translation.en: wuta, Fatima also makes humrah which is the body oil and can be used on clothes.
translation.pcm: wuta, Fatima too dey make hurah wey be di bodi oil and di one wey dey fit use am for cloth

translation.en: Often times, because of how good the smell is, customers are always indecisive about what scent they want.
translation.pcm: Plenti time, bikos of how di smell good, customer dey always dey indecisive about di kind scent wey dem want

translation.en: When issues like that arise, we like to burn each scent and allow the customer to decide which scent they like the most,Fatima said.
translation.pcm: Fatima tok say wen issues like dat arise, we go like burn each scent kom allow di customer to decide di kind scent wey dem like pass

translation.en: She also advises her customers to use a charcoal burner instead of an electric burner because from experience, the electric burner wastes the turaren wuta and doesnt burn as effectively as the charcoal.
translation.pcm: She kom advise dem her customer to dey use charcoal burner instead di wan wey dem go dey use electric burner bikos of experience, di electric burner dey waste di turaren wuta and e no dey burn well like charcoal

translation.en: Fatimas most patronised scents are the sandal Oud, grounded kajiji and Halut.
translation.pcm: Fatima wey dem dey patronise hin scent pass na di sandal wood, kajiji wey dem ground and Halut

translation.en: She notes that these particular scents get sold out the minute her customers are aware of its availability.
translation.pcm: She no say dis particular scent  na hin dem dey sell finish di minute wey her customer no say e don dey

translation.en: Fatima also mentioned that her sales peak season is the rainy season, this is because the smoke that comes from the incense burner aides in keeping the house warm so customers are always willing to purchase more.
translation.pcm: Fatima kom tok say di season she dey sell pass na rainy season, na bikos di smoke wey dey kom from di incense burner apart to dey kip di house warm so customer fi always wan buy more

translation.en: Mrs Amina Kogi, an ardent lover of turaren
translation.pcm: Mrs Amina Kogi, wey be ardent lover of turaren

translation.en: wuta told Daily Trust Saturday that she spends at least N20,000 monthly purchasing different fragrance of turaren wuta for her house.
translation.pcm: wuta tell Daily Trust Saturday say she dey spend at lease N20,000 evri month  to get different fragrance of turaren wuta for her house

translation.en: Whenever I wake up in the morning, I tell the maid to burn incense round the house and doing that makes the house smell good and homely.
translation.pcm: If I wake for mornin, I dey tell di maid to burn incense round di house as dem dem dey do dat e dey make di house smell good and homely

translation.en: Mrs Amina also told Daily Trust Saturday that most of her guests express delight over the pleasant scent in her home and insist on getting the contact of the person she purchased the incense from.
translation.pcm: Mrs Amina kom tell Daily Trust Saturday say plenti of her guests dey express joy on top di pleasant scent for her house and dey insist say dey wan get di persin connect wey she buy di incense from

translation.en: However, another turaren wuta seller Rahanatu Ahmad in Abuja told Daily Trust Saturday that she doesnt believe that turaren wuta has any spiritual benefits asides it
translation.pcm: Howeva, anoda persin wey dey sell turaren wuta  Rahanatu Ahmad for Abuja tell Daily Trust Saturday say she no believe say turaren wuta get any spiritual benefit aside am

translation.en: sweet scent and its potency in clearing or diffusing bad/offensive odour.
translation.pcm: scent wey sweet and e dey potent to dey clear or to dey diffuse odour wey dey bad/offensive

translation.en: She noted that the business is more profitable when sold in larger quantities.
translation.pcm: She add say di business get profit wen dey sell am for large quantity

translation.en: Her cheapest turaren wuta goes for N3500 and the most expensive N23,000.
translation.pcm: Her turaren wey cheap pass na hin be N3500 and di one wey expensive pass na N23,000

translation.en: The prices all depends on the size of jars.
translation.pcm: Di price dey depend on top di size of jar

translation.en: She also produces Durot “ a special kind of turaren wuta that is sometimes considered medicinal.
translation.pcm: She dey produce Durot one special kind of turaren wuta wey sometime na medicine

translation.en: She advises her female customers to purchase this particular turaren wuta to help fight minor infections and leave them feeling fresh and good.
translation.pcm: She kom advise her female customer to dey buy turaren wuta to dey help dem fight infection and make dem to dey dey fresh and good

translation.en: She told our reporter that her most patronised scents are the Desired orbs and Thirteen scents.
translation.pcm: She tell awa reporter say pesin wey dey patronise her scent na di Desired orbs and Thirteen scent

translation.en: Kano farmers trained on seed multiplication
translation.pcm: Dem train dem Kano farmer on seed multiplication

translation.en: The Sasakawa Africa Association (SAA), in collaboration with the Kano State Government and the Islamic Development Bank, has conducted a pre-dry season training of seed multiplication for farmers.
translation.pcm: Di Sasakawa Africa Association (SAA) wey dey collaborate wit di Kano State goment and di Islamic Development Bank, don conduct pre-dry season trainin of seed multiplication for dem farmer

translation.en: According to Sasakawas senior crop productivity enhancement officer, Mr Benjamin Adamu Shamaki, the training is aimed at ensuring a healthy circulation of improved seeds to the farmers.
translation.pcm: Accordin to Sasakawa  wey be senior crop productivity enhancement officer, Mr Benjamin Adamu Shamaki, di trainin dey aim to ensure say healthy circulation of improve seed to di farmer

translation.en: He added that 20 seed multiplication farmers had been supported to breed improved rice and maize seeds.
translation.pcm: Hin add say 20 seed multiplcation farmer don support to dey breed improve rice and maize seed

translation.en: He also said the project was targeting dry season farming activities in local governments that have access to irrigation facilities.
translation.pcm: Hin kom tok say di project dey target dry season farming activity for local goment wey don get access to irrigation activity

translation.en: According to him, the project is for all the 44 local government areas of the state for an enhanced crop production, marketing and farm management techniques.
translation.pcm: Accordin to m, di project na for all di 44 local goment area wey dey di state to enhance crop production, marketin and farm management technique

translation.en: We have 20 farmers from 20 local government areas with irrigation facilities.
translation.pcm: We get 20 farmers wey kom from 20 local goment area wit irrigation facility

translation.en: The project is aimed at all the 44 local governments in the state.
translation.pcm: Di project dey aim for all 44 local goment for di state

translation.en: We hope to continue with the other local governments when the wet season begins, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say; We dey hope to dey continue wit di oda local goment wen di wet season start

translation.en: A beneficiary of the training from Warawa Local Government, Malam Rabiu Bello, said he had learnt a lot of new innovations he believed would change not only the way he farmed but the whole farmers of Warawa irrigation, especially those dealing in rice production.
translation.pcm: One beneficiary of di trainin wey kom from Warawa Local goment, Malam Rabi Bello, tok say e don learn plenti on top new innovation, him believe say him go change no be only di way him dey farm but di rest of farmer dem wey dey Warama irrigation especially di one wey dey do rice production

translation.en: LG polls: Our primaries successful despite violence, says Lagos APC
translation.pcm: LG polls:Lagos APC tok say awa primaries dey successful even if violence dey .

translation.en: The Lagos State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC), has said its primaries on Saturday ahead of the July local government elections, was successful.
translation.pcm: Di Lagos state chapter of di All Progressive Congress(APC)  don tok say hin primary for Saturday wey dey ahead of di July local goment election dey successful

translation.en: It, however, called on the security agencies to probe incidents of violence in some local government areas and fish out the perpetrators.
translation.pcm: Dey call security agency to probe incident of violence for some local goment area and fish out di pipo wey dey do evil

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that pockets of violence were recorded in some local government areas including Surulere where two people were feared dead.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust report say di pocket of violence na hin dey record for some local goment area wey include Surulere wey dem fear say two pesin die

translation.en: The election could not hold in Surulere following the violence even as the local government area was allegedly under siege on Saturday as thugs and cultists loyal to some party leaders took control.
translation.pcm: Di election no fit hold for Surulere afta di violence even for di local goment area  wey dem tok say dey under siege for Saturday as dem thug and dem cult loyal to some parti leader take control

translation.en: But the APC regretted the violence, calling on the security agencies to go after the perpetrators.
translation.pcm: But APC regret di violence, dey kom call security agency make dem go afta di perpetrators

translation.en: Spokesman of the partys Interim Committee, Hon Seye Oladejo, in a statement, congratulated the party members on the successful conduct of the primaries to elect candidates for the forthcoming Local Government elections to elect Chairmen, Vice-Chairmen and Councilors into the 20 Local Government Councils, 37 Local Council Development Areas and 377 wards.
translation.pcm: Tok tok pesin of di party Interim Committee, Hon Seye Oladejo, inside one statement, congratulate di parti members dem on di primaries wey dem do wit success to elect candidates for di Local Goment elections to elect Chairmen, Vice-Chairmen and Councilors dem into di 20 Local Goment Councils, 37 Local Council Development Areas and 377 wards.

translation.en: Oladejo stated that the statewide exercise witnessed a large turnout of members who cast their votes for preferred aspirants through the open secret ballot mode as stipulated by the guidelines.
translation.pcm: Oladejo tok say d exercise wey dey statewide see plenty members wey cast dem vote for dia aspirant wey dem prefer pass through d open secret ballot mode as di guidelines tok

translation.en: He said: We acknowledge with regrets the reported few cases of skirmishes in a few wards with the attendant fallouts.
translation.pcm: him tok say; we acknowledge wit regrets di case dem wey dem report about skirmishes for few wards wit di fallouts of attendants

translation.en: We empathize with the victims of the unfortunate incident.
translation.pcm: we feel for di victims of di incident

translation.en: While we await the formal reports of the electoral officials, we wish to admonish the security agencies to conduct a thorough investigation to bring the culprits to book and maintain law and order.
translation.pcm: as we dey wait di formal reports of di electoral officials, we wish tell di security agencies make dem conduct beta investigation make dem fit bring di culprits kom face di book so dem go maintain law and order

translation.en: The party reiterated that hoodlums, cultists and other outlaws were not members of the party.
translation.pcm: di parti been tok am again say hoodlums, cultist wit oda outlaws dem no be members of di parti

translation.en: The untoward intervention of external forces within the progressive fold should be resisted by all and sundry.
translation.pcm: by all means make dem resist all external force wey dey inside di progressive fold

translation.en: In the same vein, the party wants to enjoin aggrieved aspirants to approach the Electoral Appeal Committee headed by Mr Lawal Pedro (SAN) to lodge formal complaints,the statement added.
translation.pcm: di statement add say;about di same mata, di parti want join aspirant wey dey provoke, make dem approach electoral Appeal Committee wey Mr Lawal Pedro (SAN) dey head to lodge formal complaints.

translation.en: Police arrest 6 suspected IPOB members, recover arms in Ebonyi
translation.pcm: police arrest 6 IPOB members wey dem suspect and dey recover arms for Ebonyi

translation.en: The Police in Ebonyi have arrested six suspected members of the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) and recovered five locally made pistols with 12 live ammunition from them.
translation.pcm: Di police for Ebonyi don arrest 6 members wey dem suspect for di indigenous pipo of Biafra (IPOB) and dey recover five pistol wit 12 live ammunition wey dey dey local.

translation.en: Police spokesperson in the state, DSP Loveth Odah, said this in a statement on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Police tok tok pesin for di state, DSP Loveth Odah, tok am for her inside statement on Tuesday

translation.en: Odah said the suspects were arrested during operations on Monday to disperse hoodlums enforcing the sit-at-home order by IPOB.
translation.pcm: Odah say dem arrest di suspects for operations wey dem run on Monday to use pursue hoodlums wey dey force pipo to stay for dem house, order of IPOB

translation.en: Odah also said the police neutralised three suspected armed robbers, recovered three expended cartridges, a jackknife, an axe, a cutlass and some charms from them.
translation.pcm: Odah also tok say di police neutralise three arm robbers wey dem suspect, kom recover three cartridges, jackknife wit axe, cutlass wit some juju

translation.en: She explained that following a distress call that some hoodlums had barricaded Ogbaga road, attacking and setting vehicles ablaze, operatives were swiftly deployed to the scene.
translation.pcm: She explain say as dem receive distress call say some hoodlums don barricade Ogbaga road, dey attack dem and dey put fire for cars, operatives reach der sharply

translation.en: The hoodlums on sighting the police opened fire.
translation.pcm: Di goodlums as dem see di police start to dey shoot dem

translation.en: In the exchange of gun battle that ensued two members of the gang were fatally wounded while others escaped with bullet wounds into the nearby bush,said the statement.
translation.pcm: As dem dey shoot diasef, two members of di gang wound serious wound and some escape wit bullet wound join inside nearby bush, statement tok

translation.en: Odah said one locally-made shotgun, one locally-made revolver pistol with five live cartridges, one jack knife, one axe and some charms were recovered from them.
translation.pcm: Odah say dem recorver one shortgun wey dem make locally, one revolver pistol wit five live cartridges, one jackknife, one axe wit juju

translation.en: A Toyota Picnic was set ablaze by the gang, including five motorcycles of different brands.
translation.pcm: dem burn one Toyota Picnic wit five motorcycles wey get different brands

translation.en: Innocent citizens were attacked because they refused to obey the sit-at-home directive of the IPOB.
translation.pcm: dem attack innocent citizens bikos dem no obey di stay-at-home order wey IPOB give

translation.en: The traumatised victims are currently responding to treatment at Alex Ekwueme Federal Teaching Hospital,she said.
translation.pcm: Di victims wey get traumer don dey respond to treatment for Alex Ekwueme Federal Teaching Hospital, she tok

translation.en: Odah explained that two of the IPOB suspects on surveillance mission were intercepted in front of the police headquarters in the state.
translation.pcm: Odah explain say dem intercept two of di IPOB suspect for surveilance mission for front of police headquaters for inside di state

translation.en: One locally-made double barrel short gun with four cartridges were recovered from them,Odah said.
translation.pcm: Dem recover one locally-made double barrel short gun wit four cartridges, Odah tok

translation.en: She said one other suspect was killed after the police and sister security agencies engaged his gang in a gun duel on the Ikwo/Abakaliki expressway, Ikwo Local Government Area, while others escaped with bullet wounds.
translation.pcm: She tok say dem kill one oda suspect afta polce and dem fellow security agency been engage him gang for gun fight for di Ikwo/Abakaliki expressway, Ikwo Local goment Area, as odas escape wit bullet wound

translation.en: Frantic effort is ongoing to arrest the fleeing suspects,Odah said.
translation.pcm: Beta effort dey ongoin to arrest di suspects wey run, Odah tok

translation.en: Lewandowski scores 41st goal, breaks 49-year-old record
translation.pcm: Lewandowski don score 41 goals, e break 49 year old record.

translation.en: Robert Lewandowski, on Saturday, broke Gerd Muellera's 49-year-old record when he bagged a 41st Bundesliga goal of the campaign seconds before the final whistle on the last weekend of the season.
translation.pcm: Robert Lewandowski, for Sunday, don break Gerd Muellera 49 year old record wen e score hin 41st Bundesliga goal for the season small seconds before refree blow final whistle for last week of di season.

translation.en: Mueller, 75, is suffering from severe dementia, but The Bomberâ remains an iconic figure in German football as the Bundesliga's all-time top scorer with 365 goals, well ahead of Lewandowski's tally of 277.
translation.pcm: Mueller, wey be 75 year old, dey suffer from severe dementia, but The Bombera still dey among di iconic figure for German football as di Bundesliga all time top scorer wit 365 goals, e dey ahead of Lewandowski tally of 277

translation.en: Many thought
translation.pcm: plenty thinking

translation.en: Mueller's record of 40 goals for Bayern Munich in 1971/72 would never be matched until Lewandowski rounded the goalkeeper to score in the same club
translation.pcm: Mueller 40 goals for Bayern Munich wey be record for 1971/72 neva dey match until Lewandowski rounded di goalkeeper to score for di same club

translation.en: Lewandowski broke the record on Saturday after equalling the record last weekend.
translation.pcm: Lewandowski break di record on Saturday afta equalling di record last week

translation.en: It was tense until the last second, I would have liked to have scored earlier,a relieved Lewandowski told Sky.
translation.pcm: E dey serious until the last second, I go like to don score tey-tey, Lewandowski tell Sky

translation.en: Sometimes you also have to stay patient, which was difficult.
translation.pcm: Sometimes you need to dey patient, wey dey difficult

translation.en: I always believed that a chance would come.
translation.pcm: I dey always believe say chance go kom

translation.en: That was a special and historic moment.
translation.pcm: Dat be one special and historic moment

translation.en: While Mueller scored his 40 goals over 34 league games in 1971/72, injury and squad rotation meant Lewandowski broke the record in just 29 matches.
translation.pcm: As Mueller score hin 40 goal for 34 league games for 1971/72, injury and squad rotation mean say Lewandowski break di record for just 29 matches.

translation.en: Bayern scored 101 goals in the league in 1971/72 and 99 this season.
translation.pcm: Bayern score 101 goals for league for 1971/72 and dem score 99 dis season.

translation.en: Physically, the 32-year-old Lewandowski is very different to Mueller, who was 26 in the 1971/72 season.
translation.pcm: Physically, di 32 year old Lewandowski dey very different to Mueller, wey be 26 for di 1971/72 season.

translation.en: What is your name?
translation.pcm: wetin be your name?

translation.en: Robert is an athlete, Gerd was an artist, Mueller's wife Uschi Mueller told magazine Sport Bild.
translation.pcm: Robert be athlete, Gerd be artist, Mueller wife Uschi Mueller tell magazine wey name be Sport Bild

translation.en: At 1.84m and 79kgs, Lewandowski is a model athlete, renowned for his strict diet and training programme.
translation.pcm: For 1.84m and 79kgs, Lewandowski be model athlete, e dey renowned for hin strict diet and programme.

translation.en: Mueller, at 1.76m and 80kgs in his prime, was nicknamedshort fat Mueller by former Bayern coach Zlatko Cajkovski.
translation.pcm: Mueller, for 1.76m and 80kgs wen e dey young, get di nickname short fat Mueller by hin former Bayern cochi Zlatko Cajkovski

translation.en: The pair share an insatiable appetite for goals.
translation.pcm: Di pair share dey always dey hungry for goals.

translation.en: Lewandowski has hit the net on average every 60 minutes this season, while The Bomber scored every 77 minutes in 1971/72.
translation.pcm: Lewandowski don score on average of 60 minutes for dis season, Te Bomber score evri 77 minutes for 1971/72

translation.en: Lewandowski is a star player
translation.pcm: Lewandowski be one ogbonge star player.

translation.en: Mueller was a copybook penalty box striker, who could transfer the ball from his right to left foot with bewildering speed.
translation.pcm: Mueller be ogbonge role model striker, wey fit pass ball from hin right leg to left leg sharperly.

translation.en: His low centre of gravity helped Mueller steal an edge over defenders in the first few metres.
translation.pcm: Hin low centre of gravity help Mueller dey ahead of defenders for di first few meters

translation.en: Given a sniff of goal, he was an ice-cool finisher.
translation.pcm: Wen hin see chance to score, hin be ogbonge finisher.

translation.en: Lewandowski is just as dynamic, but in contrast to Mueller, he is happy to shoot from outside the box or use the space to outsprint defenders.
translation.pcm: Lewandowski dey dynamic, but hin also dey different from Mueller, hin dey always dey hapi to shoot from outside box eighteen or make hin use speed pass defenders.

translation.en: They share the killer instinct when the ball is near goal, often being alert to a rebound and waiting until the last second to pounce, as Lewandowski demonstrated on Saturday.
translation.pcm: Dem share same sense wen ball don reach level wey e fit turn goal, dem always dey dey alert for rebound and dey ready for pounce, like how Lewandowski do am on Saturday

translation.en: How it started
translation.pcm: How e take start.

translation.en: Lewandowski started 2020/21 with a bang, converting a penalty and providing two assists in an 8-0 thrashing of the Schalke, a record result for the opening game of a Bundesliga season.
translation.pcm: Lewandowski start 2020/21 wit a bang, hin score a penalty and provide two assit for dia 8-0 win over Schalke, a record result for first game for Bundesliga season.

translation.en: He failed to score in the next game, a shock 4-1 loss at Hoffenheim, but provided all four goals, including a late match-winning penalty in a nervy 4-3 home win over Hertha Berlin last October.
translation.pcm: Hin no score for the next game, dem scock as dem lose 4-1 for Hoffenheim, but hin score all di four goals, plus di late match-winning penalty for dia 4-3 home win against Hertha Berlin for October.

translation.en: He was rested for one game in late October after scoring ten goals in his first five games, then hit a purple patch with 25 in 20 league games.
translation.pcm: Dem rest am for one game, for last October afta scoring ten goals for hin first five games, before hin kom reach 25 goals for 20 league games.

translation.en: A knee injury playing for Poland in late March left Lewandowski on 35 goals after a hat-trick against Stuttgart.
translation.pcm: Lewandowski get knee injury wen hin dey play for poland wen hin dey 35 goals afta hat-trick against Stuttgart.

translation.en: After three weeks out, he returned with a goal in the shock loss at Mainz before hitting a hat-trick in the 6-0 home win over Moenchengladbach which won Bayern the title.
translation.pcm: Afta three weeks out, hin kom back wit a goal in shock loss for Mainz before hin hit hat-trick of 6-0 for home against Moenchengladbach wey win Bayern the title.

translation.en: While Lewandowski has scored consistently, Mueller had sporadic purple patches, netting just three goals in the first nine games of the 1971/72 season.
translation.pcm: While Lewandowski don score consistently, Mueller get sporadic purple patches, dey score just three goals for di first nine games for 1971/72 season.

translation.en: However, he had scored 18 goals by the halfway point, including four in an 11-1 thrashing of Dortmund in November 1971.
translation.pcm: Hin don score 18 goals by halfway point, plus four for 11-1 thrashing of Dortmund for November 1971

translation.en: He then hit five goals in a 7-0 thrashing of Oberhausen which sparked a run of 16 goals in just seven games, finishing the season with six goals in three games.
translation.pcm: Hin den score 5 goals for 7-0 beating of Oberhausen wey reach 16 goals for just seven games, finishing di season wit six goals for three games.

translation.en: BPE, education ministry among 20 outstanding MDAs
