translation.pcm: BPE, education ministry wey dey among 20 outstanding MDAs

translation.en: The Bureau of Public Enterprises (BPE), Ministry of Education, and the Ministry of Transportation are among the Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) named as the 20 Most Outstanding MDAs in Nigeria this year.
translation.pcm: Di Bureau of Public Enterprises (BEP), Ministry of Education, and di Ministry of Transpotation dey among di Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) wey dem name as di 20 Most Outstanding MDAs for Nigeria dis year.

translation.en: This was disclosed by the CEO, Profiles & Biographies, Mr. Kammonke Abam, in a statement in Abuja, as an update on the firm's research and compilation of the accomplishments of MDAs to mark the sixth anniversary of the current administration.
translation.pcm: Na di CEO, Profiles & Biographies, Mr. Kammonke Abam, tok am, for one statement for Abuja, as part of update on the company research and compilation of di accomplishments of MDAs to celebrate di sisth anniversary.

translation.en: He said the assessment result is relative to the MDAs fulfilling their ministerial mandate in line with the administration's 9-point development agenda, and his firm's evaluation benchmark.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di assessment result dey relative to di MDAs fulfiling dia ministerial mandate in line wit di administration 9-point development agenda, and him firm evaluation benchmark.

translation.en: Abam said the firm adopted an evaluation benchmark based on five criteria of relevance, efficiency, effectiveness, impact and sustainability in assessing all the MDAs in line with best practice.
translation.pcm: Abam tok say di firm adopt an evaluation benchmark based on five criteria of relevance, efficiency, effectiveness, impact and sustainability in assessing all di MDAs in line wit best practice.

translation.en: Preparing for Ramadan requires us to know when to watch out for the crescent of the Islamic lunar month of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: Make person dey prepare for Ramadan require make we know wen to dey watch out for di cresent of di Islamic lunar month of Ramadan.

translation.en: With only few days to the commencement of Ramadan fast for the Islamic lunar year of 1442AH, it is no longer news that the holy month is by the corner.
translation.pcm: wit small days to di start of Ramadan fast for di Islamic lunar year of 1442AH, e no be news again say di holy month don dey near.

translation.en: It is in this sacred month that the holy Quran was revealed to Prophet Muhammad (Salla-llahu Alayhi Wa Sallam, SAW) for the guidance of humanity.
translation.pcm: Na for dis sacred month wey di holy Quran get revealed to Prophet Muhammad (Salla-llahu Alayhi Wa Sallam, SAW) for di guidance of humanity.

translation.en: Within the month of Ramadan is a night that is better than a thousand other months.
translation.pcm: For inside di month of Ramadan be one night wey dey better than thousands of month.

translation.en: Because Ramadan is a unique spiritual season, it is important to effectively prepare ourselves for it so that every opportunity availed by Ramadan is optimally utilized; without taking anything for granted.
translation.pcm: Bikos say Ramadan be one unique spiritual season, e dey important to effectively prepare hawasef for am so dat evri opportunity wey dey Ramadan dey optimally utilized; make we no take anything wit sipini hand.

translation.en: Ramadan is a month that Muslims happily look up to.
translation.pcm: Ramadan be di month wey Musllims always dey hapi to look up to.

translation.en: It is a month like no other.
translation.pcm: Im be month wey no get contender.

translation.en: It is a holy month in which Allah (SWT) has promised to forgive every repentant Muslim; grant mercy to every seeker of clemency; and pardon those who ask to be pardoned.
translation.pcm: Im be holy month wey Allah (SWT) promise say hin go forgive evri Muslim wey don repent; give mercy to evri seeker of clemency; and hin go forgive dos wey ask for forgiveness.

translation.en: Going by the current count of the month of Shaban on the Timing Chapter calendar, the search for the crescent is expected to begin on Monday April 12, 2021 which is equivalent to 29th day of Shaban.
translation.pcm: By di current count of di month of Shaban on di Timing Chapter calendar, to dey look for di cresent is expected to start for Monday April 12, 2021 wey dey equivalent to 29th day of Shaban.

translation.en: Abu Hurayrah (RA) reports from the Prophet (SAW) that the gates to hell fire shall remain closed throughout each Ramadan period just as the gates to paradise are left open during the same period so that the wish and prayer of those who desire the latter (paradise) would graciously be granted.
translation.pcm: Abu Hurayrah (RA) report say di Prophet (SAW) di gates to hell fire go dey close for evri Ramadan period just like how di gates to paradise go dey open durin the same period make di wish and prayer of dos wey like paradise get answerd.

translation.en: Where the crescent of Ramadan is not sighted on the 29th day of Shaaban, the month would be deemed to have naturally completed its circle on the 30th day in which case Ramadan fast automatically begins the following day, which would be the 1st day of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: For place wey di cresent of Ramadan no dey sighted on the 29th day of Shaaban, di month go count say im don complete im circle of 30th day where Ramadan fast automatically start di next day, wey go be 1st of Ramadan.

translation.en: We are not required to begin the Ramadan fast until we have heard of the sighting of the crescent of Ramadan from credible sources.
translation.pcm: We no suppose begin Ramadan fast until we hear say dem don see di cresent from correct sources.

translation.en: In our case in Nigeria, the tradition is for Muslims to wait for the announcement of the sighting of the crescent from His Eminence the Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammadu Saad Abubakar.
translation.pcm: For Naija, di tradition be say Muslims go wait for di announcement say dem don see cresent from His Eminence di Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammadu Saad Abubakar.

translation.en: Allah (SWT) states in Quran 4:59
translation.pcm: Allah (SWT) tok for Quran 4:59 say

translation.en: O ye who believe!
translation.pcm: All of una wey believe!

translation.en: Obey Allah, obey the Messenger, and those charged with authority among you
translation.pcm: Obey Allah, obey di Messenger, and dos wey dey places of authority among una.

translation.en: The more we remain steadfast and patient to wait for and obey Sultan's words, the more united and stronger we remain as a Muslim community.
translation.pcm: Di more we dey kampe and we dey patient and wait and obey Sultan tok, di more united and strong we go dey as Muslim community.

translation.en: We advise members of the Muslim community to be wary of unsubstantiated pieces of information that may emerge from social media sources on the commencement of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: We advise pipu wey dey part of di Muslim community to dey wary of unsubstantiated pieces of information wey fit show face for social media on wen Ramadan go start.

translation.en: We also urge the general public to abstain from circulating unconfirmed news about moon sighting.
translation.pcm: We advise di general public make dem stay away from news wey dem no sabi who tok am wy dey tok about seeing di moon.

translation.en: Misleading information can throw Muslim communities into confusion.
translation.pcm: Information wey no correct fit throw Muslim communities inside confusion.

translation.en: Remember that Allah's wrath awaits rumour mongers.
translation.pcm: Remember say Allah wrath dey wait for rumour mongers.

translation.en: The teachings of the Prophet Muhammad (SAW) discourage the observance of voluntary fast close to the start of Ramadan fast.
translation.pcm: Di teaching of di Prophet Muhammed (SAW) discourage di observance of voluntary fast wey dey close to di start of Ramadan fast.

translation.en: This is to avoid a situation where voluntary fast, which is a prophetic injunction, is seen to be part of Ramadan fast; the latter being an obligatory act of worship sanctioned by Allah (SWT).
translation.pcm: Dis na to avoid situation where voluntary fast, wey be prophetic injunction, is seen to dey part of Ramadan fast; di latter wey be obligatory act of worship sanctioned by Allah (SWT)

translation.en: For those who are used to observing voluntary fast every Monday, they are advised to skip Monday next week because of its proximity to Ramadan; being 29th day of Shaaban.
translation.pcm: For dos wey dey observe di voluntary fast evri Monday, e dey advise make dem skip Monday next week bikos of di closeness to Ramadan; bikos e be 29th day of Shaaban.

translation.en: As part of deliberate preparations for Ramadan and in order to take utmost advantage of the spiritual benefits of Ramadan, it is vital for us to review our daily routines so as to create enough time for engaging in devoutional activities.
translation.pcm: As part of delibrate preparation for Ramadan and make we see chance take advantage of the spiritual benefits of Ramadan, e dey important make we review awa daily routines to create plenty time for engaging in devolutional activities.

translation.en: This will enable us have more time to recite the Glorious Quran (in the case of those who never had it as a routine) or more time for reciting and understanding the Quran.
translation.pcm: Dis go allow us have more time to take recite di Glorious Quran (for dos wey no get am as routine) or more time to dey recite and understand the Quran.

translation.en: Let us also decide on the time for observing Tarawih prayers in consultations with individuals that traditionally make up the prayer congregation at the family level or conventionally at a public mosque.
translation.pcm: Make we decide quick quick to observe Tarawih prayers in consultations wit individuals wey traditionally make up di prayer congregation for di family level or conventionally for public mosque.

translation.en: Let us also define the kind of tasks we engage in during the daytime of the entire period of Ramadan so that we do not miss out from observing Tarawih prayers after breaking the fast or Tahajjud prayers after midnight.
translation.pcm: Make we also define di kain task wey we dey engage during the day for Ramadan period, make we no miss out from observing Tarawih prayers afta we break fast or Tahajjud prayers afta midnight.

translation.en: In order to preserve the sanctity of our Ramadan fast, there's need to review our usual interactions with ICT platforms especially the social media.
translation.pcm: For us to preserve di sancuary of awa Ramadan fast, need dey to review awa usual interaction wit ICT platforms especially di social media.

translation.en: The Government has banned Twitter
translation.pcm: The goment don ban Twitter

translation.en: It is important to identify and avoid specific websites, television channels and radio programmes that would impact negatively on our Ramadan fast.
translation.pcm: Im dey important to indentify and avoid some kain websites, television channels and radio programmes wey fit bring negative impact on awa Ramadan fast

translation.en: We should be prepared to also avoid certain conversations in our respective places of work to prevent us from expressing or hearing obscene phrases.
translation.pcm: Make we dey prepare to also avoid some kain toks for awa respective work place, make e prevent us for toking and hearing some bad toks.

translation.en: Muslim scholars, preachers, prayer leaders, presenters and anchors of radio and television programmes are urged to eschew the use of provocative and discourteous expressions during preaching sessions.
translation.pcm: Dem advise Muslim scholars, preachers, prayer leaders, presenters and anchors of radio and television programmes to avoid di use of provocative and discourteous expressions durin preaching sessions.

translation.en: They are expected to exhibit a good sense of maturity in the course of educating their audience on the teachings of Islam.
translation.pcm: Dem suppose exhibit good sense of maturity as dem dey educate dia audience on how dem dey teach Islam

translation.en: Wisdom and good speech, not name-calling or insults, are central to effective and popular religious proselytization.
translation.pcm: Wisdom and good tok, do yeye or insult, be central to effective and popular religious proselyzation.

translation.en: With the country still struggling to overcome several challenges, it is wise for Muslim clerics to abstain from sandwiching their religious preaching with political and ethnic sentiments.
translation.pcm: Di kontri still dey struggle to overkom plenty wahala, e dey wise for Muslim clerics to abstain from sandwiching dia religion preaching wit politica and ethnic sentiment.

translation.en: We advise dealers and retailers of consumer goods against taking undue advantage of the Ramadan season to increase prices of essential commodities.
translation.pcm: We advise dealers and retailers of consumer goods make dem no do yeye inflation of market price bikos of Ramadan season.

translation.en: It is wicked for any trader to see Ramadan as an opportunity to hike prices of foodstuffs for the simple reason of the high demand for certain commodities especially sugar and fruits during Ramadan.
translation.pcm: E dey wicked for any trader to dey see Ramadan as opportunity to dey skyrocket food price bikos demand of food plenty, especially sugar and fruits durin Ramadan

translation.en: Let us be God-fearing in all that we do and say to earn a living.
translation.pcm: Make we dey fear God for evrithing wey we dey do and say to make moni.

translation.en: Philanthropic individuals, groups, and NGOs are encouraged to organize or support public breaking of Ramadan fast , at least for less-privileged Muslims.
translation.pcm: We encourage philanthropic individuals, groups and NGOs to dey organise or support public breaking of Ramadan fast, at least for less priviledge Muslims.

translation.en: It is time in Ramadan for every Muslim  to extend hand of friendship, charity, and kindness to fellow Muslims.
translation.pcm: Na time be dis for Ramadan for evri Muslim to extend hand of friendship, charity, and kindness to dia fellow muslims.

translation.en: May Allah (SWT) guide us to begin and end the Ramadan fast in peace and with ease; amin.
translation.pcm: May Allah guide us to start and end di Ramadan fast in peace and wit ease. Amin.

translation.en: Afenifere, Ohaneze seek emergency national confab
translation.pcm: Afenifere and Ohaneze dey seek emergency national confab

translation.en: The leadership of some major socio-cultural groups from the Southern and Middle Belt part of the country on Monday adopted a common position and called for an emergency national conference that would lead to the emergence of a new constitution and restructuring of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di leaders of some socio-cultural groups wey kom from South and Middle Belt part of the kontri for Monday don tok wit one voice say make emergency national conference dey wey go lead to di emergence of a new constitution and restucturing of Nigeria

translation.en: The groups, comprising the Afenifere, the Ohanaeze Ndigbo, the Middle Belt and the Southern Kaduna Peoples Union (SOKAPU) made the call in Abuja at a dialogue session titled The Nigeria's 2023 Presidential Transition Inter-ethnic Peace Dialogue.
translation.pcm: Di groups, wey include Afenifere, di Ohanaeze Ndigbo, di Middle Belt and di Southern Kadunaa pipo Union (SOKAPU) tok am in Abuja for one dialogue session wey dem call Di Nigeria's 2023 Presidential Transition inter-ethnic Peace Dialogue.

translation.en: According to them, it is possible to reverse the current challenges facing and prevent Nigeria from breaking into pieces if the federal government listens and implements the recommendations they are putting forward.
translation.pcm: According to wetin dem tok, e dey possible to reverse di current challenges wey dey face and dey prevent Nigeria from breaking into pieces if Federal goment listen and dey do wetin pipo recommend as solutions to dem.

translation.en: He said going forward, Nigerians should be allowed to exercise their mandate and sovereignty on how they want to live together under mutually beneficial terms.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say moving forward, make all Nigerians get chance to dey exercise dia mandate and soverneignty on how dey wan live together and how evribodi go benefit from am.

translation.en: He said the problems being witnessed in the country started when the military took over power in 1966 and removed the federal constitution that would have guided the country to a viable economic and political entity.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say the wahala wey we dey see for di kontri don start wen di military grab power in 1966 and remove di federal constitution wey for don guide di kontri to a viable economic and political entity.

translation.en: Also speaking, the leader of the Northern Consensus Initiative, Dr Awal Abdullahi, said: The North before now was saying we don't believe in separation
translation.pcm: Di leader of di Northern Consensus Initiative, Dr Awal Abdullahi tok say : Di North before now dey tok say dem no believe in seperation.

translation.en: but as I'm standing, I'm telling you that if there's going to be separation tomorrow, the North is ready for it, we're also ready, let's go our different ways
translation.pcm: but as I dey tok, I dey tell you say if seperation go apun tomorrow, di North dey ready for am, we dey ready, make we all waka our different ways

translation.en: and I'm telling you this with all sincerity.
translation.pcm: and I dey tell you dis wit all sincerity.

translation.en: Northern Nigeria before now did not want to hear anything separation, but as at today, as I speak to you, the North is equally ready.
translation.pcm: Northern Nigeria before now no wan hear anythin seperation, but today, as I dey tok, di North sef don ready.

translation.en: What I'm saying might be controversial, but I'm speaking the mind of northerners
translation.pcm: Wetin I dey tok fit dey controversial, but I dey tok di mind of northerners.

translation.en: and I have no apology to anyone in this hall.
translation.pcm: and I no get any apology wey I wan give anyone wey dey dis hall.

translation.en: Reacting, the president of the Middle Belt Forum, Pogu Bitrus, said the Middle Belt would not pull out of the country with the core north.
translation.pcm: In reply, the president of di Middle Belt Forum, Pgu Bitrus, tok say Middle Belt no go pull out of di kontri wit di core north.

translation.en: He said: So if my brother says the north is going, be sure the middle-belt is not going with you, you're on your own.
translation.pcm: in tok say: if hin brother dey tok say di north is going, make dem dey inform say Middle Belt no dey follow dem waka togeda, una dey on your own.

translation.en: We've served and sacrificed for this country.
translation.pcm: We don serve and sacrifice for dis kontri

translation.en: The war that occurred, the middle-belt was used to fight while the North sat back to enjoy.
translation.pcm: Di war wey apun, di middle belt dey di fight wit full bodi but di north dey dia area dey enjoy.

translation.en: Also speaking, a former speaker of the House of Representatives, Umar Ghali Naabah observed that the leadership of the country was not serving the people properly.
translation.pcm: Former speaker of di House of Repesentative, Umar Ghali Naabah observe say leaders of di kontri no dey serve di pipo properly.

translation.en: We have weak and irresponsible leadership in the country.
translation.pcm: We get weak and irresponsible leadership for dis kontri.

translation.en: We need to talk as one Nigeria and not people from the North or from the South, Naabah, who is also the chairman of the National Consultative Forum(NCF) said.
translation.pcm: We need to dey tok as one Nigeria, no be like pipo from di North or from the South, Naabah, wey also be chairman of di National Consultative Forum (NCF) tok.

translation.en: Smoking kills 29,472 Nigerians annually  FG
translation.pcm: Smoking dey kil 29,472 Nigerians evri year, FG tok am.

translation.en: The Minister of Health, Osagie Ehanire on Monday said a research finding published in 2021 by the Centre for the Study of the Economies of Africa showed that 29,472 deaths in Nigeria were attributable to smoking.
translation.pcm: Di minister of Health, Osagie Ehanire for Monday tok say the research wey dem publish for 2021 by di Centre of di Study of di Economies of Africa showed dat 29,472 deaths for Nigeria wey attributed to smoking.

translation.en: He said this in Abuja while quoting the 2018 Tobacco Atlas report, during the commemoration of the World No Tobacco Day.
translation.pcm: He tok am for Abuja as e dey quote di 2018 Tobacco Atlas report, durin di commemoration of di World no Tobacco Day.

translation.en: He said the theme for this year's World No Tobacco Day, Commit to Quit came at a good time when the global community was battling the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di theme of dis year Woled no Tobacco Day , ' Commit to Quit' kom for better time wen di global community dey battle COVID-19 pandemic.

translation.en: This is especially so, as evidence has shown that tobacco users and those with underlying non Communicable Diseases (NCDs) are at higher risk of severe Covid-19 outcomes.
translation.pcm: Na wetin dey apun be dis, as evidence don show say pipo wey dey use tobacco and pipo wey get underlying non communicable diseases (NCDs) get high risk of severe Covid-19 outkoms.

translation.en: Assisting people to quit tobacco use will therefore improve COVID-19 treatment outcomes,he said.
translation.pcm: To assit pipo wey dey use tobacco to quit go improve Covid-19 treatment outkom, he tok.

translation.en: According to him, Nigeria records over 16, 100 deaths from tobacco-related diseases every year.
translation.pcm: According to wetin hin tok, over 16,000 pipo don die for Nigeria from diseases wey dey reated to tobacco evri year,

translation.en: He said tobacco use or exposure to second-hand smoke is the leading preventable risk factor for non-communicable diseases (NCDs) like hypertension, stroke, cancers, diabetes and chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases.
translation.pcm: E tok say tobacco use or exposure to second-hand smoke be di leading preventable risk factor for non-communicable diseases like hypertension, stroke, cancer, diabetics and chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases.

translation.en: She called on the minster to identify a space within the ministry to set-up a call center office from which the counsellors will respond to caller needs.
translation.pcm: she tok say make minister identify a space for ministry to set-up call center office wey councellors go dey respond to caller need.

translation.en: France suspends use of AstraZeneca COVID Vaccine
translation.pcm: France don suspend di use of AstraZeneca COVID vaccine.

translation.en: President Emmanuel Macron of France has suspended the use of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine in the country, pending a review of its safety by the European Medicines Agency (EMA).
translation.pcm: president Emmanuel Macron of France don suspend di use of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine in di kontri, pending di time wey Europen Medicines Agency go finish di review of it safety.

translation.en: The decision has been made to suspend the use of the AstraZeneca vaccine as a precaution, hoping that we can resume it quickly if the judgement of the EMA allows it, Macron told a press conference, adding that an announcement by the EMA was expected on Tuesday afternoon.
translation.pcm: Di decision to suspend di AstraZeneca vaccine be precaution, hoping say we go resume back quick quick if EMA stamp am say e good, Macron tok am for press conference, also tok say EMA suppose give announcement on Tuesday afternoon.

translation.en: We have a simple guide, to be informed by science and the competent health authorities and to do it as part of a European strategy, he said.
translation.pcm: We get simple guide, make we dey inform by science and di competent health authorities and to do am as part of European strategy, he tok.

translation.en: He said the suspension will be effective until tomorrow (Tuesday) afternoon when the EMA will make its position known.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di suspension go dey ground till tomorrow (Tuesday) afternoon wen di EMA go make where e stand show.

translation.en: Several European countries, including Germany, Ireland, the Netherlands, suspended usage of the shot after reported blood clotting incidents.
translation.pcm: Plenty European kontri, includin Germany, Ireland, di Netherlands, don suspend make pipo dey use di shot afta report show blood clotting incidents.

translation.en: At this stage, we must have confidence in this vaccine, Castex said on Sunday.
translation.pcm: For dis stage we suppose getv confidence in dis vaccine, Castex tok on Sunday.

translation.en: If not, we'll have delays with our vaccinations and French people will be less protected and the health crisis will last longer.
translation.pcm: If not, we go get delay wit awa vaccinations and French pipo go dey less protected and di health crisis go last long.

translation.en: Macron also said the French government would have decisions to take in the next few days in order to control the spread of COVID-19 cases after an uptick in cases and a rise in hospitalisation.
translation.pcm: Macron also tok say di French goment go take decisions for next few days in order to control di spread of COVID-19 cases afta an uptick in cases and a rise in hospitalisation.

translation.en: We will probably have new decisions to take in the coming days, Macron said.
translation.pcm: We go probably get new decision to take for di coming days, Macron tok.

translation.en: He said the government needed to look at the reality of the epidemic, town by town, region by region: it's what we are doing.
translation.pcm: He tok say goment need  look at di reality of di pandemic, town by town, regioin by region: na wetin we dey do.

translation.en: Hospitals in the Paris region are close to capacity, with patients being transferred out of the capital region to other parts of France, while other hotspots of infection are in the north around Calais and the Cote d'Azur.
translation.pcm: Hospitals for paris region don dey full, dem dey transfer patient out of di capital region to oda parts of France, oda hotspots of infection dey for di north area for Calais and di Cote d'Azur.

translation.en: Macron decided against a third national lockdown at the end of January, saying instead a policy of 6pm nation-wide curfew and a partial shutdown of bars, restaurants and other social and entertainment meeting places should continue.
translation.pcm: Macron decide agasint third national lockdown for end of january, hin tok say instead of 6pm nation-wide curfew and partial shutdown of bar, make restaurants and oda social and entertainment meeting places continue.

translation.en: Fiscal discipline, key to our success Okowa
translation.pcm: Fiscal discipline, be key to our success Okowa

translation.en: Delta Governor, Sen. (Dr) Ifeanyi Okowa, said adherence to his fiscal discipline and superior planning accounted for the successes recorded by his administration in the last six years.
translation.pcm: Delta Governor, Sen. (Dr.) Ifeanyi Okowa, tok say adherence to e fiscal discipline and superior planning account for di success wey hin administation get for di last six years.

translation.en: Okowa stated this in Asaba on Saturday.
translation.pcm: Okowa tok am in Asaba on Saturday

translation.en: He said that his administration's success during the period was borne out of greater coordination in administration and superior thought-process.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say hin administration success durin di period be out of great coordination in administation and superior thought-process.

translation.en: He recalled that prior to his administration, the state's budget hovered around N400 billion mark, with naira exchanging at N180 to a dollar as against current budget of the state being in the N300 billion mark, with exchange rate at N492 to a dollar.
translation.pcm: E recall say prior hin administation, di budget wey di state get dey around N400 billion, wey naira dey change for N180 per dollar wey dey against current budget of di state wey be N300 billion wit changing of dollar for N492

translation.en: Okowa said that following the devaluation of the naira over the years, there was less value the naira could impact on projects.
translation.pcm: Okowa tok say following di devaluation of di naira over di years, di value wey naira fit impact on project dey less.

translation.en: He said, In the past we had bigger budgets and greater value for money because the naira was relatively strong at N180 per dollar compared to now we are at N492 to a dollar with a budget of N300 billion per annum.
translation.pcm: E tok say before before we get bigger budget and gretaer value for moni bikos say di naira sey strong at N180 to a dollar but now we dey N492 to one dollar and budget be N300 billion per year

translation.en: Unfortunately for us too, the recurrent budget in terms of salaries has also increased remarkably, which has also further deepened the negative effect of the recurrent budget which had made our capital portfolio smaller.
translation.pcm: Unfortunately, di current budget wey dey related to salaries dem don skyrocket, e don kos kasala to recurrent budget wey don make awa capital portfolio smaller.

translation.en: The fact that there have been devaluation of the naira made it have less value on projects and having realised this, we needed to plan critically.
translation.pcm: Say devaluation don dey on naira don make am have less value on projects and as we don know dis now, we need dey plan.

translation.en: The governor attributed early passage and implementation of the State's budget as part of the drivers for his administration's success story.
translation.pcm: Di governor tok say early passage and implementation of di state budget as part of di thing wey make hin administation dey sucessful.

translation.en: We also monitored the seasons and acted by the seasons and that helped us a lot.
translation.pcm: We monitor di seasons and act by di season, dat sef help us

translation.en: We ensured that our budgets are passed on time and implemented on time.
translation.pcm: We make sure say awa budget get pass on time and we do watin we suppose do on time

translation.en: Our budgets are signed by December so that we are able to use the window of January to mid May to do most of the construction jobs.
translation.pcm: We sign awa budget for december so we go get chance use window of january to May do most of di contruction jobs wey we wan do.

translation.en: it means that you will contend with the rains to deliver projects, he said.
translation.pcm: e mean say you go contend wit di rain to deliver project, e tok.

translation.en: He added that the strategy has helped but it requires a lot of prudence, a lot of thinking and time to be able to get all these things done.
translation.pcm: e add say di strategy don help but e dey take lpot of prudence, you go need to think well and get time to be able to do all dis thing well.

translation.en: On the remaining two years in his tenure, Okowa assured Deltans of his continued drive to work till the last day to provide a stronger Delta .
translation.pcm: On di two years wey remain for hin tenure, Okowa assure Deltans say e go continue to work well till e leave office so e go fit leave a stronger Delta.

translation.en: Okowa also assured that his administration would continue to stay on course in areas of health, agriculture, and education.
translation.pcm: Okowa tok say hin administation go continue to dey do good for health, agreiculture and education.

translation.en: Politics tends to be distractive and I know that, but I know that by God's grace, I have the capacity to manage the two.
translation.pcm: He tok say he know say politics dey distract person, but by the grace of God, e get di capacity to manage di two well.

translation.en: Let the struggle continue even if they take my life, says Sowore
translation.pcm: Make di stuggle continue even if e take hin life, Sowore tok

translation.en: Omoyele Sowore, human rights activist, has asked his supporters to carry on withthe struggle even if he loses his life.
translation.pcm: Omoyele Sowore, wey be human rights activist don tell hin supporters to carry on even if e die

translation.en: Reacting to the incident at Unity Fountain in Abuja on Monday morning, Sowore simply identified the officer who shot him as one ACP Etine.
translation.pcm: As e dey react to wetin apun for Unity Fountain in Abuja on Monday morning, Sowore identify di officer wey shot am as ACP Etine

translation.en: Inibehe Effiong, one of Sowore's lawyers, had said that the officer fired a teargas cannister directly at the right thigh of the activist.
translation.pcm: Inibehe Effiong wey be one of Sowore lawyer, don tok say di officer fire teargas at di right tight of di activist.

translation.en: I watched Sowore being shot live on Facebook.
translation.pcm: Na for facebook I watch as dem take shot Sowore

translation.en: This is what Nigeria has been turned into under Buhari.
translation.pcm: Na wetin dem turn Nigeria to be dis under Buhari

translation.en: They've declared war on the Civic Space.
translation.pcm: Dem don declare war on di Civic Space

translation.en: The FCT Police Commissioner has fenced the Unity Fountain with iron and cables to prevent protests.
translation.pcm: Di FCT Police Commissioner don fence Unity Fountain wit iron and cable to prrevent make protest apun.

translation.en: This is a criminal offence under the Anti-Torture Act of 2017.
translation.pcm: Dis be criminal offence under di Anti-Touture Act of 2017

translation.en: Sowore has reportedly been taken to the hospital.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say dem don carry Sowore go hospital

translation.en: NIHORT boss gives reasons for tomato seasonal glut
translation.pcm: NIHORT oga don tok reason why tomato dey glot

translation.en: The Executive Director National Horticultural Research Institute, Dr Abayomi Olaniyan, has identified inadequate expertise in tomato processing as the main cause of the seasonal glut and inconsistent supply of the product in the country.
translation.pcm: Dr Abayomi Olaniyan wey be di ExecutiveDirector National Hoeticultureal Research Institute, don pinpoint inadequte expertise for tomato processing as di main kos of di seasonal glut and why di product no dey too dey for market.

translation.en: Olaniya spoke at the just concluded empowerment training for youths in the area of tomato and telfaria production.
translation.pcm: Olaniyan tok for di just concluded empowerment training wey dem do for youth in areas of tomato and telfaria production.

translation.en: He revealed that the country produces 2.3 million metric tonnes against 1.8 million tonnes produced two years ago while the national demand is 3 million.
translation.pcm: E tok say di kontri dey produce 2.3million metric tonnes against 1.8 milllion tonnes wey dem produce two years ago while di national demand be 3 million

translation.en: Ossai, who was represented by Ambassador Chibuzor Okereke, urged the beneficiaries to take full advantage of the programme in expanding their existing skills in farming.
translation.pcm: Ossai, wey Ambassador Chibuzor Okereke kom represent, advice dos wey benefit to take advcantage of di programme by expanding di skil wey dem don get before for farming

translation.en: Earlier, Chairman, NIHORT Governing Board, Major General Mohammed A. Garba, had described agriculture as a tool for achieving sustainable economic development in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Chairman, NIHORT Governing Board, Major General Mohammed A. Garba, don describe agriculture as tool wey we fit use achieve economic development for Nigeria.

translation.en: The three reasons Jose Mourinho was sacked
translation.pcm: Di three reason why dey sack Mourinho

translation.en: After checking this out thoroughly at Tottenham, I can tell you that is not true.
translation.pcm: Afta we don look dis well well for Tottenham, I fit tell you say e no dey true.

translation.en: Mourinho did not take training because he was already aware that his days at Spurs had come to an end.
translation.pcm: Mourinho no take training bikos say e don sabi say hin time for Spurs don kom to an end

translation.en: The training session carried on but he did not attend.
translation.pcm: Di training session apun but hin no attend

translation.en: Chief Executive Daniel Levy arrived early and summoned Mourinho into his office situated at the training facility.
translation.pcm: Daniel Levy wey be Chief Executive arrive eaarly and e summon Mourinho to hin office wey dey training facility

translation.en: There he gave Mourinho the news that he was fired!
translation.pcm: Na dia he give Mourinho di news say dey don sack am

translation.en: Managing Director Daniel Levy was unhappy with Mourinho criticising several of his players following their recent run of poor results.
translation.pcm: Daniel Levy wey be Managing Director no dey hapi wit Mourinho criticising plenty players afta dem no too do well for pitch

translation.en: The players were angry that Mourinho had not supported them and in the dressing room all was not well.
translation.pcm: Di players dey angry ay Mourinho no dey support dem and for dressing room, things no dey go well.

translation.en: He was sacked at Chelsea, sacked at Manchester United and now sacked by Tottenham because he turned on his players and refused to take the blame personally for poor results.
translation.pcm: Dem sack am for Chealsea, sack am for Manchester United and now Tottnham don sack am bikos say e turn on hin players and e no wan take blame for di bad results wey dem get.

translation.en: Once again the point is proven that if the players are not happy the manager has to go.
translation.pcm: Again, dey don prove di point say id players no dey hapi, managers must go.

translation.en: The players were all sent a text informing them that Mourinho was no longer in charge.
translation.pcm: Dem send di players text message say Mourunho no dey in charge again

translation.en: Levy was also upset that Mourinho had spent seventeen months at White Hart Lane and not produced a team superior to that of Mauricio Pochettino.
translation.pcm: Levy sef dey vex say mourinho don spend seventeen months for White Hart Lane and hin no produce team wey better pass wetin Mauricio Pochettino build.

translation.en: Levy was upset that players of the quality of Gareth Bale and Dele Alli were left sitting on the bench despite others struggling to get results.
translation.pcm: Levy dey vex say players wey get quality like Gareth Bale and Dele Alli dey sit for bench as odas sef dey stuggle to get good result.
