translation.en: She said,The rate of consumption of drugs among youths in the state, is not decreasing at all.
translation.pcm: She tok say di rate of consumption of drug among youth dem wey dey dio state no dey go down at all

translation.en: Anytime my officers go out for arrest they come back with a lot of users.
translation.pcm: Anytime dem officer go out go arrest pipo, dem wey always kom back station  wit plenty pipo wey dey use am

translation.en: Before you can get a dealer or a baron, you will get hundreds of users, so we can say the rate of consumption of drugs is on the increase.
translation.pcm: Before you fit catch dealer or baron, you go domn catch hundred of pipo wey be user, na why we fit say di rate wey pipo dey use drug don dey increase

translation.en: She added that while both secondary school and tertiary institution students were involved in the intake of illicit drugs, consumption was more rampant among students of tertiary institutions.
translation.pcm: She add say as both secondary school and tertiary institution student dem dey use illicit drug, na tertiary institution student dem dey use am pass

translation.en: She further said,Anytime we go out for raids, we arrest students.
translation.pcm: she tok say anytime wey dey commot, dem wey arrest student

translation.en: I hope to meet with the management of the university to discuss the issue of students involving in drug abuse.
translation.pcm: I dey hope say I go meet management of versity to take discuss di issue of student wey dey involve wit drug abuse.

translation.en: 5 policemen on trial for extorting N200,000 from Dubai-based Nigerian
translation.pcm: 5 policemen dey trial as dem extort N200,000 form Nigerians wey dey live for Dubai

translation.en: Lagos State Police Command says it has commenced orderly room trial for five policemen at FESTAC Police Station for allegedly collecting N200,000 from a Dubai-based Nigerian who was home visiting his family.
translation.pcm: Lagos State Police Command tok say dem don start room trial for 5 policemen for FESTAC police station for  di accusation say dem collect N200,000 from Dubai-based Nigerians wey kom home kom visit hin family

translation.en: The policemen had allegedly followed the victim to a local Point of Sale (POS) cash point in FESTAC where the said amount was extorted from him.
translation.pcm: Dem allege say di policemen follow di victim waka to a local point of sale cash point for FESTAC where dem tok say dem collect di moni for hin hand

translation.en: The policemen had accosted the victim while driving home in an Uber car.
translation.pcm: Di policemen dey wit di victim side by side wen e dey drive home inside Uber car

translation.en: It was learnt that the victim who recently arrived in the country from Dubai, and was also heading home from the airport, had shared the story of how police officers in FESTAC town stopped him and extorted N200, 000 from him.
translation.pcm: We hear say di victim wey just kom back from Dubai, wey dey go home from di airport, don share di tori of how police pipo dem for FESTAC stop and and collect N200, 000 from am

translation.en: #EndSARS promoter, Rinu, initially shared the story of the man on her Twitter handle.
translation.pcm: Rinu, wey be one of di #EndSARS promoter, don share di tori of di man for her Twitter handle before

translation.en: She wrote,A young Nigerian came back from the UAE this morning; took Uber from the airport to FESTAC and  bumped into Nigerian police officers.
translation.pcm: she write say one young Nigerian kom back from UAE dis morning; e carry uber from airport to estac and a em e enter police officer dem hand.

translation.en: The man later took to Twitter to reveal his identity and also recount how the incident happened.
translation.pcm: Di man go Twitter go reveal hin identity and tok about how di incident apun

translation.en: Lagos State Police Spokesman, Muyiwa Adejobi, who confirmed the incident, said all the policemen involved are being tried at the Command Headquarters, Ikeja.
translation.pcm: Muyiwa Adejobi, wey be Lagos State Police toktok pesin wey confirm di incident tok say all di police pipo dem wey dey involve dey trial for Command Headquaters for Ikeja

translation.en: Adejobi said the trial would determine the level of complicity of those involved.
translation.pcm: Adejobi tok say di trial go determine di level of complicity of pipo wey dey involve

translation.en: According to Adejobi,We have arrested all of them and the money recovered and returned to the man.
translation.pcm: According to wetin Adejobi tok, dem don arrest all of dem and dem don return di moni wey dem recover back to di man

translation.en: The policemen will soon face trial and be punished.
translation.pcm: Di policemen go soon face trial and dem go punish dem

translation.en: We have the whole team in the cell and they would be given orderly room trial, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say dem get di whole team for cell and dey go give dem orderly room trial

translation.en: Adejobi , however, did not disclose if the DPO of Festac would also be tried along with them for what people calledlack of supervision.
translation.pcm: Adejobi no tok if DPO of FESTAC go dey di trial too wit di oda pipo as pipo dey tok say na lack of supervision.

translation.en: Fayemis successor must come from Ekiti South  Sen. Olujimi
translation.pcm: Sen. Olujimi tok say na Ekiti South Fayemi successor must kom from

translation.en: The Senator representing Ekiti South, Biodun Olujimi, has said Governor Kayode Fayemis successor must come from Ekiti South in 2022.
translation.pcm: Biodun Olujimi, wey be Senator wey dey represent Ekiti South don tok say pesin wey go succeed Kayode Fayemi must kom from Ekiti South for 2022

translation.en: In a statement Wednesday, the senator said it is time to rotate power to the Southern zone of the state in the spirit of fairness and equity.
translation.pcm: E tok am for Wednesday, di senator tok say na time to rotate power to south zone for di state in di spirit of fairness and equity

translation.en: She argued that Ekiti North and Central zones had at various times produced the governor of the state while the South is left behind.
translation.pcm: She argue say Ekiti North and Central zone don produce governor of di state before but South neva produce.

translation.en: My attention has been drawn to various political undercurrents or misgivings making the rounds that I have entered into pacts on Ekiti governorship for 2022.
translation.pcm: Dey don call my attention to different undercurrent or misgiving making di round dat I don enter pact on Ekiti governship for 2022

translation.en: I have not entered into any pacts with any individual or groups.
translation.pcm: I neva enta any pact wit any pesin or group.

translation.en: How Nigeria can earn $700m yearly from sugar investment
translation.pcm: How Nigeria fit earn $700m evri year for sugar investment

translation.en: The Dangote Sugar Refinery has urged the federal government to strictly implement the Backward Integration Policy (BIP) in the sugar industry as the nation can earn $700 million yearly from local production.
translation.pcm: Dangote Sugar Refinery tell federal goment say make dem implement the Backward Integration Policy (BIP) for sugar industry as di kontri fit earn $700 million inside evri year from local production

translation.en: The Chairman of Dangote Sugar Refinery, Aliko Dangote, disclosed this Thursday at its 15th Annual General Meeting (AGM) in Lagos.
translation.pcm: Aliko Dangote wey be Dangote Refinery Chairman tok for Thursday for em Annual General Meeting (AGM) for Lagos.

translation.en: Dangote said,If the National Sugar Master Plan is followed strictly and the players all follow the rules, the country will be better for it as Nigeria will save between $600m and $700m annually as forex.
translation.pcm: Dangote tok say if dem follow di National Sugar Master Plan and di player follow di rule, di kontri go dey better as Nigeria go save $600m and $700m for inside evri year as forex

translation.en: He stated that the backward integration policy of Dangote Sugar Refinery was recording appreciable progress.
translation.pcm: E tok say di backward integration policy of Dangote Sugar Refinery record progress

translation.en: Dangote told the shareholders that despite the COVID-19 pandemic, Dangote Sugar raised its production volume by 13.7 percent to 743,858 tonnes in the financial year ended December 31, 2020, compared to 654,071 tonnes in 2019.
translation.pcm: Dangote tell shareholder dem say even as covid-19 pandemic dey, Dangote Sugar raise em population volume by 13.7% to 743,858 tonnes for financial year end for December 31,2020, compare to 654,071 tonne for 2019

translation.en: He said it posted N214.3 billion turnover.
translation.pcm: E tok say e post N214.3 billion turnova

translation.en: The board then declared a dividend payment of N18.22bn to the shareholders, amounting to N1.50 kobo per ordinary share of 50 kobo each.
translation.pcm: di board declare dividend payment of N18.22BN to di shareholder, wey dey ammount N1.50 kobo per share of 50 kobo each

translation.en: Gross profit increased by 40.4% to N53.75bn, compared to N38.29bn in 2019, while gross profit after taxation for the year increased by 33.2% to N26.70bn as against N22.36bn in 2019.
translation.pcm: Gross profit don grow by 40.4% to N53.75bn, if we compare am to N38.29bn for 2019, while gross profit afta we commot tax for di year grow by 33.2% to N26.70bn as against N22.36bn for 2019.

translation.en: Dangote said the company had revised its sugar production target to 550,000 metric tonnes, achievable by 2024.
translation.pcm: Dangote tok say di company don revise em sugar production target tp 550,000 metric tonnes, wey dem fit achieve by 2024.

translation.en: Gunmen invade herders camap, shot 1, kidnap other in Abuja
translation.pcm: Mr Ravindra Singhvi wey be di Group Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer for Dangote Sugar, tok say awa backward integration na to be global force for sugar production

translation.en: Kidnappers have shot and injured a herder while abducting one other person after they  invaded a Fulani settlement near Yewuti village in Kwali Area Council in the early hours of Monday morning.
translation.pcm: kidnapper dem don shot and injure one herder as dem dey abduct anoda persin afta dem invade settlement wey be dem fulani own near Yewuti village for Kwali Area Council for early momo for Monday

translation.en: A resident of Yewuti community, simply identified as Salihu, said the incident happened around 12:23 am when the kidnappers came through the bush and attacked the Fulani settlement.
translation.pcm: persin wey de live Yewuti community, wey be Salihu tok say di gbege incident apun for around 12:23 am as dem kidnapper enta from inside bush kom attack dio fulani settlement

translation.en: He said the kidnappers shot one of the herders in the leg, while they whisked away another at gunpoint, after the they scared the community residents with sporadic gun shots.
translation.pcm: e tok say di kidnapper dem shot one herder for leg as dem carry anoda person commot for gunpoint na afta dem scare pipo wey dey live for di community as dem dey shot plenty bullet.

translation.en: One of the Fulani men was trying to escape when they shot him in the leg, while they took another herder away.
translation.pcm: One of di fulani men dey try escape wen dem shot am for leg as dem carry anoda herder commot

translation.en: The injured herder was later taken to the hospital for treatment, he said.
translation.pcm: Di herder wey dey injure na hin dem take go hospital for treatment, hin tok

translation.en: He said the family of the kidnapped victim was yet to establish contact with the kidnappers.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say di family of di victim neva get di contat of di kidnapper dem

translation.en: The spokesperson of the FCT police command ASP Maryam Yusuf, asked our reporter to send a text, which he did
translation.pcm: ASP Maryam Yusuf wey be spokesperson of FCT Police comand ask awa reporter say make e send text, and e do so.

translation.en: but she was yet to reply to the text message sent to her.
translation.pcm: she neva reply di text message wey dey send give am.

translation.en: The virtues of open grazing in Nigeria
translation.pcm: Di virtue of open grazing for inside Nigeria

translation.en: According to a popular adage when you are in a tunnel, what you need is light, not sound.
translation.pcm: as dem dey tok am for inside one popular adage, if you dey inside tunnel, na light wey you need, no be sound

translation.en: However, a light at the end of the tunnel on issues relating to cattle husbandry is long time coming.
translation.pcm: light for end of turnnel on palava wey dey on top cattle husbandary don tay.

translation.en: It is true that population has increased over the years, also more land has been put into farming and infrastructure, but analysis of data shows that for 20 million cattle and 200 million Nigerians, there is more than enough land.
translation.pcm: Na true say population don increase ova di years, and plenty land don dey use for farming and infracstructure, but wetin analysis show be say for 20 million cattle dem and 200 million Nigerians, land go dtill dey plenty

translation.en: For a start, Kano State, one of the most densely populated states is home to about one million cattle and there is relative tranquility.
translation.pcm: To take start, Kano State wey be one of di place wey pipo plenty pass get about one million cattle and tranquility dey.

translation.en: Nigeria has a landmass of 92.3m ha, with 70.8m ha of agricultural area but only between 34 million to 35 million ha was cultivated last year.
translation.pcm: na 92.3m landmass Nigeria get, wit 70.8 ha wey dem dey use do agriculture but na only 34 million to 35 million dem don use since last year

translation.en: For the sake of discussion, lets look at maize production.
translation.pcm: bikos say we dey tok, make we look maize production

translation.en: Available data shows that in 2020, only about 12m tons were produced.
translation.pcm: data wey dey available show say inside 2020, na only 12m tonnes dem produce

translation.en: Research findings have shown that 86 per cent of cereal biomass is made of materials not consumable by humans.
translation.pcm: research don touchlight say 86% of cereal biomass na em be say na material wey human no dey consume dem take do am.

translation.en: The implication is that over 50 million tons of crop residues will be wasted if not consumed by cattle.
translation.pcm: Di implication be say 50 million tons of crop go dey reduce if e no dey consumed by cattle

translation.en: Not to mention sorghum that accounts for 50 per cent of total cereal production and occupies about 45 per cent of the total land area devoted to cereal production.
translation.pcm: Make we no mention sorghum wey account for 50% of di total cereal wey dem produce and e occupy about 45% of di total land area wey dem devote for cereal production

translation.en: Add to these, the millions of tons of grasses on fallow land and open range.
translation.pcm: Make we add to diz, di million ton of grass wey dey fallow land and open range

translation.en: To access these fodders, which are mainly available only in situ, cattle must move and openly graze.
translation.pcm: To access diz fodder dem, wey dey always dey available only for situ, cattle go move and dem go dey openly gaze

translation.en: In most cases, this is done with the expressed permission of farmers for a fee.
translation.pcm: for many case, dem go pay farmer and take permission before dem do am

translation.en: This explains why a kilo of beef sells for 1700 Naira.
translation.pcm: Na diz touchlight why kilo of beef dey sell for N1700

translation.en: Therefore, until the country has a programme to process these quality fodders, banning open grazing will be a dog in the manger policy.
translation.pcm: Until di kontri get ways wey dem fit process di fodder dem, banning open grazing no fit apun

translation.en: But I accept that rogue elements amongst herders engage in criminalities and the justice system has failed to prosecute them.
translation.pcm: But I know say some wayo pipo wey dey among herder dem dey engage for criminal things and justice system no see dem prosecute

translation.en: These are small-scale livestock producers that settle in communities all over Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Na small scale livestock producer dem wey settle for different different community wey dey Nigeria

translation.en: They negotiate with members of the host community for land to build their homestead, grow crops and keep cattle.
translation.pcm: Dem go negotiate wit pipo wey get di community t buy land wey dem go build, grow dia crop and keep dia cattle

translation.en: According to FAO, 33 per cent of global land is under cultivation for animal feeds while 30 per cent of the entire earth surface is permanently under pasture to support global intensive livestock production.
translation.pcm: According to wetin FAO tok, 33% of land wey dey dis world na em dem dey use for animal feeds while 30% of di earth surface dey permanently under pature to dey support global intensive livestock producton

translation.en: Ethiopia has a landmass of 110 million hectares with 60 million cattle, three times that of Nigeria under open grazing.
translation.pcm: Ethiopia get 100 million hectares landmass wit 60 million cattle, e plenty three times pass Nigeria own wey dey under open grazing

translation.en: Ethiopia is one of the fastest-growing economies in Africa with livestock production covering 40 per cent of agricultural output and contributing 13-16 per cent of the total GDP.
translation.pcm: Ethiopia be one of di economy for Africa wey dey grow fast fast wit livestock production wey cover 40% of Agricultural output and e dey contribute 13-16% to di total GDP

translation.en: Without any doubt, cattle production is facing a myriad of challenges associated with husbandry, the misconduct of some herders, climate change and local politics.
translation.pcm: Cattle production dey face myraid of challenge dem wey dey associated wit husbandry, di misconduct of herder dem, climate change and local politics

translation.en: In todays world, technology is the weapon of first choice to overcome most challenges associated with livestock production.
translation.pcm: For today world, technology be weapon of first choice wey fit help overkom plenty challenge dem wey dey face livestock production

translation.en: The industry is worth about N10 trillion (PAN) and is the biggest in Africa.
translation.pcm: Na about N10 trillion (PAN) di industry worth and na em big pass for Africa

translation.en: Commercial and free-range rural poultry exists in all states thus giving commercial poultry the all-important Federal character.
translation.pcm: Commercial and free-range rural poultry dey for al state wey dey give commercial poultry di all-important Federal character.

translation.en: The poultry revolution did not just happen, it was made to happen by deliberate government policies, public-private sector partnership and the Nigerian spirit of entrepreneurship.
translation.pcm: Di poultry revolution no just apun laidat, na goment policy make am apun, public-private sector partnership and di entrepreneurship spirit wey Nigerian get .

translation.en: The same technology can transform the cattle industry for the benefit of all.
translation.pcm: Na di same technology fit transform di cattle industry wey evribodi go benefit.

translation.en: Dr Junaidu Maina is a former Director, Federal Livestock Department
translation.pcm: Dr Junaidu Maina wey be former Director, Federal Livestock Department.

translation.en: Biden lifts travel ban on Nigeria, Sudan, Tanzania, others
translation.pcm: Biden don lift travel ban on top Nigeria, Tanzania, Sudan and odas dem

translation.en: President Joe Biden on Wednesday lifted the travel restriction the Trump administration had placed on countries including Nigeria, Sudan, Eritrea, Tanzania, among others.
translation.pcm: president Joe Biden for Wednesday commot di travel ban wey Trump administration put on top Nigeria, Sudan, Eritrea, Tanzania and odas dem

translation.en: The order also ended blocked entry to most people from Iran, Syria, Libya, Yemen, Somalia and North Korea.
translation.pcm: Di order sef end block entry for pipo for Iran, Syria, Libya, Yemen, Somalia and North Korea

translation.en: On Wednesday the president signed 15 executive orders including two agency actions.
translation.pcm: For Wednesday di president sign 15 executive order wey include two agency action

translation.en: Biden condemned the ban as an attack on racial and religious minorities.
translation.pcm: Biden tok say di ban be attack on racial and religious minorities.

translation.en: The president directs theState Department to resume visa processing for those countries and develop a plan to address people affected, such as those who were denied entry to the U.S.
translation.pcm: Di president don direct State Department say make dem resume visa processing foe kontri dem and make dem develop plan wey go address pipo wey e affect, like doz wey dem deny make dem enter U.S.A

translation.en: The former president, Donald Trump had placed restrictions on travel and immigration from some predominantly Muslim countries.
translation.pcm: Donald Trump wey be di former president don put restriction on travel and immigration from kontri dem wey many of dem be muslim

translation.en: Trumps central 2016 campaign promises were to crack down on immigration and limit the number of Muslims coming to the U.S.
translation.pcm: Trump 2016 campaign promise dem dey on top immigration and make e limit di number of muslim dem wey dey kom to di US.

translation.en: The travel ban has been devastating especially to those who have families in the US.
translation.pcm: Di travel ban dey devastating to pipo wey get family dem for inside USA.

translation.en: The Managing Director of Lekki Port LFTZ Enterprise Limited (LPLEL), promoters of the Lekki Deep Sea Port, Mr Du Ruogang, has said the port would generate about 2000 direct jobs and over 10,000 indirect jobs when it is completed in 2022.
translation.pcm: Mr. Du Ruogang wey be Managing Director for Lekki Port LFTZ Enterprise Limited (LPLEL), wey  be promoters of di Lekki Deep Sea Port tok say di port go generate like 2000 direct job and ova 10,000 indirect job wen dem complete am for 2022

translation.en: Ruogang disclosed this recently while taking journalists on a tour to assess the level of progress on the construction work at the Lekki Port project site.
translation.pcm: Ruogang tok am wen e dey tok give journalist on a tour to assess di level of progress on di construction work for Lekki Port project site

translation.en: He also disclosed that construction work on the project has so far moved at a fast pace, reaching 51% completion, adding that some major milestones such as completion of Eastern breakwater had been achieved.
translation.pcm: E tok say di construction work dey move at fast rate, as em don reach 51% completion, e add say major milestone like completion of Eastern breakwater don be achieve

translation.en: He stressed that all hands are already on deck to deliver the first of its kind Deep Sea Port in Nigeria as one of the shareholders, the Nigerian Ports Authority, had commenced work to initiate marine services at the site.
translation.pcm: E tok say na all hand dey deck to deliver di first ogbonge Deep Sea Port for Nigeria as one of di shareholder, wey be Nigeria Port Authority, don commence to dey initiate maritime service for inside di site

translation.en: He also expressed confidence that the Lekki Deep Sea Port would change the narrative of Nigerias maritime sector and consequently impact Nigerias economic development.
translation.pcm: E tok say e get confidence say dio Lekki Deep Sea Port go change di narrative for Nigeria maritime sector and em go impact economic development for Nigeria

translation.en: According to him, Lekki Port is estimated to have an aggregate economic impact of $361 billion over 45 years, creating no less than 169,972 jobs and generating revenue for both state and federal government agencies through taxes, royalties and duties in the process.
translation.pcm: According to wetin e tok, dem don estimate say Lekki Port go generate economic impact of $361bilion ova 45 years, wey go create 169,972 jobs and revenue for state and federal goment agency dem through taxes, royalties and duties in di process.

translation.en: The MD explained that the project has succeeded in providing employment opportunities for about 1,200 Nigerians with 50 of them from the host community.
translation.pcm: Di MD explain say di project don suceed to dey provide employment opportunity for about 1200 Nigerians wit 50 of dem wey kom from di host community dem.

translation.en: Huawei CEO: We wont give up the ideal of globalization
translation.pcm: Huawei CEO: We no go give up di ideal of globalization

translation.en: Huaweis CEO Ren Zhengfei has pledged to stick to a globalization strategy despite external pressure.
translation.pcm: Ren Zhengfei wey be Huawei CEO don pledge say dem go stick to globalization strategy despite di pressure wey dem dey get from outside

translation.en: He has called on the new US administration to come up with more open policies that are in the interests of US companies and the US economy as a whole.
translation.pcm: E don call di new US administration make dem do more open policy dem wey dey wit di interest of US company dem and US economy as a whole

translation.en: These are the first public remarks the founder of Huawei has made since the change of the US administration.
translation.pcm: Na wetin di Huawei founder first tok be dis since di change of di US administration

translation.en: Ren was speaking during a press briefing in Taiyuan, the capital city of Chinas northern Shanxi province, after launching the Intelligent Mining Innovation Lab.
translation.pcm: Ren dey tok for one press briefing for Taiyuan, di capital city of China northern Shanxi Province, afta dey launch di intelligent Mining Innovation Lab

translation.en: Trade benefits both sides.
translation.pcm: Trade dey benefit di two side dem

translation.en: Allowing US companies to supply goods to Chinese customers is conducive to their own financial performance.
translation.pcm: To dey allow US company dem supply goods to chineses customers dey conducive to dia own financial performance

translation.en: If Huaweis production capacity expands, US companies could sell more.
translation.pcm: If Huawei production capacity expand, US company dem go fit sell plenty

translation.en: Its a win-win situation.
translation.pcm: Na win-win situation di thing be

translation.en: I believe the new administration will weigh these interests as they consider their policies, said Ren.
translation.pcm: I believe say di new administation go weigh dis interest as dem dey consider dia policy, ana wetin Ren tok

translation.en: Ren stated that Huawei creates value to the whole ecosystem and the wider economy.
translation.pcm: Ren tok say Huawei create value to di whole ecosystem and di wider economy

translation.en: He cited the example that Huawei has built 5G networks in many cities in Europe, Asia and the Middle East.
translation.pcm: E cite example say Huawei don build 5G network for many city dem wey dey Europe, Asia and di Middle East.

translation.en: As humanity keeps making progress, no company can develop a globalized industry alone.
translation.pcm: As humanity dey make progress, no konpany fit develop gloibalise economy alone

translation.en: It requires concerted efforts around the world, Ren added.
translation.pcm: Na wetin wey require effort from around di world, na wetin Ren tok

translation.en: The United States government has been campaigning against Huawei in the past two years alleging Huaweis equipment could be used to spy on Americans, without presenting any evidence.
translation.pcm: Di United State goment don dey campaign against Huawei for di last two years dey tok say Huawei equipment fit dey use to dey spy on America and dem no present evidence.

translation.en: Huawei has repeatedly denied the claims, and few other countries have given in to US pressure.
translation.pcm: Huawei don deny di claim ova and ova, and few oda kontri dem don give in to US pressure.

translation.en: Ren said he is now even more confident about Huaweis survival.
translation.pcm: Ren tok say e dey confident say Huawei go survive

translation.en: We have found new and more ways to overcome our challenges.
translation.pcm: We don find new new and plenty way wey we fit use overkom awa challenges

translation.en: Our sales revenue and profits in 2020 were higher than the previous years, Ren told journalists.
translation.pcm: Awa sale revenue and profit dem for 2020 dey high dat previous year, Ren tell journalist dem

translation.en: Ren said the Intelligent Mining Innovation Lab would result in better services for mines with 5G.
translation.pcm: Ren tok say di Intelligent Mining Innovation Lab go result for better service for mines wit 5G

translation.en: By supporting the mining industry, we can grow our business and support more efficient and safer production in mines.
translation.pcm: As dem dey support di mining industry, we fit grow awa business and support plenty efficient and safer production for mines

translation.en: We can also enable coal mine workers to wear suits and ties at work, Ren said.
translation.pcm: We fit allow coal worker dem wear suit and tie for work, Ren tok

translation.en: In the 5G era, connecting businesses is the main goal.
translation.pcm: To dey connect business be di main goal for di 5G era

translation.en: There are many industries that we are not too familiar with, like airports, ports, coal mining, iron and steel production, automotive manufacturing, and aircraft manufacturing.
translation.pcm: Plenty industry dey wey we no too dey familiar wit, like airport,ports, coal mining, iron and steel production, automotive manufacturing, and aircraft manufacturing.

translation.en: Thats why we built joint labs to learn more about the needs of these industries.
translation.pcm: Na why we build joint lab to take learn about di need of diz industry

translation.en: Huaweis business results for the first nine months of the year 2020 showed that revenue totalled 671.3 billion yuan ($98.57 billion), up 9.9% from that of the same period in 2019.
translation.pcm: Huawei business result for di first nine month of di year 2020 show say di revenue total 671.3 billion yuan (98.57billion), up 9.9% for di same period for 2019

translation.en: We'll continue serving our customers well by creating more value for them.
translation.pcm: We go continue to dey do awa customer well well as we go dey create plenty better value

translation.en: We want them to have lasting faith in us, and we hope that they wont sway because of political pressure, said Ren.
translation.pcm: We want make dem get lasting faith in us, and we hope say dem no go go away bikos say political pressure dey, Ren tok.

translation.en: Farmers, herders in Ekiti to register with government or get expelled
translation.pcm: Farmer and Herder dem for Ekiti go resgister wit goment or make dem expel dem

translation.en: Ekiti State government has given farmers and herders another two-week window to register with the state government or be ready to leave the state.
translation.pcm: Ekiti State goment don give farmer and herder dem two weeks chance to use resgiter wit di state goment or make dem get ready to leave di state.

translation.en: The two-week grace begins on Sunday, March 22.
translation.pcm: Na Sunday, March 22 di two weeks state.

translation.en: In February, the state conducted a two-week registration of farmers and herders, but not all those involved seized the opportunity.
translation.pcm: Di state conduct two weeks registration for farmer and herder dem for february, but no be evri bodi seize di opportunity

translation.en: He added that the registration was also aimed at ensuring peace between the two groups and bringing incessant clashes between them to an end.
translation.pcm: E add say di registration na also to ensure peace between di two group and bring end to clashes wey dey apun netween dem

translation.en: He noted that the exercise was in consonance with the National Livestock Transformation Programme of the Federal Government.
translation.pcm: E note say di exercise dey consonance wit di National Livestock Transformation Programme wey di Federal goment dey do

translation.en: Dr Adetoyi observed that clashes between farmers and herders posed dangers to human and food security.
translation.pcm: Dr. Adetoye observe say di clash wey dey apun between farmer and herder dem be danger to humanity and food security.

translation.en: Special Adviser to Gov. Kayode Fayemi on security matters and chairman, herders-farmers peace committee, retired Brig.-Gen. Ebenezer Ogundana, warned in the statement that whoever failed to register would be treated as a criminal.
translation.pcm: retired Brig.-Gen. Ebenezer Ogundana wey be Special Adviser to Gov. Kayode Fayemi on security matters and chairman, herders-farmers peace committee warn say persin wey no register, dem go do am like criminal

translation.en: Such persons, he said, would be compelled to leave the state.
translation.pcm: Pipo like dat go commot di state, na wetin e tok

translation.en: Director-General, Office of Transformation and Service Delivery, Prof. Mobolaji Aluko, told the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) that identity cards would be issued to registered farmers and herders free of charge, (NAN).
translation.pcm: Prof. Mobolaji Aluko wey be Director-General, Office of Transformation and Service Delivery, tok give  di News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) say identity card go dey issue to farmer and herder dem wey register for free of charge.

translation.en: On October 13, 2020, President Muhammadu Buhari nominated one of his aides, Lauretta Onochie and three others as commissioners in the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC).
translation.pcm: President Muhammadu Buhari for  October 13, 2020, nominate one of hin aide, Lauretta Onochie and three oda pipo for commissioner in di National Electoral Commission

translation.en: Apart from the chairman of the commission, Professor Mahmoud Yakubu, there are 12 national commissioners that run the administration of the electoral umpire.
translation.pcm: Apart from the chairman of di commission, Professor Mahmoud Yakubu, na 12 national commissioner dey wey dey run di administation of di electoral umpire

translation.en: Yakubu, whose first tenure ended on Monday, November 9, 2020, was re-appointed as the chairman of the commission for a record second term in office.
translation.pcm: Yakubu, wey em first tenure finish for Monday, Novermber 9, 2020, dey re-appointed as chairmo of di commission for second term for insode office

translation.en: There was also the voluntary retirement of Abubakar Ahmed Nahuche, an engineer, thus leaving the electoral impire with six vacant seats for national commissioners.
translation.pcm: Voluntary retirement of Abubakar Nahuche wey be engineer sef dey, which mean say six vacant seats dey for di electoral impire for national commissioners

translation.en: This may have prompted President Buharis nomination of his Special Assistant on Social Media, Lauretta Onochie, for confirmation by the Senate as a national commissioner representing Delta State.
translation.pcm: dis fit prompt President Buharis nomination of hin Special Assistant on Social Media, Lauretta Onochie, for confirmation by di senate for national commissioner wey dey represent Delta State.

translation.en: Others nominated are Professor Mohammed Sani (Katsina), Professor Kunle Ajayi (Ekiti) and Seidu Ahmed (Jigawa).
translation.pcm: Oda pipo wey dem nominate be Professor Mohammed Sani (Katsina), Professor Kunle Ajayi (Ekiti) and Seidu Ahmed (Jigawa).

translation.en: Senate President Ahmad Lawan, on October 13,  2020, while reading the presidents letter of request at plenary in the Senate, said the nomination was pursuant to paragraph 14 of part 1F of the First Schedule of the 1999 Constitution.
translation.pcm: October 13,  2020 wen  Ahmad Lawan wey be Senate President, dey read di president letter of request at plenary in the Senate, tok say di nomination dey  pursuant to paragraph 14 of part 1F of the First Schedule of the 1999 Constitution.

translation.en: Members of civil society organisations who spoke with Daily Trust were unanimous that President Buhari should respect the provisions of Nigerias constitution and without delay.
translation.pcm: Civil society organisation member dem wey tok wit Daily Trust dey unanimous say President Buhari should respect di provisions of Nigeria constitution and make e no delay.

translation.en: Speaking on the development, the executive director, Resource Centre for Human Rights and Civic Education (CHRICED), Dr Ibrahim M. Zikirullahi, told Daily Trust on Sunday that the issue of vacancy at the level of INEC national commissioners is very disturbing.
translation.pcm: Dr Ibrahim M. Zikirullahi wey be di executive director, Resource Centre for Human Rights and Civic Education (CHRICED), tok give  Daily Trust for Sunday say di issue of vacancy for INEC national commissioner level dey very disturbing

translation.en: According to him, if the president is having difficulty in finding the right candidates to fill the vacancies, he could advertise the positions and let qualified people apply.
translation.pcm: According to wetin e tok, if di president dey get difficulty to find di correct candidate to fill di vancancies, make e advertise di position make pipo wey dey qualified apply.

translation.en: To allow a vacuum in an institution very critical to our democracy sends a worrisome signal.
translation.pcm: To allow vacuum for institution wey dey important to awa democracy sey send worrisome signal

translation.en: On the nomination of his aide, which was roundly condemned, the president appears to imply that he does not know people beyond his narrow circle in government.
translation.pcm: On di nomination of hin aide, wey pipo conderm, di president dey look like person wey no know popi for outside hin circle wey dey goment

translation.en: the director of programmes, Yiaga Africa, Cynthia Mbamalu, told Daily Trust that the INEC was yet to be fully constituted since some seats of some national commissioners are vacant.
translation.pcm: Cynthia Mbamalu wey be di director of programmes, Yiaga Africa, tok give Daily Trust say INEC neva dey fully constituted since di seat of some national commissioner don dey vacant

translation.en: The National Assembly has the power to decline to confirm a nominee who does not meet the required criteria to serve as national commissioner.
translation.pcm: Di National Assembly get power to decline and to confirm persin wey meet di require criteria to serve as national commissioner

translation.en: The lawmakers should have screened other nominees who passed the test of non-partisanship and integrity while waiting for a replacement for those who did not pass the test.
translation.pcm: Di lawmaker dem should screen oda nominee wey pass di test of non-partisanship and integrity as dem dey wait for replacement for pipo wey no pass di test

translation.en: This delay has a severe impact on the operations of the INEC, with just 21 months away from the 2023 elections.
translation.pcm: Dis delay get impact on di operations of INEC wit 21 months away from 2023 elections.

translation.en: She added that the appointment of the remaining commissioners was crucial for a duly constituted INEC, which will ensure a successful conduct of the 2023 elections.
translation.pcm: She add say di appointmentof di commisonner wey remain dey crucial for a duly constituted INEC, wey go ensure successful conduct of di 2023 election.

translation.en: She said,It is crucial that the president reconsiders his nomination and increases the number of women as national commissioners.
translation.pcm: she tok say e dey crucial make di president reconsider hin nomination and make e increase di number of woman dem for national commissioner

translation.en: Commenting on the issue, the executive director, Civil Society Legislative Advocacy Centre (CISLAC), Auwal Musa Rafsanjani, said Nigerians had noted Onochies support for President Buhari and other members of the All Progressives Congress (APC).
translation.pcm: Auwal Musa Rafsanjani, wey be di executive director, Civil Society Legislative Advocacy Centre (CISLAC) commenton di matter, E tok say Nigerians don note Onochies support for President Buhari and oda member dem for All Progressives Congress (APC).

translation.en: It is even more important for the president to listen to voices of the civil society and the general Nigerian citizenry to rescind the appointment of Onochie as INEC commissioner.
translation.pcm: Em dey more important make di president listen to voice dem of di civil society and di general Nigerian citizenry to reacind di appointment of Onochie as INEC commissioner

translation.en: Failure to do this would have a negative effect on citizens perception of the commission and its composition, Rafsanjani said.
translation.pcm: If e fail to do am, e go get negative effect on di way citizen dem dey see di commission and di composition, na wetin Rafsabjani tok.

translation.en: When contacted, the Presidency kept mum on the decision of the Senate not to confirm the nominees.
translation.pcm: Wen we contact dem, di Presidency dey quiet on di decision of di senate not to confirm di nominees

translation.en: Senator Babajide Omoworare, the Senior Special Assistant to the President on National Assembly Matters (Senate), neither picked his calls not replied a text message sent to him by our correspondent.
translation.pcm: Senator Babajide Omoworarewey be Senior Special Assistant to the President on National Assembly Matters (Senate), no pick hin calls and e no reply di text message wey awa correspondent send give am.

translation.en: A similar message sent to the Senior Special Assistant to the President on Media and Publicity, Garba Shehu, after phone calls, was not replied at the time of going to press.
translation.pcm: A similar message wey we send to di Senior Special Assistant to the President on Media and Publicity, Garba Shehu, afta phone calls, no get reply at di time of going to press.

translation.en: Secondus accused of N10bn fraud in fresh crisis rocking PDP
translation.pcm: Dem accuse Secondus of N10bn fraud for fresh crises wey dey apun for inside PDP

translation.en: A fresh crisis has hit the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) as the Prince Uche Secondus-led National Working Committee (NWC) of the party has been accused of mismanagement of N10bn generated from the sale of forms for four years.
translation.pcm: Fresh crises don burst for inside pipo Demoratic parti (PDP) as dem don accuse di Prince Uche Secondus-led National Working Committee (NWC) of mismanagement of N10bn wey dem generate from di slaes of forms for years ago

translation.en: The countrys anti-corruption agencies, EFCC and ICPC have been petitioned by one of the chieftains of the party over the matter.
translation.pcm: EFCC and ICPC wey be di anti-corruption agencies for di kontri don get petition wey one of di chieftain dem for di parti write ova di matter.

translation.en: The petitioner, Prince Kassim Afegbua, alleged that the leadership has mismanaged close to N10bn which accrued from the sale of nomination forms for the presidential, gubernatorial, house of assembly and senatorial elections from 2017 to date.
translation.pcm: The petitioner, Prince Kassim Afegbua, allege say di leadership don mismanage close to N10bn wey dem get from di sale of nomination form dem for the presidential, gubernatorial, house of assembly and senatorial elections wey apun for 2017 to date.

translation.en: Responding to the petitioner, the National Publicity Secretary of the PDP, Kola Ologbondiyan, described the claim asspurious andirresponsible.
translation.pcm: the National Publicity Secretary of the PDP, Kola Ologbondiyan wey respond to di petitioner tok say di claim dey asspurious andirresponsible.

translation.en: The PDP did not raise Afegbuas fictitious sum of N10 billion as alleged by him.
translation.pcm: PDP no raise N10bn as Afegbua allege am

translation.en: For the avoidance of doubt, the PDP generated the sum of N4.6 billion and raised a budget for its expenditure.
translation.pcm: To take remove doubt, PDP generate di sum of N4.6 billion and dem raise di budget of dia expenditure.

translation.en: In December 2019, I wrote an article about Thomas Cook, arguably the first-ever travel agency and how that firm accidentally established tourism as we know it today.
translation.pcm: For December 2019, I write article about Thomas Cook, wey be di first-eva travel agency and how dat firm accidentally establish tourism as we know am today

translation.en: Last week, news came out that some $601 million of airline funds were stuck in Africa.
translation.pcm: For last week, we get news say $601 million of airline fund dey stuck for inside Africa

translation.en: In time, Nigerians were given one of the strictest visa regimes to the UAE and we were excluded entirely from certain types of long-stay visas.
translation.pcm: dem give Nigerian dem one of di strictest visa regimes to di UAE and dem exclude dem entirely from certain type of long-stay visa

translation.en: The next level perhaps, is for the UAE to start inviting Nigerians for physical interviews before visas are granted.
translation.pcm: For di next level, na for UAEto start dey invite Nigerian dem for physical interview before dem grant dem visa

translation.en: Europe and the USA remained suspicious and difficult for us to visit.
translation.pcm: Europe and USA dey suspicious and difficult for us to visit.

translation.en: The police in Ogun State have arrested four suspects for abducting a 13-year-old child at Onipanu in Ado Odo/Ota Local Government Area of the state.
translation.pcm: di police wey dey Ogun state don arrest four suspetcts say dem abduct a 13- year old pikin for Ado Odo/Ota local government Area of di state.

translation.en: The suspects are John Nelson (21), Adeleke Ayotunde (29), Adekunle Basit (20) and Abey Fagbemi (20).
translation.pcm: di suspects na John Nelson (21), Adeleke Ayotunde (29), Adekunle Basit (20) and Abey Fagbemi (20).

translation.en: They were arrested following a complaint lodged at the Onipanu Divisional Headquarters by one Adejuwon Odunowo; the father of the victim.
translation.pcm: dem arrest dem based on a complaint wey dem lodged for  di Onipaanu Divisional Headquarters by one Adejumo Odunowo ; wey be di papa for di victim

translation.en: The complainant told the police that his daughter, Susan Odunowo, was sent on an errand by her mother at about 6.pm on May 6, and that she did not return home.
translation.pcm: di complaint tell di police say hin daughter , Susan Odunowo go errand wey her mama send am at about 6.pm for May 6, and say she no no return home

translation.en: He said he later got a call from someone who demanded N500,000 ransom to set the victim free.
translation.pcm: hin tok say hin later get call from persin wey demand N500,000 ransom to set di victim free

translation.en: The spokesman of the police, Abimbola Oyeyemi, told newsmen on Tuesday in Abeokuta that following the report, the DPO of Onipanu, CSP Bamidele Job, detailed his detectives to unravel those behind the act.
translation.pcm: Abimbola Oyeyemi, wey be di tok tok pesin for di police, tell di newsmen on Tuesday for Abeokuta say afta di report , di DPO wey dey Onipaanu, CSP Bamidele Job, detailed hin detectives make dem go unravel those wey dey behind di act

translation.en: According to him, on May 8, the detectives traced one of the suspects to Cele area of Ota where he was arrested.
translation.pcm: according to him, for May 8, di detectives trace one of di suspects to Cele area wey dey Ota where dem arrest am

translation.en: Oyeyemi further said the arrest of the first suspect led to the apprehension of two other members of the gang at a factory in Ota.
translation.pcm: Oyeyemi kontinue tok say di arrest of di first suspect na hin lead to di apprehension of di oda two members for di gang wey dey a factory for Ota

translation.en: He explained the operatives discovered that the victim was being kept in a room owned by Adekunle Basit and that, Detectives swiftly moved in there and rescued the victim unhurt.
translation.pcm: hin explain say na di operatives discova say dem hide di victim for one room wey belong to Adekunle Basit and dat detectives reach there and rescue di victim unhurt

translation.en: The leader of the gang, Abbey Fagbemi, who took to flight immediately he heard of the arrest of his fellow gang members, was later arrested at about 7.am of Monday May 10, 2021.
translation.pcm: dem later catch di leader for di gang, Abbey Fagbemi wey jappa immediately him hear di arrest of hin fellow gangs, at about 7.am for Monday may 10, 2021.

translation.en: transfer of the suspects to the anti-kidnapping section of the state criminal investigation and intelligence department for discreet investigation and prosecution.
translation.pcm: dem transfer di suspects to di anti-kidnapping section for di state criminal investigation intelligence department for discreet investigation and prosecution.

translation.en: Association of Bureaux De Change Operators of Nigeria (ABCON) has charged operators to ensure sound corporate governance practices and improved customer services in their operations.
translation.pcm: association of Bureax De Change Operators For Naija don charge operators make dem ensure sound governance practices and improved customer services for dia operations

translation.en: The ABCON President, Dr. Aminu Gwadabe, gave this charge in Lagos at the opening session of the 2021 Annual ABCON Nationwide Training on BDC Operations.
translation.pcm: The ABCON president,Dr Aminu Gwadabe, gave dis charge for Lagos at di opening session of di 2021 annual ABCON nationwide training on BDC operations

translation.en: It is also to enhance the service delivery to forex end users, noting that BDCs occupy a very important position and play critical roles in the national's foreign exchange market.
translation.pcm: e dey also enhance delivery to forex users, noting say BDC dey occupy role wey dey important and e dey play critical roles for di national foreign exchange market

translation.en: Gwadabe said these roles informed the decision of ABCON to partner with the CBN, NFIU and other security agencies to organise the annual nationwide training on BDC operations.
translation.pcm: Gwadabe say na dis roles inform di decision wey ABCON take go partner with di CBN, NFIU and di oda security agencies to organise di annual nationwide training for BDC operations.

translation.en: He also said the one week training ending on June 30 holds in four locations across the country.
translation.pcm: hin talk say di one week training wey go end for june 30 go hol for four locations across di kontri

translation.en: NDLEA seizes N10bn heroin, khat at Lagos, Kano airports
translation.pcm: NDLEA don seize N10bn heroin, Khat for Lagos, Kano airports

translation.en: Operatives of the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) at the Murtala Muhammed International Airport (MMIA), Lagos and Mallam Aminu Kano International Airport (MAKIA), Kano have seized consignments of heroin and khat with a street value of over N10 billion.
translation.pcm: operatives wey dey National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) for di Muritala Muhammad Airport International Airport (MMIA), Lagos and Mallam Aminu Kno International Airport (MAKIA), kano don seize consignment of heroin and khat wey get street value of over N10billion

translation.en: A sample of the substance in the consignment was sent for laboratory analysis and came out positive to khat, weighing 36kg.
translation.pcm: dem send sample of di consignment wey dem sight to di laboratory and e come out positive to Khat, e weigh 36kg

translation.en: This thus bringing the total weight of illicit drugs seized at the two international airports to 61.3kg he added.
translation.pcm: hin say na dis one bring di total weight of illicit drugs wey dem seize for di two international airports to 61.3kg

translation.en: Luka Istifanus: FCT won't hire athletes to win National Sports Festival medals
translation.pcm: Luka Istifanus: FCT no go hire athletes wey go win National Sports Festive Medals

translation.en: The acting Director of Sports in the FCT, Luka Istifanus has frowned at the reckless poachimg of athletes by the big money spenders as he vowed that the FCT won't go about paying athletes to win National Sports Festival medals.
translation.pcm: Di acting director in sports for FCT, Luka Istifanus don frown at di reckless poaching of athletes by di big money spenders as e don vow say di FCT no go waka about dey pay athletes to win National Sports Festival medals

translation.en: In this interview with Trust Sports, the acting Director spoke on the performance of Team FCT at Edo 2020 and sports development in the Federal Capital Territory.
translation.pcm: For dis interview wey dem get wit Trust sports, di acting director don yarn on top di performance of team FCT for Edo 2020 and sports development for di Federal Capital Territory

translation.en: How has it been since you assumed office as the acting Director of Sports in the FCT?
translation.pcm: How e dey go as you don resume office as di acting Director of Sports in di FCT?

translation.en: I took over as the acting Director of Sports in the FCT on the 8th day of October 2020 and since then my major concern has been how to take sports in the territory beyond where I met it.
translation.pcm: Na me take over as di acting director of sports in di FCT on di 8th day of october 2020 and so tey dat time my major concern na how I go take sports for di Territory beyond wia I meet am

translation.en: It has not been easy because FCT is more or less a civil service settlement.
translation.pcm: E no dey easy unto say FCT dey more or less civil service settlement

translation.en: You cannot compare it with states like Lagos, Kano, Rivers, Edo, Kaduna and others.
translation.pcm: Una no fit compare am wit states like Lagos, Kano, Rivers, Edo, Kaduna and odas

translation.en: However, we are doing everythimg to improve on the achievements we recorded in the past.
translation.pcm: Howeva, we dey do Evrithing wey go help improve di achievements wey we record for past

translation.en: Interestingly, the Federal Capital Territory Administration is solidly behimd us.
translation.pcm: Interestingly, di Federal Capital Territory Administration don stand gidigba for awa back

translation.en: FCT placed 16th on the medals table at the just concluded 2020 National Sports Festival.
translation.pcm: FCT don placed 16th place on di medals table wey dem just conclude for di 2020 national sports festival

translation.en: How satisfied are you with the performance of your athletes?
translation.pcm: How satisfied you dey wit di performance of athletes

translation.en: I must start by saying that I was the happiest person when the administration of the FCT approved that we should participate in the 2020 National Sports festival.
translation.pcm: I suppose start my yarn to say na me be di happiest pesin wen di administration of di FCT approve say make we participate for di 2020 national sports festival

translation.en: Although there is still room for improvement, I will say that I am satisfied with what we were able to achieve.
translation.pcm: Although room still dey for improvement, I go say I dey satisfied wit wetin we achieve

translation.en: Looking back, we have always the been 17th, 18th or 19th apart from when we hosted the sports festival in 2004 and 2018.
translation.pcm: As we dey look back, na we dey always be di 17th, 18th or 19th apart from wen we host sport festival for 2004 and 2018

translation.en: You know when you are the host, you have so many advantages.
translation.pcm: una know say if una be di host you get advantage wey plenti

translation.en: You can patronise as many events as possible.
translation.pcm: una fit patronise as many events as e possible

translation.en: You can register as many athletes as you want.
translation.pcm: you fit register as many athletes wey you want

translation.en: However, when you are going out, you have to cut down the number of events and athletes to minimise cost.
translation.pcm: however, wen una dey go out una go cut down di number of events and athletes to minimise cost

translation.en: So I am happy that this time around, we didn't host but ended up in the 16th position despite the enormous challenges we faced.
translation.pcm: I dey happy say dis time around, we no host but e end up for 16th position despite di enormous challenge wey we face

translation.en: Two states, the host Edo and Delta battled for supremacy and that impacted negatively on officiating.
translation.pcm: two states, di host Edo and Delta dey battle for supremacy and na dat dey impact negatively for officiating

translation.en: We could have performed even better but questionable officiating denied us so many medals.
translation.pcm: we suppose perfom better but na officiating wey dey questionable deny us for plenti medals

translation.en: We were not the only victims of the supremacy tussle between Edo and Delta.
translation.pcm: no be only us be di victims of di supremacy tussle wey dey between Edo and Delta

translation.en: In all, we are grateful because we performed better than 21 states.
translation.pcm: in all, we dey grateful bikos we do better dan 21 states

translation.en: With the support of the government, we would perform better at Delta 2022.
translation.pcm: wit di support of di goment, we go do better at Delta 2022

translation.en: The National Sports Festival is now open.
translation.pcm: di national sports festival don dey open

translation.en: How did your athletes cope with their more experienced opponents?
translation.pcm: how una athletes take cope wit dia opponents wey get more experience

translation.en: It was not an easy task because some states went as far as the USA, France and Germany to hire athletes.
translation.pcm: the task no dey easy unto say some states don go far as di USA, France and Germany to hire athletes

translation.en: Like in tennis, the player who won the singles event came from France and was paid the sum of N5 million by Delta State.
translation.pcm: as e dey for tennis, di player wey win di singles event na from France and dem pay am a sum of N5 million by Delta state

translation.en: Some states brought as much as 30 professionals outside the country which was a whole lot of money.
translation.pcm: some states don buy so tey 30 proffessional for outside Kontri which be a whole lot money

translation.en: Remember in addition to government money, they have oil companies that are their sponsors.
translation.pcm: Remember in adition to goment money, dem get oil companies wey be dem sponsors

translation.en: But here in FCT, we depended solely on government funding.
translation.pcm: For FCT here, na goment funding we depend on solely

translation.en: A state gave as much as N15m to one of its officials to monitor proceedings for it in combat sports.
translation.pcm: one state don give official money wey reach N15m make e go use am monitor proceedings for combat sports

translation.en: That is the money that some states struggled to get to attend the festival.
translation.pcm: na di money wey some states struggled get to attend the festival

translation.en: For us, even before we left for Benin City, our minister charged us to be responsible to our behaviours, to be worthy ambassadors.
translation.pcm: for us, even before we go Benin city, minister don charge us make we dey responsible to ur behaviors and be worthy ambassadors

translation.en: He advised that we shouldn't try to win by all means.
translation.pcm: hin advised say make we no try win by all means

translation.en: That was his farewell message to us and we abided by it.
translation.pcm: na hin farewell message to us and we abided by it

translation.en: We didn't go outside FCT to look for athletes.
translation.pcm: we no go outside FCT go look for athletes

translation.en: It has been the policy of the FCT to raise athletes from the grassroots and expose them for national and international competitions.
translation.pcm: e don become di policy of di FCT to raise athletes and expose dem for national and international competitions

translation.en: That was exactly what we did.
translation.pcm: na dat exact thing we do

translation.en: our father can you hear please give us good chidlren and after giving us good children give us money to take care of them
translation.pcm: Pale una dey hear, abeg give us good pikin afta una don give us good pikin give us money wey we go use take care of dem

translation.en: Do you support calls in some quarters for the National Sports Festival to be returned to when it was strictly for amateurs?
translation.pcm: se una support calls in some quarters for di National Sports Festival make dem return am wen e suppose dey for amateurs strictly

translation.en: Don't throw this golden opportunity
translation.pcm: no throw-way dis golden opportunity

translation.en: The biggest disadvantage is that it is making coaches to be lazy.
translation.pcm: di advantage wey big pass be say e dey make coach lazy

translation.en: The Coaches are paid salaries but when it is time for the sports festival, they are given money to go round and poach athletes from other states.
translation.pcm: dem dey give coach salary but wen e reach sports festival time dem go give dem money wey dem go use go oda states go poach other athletes

translation.en: I remember during the 2018 edition, some athletes were forced to refund as much as N1m for failing to deliver medals to states that contracted them.
translation.pcm: i remember di 2018 edition , dem force some athletes make dem refund as much as N1m on top say dem fail to deliver medal for di states wey give dem contract

translation.en: This is definitely not helping in the development of talents.
translation.pcm: true true dis no help in di development of talents

translation.en: That was how he was eliminated
translation.pcm: Na so dem eliminate am

translation.en: That was how so many other players were denied the opportunity to exhibit their talents.
translation.pcm: Na so dem deny oda players di opportunity wey go exhibit dia talent

translation.en: The sports festival is now for the highest bidder but FCT won't buy medals.
translation.pcm: Di sports festival don dey for di highest bidder but FCT no go buy medals

translation.en: We don't have money to hire athletes to win medals.
translation.pcm: We no get money wey we go use take hire athlethes wey go win medals

translation.en: We shall continue to raise our own local athletes.
translation.pcm: We go kontinu dey raise local athletes wey be awa own

translation.en: He who has God on his side
translation.pcm: Pesin wey get God for hin side

translation.en: Honestly, we must go back to the grassroots.
translation.pcm: True, true we suppose go back to di grassroots

translation.en: FCT has 62 wards.
translation.pcm: Na 62 wards FCT get

translation.en: Each area council has 10 words except AMAC that has 12.
translation.pcm: Na evri council area get 10 words except AMAC wey get 12

translation.en: Sports development must start from the ward level.
translation.pcm: Sports development suppose start from di ward level

translation.en: In the past, FCT organised so many competitions from the ward level but mostly in team sports like football, handball, volleyball and athletics.
translation.pcm: For di past, FCT don organised so many competitions from di ward level but mostly dey team sports like football, handball, volleyball and athletics

translation.en: These are events that are not capital intensive.
translation.pcm: Na events wey no dey capital intensive be dis

translation.en: We usually start from the wards to the area council headquarters and to the city centre.
translation.pcm: We dey always start from di wards to di area council headquarters and to di city centre

translation.en: This is the platform that has continued to generate athletes for the FCT.
translation.pcm: Na dis be di platform wey dey kontinue to dey generate athletes for di FCT

translation.en: So I am calling on other states to emulate the FCT in developing their own athletes.
translation.pcm: So i dey call oda states make dem emulate di FCT wen dem wan develop dia own athletes

translation.en: As we areTalking of developing athletes, would you say there are enough and standard sporting facilities in the FCT?
translation.pcm: As we dey tok of developing athletes, you fit tok say enough standard sporting facilities dey FCT?

translation.en: We have six sports centres that are under construction in each of the six area councils.
translation.pcm: We get six sports centres wey dey under construction for each of di six area councils

translation.en: Already, we have made a strong appeal and the Hon.
translation.pcm: Already, we don make one strong appeal and di hon

translation.en: Minister of State, Dr. Ramatu Tijjani Aliyu has already visited some of the facilities.
translation.pcm: Minister of state, Dr Ramatu Tijani Aliyu don already go some of di facilities

translation.en: She has been to Kuje and AMAC and is planning to go to Bwari and others to see the level of development.
translation.pcm: She don go Kuje and AMAC and she dey dey plan to go to Bwari an odas go see di level of development

translation.en: With the backing of the Honourable Minister, Alhaji Mohammed Musa Bello, she is doing everythimg to ensure these facilities are completed.
translation.pcm: wit di backing of di honourable minister, Alhaji Musa Bello, she dey do Evrithing wey go make sure say dem complete diz facilities

translation.en: We have also made requests for sporting equipment in sports like karate, judo, boxing, wrestling and a host of others.
translation.pcm: We don also make request for sporting equipments for sports like Karate, Judo, Boxing, Wrestling and a host of odas

translation.en: We are expecting favourable responses.
translation.pcm: Na dey expect favourable responses

translation.en: What are the plans for the next edition of the sports festival?
translation.pcm: Na wetin be di plan for di next edition for di sports festival

translation.en: We have started training already because the next edition is less than one and half year away.
translation.pcm: We don already start training bikos di next edition no reach one year

translation.en: So we have started preparations and we have since made requests and recommendations to enable us to prepare adequately for Delta 2022.
translation.pcm: We don start preparations and we make requests and recommendations wey go enable us prepare adequately for Delta 2022

translation.en: We need to imbibe the lessons of Ramadan
translation.pcm: We need to dey imbibe di lessons of Ramadan

translation.en: There is a need to pay more attention to the plight of the poor.
translation.pcm: Need dey make dem pay more attention to di plights of di poor

translation.en: The Muslims holy month of self- purification and self- denial otherwise known as Ramadan has just ended.
translation.pcm: Di Muslim month of self-purification and self-denial wey dem also know as Ramadan just end

translation.en: While it lasted, the season of fasting and prayer offered all Muslims the opportunity to reflect on their relationship with Allah.
translation.pcm: As e dey last, di season wey dem dey use fast don offer all Muslims opportunity wey dem go use reflect on dia relationship wit Allah

translation.en: It also enabled those with means to share food with the poor, the needy and the less privileged.
translation.pcm: E don also enable those wey get means to share food wit pipo wey poor, wey dey in need and pipo wey be less priviledged

translation.en: For all Muslims, it was an opportunity to rededicate themselves to the teachimgs of the faith and the cause of mankind as a whole.
translation.pcm: For all Muslims, e be opportunity wey dem go use rededicate demsef to di teachings of di faith and di kos of mankind as a whole

translation.en: Altogether, it was a period of deep reflection on the inter-relationship between man and his neighbour, on the one hand, as well as man and his God.
translation.pcm: Although e be period of deep reflection on di inter-relationship wey dey between man and hin neighbour, for di oda hand, as well as man and hin God

translation.en: Even though the month-long fasting has come and gone, its lessons must endure.
translation.pcm: Even though di long-fasting don go, di lessons must endure

translation.en: As one of the five pillars of Islam, Ramadan has a highly spiritual significance.
translation.pcm: Ramadan get high spritual significance , na one of si five pillars of Islam be dat

translation.en: To devotees, it was a period of self-emptying without which no spiritual being can have a truly rewarding relationship with his or her maker.
translation.pcm: To devotees, e be period of self-emptying witout which no spiritual being go get a truly rewarding relationship wit hin maker

translation.en: That explains why the exercise was marked in Nigeria (as elsewhere in the world) by private and group prayers, and abstinence from all forms of worldly comforts and pleasures.
translation.pcm: Na dat explain why dem mark di exercise for Nigeria (as elsewia in di world) by private and group players, and abstinence from all forms of wordly comforts and pleasures

translation.en: The aim was to enhance spiritual growth and foster charity and brotherly love.
translation.pcm: di aim Na to enhance spiritual growth and foster charity and brodaly love

translation.en: As the Muslims therefore mark the end of this annual spiritual exercise, it is hoped that the outcome will be of immense benefit to the nation.
translation.pcm: As di Muslims don mark di end of dis annual spiritual exercise, dem dey hope say make di outkom go be of immense benefit di nation

translation.en: Nigerians can hardly make ends meet due to the prevailing economic situation in the country.
translation.pcm: Naija pipo can hardly make ends meet due to di economic situation wey dey prevail for di Kontri

translation.en: By paying attention to the plight of the poor, as was amply demonstrated in the course of Ramadan, we invariably place the welfare of our neighbour as important as ours.
translation.pcm: As we dey pay attention to di plights of di poor, as dem amply demonstate am for di course of Ramadan we dey invariably place di welfare for awa neighbours say e dey important as awa own

translation.en: By allowing others to partake of our wealth or material possessions, we honour the One who made us
translation.pcm: As we dey allow odas partake for awa wealth or material possessions, we honour di one wey make us

translation.en: This happens to be at the heart of all religions but a virtue hardly imbibed by many in Nigeria today.
translation.pcm: Na dis be di heart of all religions but a virtue wey dey hard to imbibe by plenti pipo for Naija

translation.en: That must change.
translation.pcm: E gast change

translation.en: Since the Ramadan fast, like the other four pillars of Islam, was aimed at promoting both the spiritual and material wellbeing of man, it stands to reason that man is invariably better off doing the will of God
translation.pcm: So tey di Ramadan fast, like di fawa pillars wey dey Islam, dem aim am at promoting both di spiritual and material well-being of man, e stand to reason say man dey invariable beta off s e dey do di will of God

translation.en: When he is able to rein in the impulse for self- gratification and greedy accumulation of wealth, man is more liable to make his society a better place to live in, not only for himself but also for his neighbour.
translation.pcm: Wen he dey able to rein in di impulse for self-gratification and greedy accumulation of wealth, man dey more liable to make hin society a better place wey pesin go live in, no be only hin but for hin neighbor also

translation.en: That for us was one of the most enduring lessons of Ramadan which we hope many would have imbibed.
translation.pcm: Dat na one of di most enduring lessons of Ramadan wey we hope plenti pipo go imbibe

translation.en: It is noteworthy that fasting as a spiritual exercise is advocated by all religions ostensibly with the notion that the man who can make sacrifices in the bid to tame his desires would be a better person both for himself and the larger society.
translation.pcm: E dey noteworthy dat fasting as e be spiritual exercise dey advocated by all religions obstenibly wit di notion say di man wey fit make sacrifices for di bid to tame hin desires go be beta person for hinself and di society wey large

translation.en: As one expert puts it, besides abstention from food and drink, fasting helps the faithful from looking at the provocative, from hearing the mischievous, and from uttering the obscene o avoid slander and from thimking about inflicting injury to others
translation.pcm: As one expert don put am say, besides abstention for food and drinks, fasting dey help di pesin wey dey faithful make e no dey look di provocative, make e no dey hear di mischievous, and make e no dey utter di obscene and make e dey avoid slander and make e no dey think about inflicting injury for odas

translation.en: The month of Rahmah (blessing), Barakah (mercy), and Magfirah (forgiving) is upon us.
translation.pcm: Di month of Rahmah (blessing), barakah(mercy)and Magfirah dey upon us

translation.en: The blessed month is a precious gift from Allah SWT to Muslims.
translation.pcm: Di blessed month na precious gift from Allah to muslims

translation.en: But do we know exactly why this month is so special to Muslims?
translation.pcm: But do we know why dis moth dey so special to muslims

translation.en: What exactly is the purpose of this month, and all the blessings associated with it?
translation.pcm: Na wetin be di main koko for dis month, and all di blessings wey dey wit it

translation.en: What are the lessons we are supposed to take away in observing the sanctity of this month?
translation.pcm: Na wetin be di lessons wey we suppose take away in observing, di sanctity wey dey dis month

translation.en: Of course, this blessed month exists to train us, to guide us, and to remind us of how we should approach the remaining 11 months of the year.
translation.pcm: Of course, dis month dey to train us, guide us, and to remind us of how we suppose approach di 11 months of di year wey remain

translation.en: Ramadan imparts upon us numerous lessons: How to develop our manners and moral fortitude, how to treat our fellow human beings with respect, how to strengthen our brotherhood, how to maintain unity among the Muslim community, and how to be welcoming to all the non-Muslims who share this land with us.
translation.pcm: Ramadan dey teach us plenti lessons: how we go develop awa manners and moral fortitude, how we go treat awa fellow beings wit respect, how we go strenghten awa brodahood , how we go maintain unity wey dey di Muslim community, and how we go dey welkom di non-Muslims wey we dey share land togedir

translation.en: The month also teaches us to be more pious, disciplined, and how to maintain self-control, while shielding our souls from greed and immorality.
translation.pcm: Di month dey also tech us make we dey more pious, disciplined, and how we go maintain self-control, wen we dey shield awa souls from greed and immorality

translation.en: But, most importantly, the month teaches us how we can improve our connection with the Almighty.
translation.pcm: But di main koko be say di month dey teach us how we fit improve awa connection wit di Almighty

translation.en: The month of Ramadan also instills a sense of empathy withim us.
translation.pcm: Di month of Ramadan dey also instill sense of empathy wey dey inside us

translation.en: It allows us to understand the situation of the less fortunate, to feel and experience the pain of hunger and the pangs of thirst that our poverty-stricken brothers and sisters who are often forced to go without food and drink feel every waking day.
translation.pcm: E dey allow us to understand di situation of di less fortunate, make we feel and experience di pain of hunger and di pangs of thirst wey awa poverty-stricken brodas and sisters wey no get choice but to go witout food and drinks dey feel everi day wen dem wake

translation.en: Ramadan is a month of mercy and bonding â€” Muslims all over the world help one another, and those outside their community, spreading happiness all around.
translation.pcm: Ramadan na month of mercy and bonding Muslims wey dey all over di world dey help one anoda, and those wey dey dia community, make dem dey spread happiness all around

translation.en: This month is a shiming example of the unity that can be achieved among all classes of people in any society, as the rich and the poor, the employer as well as the employee; the parents as well as the child, the ruler as well as the subjects, all keep fast.
translation.pcm: Dis month na shinny example for di unity wey we fit achieve among all classes of pipo wey dey any society as di rich and di poor, di employer as well as di employee; di parents as well as di subjects, all dey fast

translation.en: Regardless of the colour of their skin or their social stature, fasting unites us all.
translation.pcm: Regardless of di colour wey dem get for skin or dia social stature, na fasting dey unite all

translation.en: It reminds us how we should conduct ourselves and our behaviour towards those around us, while also teachimg us the importance of respect.
translation.pcm: E dey remind us how we suppose conduct awaselves and awa behaviour towards those wey dey around us while e dey also teach us di impotance of respect

translation.en: Not only do we learn to abstain from food and drink, but we also abstain from making any statements and actions that may cause harm to people or violate their rights.
translation.pcm: No be to dey abstain from foods and drinks we learn, but we also abstain make we no go make statements and actions wey fit kos harm to pipo or violate rights wey dem get

translation.en: It gives us an opportunity to rectify ourselves through performing numerous good deeds such as providing food or aid to the needy, improving social interaction, giving charity, sadaqah and zakat, and so on.
translation.pcm: E dey give us opportunity wey we go use rectify awaselves through performing plenti good deeds wey be like providing food or aid to di needy, improving social interaction, giving charity, sadaqah and zakat, and so on

translation.en: And all of these deeds will be remembered on Judgment Day by the Almighty.
