translation.pcm: Di Almighty go remember all di deeds wey do for judgement day

translation.en: But what happens to all these lessons after Ramadan?
translation.pcm: But wetin go apun to all di lesson wey we don learn afta Ramadan

translation.en: Unfortunately, we seldom retain any of the lessons we learn on this holiest of months beyond Eid-Eil-Fitr itself.
translation.pcm: Unfortuntely, we no too dey retain any of di lessons wey we learn for dis holy month pass Eid-Il-Fitr itself

translation.en: But the purpose of Ramadan runs deeper than mere celebration.
translation.pcm: But di koko for Ramadan run deep pass mere celebration

translation.en: The lessons we receive are the lodestar for the rest of the 11 months in any given year.
translation.pcm: Di lessons wey we receive be di lodestar for di rest of di 11 months for any year wey dem give

translation.en: The training we receive is meant to improve us as human beings for the rest of our lives, as that is the true purpose of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: Di training wey we receive suppose improve us as human beings fo di rest of awa lives, as dat na di main koko of Ramadan

translation.en: After the month is over, and we have all observed our final fast, and the Eid celebrations are dealt with, we will all return to our normal lives.
translation.pcm: Afta di month don end, and we don observe awa final fast, and dem don deal wit di Eid celebrations, we go go back to awa normal lives

translation.en: But, it is important that we keep the spirit of Ramadan alive for the rest of the year, and indeed the rest of our lives.
translation.pcm: But e dey important make we kip di spirit of Ramadan alive for di rest of di year, and indeed for awa live wey remain

translation.en: Because it is only through unity, modesty, and temperance that we can make the world a better place for all of us.
translation.pcm: bikos, na only through unity, modesty, and temperance we fit make di world a place wey beta for all of us

translation.en: All said, the nations leaders, political and otherwise, have much to take from the lessons of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: As we don tok evri evri, di nation leadres, political and odawise, get plenti wey dem go take from di lessons of Ramadan

translation.en: If they can curtail their materialistic tendencies and pay more attention to the yearnings of the people, the country will certainly become a much happier place for everyone.
translation.pcm: If dem fit curtail deir materialistic tendencies and pay more attention to di yearnings fo di pipo , di Kontri go bikom a place much happier for Evribodi

translation.en: We therefore urge our leaders to imbibe the lessons of Ramadan.
translation.pcm: We direfore dey urge awa leaders make dem imbibe lessons for Ramadan

translation.en: To our numerous Muslim readers we say, Eid Mubarak.
translation.pcm: To awa plenti Muslim readers we tok say , Eid Mubarak

translation.en: May Allah reward your sacrifice.
translation.pcm: Make Allah reward una sacrifice

translation.en: Ibrahim Adbon writes from Abeokuta, Ogun State.
translation.pcm: Ibrahin Adbon dey write from Abeokuta, Ogun state.

translation.en: Column No.6: Who's checking checkpoints in Abuja?
translation.pcm: Column no 6: who dey check checkpoint for Abuja

translation.en: It goes without saying that Abuja, being the capital city of our dear nation Nigeria, is important.
translation.pcm: E dey go as dem dey tok am say Abuja, wey be di capital for awa dear Naija, dey important

translation.en: So I will be the last person to complain about security being too much.
translation.pcm: So na me go be di last person wey go complain say security too much

translation.en: In fact, I would even say it needs to be more.
translation.pcm: In fact, I go even tok am say e need am more

translation.en: Checkpoints, those incredibly useful security constructs, have helped and continue to help to either thwart criminals, or even proactively tackle crime.
translation.pcm: Checkpoints, wey be di incredibly useful security constructs, don help and e still dey kontinue to help make e either thwart criminal, or even proactively tackle crime

translation.en: The police, saddled with most of internal security, at least in the ideal situation, man most of the checkpoints in Abuja metropolis, as well as surrounding areas.
translation.pcm: Di police, wey dem saddle wit plenti of di internal security, at least for di ideal situation, man most of di checkpoints for Abuja Metropolis, as well as areas wey dey di surrounding

translation.en: Sure, the army picks up the slack in some places, but the boys in blue are supposed to be the main custodians.
translation.pcm: Sure, di army don pick up di slack for some places, but di boys supose be di main custodians

translation.en: They are mad at the kids for doing such a thing
translation.pcm: Dem vex for di pikin say dem do dat kain thing

translation.en: boy do they mess thimgs up in a lot of cases.
translation.pcm: Boy, dem dey mess things up for plenti cases

translation.en: For starters, take for instance one of the checkpoints in Wuse II, particularly the one leading from Zone 4 to Wuse II, just before the bridge.
translation.pcm: For starters, take for instance one of di checkpoints wey dey Wuse II, particularly di one wey dey lead from zone 4 treach Wuse II , just before e reach di bridge

translation.en: The conduct of the officers there, from my experience, is abysmal.
translation.pcm: di conduct of di officers for dere, for my experience, dey abysmal

translation.en: Anyone who plies that road after 9pm their resumption time will echo what I am saying.
translation.pcm: anyone wey ply dat road afta 9pm

translation.en: I won't go into details, but what I can say is that it sometimes is extremely unprofessional.
translation.pcm: I no go enta details, but wetin I fit tok be say e dey extremely unprofessional sometimes

translation.en: Still in Wuse II, just beside AP plaza, the story is the same.
translation.pcm: still for Wuse II, just beside di AP Plaza, di Tori na di same

translation.en: I would like to suggest to the higher-ups to monitor all the checkpoints in Wuse II to see firsthand what I mean.
translation.pcm: I go lyk suggest to di higher-ups make dem monitor all di checkpoints wey dey Wuse II make dem see wetin I dey tok firsthand

translation.en: But the checkpoint horror stories don't end there.
translation.pcm: but di checkpoints horror Tori no end for there

translation.en: Probably the worst of them all is the checkpoint after the traffic lights at the popular Banex Junction, which is manned by cops from the Counter Terrorism Unit (CTU), no less.
translation.pcm: probably di one wey worst pass na di checkpoint wey dey afta di popular Banex junction wey dem dey man by cops wey dey from di Counter Terrorismm Unit (CTU) no less

translation.en: Barking at commuters and intimidating innocent citizens every night, they cut a picture of a poorly-trained and badly-behaved set of individuals who seem to miss the point that theyâ€™re supposed to protect and serve citizens.
translation.pcm: barking at commuters and intimidating innocent citizens evri night, dem cut a picture of a poorly-trained and badly-behaved set of individuals wey seem to miss di point say dem suppose protect and serve citizens

translation.en: The same CTU is also responsible for the personnel manning a checkpoint near the Nigerian Army Farms and Ranch Ltd. (NAFARLS), where all kinds of thimgs unfold.
translation.pcm: na di same CTU dey responsible for di presonnel manning for one checkpoint wey dey near di Naija Farms And Ranch (NAFARLS), wia all kain tinz dey unfold

translation.en: Anyone plying that road can see for themselves.
translation.pcm: anyone wey dey ply dat road fit see for demselves

translation.en: I'll also request the higher-ups to do the same, with a view to fixing thimgs.
translation.pcm: I go also request make di higher-ups do di same, wit a view wey dem go use fix things

translation.en: Forget Abuja for a minute
translation.pcm: forget Abuja for one minute

translation.en: Look around Nigeria, and the many checkpoints roadblocks, really on highways across the country by numerous security agencies, are generally seen as reasons for loss of time, or even increased prices of consumer goods and services.
translation.pcm: look around Naija, and di plenti checkpoints roadblocks, really for highway across di Kontri by numerous security agencies, dem dey see am a reson for loss of time generally, or even for consumer goods and services

translation.en: As is the case with our security organisations, they always push back swiftly, with well-oiled PR machimes denying allegations or issuing veiled threats.
translation.pcm: as di case be wit awa security organisations, dem dey always push back swiftly, wit well-oiled PR machines wey deny allegations or issuing veiled threats

translation.en: Don't forget the fact that while many checkpoints might be legal, many are not.
translation.pcm: no forget di fact say while plenti checkpoints fit be legal, plenti are not

translation.en: That is made clear by the way and manner in which the personnel mounting it carry out their activities.
translation.pcm: dem make am clear by di way and manner in which di personnel mounting dey carry out dia activities

translation.en: Now, this isn't a police-bashing piece.
translation.pcm: now, dis no be police-bashing piece

translation.en: It's also not meant to disparage VIOs and FRSC personnel.
translation.pcm: E no suppose disparge VIOs and FRSC personnel

translation.en: It's a general critique of checkpoints and how we do them in this part of the world.
translation.pcm: E be general critique for checkpoints and how we dey do am for dis part of di world

translation.en: Which means we will have to look at others, like the Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) and that of VIOs
translation.pcm: which means we go look at odas, lyk di Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC) and dat of VIOs

translation.en: Again, I will not say too much, just to suggest closer monitoring of the checkpoints snap checkpoints, really for some really shocking revelations.
translation.pcm: again, I no go yarn too much, just make I suggest closer monioring of di checkopints and checkpoints, really for some revelation dey shock

translation.en: This is because this isn't a piece meant to disparage anyone or any organisation.
translation.pcm: dis na bikos dis no be piece wey suppose disparge anyone or any organisation

translation.en: But can someone do somethimg about the ridiculous lack of quality of our checkpoints, generally?
translation.pcm: but generally someone fit do something about di ridiculous lack of quality of awa checkpoints?

translation.en: Checkpoints aren't recent, as far as innovations go.
translation.pcm: checkpoints no be recent, e far as innovations go

translation.en: There are set standards for the various types that exist, and all we need to do is to adhere to them.
translation.pcm: dem be set standards for di various stypes wey exist, wetin we need do na to adhere to dem

translation.en: They are quite helpful in fighting crime, and so we cannot wish them away.
translation.pcm: dem dey quite helpful for fighting crime, we no fit wish dem away

translation.en: But we owe it to ourselves to get them right.
translation.pcm: But we owe to awaself to get dem right

translation.en: They, , like most thimgs, have the capacity for great good, but if handled badly, can be the source of a lot of very bad thimgs.
translation.pcm: like most things dem get di capacity for great good, but if to say dem handle am badly, e fit be source for plenti bad things

translation.en: Maybe focusing on the ones in Abuja will help us, as best practices spread nationwide.
translation.pcm: maybe if we focus on di one wey dey Abuja go help us, as best practices don dey spread nationwide

translation.en: I have no interest in highlighting the bad, but the personnel at checkpoints in Abuja make that inevitable.
translation.pcm: I no get interest in highlighting di bad, but di personnel wey dey di checkpoint dey make am inevitable

translation.en: But all hope is not lost: I am hoping that somehow, someone, somewhere who can do somethimg about our checkpoints will do somethimg about them.
translation.pcm: as all hope neva lost: I dey hope say somehow, someone, somewia wey fit do something about awa checkpoints go do something dem

translation.en: That someone, somewhere, somehow, is checking our checkpoints, and the people that man them.
translation.pcm: dat someone, somewia, somehow, dey check awa checkpoints, and di pipo wey dey man dem

translation.en: It might make all the difference in our safety and public perception about our security personnel, which is something we've been sorely lacking for a long time now.
translation.pcm: e fit make all di difference in awa safety and public perception about awa security personnel,wey be something we dey lack solely for a while now

translation.en: Glut hits Katsina tomato farmers
translation.pcm: Glut don jam Katsina tomato farmers

translation.en: Farmers and dealers of tomatoes in Katsina State have, in the last two weeks, experienced acute market glut; some of them resorted to sun-drying the produce.
translation.pcm: Farmers and dealers of tomatoes for Katsina state don experince for di past two weeks acute market glut; some don resort to dey sun-dry di produce

translation.en: According to the farmers, they least expected such development, considering the stiff economic condition in the country, high cost and demand of food items, as well as longtime border closure that halted free importation of food items, including tomato paste.
translation.pcm: according to di farrmers, dem no dey expect dat kain development, considering di stiff economic condition wey dey di Kontri, high cost and demand for food items, as well as longtime border closure wey halt free importation of food items wey include tomato paste

translation.en: Shehu Bashiru Danja, a tomato farmer, said they were expecting huge revenue in this period, but their hope was dashed with the recent development.
translation.pcm: Shehu Bashiru Danja, wey be tomato farmer yarn say dem dey expect huge revenue for dis period but dem dash deir hope wit di recent development

translation.en: Many of us targeted Christmas and New Year periods, with the hope to make good sales of the produce, but to our surprise, we ended up with market glut.
translation.pcm: plenti of us don target christmas and New year period, wit di hope say we go make good sales or di produce, but e shock us say we go end up for market glut

translation.en: We are really affected because of the high cost of production that involves fertiliser, seeds, herbicides/pesticides and labour, he said.
translation.pcm: hin tok say e really affect us bikos of di high cost of production wey involve fertiliser, seeds,herbicides/pesticides and labor

translation.en: Bashiru added that since the closure of land borders and the outbreak of COVID-19, the market price of tomato was not as low as N1,000 per big basket until recently.
translation.pcm: Bahiru kom add say since di closure for land borders and di outbreak of COVID-19, di market price for tomato no less pass N1,000 for one basket until recently

translation.en: A big basket of tomatoes was sold between N3,000 and N10,000 last year, a reason many irrigation farmers this season concentrated on tomato production, with the hope that it would yield huge profits than other crops like wheat, Irish potato or cabbage, he added.
translation.pcm: hin kom add for last year say dem sell one big basket of tomatoes between N3,000 and N10,00, one reason wey many irrigation farmers dis season go concentrate on tomato production, and dem dey hope say e go yield huge profits pass crops like wheat, irish potato,or cabbage

translation.en: Hamza Dalhatu, a tomato merchant and farmer said the market glut was borne out of protest against the indiscriminate taxes and levies on the produce in southern markets.
translation.pcm: Hamza Dalhatu, wey be tomato merchant and farmer yarn say dem borne di market glut out of protest against di indiscriminate taxes and levies wey dem put for di produce for Southern market

translation.en: Since last year, there has been an increase in taxes and levies on our goods and trucks in the southern part of the country.
translation.pcm: so tey last year, increase don dey in taxes and levies on awa goods and trucks wey dey di southern part for di Kontri

translation.en: The lingering security issue is also a threat to our merchants; hence they suspended business till things are sort out.
translation.pcm: di security issue wey dey linger be threats to awa merchants; na so dem suspend business till dem sort out things

translation.en: We cannot continue like that.
translation.pcm: we no fit kontinue lyk dat

translation.en: All the cost burdens end up on farmers without considering the cost of production, Dalhatu said.
translation.pcm: Dalhatu tok say, all di cost burden go end up on farmers wey no go consider di cost of production .

translation.en: A check at Danja and Funtua markets revealed that a small basket of tomatoes costs N400 while a big basket was not more than N1,200
translation.pcm: one check for Danja and Funtua market don reveal say one small basket of tomatoes cost N400 wen one big basket no pass N1,200

translation.en: as at last week Friday.
translation.pcm: so tey last week Friday

translation.en: Another tomato dealer, Sani Suleiman Hunkuyi, expressed hope that thimgs would soon normalise as dealers from Lagos and Ibadan have visited some of their members in Sokoto, Kebbi and Zamfara to fashion out new terms for the business.
translation.pcm: anoda tomato dealer, Sani Suleiman Hunkuyi, don express hope say things go soon normal as dealers for Lagos and Ibadan don visit some of dia members wey dey Sokoto, Kebbi, and Zamfara make dem fashion out new terms for di business

translation.en: The market glut of the produce is temporary and farmers will soon continue to reap the maximum benefits of their sweat
translation.pcm: di market glut for di produce be temporary and farmers go soon kontinue dey reap I maximum benefits for dem sweat

translation.en: Suleiman said.
translation.pcm: Suleiman tok say

translation.en: Supreme price: The untold story of policemen killed during #EndSARS protest
translation.pcm: supreme price: di Tori wey dem no yarn of policemen wey dem kill for ENDSARS protest

translation.en: Sergeant Adegoke Ajibola and Corporal Rotimi Oladele ran as fast as their legs could carry them, sought a hiding place, pleaded for their lives as the mob closed in on them.
translation.pcm: Sergeant Adegoke Ajibola and Corporal Rotimi Oladele run as fast as deir legs fit carry,seek for place wey dem go hide, pleaded for deir lives as di mob close on dem

translation.en: Their pleas fell on deaf ears.
translation.pcm: all dia pleas go fall on deaf ears

translation.en: They were dragged, beaten, hit with sticks, knives and any available objects in sight.
translation.pcm: dem drag dem, beat dem, hit dem wit sticks, knives and any objects wey dey available for sight

translation.en: While still begging for their lives to be spared, they were set ablaze on a heap of tyres.
translation.pcm: for di time wey dem still dey beg make dem spare dia lives, dem set dem for fire for one heap of tyres

translation.en: The more the fire raged, their voices were lost in the flames, never to be heard again.
translation.pcm: as di fire dey rage , dia voice lost for di flames, wey dem no go eva hear dem for for life

translation.en: The two men burnt to death on Iwo Road in the ancient town of Ibadan, the third largest city in Nigeria, were not criminals.
translation.pcm: di two men wey dem burn to death for Iwo Road for di ancient town fo Ibadan , wey be di largest city for Naija, no be criminals

translation.en: No, their only crime was that they were crime fighters.
translation.pcm: no, di only crime be say dem be crime fighters

translation.en: A viral video posted by one of the hoodlums showed the despicable scene as the policemen were set ablaze on a heap of used tyres and their bodies shared.
translation.pcm: one video wey go viral by one of di hoodlums show di despicable scene as dem set di policemen ablaze on top a heap of tyres wey dem don use and dem shared dia bodi

translation.en: The two were among the not less than 22 policemen, seven soldiers and 59 civilians killed in October 2020 during the #EndsARS protest, according to the toll announced by President Muhammadu Buhari during an emergency meeting with former Nigerian leaders.
translation.pcm: di two dey among di policemen wey no less 22, seven soldiers and 59 civilians wey dem kill for October 2020 during di ENDSARS protest, according to di toll wey President Muhammadu Buhari announce for one emergency meeting wey hin get wit former Nigerian leaders

translation.en: The #EndSARS was a decentralised social movement and a series of mass protests against police brutality in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: di ENDSARS be decentralised social movement and a series of mass protests gainst police brutality For Naija

translation.en: The slogan calls for the disbanding of the Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS), a notorious unit of the Nigerian police with a long record of abuses.
translation.pcm: di slogan call for make dem disband di Special Anti-Robbery Squad (SARS), wey be one notorious unit of di Nigerian Police and e get long record for abuse

translation.en: The #EndSARS protest, which lasted two weeks, was peaceful until it was hijacked by hoodlums, who looted public and private-owned warehouses, burnt police stations and destroyed property.
translation.pcm: di EndSARS protest, wey last two weeks, dey peaceful until hoodlums wey loot public and private-owned warehouse burn police station and destroy propety hijack am

translation.en: Ajibola and Oladele were not members of the now disbanded SARS, according to official record and findings by our correspondents.
translation.pcm: according to di official record and findings by awa correspondence,Ajibola and Oladele no be members of di SARS wey dem just disband

translation.en: In fact, they were not the regular policemen seen on the road as findings revealed that they were attached to the Operations Department of the Oyo State police command.
translation.pcm: in fact dem no be regular policemen wey dem dey see for road as finding don reveal say dem dey attached to di operation department for Oyo state police command

translation.en: Their area of engagement was usually being on special duty as requested by different companies and organisations, and as approved by the command.
translation.pcm: di area wey dem dey engage dey usually be for special duty as different companies and organisations de request, and as e dey approved by di command

translation.en: They were on their way to such engagement at a fish depot at the Wema Bank area of Gbagi in Ibadan when they met their untimely death.
translation.pcm: dem dey dia way for dat engagement for one fish depot for di Wema Bank area wey dey Gbagi for Ibadan wen dem meet dia untimely death

translation.en: Coincidentally, the 42-year-old Ajibola and his colleague, Oladele, had three children each.
translation.pcm: coincidentally, Ajibola wey be 41 year-old and hin colleague,Oladele, get three pikin each

translation.en: Oladele's wife, Feranmi, had just put to bed their third child, 16 days before the unfortunate incident.
translation.pcm: Oladele's wife, Feranmi,just born dia third pikin 16 days before di unfortunate incident

translation.en: Feranmi, who is an orphan, just as her late husband, said the news of his death shattered her world.
translation.pcm: Feranmi, wey be di orphan, just as her husband wey late, tok say di news of hin death shattered her world

translation.en: Tears welled up her eyes as she recounted the horrifying experience of six months ago.
translation.pcm: tears well up for her eyes as she dey recount di experience of six months ago wey dey horrifying

translation.en: Sensing danger as the #EndSARS protest had turned violent in some areas, Feranmi had pleaded with Oladele to stay at home.
translation.pcm: sensing danger as di EndSARS protest don dey tun violent for some areas, Feranmi don plead make Oladele stay for house

translation.en: The plea was ignored by her husband, who had said he couldn't abdicate his responsibilities as a law enforcement agent.
translation.pcm: her husband ignore her plea, wey say hin no fit abdicate hin responsibilities as a law enforcement agent

translation.en: Undeterred, Feranmi called Oladele's elder sister to intervene, but the late police officer refused all treaties to make him stay at home.
translation.pcm: undettered, Feranmi call Oladele's elder sister make she kom chook mouth for di mata, but di police refuse all treaties wey go make am stay for house

translation.en: After much persuasion, he promised that he would stay in the office.
translation.pcm: afta plenti persuasion, hin promise day hin go stay for di office

translation.en: His sister also asked me to leave him since he said he was not going to the field but the office.
translation.pcm: hin sister say make I leave am since hin tok say no be field e dey go say na di office

translation.en: Four hours after he left the house, I felt that somethimg bad had happened to me.
translation.pcm: four hours afta hin don commot,I kom feel say something don apun to me

translation.en: I could not eat.
translation.pcm: I no fit chop

translation.en: I wasn't okay because I was expecting him to call me, but there was nothimg of such.
translation.pcm: I no dey okay unto say I dey expect make hin call me, but I no see dat kind ti

translation.en: I called him but his phone was not going through.
translation.pcm: I call am but hin phone no go through

translation.en: I then went to meet one of our neighbours to inform her about it, but she said maybe my husband's phone was off because he could not have the time to charge it.
translation.pcm: na so I go meet one of awa neighbawas go inform her about it, but she say maybe my husband's phone don off bikos hin no get time wey e go use charge am

translation.en: Shortly after that, I was outside my room
translation.pcm: shortly, afta dat one, as I dey outside my room

translation.en: and I heard people saying two policemen were killed in town.
translation.pcm: na so I hear as pipo dey tok say dem don kill two policemen for town

translation.en: Not too long, I saw people moving their properties out of the barracks without telling me anythimg.
translation.pcm: e no too far, na so I see pipo wey dey commot dia property out of di barracks and dem no tell me nada

translation.en: They were moving with the fear of possible attack on barracks.
translation.pcm: dem dey move wit fear make dem no go attack di barracks

translation.en: In fact, they were watchimg me because many of them knew my husband had been killed.
translation.pcm: in fact, dem dey watch me bikos plenti of dem don know say dem kill my husband

translation.en: When it was around 8pm when people had left the barracks, I was still waiting for my husband to return home.
translation.pcm: as e be like 8pm wen pipo don commot di barracks, I still dey wait make my husband kom house

translation.en: I just decided to visit the Eleyele headquarters when my sisters came into our house.
translation.pcm: na so I decide say make I visit di Eleyele headquartes wen my sisters enter for awa house

translation.en: She asked me to follow her to her house.
translation.pcm: she say make I follow am go her house

translation.en: I was hearing people saying my husband had an accident.
translation.pcm: I dey hear pipo yarn say my husband get accident

translation.en: That was the last moment I remember.
translation.pcm: na dat be di last moment wey I remember

translation.en: The following day, the oldest man in my family came to meet me and explained that my husband had died.
translation.pcm: di day wey follow, di man wey old pass for my family kom meet me kom explain say my husband don kpeme

translation.en: For more than five days, I didn't know anythimg again, she said.
translation.pcm: she say I no sabi anything for like five days

translation.en: Her words were stopped intermittently as she made unsuccessful attempts to control her tears
translation.pcm: her words stop intermittently as she dey try kontrol her tears unsuccesfully

translation.en: They told us that we just had to accept our fate and move on.
translation.pcm: dem tell us make we accept awa fate and move on

translation.pcm: my last pikin be 16 days wen di tin apun

translation.pcm: dem attack hin for Iwo Road

translation.pcm: hin dey among di two victims wey dem roast for Abayomi

translation.pcm: she kom add, I hear say those hoodlums chop di flesh of my hsuband wit fear all over her

translation.en: you are the boss for this Tarmac
translation.pcm: na una be di boss for dis Tarmac

translation.pcm: Bolanle-Ajibola wey be di wife of sergeant Ajibola kom describe di gruesome murder of her husband as disheartening and disguisting

translation.en: Reluctantly recalling the incident of October 22, Tokede wondered how the standard of humanity had depreciated in the society, warranting human beings to kill and eat the flesh of another.
translation.pcm: reluctantly recalling di inident wey apun for October 22, Tokede dey wonder how di standard for humanity don depreciate so tey human beings go dey kill and chop each oda

translation.pcm: so tey di news wey I hea, dem roast am afta hoodlums don lynch am

translation.en: I felt sad when I heard about it.

translation.pcm: plenti commentators, wey include di goverment and di police authorities agree say dem get justifiable reasons for di EndSARS protests owing to di excess of officers wey dey di unit, but for di heat dem kill many innocent and officers wey dey dedicated

translation.pcm: Mrs Bolanle-Ajibola kom add say dem dey always assign hin for special assignment and hin dey carry hin tasks out dilligently until dem kill am

translation.en: On her part, Mrs Oladele described her husband as a man who was good to motorists and respected others in the discharge of his duties.

translation.pcm: she narrate as tears dey gush from her eyes say, dem no recover di remaining part of hin bodi and deposit am for one morgue

translation.en: It was uncontrollable as she became mute for some minutes before eulogising the late crime detector.
translation.pcm: e dey uncontrollable as she go mute for some minutes before eulogising di late crime detector

translation.en: If not for his good deeds, a Kogi State-born Yakubu Enemali would have been killed after hoodlums attacked the Ojoo division of the Nigeria Police Force, Ibadan during the protest, noted the woman who rescued him.

translation.en: Three policemen were killed in the attack, but Enemali was rescued by a Good Samaritan.
translation.pcm: dem kill three policemen for di attack, but na good samaritan save Enemali

translation.en: Daily Trust gathered that the father of nine was rescued by a woman whom he had helped in the past.

translation.en: The Good Samaritan, who refused to mention her name, for security purposes, confirmed to Daily Trust Saturday that Enemali was axed in the head and shot in his leg when she met him in a pool of blood.

translation.en: Seven months after he was rescued, Enemali is yet to utter a word.

translation.en: He is in pain and can't talk.

translation.en: At the moment, though Enemali can recognise people, he cannot talk, which necessitated the need to undergo Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) brain test at the Chemical Pathology Department of the University College Hospital (UCH), Ibadan to determine the type of surgery to be carried out.
translation.pcm: For di moment, even if to say Enemali fit recognise pipo, hin no fit tok, na dis necessitate di need make e undergo Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) wey be test for di brain for di Chemical Pathology Department for di University College Hospital (UCH), Ibadan make dem determine which kain surgery dem go carry out

translation.en: He was diagnosed with seizures at the MOP and SOP Department of the hospital.

translation.en: According to a medical expert, Dr Mustapha Ajakaiye, seizure is a sudden, uncontrolled electrical disturbance in the brain.
translation.pcm: According to di medical expert, Dr Mustapha Ajakaiye, seizure na sudden, uncontrolled electric disturbance for di brain

translation.en: It can cause changes in behaviour, movements or feelings and levels of consciousness.

translation.en: Six months after the #EndSARS protest which claimed the lives of many policemen, including six officers attached to the Lagos State command, their widows still await promises made to them by both the government and the Nigeria Police Force.
translation.pcm: six months afta di #EndSARS protest wey claim di lives of plenti policemen, including di six officers attached to di Lagos State Command, dia widows stilll dey wait on top di promises wey di goverment and di goverment and di Police force make

translation.en: Since they lost their breadwinners, the plight of these widows can be described as a desperate struggle for survival as they are now left with no other choice but to fend for their children, a task which some of them were not exposed to during the lifetime of their husbands.
translation.pcm: so tey wen dem lose dia breadwinners, we fit describe di plights of dis widows as a desperate struggle for survival as dem no get choice but to fend for dia pikin, one task wey dem neva expose to for dia husbands lifetime

translation.en: A good number of them are presently weighed down by these burdens that were suddenly placed on them by the cold hand of death.
translation.pcm: Di burden wey di cold hands of death place don place for dia hand don weigh plenti of dem down

translation.en: Not able to cope, some of them have relocated to their villages.
translation.pcm: As dem no fit cope, some of dem don commot go dia village

translation.en: The Lagos State Government was said to have given the widows N10million each, but that good gesture had also pitched them against the relatives of their late husbands.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say di lagos state goverment give N10 million each, but dat good gesture don pitch dem against di relatives of dia late husband

translation.en: Our correspondent reliably learnt from some of the widows that the money given to them by the state government was taken away from them by the relatives of their husbands.
translation.pcm: awa corespondent don hear from some of di widows say di relatives of dia late husbands don collect di money wey state goment give dem

translation.en: They alleged that only a fraction of the total amount was later handed over to them by the heads of their respective families.
translation.pcm: dem say na only shikili money dem hand over to dem by di head of di respective family

translation.en: Those who spoke to our correspondent said they were eagerly expecting the scholarship the Police Force promised their children.
translation.pcm: Those wey follow awa correspondent yarn say dem dey expect di schorlarship wey di police force don promise dia children

translation.en: The only way out is the establishment of local storage and processing facilities in producing zones across the country.

translation.en: They are developing Nigeria's gas industry for the domestic market
translation.pcm: Dem dey develop Naija's gas for di domestic market

translation.en: The natural gas industry is a cultured industry that drives innovation and touches nearly every field and aspect of life that we care about.
translation.pcm: di natural gas na one cultured industry wey dey drive innovation and e dey touch nearly Evri field and aspect of life wey we care about

translation.en: From mobile phones to the makeup we wear, to medical devices, bank cards, and even the football we kick around with friends.
translation.pcm: from mobile phones to di makeup wey we dey wear, to medical devices, bank cards, and even di football wey e dey kick around wit friends

translation.en: The industry is one of the building blocks of the thimgs we need and love every day.
translation.pcm: Di industry na one of di building blocks of di things wey we need and love evri day

translation.en: Natural gas is used for transportation, cooking, electricity generation, and manufacturing.
translation.pcm: dem dey use natural gas for transportation, cooking, electricity generation and manufacturing

translation.en: It is used as a raw material for making fertiliser, antifreeze, plastics, pharmaceuticals and fabrics.
translation.pcm: Dem dey use am as raw material wey dem dey use make ferterlizer,antifreeze, plastics, pharmaceuticals and fabrics

translation.en: The steel and paper industries also use natural gas to generate process steam for industrial applications.
translation.pcm: Di steel and paper industry dey also us e natural gas to generate process steam wey dem dey use for industrial applications

translation.en: Existing data shows Africa's largest economy, Nigeria, has the largest natural gas reserves on the continent.
translation.pcm: Data wey dey for ground don show say Africa's largest economy, Naija, get di largest natural gas reserves for di continent

translation.en: With oil, the industry accounts for about 70 per cent of its revenue, making the sector one of Nigeria's best and most sought-after employment sectors.
translation.pcm: wit oil, di industry go account for about 70 per cent of its revenue, e go make di sector one of Naija's best and most sought-afta employment sectors

translation.en: Most of Nigeria's electricity generation is from natural gas, while crude oil is primarily used for power backup.
translation.pcm: plenti of Naija's electricity generation na from natural gas, while dem dey use di crude oil for power backup

translation.en: A forecast by the U.S. Energy Information Administration shows that natural gas will be the largest global electricity generation source.
translation.pcm: one forecast wey di U.S Energy Information Administration do don show say dat natural gas go be di largest elcetricity generation source

translation.en: Natural gas brings with it several quality-of-life environmental benefits because it is a relatively clean-burning fuel.
translation.pcm: Natural- gas dem bring its sevaral quality- of-life environmental benefits bikos e dey relatively clean burning-fuel

translation.en: Globally, the sector is producing millions of jobs, with employment up 40 per cent since the Great Recession of 2008 in the U.S. alone.
translation.pcm: Globally, di sector dey dey produce millions of jobs, ,wit employment wey dey up to 40 per cent so tey di Great Reccession of 008 for di U.S alone

translation.en: Thus, given its existing gas reserves, it will be surprising to see Nigeria not leading the continents gas industry.
translation.pcm: Thus, given di gas reserves wey dey exist, e shock to see say Naija no dey lead di continent gas industry

translation.en: On 29th March 2021, President Buhari launched the country's Decade of Gas.
translation.pcm: President Buhari don launch di kontri's decade of gas, for 29th of March 2021

translation.en: The aim is to transform Nigeria into a gas-powered industrialised economy by 2030.
translation.pcm: Di aim na to transform Naija into a gas-powered industrialised economy by 2030

translation.en: Developing the gas industry will boost other industries through the provision of electricity and raw materials.
translation.pcm: Developing di gas industry go boost oda industries through di provsion of electricity and raw materials

translation.en: Here, we will shed light on three points: some critical gas development policies, the potential benefits of developing the gas industry for the domestic market, and the employment opportunities in the gas industry.
translation.pcm: Here, we go shine light on three points: some gas development policies wey dey critical, di potential benefits of developing di gas industry for di domestic market , and di employent opportunities wey dey gas industry

translation.en: Since the discovery of gas in Nigeria, there have been subsequent attempts to develop the industry.
translation.pcm: So tey di discovery of gas for Naija, subsequent attempts to develop di industry

translation.en: For example, the gas commercialisation and utilisation programmes contributed to reducing gas flaring and increased gas utilisation by about 300 per cent between 1995 and 2017.
translation.pcm: For example, di gas commercialisation and utilisation programmes contributed to reduce gas flaring and increase gas utilisation by about 300 per cent between 1995 and 2017

translation.en: There were gas pipeline projects which concentrated on the western part of the country and the continent.
translation.pcm: there be gas pipeline projects wey concentrate on di western part of di kontri and di continent

translation.en: The first Escravos to Lagos Pipeline System (ELPS) was commissioned in 1989 to supply Lagos and neighbouring South-west states.
translation.pcm: Dem commissioned di first Escravos to Lagos Pipeline System for 1989 to supply lagos and neighboring south-west states

translation.en: Following the success of the ELPS, the government agreed to supply Ghana, Benin, and Togo through the Western African Gas Pipeline, which was commissioned in 2006.
translation.pcm: Afta di success of di ELPS, di goverment agree make dem dey supply Ghana, Benin and Togo through di Western African Gas Pipeline wey dem commission for 2016

translation.en: However, these projects were not favourable to the country's domestic market, given the persistent issues of power in the country.
translation.pcm: Howeva, dis project no dey favourable to di kontri's domestic market, given di persistent issues for power wey dey di kontri

translation.en: Evidently, Nigeria's power sector is challenged with poor electricity facilities, natural gas supply shortages, inefficient distribution network and inadequate transmission system.
translation.pcm: Evidently, Naija's power sector dey challenged wit electricity facilities wey poor, shortage for natural gas supply, distribution network wey dey inefficient and transmission system wey dey inadequate

translation.en: According to the International Energy Agencys 2018 estimate, only 60 per cent of Nigeria make use of natural gas
translation.pcm: Accordig to di 2018 estimate wey di International Energy Agency do, na only 60 per cent of Naija dey use natural gas

translation.en: population had access to electricity.
translation.pcm: population get access to electricity

translation.en: Power shortage has limited the growth of the country's total production across all sectors.
translation.pcm: power shortage don limit di growth for di Kontri's total population for all sectors

translation.en: It has caused many businesses to close or move to neighbouring countries completely.
translation.pcm: E don kos make plenti business close or move completely to neighboring kontries

translation.en: It was challenging for new start-ups and for attracting foreign investment.
translation.pcm: E dey challenge new start-ups and attract foreign investment

translation.en: The lack of electricity has contributed to the high inflation rate as businesses pay for an expensive alternative electricity source, their production cost increases, which increases the prices of goods and services.
translation.pcm: Di lack of electricity don contribute to di high rate of inflation as business don dey pay for expensive alternative electricity source, dia production cost don increase, and e dey increase di price of goods and services

translation.en: To mitigate these issues, the Buhari administration commissioned gas infrastructure projects to promote gas use in the domestic market.
translation.pcm: To mitigate diz issue, di Buhari administration don commision gas infrastructure project make dem promote use of gas for domestic market

translation.en: The projects include the second Escravos to Lagos Pipeline System (ELPS-2), Obiafu Obrikom
translation.pcm: Di projects include di second Escravos to Lagos Pipeline System (ELPS-2) Obiafu Obriko

translation.en: Oben (OB3) gas line and the Ajaokuta to Kaduna to Kano (AKK) gas line.
translation.pcm: Oben (OB3) gas line and di Ajaokuta to Kaduna to Kano (AKK) gas line

translation.en: The AKK gas line project will pass through Abuja from Ajaokuta.
translation.pcm: Di AKK gas line project go pass through Abuja from Ajaokuta

translation.en: Then we will see another line from Abuja to Kaduna, then from Kaduna to Zaria, and from Zaria to Kano.
translation.pcm: Den we go see anoda line from Abuja to Kaduna,, den from Kaduna to Zaria, and from Zaria to Kano

translation.en: With himdsight, these projects should have been done since the turn of the millennium.
translation.pcm: wit hindight, dem suppose do dis projects since di turn of di millenium

translation.en: Nonetheless, these are notable projects and should be appraised with optimism.
translation.pcm: Nonetheless, dem be notable projects and dem suppose praise dem wit optimism

translation.en: The projects are expected to guarantee net investment return.
translation.pcm: Dem expect make di project guarantee net investment return

translation.en: The gas lines will provide gas to cement firms, other industrial concerns, and residential customers.
translation.pcm: Di gas line go provide gas to cement firms, and residential customers

translation.en: The users of compressed natural gas like buses and trucks will be able to buy the product cheaper as its supply increases.
translation.pcm: Di users of compressed natural gas like buses and trucks go dey able to buy di product cheaper as di supply don increase

translation.en: The government is also planning to build three new gas-fired power plants for power generation plants, located in Abuja, Kaduna, and Kano, to use the pipelines gas to generate 3,600 MW power.
translation.pcm: Di governmet dey also plan to build three new gas-fired power plants for power generation plants wey dem fit locate for Abuja, Kaduna, and Kano, make dem use di pipelines gas to generate 3,600 MW power

translation.en: The power plant will provide electricity to households and many industries in the northern part of the country.
translation.pcm: Di power plant go provide electricity for households and many industries wey dey di Northern part of di kontri

translation.en: The benefit of producing a decent amount of power and raw materials from gas will translate to a success story.
translation.pcm: Di benefit for producing a decent amount of power and raw materials from gas go born one success tori

translation.en: For example, resuscitating the textile industry will mean reviving its largest manufacturing sub-sector, which accounted for 22 per cent of employment and 15 per cent of manufacturing value-added in 1984.
translation.pcm: For example, if dem resuscitate di textile industry e go mean say dem dey revive di largest manufacturing sub-sector, wey account for 22 per cent of employment and 15 per cent of manufacturing value-added for 1984

translation.en: In the long run, the tax revenue from the performing industries and employees will outweigh the cost of pipeline projects.
translation.pcm: in di long run, di tax revenue for di performing industries and employees go outweigh di cost of pipeline projects

translation.en: If government policies are successful, all other thimgs being equal, the natural gas industry will be a major source of job opportunities for Nigerian's rising labour force.
translation.pcm: If to say goverment policies dey successful, all oda things as e dey equal, di natural gas industry go be one major source of job opportunities for Naija's labour force wey dey rise

translation.en: The industry has a high concentration of contractors and sub-contractors, with different work split between specialists.
translation.pcm: Di industry get high concentration of contractors and sub-contractors, wit different splits wey dey between specialists

translation.en: The gas industry jobs are characterised as semi-skilled and skilled craft trades positions.
translation.pcm: Dem characterise di industry as semi-skiled and skiled crafts trades positions

translation.en: The jobs in the sector are not restricted to petroleum engineers alone.
translation.pcm: Demmno restrict jobs wey dey di sector to petrolrum engineers alone

translation.en: Many roles do not need special education.
translation.pcm: plenti roles no need special education

translation.en: The skills can be learned on the job, from attorneys to welders to architects, truck drivers, and accountants.
translation.pcm: Di skil na something e fit learn on di job, from attorneys to welders to architects, truck drivers and accountants

translation.en: The industry also pays above minimum wage.
translation.pcm: Di industry dey also pay minimum wage

translation.en: This means that the industry has an enormous opportunity to attract, retain, and develop lifelong careers for individuals as the industry expands.
translation.pcm: E mean say di industry get enormous opprtunity to attract, retain, and developlifelong careers for individuals as di industry dey expand

translation.en: Finding jobs in the industry is similar to other sophisticated, high-tech industries.
translation.pcm: To dey find job for di industry dey similar to oda sophisticated, high-tech industries

translation.en: Employees should have a decent education, some certification as an industry specialist would be an advantage, training and a little experience could go a long way.
translation.pcm: Employees suppose get decent education, some certification as industry specialist go be an advantage, training and experince go go far

translation.en: Therefore, as the government is laying out policies for the Decade of Gas, the opportunity for capacity development is opening.
translation.pcm: therefore, as di goverment dey lay out policies for di Decade of Gas,, di opportunity for capacity development go open

translation.en: The education sector can explore the training curriculum for the industry and ways to attract industry experts who can contribute to capacity development.
translation.pcm: Di education sector fit explore di training curriculum wey dey for di industry and ways wey dem go take use attract industry experts wey go contribute to capacity development

translation.en: In conclusion, The Decade of Gas is a desirable policy.
translation.pcm: In conclusion, di decade for Gas na desirable policy

translation.en: It is an opportunity for Nigeria to develop its gas industry, even though it looks a bit too late for this adminitration.
translation.pcm: E be opportunity for Naija wey dem go use to develop di gas industry, even as e dey look a bit too late for dis administration

translation.en: Thus, the next government and all the relevant stakeholders should consider this ingenuity to transform the country into a gas-powered industrialised economy.
translation.pcm: Thus, di goment wey next and all di relevant stakeholders suppose consider dis ingenuity wey dem go use transform di kontri to a gas-powered industrialised economy

translation.en: Dr Nasir Aminu is the Programme Director, Economics, Cardiff School of Management, United Kingdom
translation.pcm: Dr Nasir Aminu na di programme Director for Economics, Cardiff School for Management wey dey United Kingdom.

translation.en: Kidnapping: Abuja suburb requests police division
translation.pcm: Kidnapping: Abuja suburb dey request for police division

translation.en: Residents of Tungan Maje, a suburb of Gwagwalada Area Council of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), have called on the Inspector General of Police (IGP) to establish a police division to help tackle crime in the area.
translation.pcm: Residents wey dey Tungan Maje, wey be a suburb for Gwagwalada Area Council for di Federal Capital Territory (FCT), don call di Inspector General of Police (IGP) make e establish police division for di area wey go help tackle di crime for di area

translation.en: The community has suffered series of kidnapping for ransom in the past few months and the people say they now live in fear.
translation.pcm: Di community don suffer series of kidnapping for ransom for di past few months and di pipo say dem dey live in fear

translation.en: Some residents who spoke with Daily Trust also expressed desire to meet with the FCT Commissioner of Police, Bala Ciroma.
translation.pcm: Some residents wey follow Daily Trust yarn don express dem desire to meet wit di FCT commissioner for police, Bala Ciroma

translation.en: The Chief of Tungan Maje, Alhaji Salisu Isiaku Naannabi, debunked a newspaper publication that quoted unnamed sources claiming that his people decried the withdrawal of police from the community.
translation.pcm: Di chief for Tungan Maje, Alhaji Salisu Isiaku Naannabi, debunk one newspaper publication wey quote unarmed sources dey claim say hin pipo decried make dem no witdraw police for di community

translation.en: He clarified that the claim that the communitys members paid police N20,000 every day for feeding allowance during their assignment in the area was untrue.
translation.pcm: Hin clarify di claim wey say make di community members dey pay N20,000 Evri day for feeding allowance during dia assignment for di area say e no true

translation.en: He said, The police special squad was not withdrawn from the area but was deployed to Kuje to carry out an assignment
translation.pcm: Hin yarn say , dem no witdraw di police special squad for di area but dem deploy dem go Kuje make dem go do assignment

translation.en: and they would return to the community when they are done.
translation.pcm: And dem go return to di community wen dem don do

translation.en: People are many at the market today because of bonanza
translation.pcm: pipo yakpa for market as per say bonanza dey

translation.en: Sunday, a resident and leader of non indigenes in the community, said the FCT Police Command, the traditional ruler and prominent residents of the community had collaborated to ensure security of the area in the past months.
translation.pcm: Sunday, one resident and leader for non indigenes wey dey di community tok say di FCT police command, di traditonal and prominent residents for di community don collaborate to ensure say security dey for di area in di past months

translation.en: He stressed that the establishment of a police station would go a long way to address kidnapping and armed robbery in the area.
translation.pcm: Hin stress say di establishment of a police station go go far to address kidnapping and armed robbery wey dey di area

translation.en: Barr David Aigbefoh, another resident, who said the community had provided land for the building of the police division, called on the IGP for speedy implementation and construction of the station.
translation.pcm: Barr David Aigbefoh, wey be anoda resident, yarn say di community don provide land wey dem go use take build police division, call on di IGP for speedy implementation and construction of di station.

translation.en: Kim Kardashian officially a billionaire, says Forbes
translation.pcm: Forbe tok say Kim Kardashian don officially be billionaire

translation.en: Kim Kardashian West has been named on the World's Billionaires list for the first by Forbes.
translation.pcm: Dem don name Kim Kardashian West on top di world's billionaires list for di first by Forbes

translation.en: Forbes estimates that Kardashian West is now worth $1 billion, up from $780 million in October, thanks to two lucrative businessesâ€”KKW Beauty and Skimsâ€”as well as cash from reality television and endorsement deals, and a number of smaller investments.
translation.pcm: Forbes don estimate dat Kardashaian West don worth up $1 billion, from $780 million for october, thanks to two lucrative businesses KKW Beauty and skin as well as cash wey kom from di reality television and endorsement deals, and a number of investments wey small

translation.en: The first time she was mentioned in the pages of Forbes in 2011, it was simply a tally of her Twitter followers: 6.6 million, just below Barack Obama and just above Ashton Kutcher.
translation.pcm: Di first time wey dem mention her name for di pages of Forbes in 2011, e tally simply wit her followers wey dey twitter: 6.6 million, wey just dey below Barack Obama and e dey above Ashton Kutcher

translation.en: Five years later, she graced the cover of Forbes thanks to her booming mobile game, which helped her earn $51 million that year.
translation.pcm: As five years don pass, she grace di cover of Forbes thanks to her mobile game wey dey boom, wey help am earn $51 million for dat year

translation.en: Kardashian West founded KKW Beauty in 2017, following the success of her half-sister Kylie Jenner's Kylie Cosmetics.
translation.pcm: Kardashian West find KKW Beaurty for 2017, as e follow di success of her half-sister Kylie Jenner Kylie bikosmetics

translation.en: She borrowed from Kylies playbook, using a similar direct-to-consumer model that relies heavily on social media marketing.
translation.pcm: She borrow Kylie's playbook, as she use one similar direct-to-customer model wey rely on top socail media marketing heavily

translation.en: Her first launch, 300,000 contour kits, sold out withim two hours.
translation.pcm: dem sell her first launch, 300,000 contour kits witin two hours

translation.en: By 2018, the business had expanded into eyeshadows, concealers, lipsticks and fragrances, and was bringing in about $100 million in revenue.
translation.pcm: As 2018, di business don expand into eyeshadows, concealers, lipsticks and fragrance, and e dey bring in about $100 million as revenue

translation.en: It's the first time I've moved away from having licensing deals and transitioned into being an owner, Kardashian West told Forbes in 2017, when she announced her cosmetics line.
translation.pcm: Kim Kardashian West announce her bikosmetics line as she tok say na dat be di first time wey she go commot from having lincensing deals as she transition to owner

translation.en: She cashed in on that ownership last year when she sold 20% of KKW Beauty to cosmetics conglomerate Coty for $200 million, a deal that valued the company at $1 billion.
translation.pcm: She cash in on top di ownership last year wen she sell 20% of KKW Beauty bikosmetics conglomerate copy for $200 million

translation.en: While Forbes estimates that figure is a little bloated Coty, which also bought 51% of Kylie Cosmetics in 2020, is known for overpaying her remaining 72% stake is still worth about $500 million, by Forbes account.
translation.pcm: As Forbes don estimate am say di figure wey dey a little bloated coty, dey also buy 51% of Kylie cosmetics for 2020 dey also overpay 72% stake wey remain still worth to say $500 million, by Forbes account

translation.en: After she slapped him, he became calm
translation.pcm: Afta she give am one slap hin mellow

translation.en: Skims, the shapewear line Kardashian West launched in 2019.
translation.pcm: Skims na di shapewear line wey Kardashian West launch for 2019

translation.en: She raised money from fashion insiders like Net-a-Porters Natalie Massane and Theorys Andrew Rosen, and capitalized on her massive social media following to shill the brand.
translation.pcm: Na she raise money for fashion insiders like Net-a-porters Natalie Massane and diorys Andrew Rosen, and capitalize am for her massive social media as di shill of di brand follow am

translation.en: She now has 69.6 million Twitter followers and 213 million followers on Instagram.
translation.pcm: Now she don get 69.6 million wey dey follow am for twitter and 213 million wey dey follow am for Instagram

translation.en: Skims has been quick on its feet:
translation.pcm: Skims don do shaperly on its feet

translation.en: During the pandemic, when consumers became more interested in comfy clothes for the couch than in smoothimg their stomachs under evening gowns, she swiftly started turning the focus to loungewear.
translation.pcm: For di pandemic, wen consumers dey more interested in comfy clothes for di couch dan in smoothing dia stomach for under evening gowns, she kom start to dey swiftly turn di focus to loungewear.

translation.en: Kardashian West owns a majority stake in closely-held Skims, which hasn't disclosed its revenues.
translation.pcm: Na Kardashian West own majority stake for closely-held skims wey neva disclose its revenue

translation.en: A source familiar with Skims told Forbes about a transaction that values the shapewear company north of $500 million.
translation.pcm: One source wey dey familiar wit Skims yarn Forbes about a transaction wey value di shapewear company north of $500 million

translation.en: As a result, Forbes estimates her Skims stake is worth a conservative $225 million, enough to lift her fortune to $1 billion.
translation.pcm: As a result Forbes don estimate her skims stake say e worth a conservative $225 million wey dey enough to lift her fortune to $1 billion.

translation.en: The rest of Kardashian Wests fortune sits in cash and investments, including real estate.
translation.pcm: Di rest of Kardashian West dey sit for cash and investments and e include real estate

translation.en: Every year since 2012, she has earned at least $10 million pretax, by Forbes count, thanks to paychecks from Keeping Up With the Kardashians, endorsement deals and endeavors like the aforementioned mobile game and her now-defunct Kimoji app.
translation.pcm: evri year so tey 2012, she don dey earn at least $10 million for pretax, by wetin Forbes count, thanks to paychecks from Keeping Up wit di Kardashians, endorsement deals and endeavors like di one wey we mention before, mobile game and her now-defunct Kimoji app.

translation.en: Sheâ€™s also got three properties in Calabasas, northwest of Los Angeles, and a portfolio of blue-chip investments, including shares of Disney, Amazon, Netflix and Adidas that her soon-to-be ex-husband Kanye West gifted her for Christmas in 2017.
translation.pcm: She also get three properties for Calabasas wey dey Northwest of Los Angeles and one portfolio of blue-chip investments wey include shares of Disney, Amazon, Netflix and Adidas wey her soon-to-be ex-husband Kanye West gift am for Christmas for 2017.

translation.en: But its the companies that she has launched herself, and grown with the typical Kardashian flare for self-promotion, that land her on the Worlds Billionaires list.
translation.pcm: But na di company wey she launched herself, and grown wit di typical Kardashain flare for self-promotion wey land am for billionaires list

translation.en: As she tweeted the day she made the cover of Forbes, mocking the criticism she's received for years: Not bad for a girl with no talent.
translation.pcm: As she tweet am for dat day wey she make di cover of Forbes, mocking di criticism wey she don receive for years: E no bad for girl wey no get talent.

translation.en: As rabbit demand increases, farmer explains how youths can key in to this type of farming
translation.pcm: As di demand for rabbit don dey increase, frmers dey explain say make di youths key in for dis kain of farming

translation.en: Rabbit farming is not common in Nigeria but the demand for rabbit meat is growing in the country same as it is in Europe and Asia.
translation.pcm: Rabbit farming no common for Naija but di demand for rabbit meat dey grow as e be for kontries like Europe and Asia

translation.en: According to the Food and Agriculture Organisation of the United Nations (FAO), an estimated 1.2 billion rabbits are slaughtered annually for meat.
translation.pcm: Acoording to wetin di Food and Agriculture Organisation of di United Nations (FAO) don estimate say dem dey slaughter 1.2 billion rabbits annually for meat

translation.en: The South African National Agricultural Marketing Council, in June 2020, reveal say dem produce 1.48 million tons of rabbit meat for 2017.
translation.pcm: Di South African National Agricultural Marketing Council for June 2020 don reveal say 1.48 million tons of rabbit meat were produced in 2017.

translation.en: China was the leading producer, accounting for 62.9% of the global production, followed by North Korea (10.4%), Spain (3.9%) and Egypt (3.8%), among others.
translation.pcm: China wey be di leading producer dey acount for 62.9% of di production wey dey global, followed by followed by North Korea (10.4%), Spain (3.9%) and Egypt (3.8%), among odas

translation.en: By the end of 2019, Hungary, Chima, France and Spain were the major contributors to the global trade balance of rabbit meat by value.
translation.pcm: As 2019 dey end, Hungary, China, France and Spain dey among di major contributors to di trade balance for rabbit meat by value globally

translation.en: Germany, Belgium and Italy are the leading importers commanding 21%, 19.2% and 9.3% share of global imports, respectively, according to statistics.
translation.pcm: According to wetin statistic say .Germany, Belgium and Italy na di leading importers as dem dey command 21%, 19.2% and 9.3% share of global imports respectively

translation.en: Here in Nigeria, a farm, Wise Trust Intl Ltd, is changing the narrative amidst huge and rising demand for rabbit meat and breeding stock in the country.
translation.pcm: For Naija here, one far, Wise Trust Intl Ltd dey change di narrative amidst huge and rising demand for rabbit meat and breeding stock for di kontri

translation.en: Driven by a passion for white meat, the farmer, Pastor Tayo Ayinla, said his first motivation for the rabbit business was basically the health benefit because people of his age medically have to cut down on consumption of red meat and move towards white meat, adding that the motivation further led to the discovery of its economic benefits.
translation.pcm: Pastor Tayo Ayinla wey white meat dey drive hin passion tok am say hin first motivation for di rabbit business na di health benefit bikos pipo wey dey hin age suppose cut down di consumption of red meat and waka dey chop white meat hin kom add say di motivation further led to di discovery of its economic benefits.

translation.en: The pastor has, perhaps, the biggest rabbit farm in the Federal Capital Territory.
translation.pcm: Na di pastor get di biggest rabbit farm for di Federal Capital Territory

translation.en: He has 17 different species of rabbits on the farm, which he started just a year ago in Karshi, in Abuja Municipal Area Council.
translation.pcm: Hin get 17 species of rabbit on top di farm wey hin start like say a year ago for Karshi, for Abuja Municipal Area Council.

translation.en: He raises them in cages, locally constructed hutches and in free-range.
translation.pcm: Hin dey raise dem for cage, hutches wey dem construct locally and in free range

translation.en: This reporter, who was in Karshi, visited the farm where the pastor shared his knowledge of rabbit farming so that others can key into it.
translation.pcm: Dis reporter wey dey Karshi, visit di farm wia di pastor kom share hin knowledge of rabbit farming so odas fit tap into am

translation.en: He also has rabbits on another farm in Kwara State.
translation.pcm: Hin also get rabbits for anoda farm for Kwara state

translation.en: Some of the free-range rabbitry in the farm
translation.pcm: Some of di free range rabbit for di farm

translation.en: How rabbits multiply
translation.pcm: How rabbits dey multiply

translation.en: He said if a farmer has about 60 to 70 doe (the female rabbit is called a doe and the male buck) with an average of five births per rabbit, he will have a very good number per year.
translation.pcm: Hin say if di farmer get about 60 to 70 doe ( na di female rabbit dem dey call doe and di male buck) wit an average of five births per rabbit, hin go get very good number per year.

translation.en: For instance, on this farm, we have seen a doe give birth to 10, 11 rabbits
translation.pcm: For instance, on dis farm, we don see a doe wey born 10 to 11 rabbits

translation.en: but I want to be more conservative.
translation.pcm: But I wan dey more conservative

translation.en: So let's say five rabbits as an average; then one rabbit can give a farmer between 25 to 30 rabbits in a year because with good management they can reproduce four to six times a year.
translation.pcm: So make we say five rabbits as an average: di one rabbit fit give farmer between 25 to 30 rabbits for a year bikos wen good management dey dem fit produce four to six times for one year

translation.en: So if he gets five in a year that's 25,
translation.pcm: So if to say hin get five for one year dat mean say hin get 25

translation.en: multiplied by the 60 that we are talking about that is 1,600 rabbits in a year.
translation.pcm: Multiply am by di 60 wey we dey tok about e make 1,600 rabbits for one year

translation.en: Of course, you can even get more than that.
translation.pcm: Of kos, una fit get pass dat

translation.en: people Demand for rabbit meat
translation.pcm: pipo dey demand for rabbit meat

translation.en: The demand for rabbit meat is growing and according to Pastor Ayinla, at no time has the demand been fully met.
translation.pcm: Di demand for rabbit meat dey grow and according to wetin Pastor Ayinla say, dem neva meet di demand fully

translation.en: He told this reporter that he had received an order for 10 tons of rabbit meat from the Southwest but It is very difficult to get even one ton,â€ he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tell di reporter say hin receive order of 10 tons of rabbit meat for di Southwest but e dey very difficult to get even one ton

translation.en: At times, you have a person requesting 2,500 rabbits for breeding but hardly will he get up to 500.
translation.pcm: At some time una go get perosn wey go dey request for 2,500 rabbits say hin wan breed am but hin go get up 500

translation.en: There was a time we got a request for 2,500 rabbits for breeding stock in the whole of the North (the client organisation has a Northern representative in Abuja here), but in the whole of the North, we only supplied a little above 200 out of the order placed for 2,500.
translation.pcm: One time dey wey we get request of 2,500 rabbits for breeding stock for di whole of di North (di client organisation get Northern representative for Abuja here), but for di whole of di North, we dey only supply a little above 200 out of di order wey dem place for 2,500.

translation.en: â€œSo rabbitry is an upcoming ATM money dispenser.
translation.pcm: So rabbitry na upkoming ATM moni dispenser

translation.en: Very soon it is going to be a money dispensing business, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin say very soon e go turn moni dispencing business

translation.en: The rabbit value chain has boomed
translation.pcm: Di rabbit value chain don boom

translation.en: The farmer explained the rabbit value chain thus: Most of us don't know the benefits we have in rabbit rearing.
translation.pcm: Di farmer explain for di rabbit value chain say : most of us no know di benefits wey we get for rabbit rearing

translation.en: Number one, there's a lot of value in rabbit farming.
translation.pcm: Number one be say, plenti value dey for rabbit farming

translation.en: As a farmer you can make money from selling the rabbits breeding stock to another farmer; you can sell rabbit meat to those that want it; You can also get income through the sale of their poo or from the conversion of their poo into gas for cooking, or generation of electricity and what is left of that process can be used as fertiliser.
translation.pcm: As a farmer una fit make moni from selling di rabbits breding stock to anoda farmer; una fit sell rabbit meat to those wey want am; una fit get income through di sale of dia poo or from di conversion of dia poo into gas for cooking, or generation of electricity and wetin remain of dat process fit be used as fertiliser.

translation.en: Most people use the rabbit wastes directly as fertiliser but that is not as effective as when you passed the poo through some processes.
translation.pcm: Most pipo dey use rabbit wastes for fertiliser but e no dey as effective as wen una dey pass di poo for some process

translation.en: Also, the urine can be used as a pesticide in the production of vegetables.
translation.pcm: Also, dem fit use di urine as pesticide for di production of vegetables

translation.en: Cost of starting a rabbit farm isn't expensive
translation.pcm: Cost wey dem dey take use start rabbit farm no dey expensive

translation.en: With just N25,000 to N30,000 a farmer can start rabbit farming.
translation.pcm: wit just N25,000 to N30,000 farmer fit start rabbit farming

translation.en: The good thimg is that anybody can do it; an old person can do it because the management is very easy.
translation.pcm: Di good thing be say anybodi fit do am; an old person fit do am bikos of di management dey very easy

translation.en: You don't need a particular place to do rabbit farming because they're neat animals, they don't smell.
translation.pcm: Una no need one particular place to do rabbit farming bikos dem be neat animals, dem no dey smell

translation.en: You can actually do it in your house even for a person with a two-bedroom flat.
translation.pcm: Actually una fit do am for una house even for person wey get two-bedroom flat

translation.en: For instance, you can convert one of the rooms.
translation.pcm: For instance, una fit convert one of di room

translation.en: They don't smell.
translation.pcm: Dem no dey smell

translation.en: The farmers can always come and buy from us; we will assist them to set up their farms.
translation.pcm: Di farmers dey always kom buy from us; we dey assist dem set up dia farms

translation.en: And like I just said, in our own little way, we started about a year ago.
translation.pcm: And as I tok am, for awa own little way, we start am about a year ago

translation.en: Rabbit feeds aren't expensive
translation.pcm: Rabbit feed no dey expensive

translation.en: The good thimg about rabbits is that their feeding is not demanding; they eat just about anythimg.
translation.pcm: Di thing wey good about rabbits be say dia feeding no dey demand, dem just dey chop anything

translation.en: For instance, the way we handle ours here, we usually go to people selling cabbage and collect the outer cover of the cabbage; its good for them.
translation.pcm: For instance, as we dey handle am here, we dey usually go meet pipo wey dey sell cabbage and collect di outer cover of di cabbage, e dey okay for dem

translation.en: Also at the watermelon sellers, people usually eat the red part only and throw away the cover.
translation.pcm: Also for di person wey dey sell watermelons, pipo dey usually chop di red part throw-way di cover

translation.en: The cover is medicinal for them.
translation.pcm: Di cover dey medicinal to dem

translation.en: Also, we go to the market where they sell carrots to pick the leaves.
translation.pcm: Also, we dey go market wey dem dey sell carrots go pick di leaves

translation.en: Virtually what rabbits eat is almost free, and it becomes much easier
translation.pcm: Virtually wetin rabbit dey chop na almost free, and e dey get much easier

translation.en: when the rain starts then we can get plenty of fresh leaves for them.
translation.pcm: wen di rain start den we fit get plenti fresh leaves for dem

translation.en: A word for the youths, they should work hard
translation.pcm: One word for di youths be say make dem work hard

translation.en: My advice to the youth is that they should understand that the government can't meet all our needs.
translation.pcm: My advice for di youths be say make dem understand say di goverment no fit meet all of awa needs

translation.en: The reason we are having some of the problems is that so many people want government jobs and if una llook at di budget wey di government get, na situation wey dem dey use 70 to 80 per cent of government for recurrent expenditure, we no fit expect any magic from di government
translation.pcm: Di reason why we dey get some kain kwanta be say plenti pipo want make goverment jobs

translation.en: First and foremost, you need to look inward: what can I do for myself.
translation.pcm: First and foremost, una need look inward: wetin I fit do for myself

translation.en: Until you're able to do somethimg for yourself you can't do anythimg for the country.
translation.pcm: Until una fit do something for unaself una no fit do anything for di kontri

translation.en: You should also understand that there are a lot of opportunities as far as this country is concerned.
translation.pcm: Una suppose understand say lots of opportunity dey as dis kontri is concerned

translation.en: Some people will tell you that they want to do so and so
translation.pcm: Some pipo go tell you say dem wan do dis and dat

translation.en: Egun people speak better than you do
translation.pcm: Egun pipo speak beta pass una

translation.en: but there's no market
translation.pcm: But market no dey

translation.en: so the question is: how can you be in a country with over 200 million people and say there's no money at hand
translation.pcm: So di question na: how una go dey kontri wey get pass 200 million pipo kom dey tok say money no dey

translation.en: you're saying there's no market ?
translation.pcm: Una dey tok say market no dey

translation.en: It is either you don't understand how to market what you're doing
translation.pcm: Na either una no understand how dem dey market wetin una dey do

translation.en: or you don't understand how to do business.
translation.pcm: Abi una no know how dem dey do business

translation.en: Like in rabbit, if you see how our rabbits are, the business will attract you, they're looking so robust.
translation.pcm: Like for rabbit, if una see how awa rabbits be, di business go attract you, dem dey look so robust

translation.en: So people say I have never seen a rabbit as big as this.
translation.pcm: So pipo dey say I neva see rabbit wey big like dis

translation.en: Its the way we have been able to manage them in terms of what we feed them and the environment that we have created for them.
translation.pcm: Dis na di way we dey take use manage dem in terms of wetin we feed dem and di environment wey we create for dem

translation.en: So people should begin to look inwards.
translation.pcm: So pipo go begin dey look inwards.

translation.en: Only e-voting will ensure rancour free polls in Nigeria -Diri
translation.pcm: Na only e-voting go ensure rancour say free polls dey for Naija- Diri

translation.en: Bayelsa State Governor, Senator Douye Diri, says the hitch-free conduct of the recent Ijaw National Congress (INC) election through electronic voting indicated that Nigeria can hold rancour-free national elections by adopting such measures.
translation.pcm: Senator Duoye Diri wey be di Bayelsa state governor tok say di hitch-free conduct of di Ijaw National Congress (INC) election wey dem do through electronic voting don indicate say Naija fit hold rancour-free national elections if dem adopt dat kain measure

translation.en: Diri who stated this during the inauguration of the new INC leadership at the Ijaw House in Yenagoa, urged the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) to adopt electronic voting to avoid conflicts during elections.
