translation.pcm: Diri don tok am for di inauguration of di new INC leadership at di Ijaw house for Yenagoa, as hin urge di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) make dem adopt electronic voting wey go help dem avoid conflicts during elections.

translation.en: He noted that the failure of the countrys electoral body to adopt e-voting has led to politicisation of revered state institutions and disrespect to such institutions.
translation.pcm: Hin note am say di failure of di electoral bodi of di kontri make dem adopt e-voting don lead to politicisation of reversed state institutions and disrespect to such institutions.

translation.en: The governor also explained that the adoption of e-voting would provide an opportunity for Nigerians in the Diaspora to choose their leaders through the ballot.
translation.pcm: Di governor don explain say di adoption go provide opportunity for Naija pipo wey dey di Diaspora choose dia leaders through di ballot.

translation.en: He said: I am an advocate and supporter of electronic voting system.
translation.pcm: Hin say: I be advocate and supporter of electronic voting system

translation.en: Many Nigerians have been denied the right to vote because they are not in Nigeria and cannot participate in choosing their leaders.
translation.pcm: Dem don deny plenti Naija pipo di right wey go make dem vote bikos dem no dey Naija and dem no fit participate in choosing dia leaders

translation.en: It is a challenge to Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Na challenge for Naija e be

translation.en: Let the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) be challenged.
translation.pcm: Make e challenge di Independent National Electoral Commission

translation.en: If the Ijaws can do it, the Federal Government can also do it.
translation.pcm: If di Ijaws fit do am, di Federal goverment fit do am also

translation.en: If Ijaws can enfranchise Ijaws in Europe and America to be part of deciding who leads them, INEC can equally do it.
translation.pcm: If Ijaws fit enfranchise Ijaws wey dey Europe and America make dem be part of deciding who go lead dem, INEC fit do am

translation.en: It will check violence, criminality and state institutions being politicised, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say e go check violence, criminality and state institutions being politicised

translation.en: In his inaugural address, the new INC President, Professor Benjamin Okaba, assured that the body would work for the progress of the Ijaw people.
translation.pcm: For hin inaugural lecture, di new INEC president, Professor Benjamin Okaba asuure dem say di bodi go work for di progress of Ijaw pople

translation.en: Prof. Okaba noted that the INC fully supported the recent pronouncement by governors of southern Nigeria prohibiting open grazing in the region, saying the organisation would provide the necessary support to ensure adherence to laws aimed at protecting the people and their land against invasion from external forces.
translation.pcm: Prof. Okaba note am say INEC go fully support di recent pronouncement by governors of south Naija wey dey prohibit open grazing for di region, hin still tok say di organisation go provide necessary support wey go ensure say dem adhere to di laws wey dem aim at protecting di pipo and dia land against invasion from external forces.

translation.en: He stated that INC would collaborate with other ethnic minorities that share the same experiences with the Ijaws to achieve their dreams, said the ethnic group was aware of surreptitious moves by some groups to annex territories in the Niger Delta because of its resources, but that no part of Ijaw would be ceded or conquered.
translation.pcm: Hin say di INC go collaborate wit oda ethnic minorities wey dey share di same experience wit di Ijaws make dem achieve dia dreams, say di ethnic group no dey aware of surreptitious moves wey some groups dey make to annex territories for di Niger Delta so tey di resources wey e get, but say no part of Ijaw would be ceded or conquered.

translation.en: Maize will be Scarce in 2021, maize farmers raise alarm
translation.pcm: Maize farmers don raise alarm say maize go dey scarce for 2021

translation.en: Farmers in Oke-Ogun area of Oyo State under the banner of Association of Farm Settlers on Sunday said failed flood forecast and lack of government input in agriculture would make maize scarce in the year 2021.
translation.pcm: Farmers for Oke-Ogun area for Oyo state wey dey under di banner of Association of Farm Settlers on Sunday tok say failed flood forecast and lack of goverment input for agriculture go make maize scarce in di year 2021.

translation.en: The farmers said its members lost millions of naira in the year 2020 planting season as a result of government failure to support agricultural produce.
translation.pcm: Di farmers say di members lost millions of naira for di year 2020 planting season as a result say goverment fail to support agricultural produce.

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that Oke-Ogun area of Oyo state is regarded as the food basket of the entire southwest states of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust don report say dem regard Oke-Ogun for Oyo state as di food basket of di entire southwest states for Naija

translation.en: The group made this disclosure in a communique issued after its emergency meeting held in Iseyin area of the state to address the plight of maize farmers in the state.
translation.pcm: Di group don make dis disclosure in a communique issue afta dem hold emergency meeting for Iseyin area of di state make dem address di plight of maize farmers for di state.

translation.en: The farmers claimed many of its members had decided not to deal with maize planting again because of lack of farm implements and manpower.
translation.pcm: Di farmers claim say plenti of e members don decide say dem no go deal wit maize planting

translation.en: The rigorous campaign from Oyo State Ministry of Environment and Water Resources said that there would be lot of rain towards the end of October and November, they sought for fund to plant maize.
translation.pcm: Di rigourous campaign for Oyo state Ministry of Environment and Water Resources tok say e go rain well-well towards di end of October and November, dem dey find fund wey dem go use take plant maize.

translation.en: Many of our members have decided not to plant maize again because of the poor and unstable rainfall, when they heard about the governments forecast through the meteorology department
translation.pcm: Plenti of awa members don decide say dem no go plant maize again bikos of di poor and rainfall wey dey unstable, wen dem hear about di goverments forecast through di meteorology department

translation.en: It is very unfortunate that the failed forecast led to a staggering loss to our members, they lost millions in bank loans and borrowing from family and friends to plant maize, many cannot even pass by their farms to see the withered maize farms, we are so hurt by this occurrence.
translation.pcm: E dey unfortunate say di failed forecast led to a staggering loss to awa members dem lost millions for bank loans and dem borrow from family and friends to plant maize, as plenti no fit pass by dia farms to see di maize farms wey don widir, dis occurrence pepper awa bodi

translation.en: The baby has a rash on its body
translation.pcm: Di pikin get kro-kro/craw-craw for bodi

translation.en: The communique further said the two layers of government and the Central bank of Nigeria should put in their best measures to avert food scarcity, especially scarcity of maize in 2021 as most maize farmers in Nigeria lost their crops to the drought.
translation.pcm: Di communique also tok am say di two layers of goverment and di central bank of Naija suppose put in dia best measures wey go help avert food scarcity, especially scarcity of maize for 2021 as most maize farmers for Naija don lose dia crops to di drought.

translation.en: The Association of Government Farm Settlers, Ipapo-Iseyin branch which represented farmers in Oke-Ogun area of Oyo State used the occasion of the emergency meeting to call on President Muhammadu Buhari to evolve new measures to assist farmers determine weather forecast and also provide basic supports to genuine farmers.
translation.pcm: Di association of goverment Farm Settlers, Ipapo-Iseyin branch wey represent farmers wey dey Oke-Ogun area of Oyo State used di occasion of di emergency meeting to call on President Muhammadu Buhari make hin evolve new measures wey go help assist farmers determine weather forecast and also provide basic supports to genuine farmers.

translation.en: They also extended their call to the governor of Oyo State to keep his promise of extending the coverage of funding for farm settlements to their association which represented the ten local government areas in Oke-Ogun from the recent loan accessed by the administration to develop the farm settlements.
translation.pcm: Dem also extend di call to di governor of Oyo state make hin keep hin promise wey be say hin go extend di coverage of funding for farm settlements to dia association wey dey represent di ten local goverment areas wey dey Oke-Ogun from di recent loan wey di administration accessed to develop di farm settlements.

translation.en: Our fear for now is what will be the fate of poor Nigerians that depend largely on basic food items that are sourced from maize, it is easy to predict that there will be scarcity of maize next year with what happened this year, unless government quickly evolve a way out to assist farmers to surmount this problem.
translation.pcm: awa fear for now be say wetin go be di fate of poor Naija pipo wey dey depend largely on top di basic food items wey dem dey get from maize, e dey easy to predict say scarcity of maize go dey next year wit wetin don apun for dis year, unless goverment go quickly evolve way out to assist farmers wey go help surmount dis problem.

translation.en: Our governor in Oyo State has shown an unparalleled love for farmers in Oyo State and we can all see that he is out to make agriculture the major pillar to promote the States economy
translation.pcm: awa governor for Oyo state don show unparalleled love for farmers for Oyo state and we fit see say hin wan make agriculture be di major pillar wey go promote di economy for di state

translation.en: we are calling on him to please extend the funding from the loan for farm settlement to us at Oke-Ogun, Alabi pleaded.
translation.pcm: Alabi plead say we dey halla on hin make hin extend di funding of di loan for farm settlement to us for Oke-Ogun.

translation.en: Kobe Bryant inducted posthumously into Basketball Hall of Fame
translation.pcm: Dem don induct Kobe Bryant posthumously for basketball hall of fame

translation.en: Los Angeles Lakers icon, Kobe Bryant, has been inducted posthumously into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on Saturday as part of a star-studded group that also included Tim Duncan and Kevin Garnett.
translation.pcm: Dem don induct Los Angeles Lakers icon, Kobe Bryant posthumously for di Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of fame on Sunday as a part of a star-studded group wey go also include Tim Duncan and Kevin Garnett

translation.en: Bryant was inducted as part of the Class of 2020, almost 16 months after he and his 13-year-old daughter, Gianna, were killed in a helicopter crash along with seven others in southern California.
translation.pcm: Dem induct Bryant as part of di class of 2020, almost 16 months afta hin kpeme wit hin daughter Gianna wey be 13-year-old for helicopter crash along wit seven odas for Southern California

translation.en: Bryant's wife, Vanessa Bryant, took the podium Saturday to speak movingly about his love for basketball, his family, his teammates and his fans.
translation.pcm: Bryant's wife, Vanessa Bryant waka go podium for Saturday go speak movingly about di love wey hin get for basketball, hin family, hin team members and hin fans

translation.en: You did it.
translation.pcm: Una do am

translation.en: You are in the Hall of Fame now.
translation.pcm: Una don dey hall of fame now

translation.en: You are a true champion, not just an MVP.
translation.pcm: Una be true champion, no be just MVP

translation.en: You are an all-time great, Vanessa said.
translation.pcm: Vanessa yarn say Una be all-time great

translation.en: I am currently broke
translation.pcm: sapa don hol'me

translation.en: big man Garnett, two-time NBA champion coach Rudy Tomjanovich and WNBA legend Tamika Catchimgs were among those also inducted on Saturday night.
translation.pcm: Big man Garnett, two-time NBA champion coach Rudy Tomjanovich and WNBA legend Tamika Catchings dey among those wey dem induct for Saturday

translation.en: The delayed enshrinement stretched over two days at the Mohegan Sun Resort and Casino in Uncasville, Connecticut, with Vanessa Bryant and Kobes oldest daughter, Natalia, accepting Bryants Hall of Fame jacket and ring on Friday night.
translation.pcm: Di enshrinement wey dem delay stretch for over two days at di Mohegan Sun Resort and Casino for Uncasville, connecticut, wit vanessa Bryant and Kobes daughter wey old pass, Natalia dey accept Bryant's Hall of Fame jacket and ring for Friday night

translation.en: Bryant and the others were voted into the Hall of Fame as part of the 2020 class, but the formal induction ceremony was delayed because of the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: Bryant and di odas wey dem vote into di hall of fame as part of di 2020 class, but di formal induction ceremony wey dem delay so tey di covid-19 pandemic

translation.en: There will never be anyone like Kobe, Vanessa said.
translation.pcm: Vanessa say nobodi like Kobe fit dey

translation.en: Kobe was one of a kind.
translation.pcm: Kobe na one of a kind

translation.en: He was special.
translation.pcm: Hin dey special

translation.en: He was humble off the court but bigger than life.
translation.pcm: Hin dey humble off di court but e big pass life

translation.en: Vanessa was helped to the stage by NBA legend Michael Jordan, who acted as a presenter for Kobe and three-time NCAA champion coach Kim Mulkey.
translation.pcm: NBA legend Michael Jordan wey act as presenter for Kobe and three-time NCAA champion coach Kim Mulkey help Vanessa for stage

translation.en: He and Gigi deserved to be here to witness this.
translation.pcm: He and Gigi deserve dey here dey witness dis

translation.en: Gigi would have been so proud of her dad getting into the Hall of Fame, Vanessa said.
translation.pcm: Vanessa say, Gigi go dey proud of her pale say hin get into di hall of fame

translation.en: Like Kobe, Garnett went straight out of high school to the NBA.
translation.pcm: Like Kobe, Granett waka from high school go NBA

translation.en: Garnett talked of his respect and admiration for both Duncan and Kobe.
translation.pcm: Garnett dey yarn from hin respect and admiration wey hin get for both Duncan and kobe

translation.en: I appreciate you, Garnett said to Duncan from the stage.
translation.pcm: Garnett follow Duncan tok from stage say hin appreciate am

translation.en: It an honour to go into the hall with you, bro.
translation.pcm: Na honour to waka follow you go di hall bro

translation.en: After the guy struggled for his life he later died
translation.pcm: Afta di guy don struggle for hin life hin later kpeme

translation.en: Garnett played 21 seasons for Minnesota, Boston and Brooklyn, averaging 17.8 points and 10.0 rebounds per game.
translation.pcm: Garnett don play 21 seasons for Minnesota, Boston and Brooklyn and e dey average 17.8 points and 10.0 rebounds per game

translation.en: My only regret with Minnesota is that I didn't get to bring a championship, Garnett said.
translation.pcm: Garnett tok say hin only regret wit Minnesota be dat hin no bring a championship

translation.en: But like I said, I look forward to rebuilding Minneapolis.
translation.pcm: But as I don tok am, I dey look forward to rebuilding Minneapolis

translation.en: Duncan had an immediate impact in the NBA, winning the rookie of the year award.
translation.pcm: Duncan don make immediate impact for di NBA, as hin win rookie of di year award

translation.en: His first NBA title came just one year after that.
translation.pcm: Hin first NBA title kom one year afta dat

translation.en: Werder Bremen relegated after 40 years in Bundesliga
translation.pcm: Werder Bremen don relegate afta 40 years in Bundesliga

translation.en: Werder Bremen were relegated from the Bundesliga for the first time in 41 years on Saturday after a 4-2 thrashimg at home by Borussia Moenchengladbach.
translation.pcm: Werder Bremn don relegate from di Bundesliga for di first time for 41 years on Saturday afta a thrashing for home by Borussia Moenchengladbach.

translation.en: At the moment it's hard to say anythimg,â€ caretaker coach Thomas Schaaf, who stepped in after Florian Kohfeldt was sacked last weekend, told Sky.
translation.pcm: So tey dat moment e hard make person say anything, caretaker coach Thomas Schaaf wey step in afta dem sack Florian Kohfeldt last weekend, told Sky.

translation.en: We didn't manage to do what we wanted to do.
translation.pcm: We no manage to do wetin we wan do

translation.en: We missed the huge opportunity to equalise, which we needed.
translation.pcm: We miss di huge opportunity wey we need use equalise

translation.en: We fought back too late.â€
translation.pcm: We fight back e don late

translation.en: Colognes 1-0 win over bottom side Schalke, who were already relegated, confirmed Bremens worst fears, sending them down for the first time since 1979-80 when they came back up a season later.
translation.pcm: Colognes 1-0 win over di bottom side Schalke, wey dem don already relegate , confam Bremens worst fears, sending dem down for di first time since 1979-80 wen dem late kom came back up a season later.

translation.en: Bremen paid the price for taking one point from their last 10 league games in Germanys top flight, finishimg 17th in the table, two points behimd Cologne who have a two-legged relegation play-off next week.
translation.pcm: Na Bremen take di prize for taking one point for dia last 10 league games for Germanys top flight , finishing 17th for di table, two points behind Cologne wey get a two-legged relegation play-off next week.

translation.en: Bremen made the worst possible start when Gladbach captain Lars Stindl was left alone in the penalty area and fired into the bottom right corner with just three minutes gone.
translation.pcm: Bremen make di worst possible start wen dem leave Gladbach captain Lars Stindl for di penalty area and fire am into di bottom right corner wit just three minutes gone.

translation.en: Gladbach doubled their lead early in the second half when Marcus Thuram got in behind the defence and fired past Bremen goalkeeper Jiri Pavlenka.
translation.pcm: Gladbach don double dia lead early for di second half wen Marcus Thuram got in behind di defence and fire am past Bremen goalkeeper Jiri Pavlenka.

translation.en: A towering header by Ramy Bensebaini and a Florian Neuhaus goal made it 4-0 before Bremen fought back as forward Milot Rashica and Niclas Fuellkrug scored late on, but to no avail.
translation.pcm: A towering header by Ramy Bensebaini and a Florian Neuhaus goal make am 4-0 before Bremen fought back as forward Milot Rashica and Niclas Fuellkrug scored late on, but e no reach

translation.en: She became the first female athlete to win three Olympic 100m golds when she takes to the track for another loaded race in Fridays Diamond League meet in Doha.
translation.pcm: She don bikom di first female athlete wey go win three olympic 100m goals wen she take to di track for anoda loaded race for Fridays Diamond League meet for Doha.

translation.en: Fresh from finishimg fourth in the opening elite meeting in a wet, wind-swept Gateshead last week behind world
translation.pcm: As e dey fresh from finishing fourth for di opening elite meeting in a wet, wind-swept Gateshead last week behind world

translation.en: Ta Lou, Fraser-Pryce insisted that the stronger the field, the better.
translation.pcm: Ta Lou, Fraser-Pryce insist say di stronger di field, di beta

translation.en: The harder the competitions are, the better I am at performing.
translation.pcm: As di competition dey hard, di beta I be at performing

translation.en: I like a challenge
translation.pcm: I dey like challenge

translation.en: I like it when competition is hard, said the 34-year-old Olympian.
translation.pcm: Di 34-year-old champion tok say hin like am wen di competition dey hard

translation.en: Two killed in cult clash in Edo
translation.pcm: Dem kill two for cult clash for Edo

translation.en: Two persons were reportedly killed in a renewed clash between two cult group in Benin City, Edo State capital.
translation.pcm: Dem don report say dem kill two person for one clash wey apun between two cult group for Benin City wey be Edo state capital

translation.en: It was gathered that the rivalry between the cult groups began on Saturday following the killing of one Ogbomo, allegedly by a rival group.
translation.pcm: Dem gather say di rivalry wey dey between di cult groups began for Saturday afta dem kill one Ogbomo, allegedly by one rival group

translation.en: Ogbomo was said to have been killed by a four-man gang at about 4:pm along Esigie street, 3rd Circular Road, Benin on Saturday.
translation.pcm: Dem say na one four-man gang kill Ogbomo at about 4:pm along Esigie street, 3rd circular road, Benin for Saturday

translation.en: It was learnt that the rival group on Monday afternoon retaliated with another killing.
translation.pcm: Dem later learn am say di rival group retaliate wit anoda kilin

translation.en: On the Monday killing, it was gathered that the gang allegedly waylaid a commercial bus driver along 3rd Circular road by Esigie junction and shot him dead.
translation.pcm: Dem gather am on top di Monday kilin say di hang wey allegedly waylaid one commercial bus driver for 3rd circular road by Esigie junction and shoot am

translation.en: An eyewitness who only identified himself as Okharedia said: I and other passengers boarded a commercial bus from Ekiosa market to New Benin by Upper mission junction.
translation.pcm: One eyewitness wey identify hinself as Okharedia say: hin board commercial bus from Ekiosa market go New Benin by upper mission junction wit oda passengers

translation.en: Halfway into the journey, an Audi car overtook us and forced the driver to stop.
translation.pcm: Halfway into di journey, and Audi car overtook us and e force di driver make e stop

translation.en: The next thing the gunmen came out of the Audi car and dragged the bus driver out of the steering and fired him at closed range
translation.pcm: Di next thing be say di gunmen kom out of di Audi car and drag di bus driver out of di steering kom fire am for close range

translation.en: When contacted, the Edo state public relations officer, Kotongs Bello, said he is not aware of the development.
translation.pcm: wen dem contact di Edo state public relations relations officer, Kotongs Bello, hin say hin no dey aware on top di development

translation.en: He said, the divisional police officers of various police station usually briefed the command of any development but I am not aware of this one
translation.pcm: Hin say, di divisional police officers for various police station dey usually brief di command for any development but I no dey aware of dis one

translation.en: SWAN urges Govt to investigate Wikki Tourists poor outings
translation.pcm: SWAN don urge goverment make dem investigate poor outing wey Wikki tourists get

translation.en: Bauchi State Chapter of Sports Writers Association of Nigeria (SWAN) has called for an investigation into the recent poor outings of Wikki Tourists FC in the Nigeria Professional Football League (NPFL).
translation.pcm: Bauchi State Chapter of Sports Writers Association of Naija (SWAN) don call for investigation into di recent poor outings of Wikki Tawaists FC for di Naija Professional Football League (NPFL).

translation.en: Bala Bawaji, the state SWAN secretary, said this in a statement on Monday in Bauchi.
translation.pcm: Bala Bawaji, wey be di state SWAN secretary, tok am for di statement wey hin make on Monday for Bauchi

translation.en: SWAN is calling on the government to as a matter of urgency set-up a committee to look into the problems facing the club with a view to finding a lasting solution.
translation.pcm: SWAN dey call on di goverment as a mata make dem set-up committee wey go look into di kasala wey di club dey face and wit a view make dem find solution wey go last

translation.en: The team currently occupies the 15th position on the league table with only 24 points from 21 matches.
translation.pcm: Di team don occupy di 15th position for di league table and e get 24 points for 21 matches

translation.en: This does not reflect the State Government investment in the club, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say e no reflect di state goverment investment for di club

translation.en: The SWAN secretary pointed out that investigating the club would allow the government to examine and x-ray its lacklustre performance at the league.
translation.pcm: Di SWAN secretary don point out say investigating di club go allow di goverment examine and x-ray its lacklustre performance for fi league

translation.en: SWAN calls on the management and players of the club to brace up and return the state darling team to its position of eminence, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin say di SWAN dey call on top di management and players of di club make dem brace up and return di state darling team to its position of eminence

translation.en: The News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) reports that the club in its last two matches suffered a devastating 1-5 away defeat in the hands of Katsina United FC in Katsina and a 2-1 home defeat by Nasarawa United FC of Lafia.(NAN)
translation.pcm: Di News Agency for Naija (NAN) don report say di club for di last two matches don suffer one devastating 1-5 away defeat for di hands of Katsina United FC for Katsina and a 2-1 home defeat by Nasarawa United FC of Lafia.(NAN)

translation.en: Dessers scores, Onuachu bags assist as Genk demolish Antwerp
translation.pcm: Dessers don score, Onuachu bags assist as Genk don demolish Antwerp

translation.en: Cyriel Dessers found the back of the net while Paul Onuachu provided an assist as Genk secured a 4-0 victory over Royal Antwerp in the Belgian First Division A Championship Group game on Thursday.
translation.pcm: Cyril Dessers find di back of di net while Paul Onuachu provde an assist as Genk go secure a 4-0 victory over Royal Antwerp for di Belgian First Division A Championship Group game for Thursday.

translation.en: His compatriot Onuachu was handed a starting role and utilized the opportunity to continue his impressive performances.
translation.pcm: Hin compatriot Onuachu hand am a starting role and utilise di opportunity to kontinu hin perfromances wey dey impressive

translation.en: The game started with both sides aiming to outwit each other but despite their efforts, they failed to get the ball into the back of the net in the opening 40 minutes.
translation.pcm: Di game started as both sides dey aim to outwit each oda but despite dia efforts, dem fail to get di ball into di back of di net for di 40 minutes.

translation.en: With two minutes left to the half-time break, Kristian Thorstvedt broke the deadlock to hand the Blue and White the lead.
translation.pcm: For two minutes make e reach half-time break, Kristian Thorstvedt break di dreadlock go hand di Blue and White di lead.

translation.en: Are you here alone
translation.pcm: Na only you waka kom

translation.en: men doubled their lead in the 49th minute when Thorstvedt scored after benefitting from Onuachu's assist.
translation.pcm: Men double dia lead for di 49th minute wen Thorstvedt score afta hin benefit from Onuachu's assist.

translation.en: Thorstvedt completed his hat-trick moments after the hour mark before Dessers was brought on for Onuachu in the 74th minute.
translation.pcm: Thorstvedt complete hin hat-trick moment afta di hour mark before dem bring Dessers on for Onuachu for di 74th minute.

translation.en: Banks assets declaration and corruption war
translation.pcm: Banks assets don declare and corruption war

translation.en: Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC), Abdurasheed Bawa, made a declaration that the Bank Employees Assets Declaration Act of 1986 would be resuscitated to block loopholes created by bankers to sanitise the countrys financial system.
translation.pcm: Chairman for di economic and financial crimes commission (EFCC) Abdulrasheed Bawa don make declaration say dem go resuscitate di Bank Employees Assets Declaration Act of 1986 to block loopholes wey bankers don create to sanitise di kontri's financial system

translation.en: According to Bawa, the decision was taken due to the role bankers are expected to play in the fight against corruption, as the EFCC is mandated to ensure compliance with the Act.
translation.pcm: According to wetin Bawa tok, dem take di decision due to di role wey dem dey expect make bankers play for di fight against corruption, as di EFCC don mandate am to ensure say dem comply wit di Act.

translation.en: Section 1 of the Bank Employees Declaration of Assets Act 1986 makes it mandatory for every employee of the bank to make full disclosure of assets upon employment on an annual basis.
translation.pcm: Section 1 for di Bank Employees Declaration of Assets Act 1986 don make am mandatory for Evri employee for di bank to make full disclosure of assets upon employment for annual basis.

translation.en: The law under Section 7 Sub-Section 1 stipulates that it shall be an offence for an employee of a bank to own assets in excess of their legitimate and probable income.
translation.pcm: Di law wey dey under Section 7 Sub-Section 1 stipulates say na offence e go be for an employee of a bank make e own assets in excess of dia legitimate and probable income

translation.en: After the deadline as stipulated by the EFCC Chairman, there are consequences that will arise as a result of non-declaration of assets by bank employees.
translation.pcm: Afta di EFCC chairman don stipulate di deadline, consequences go arise as a result of non-declaration by bank employees

translation.en: For instance, there is a spelt out penalty of 10 years imprisonment upon conviction as well as forfeiture of assets beyond and above legitimate income and probable earnings of such bank employees.
translation.pcm: Spelt out penealty of 10 years inprisonment upon conviction as well as forfeiture of assets wey dey beyond and above legitimate income and probable earnings for dat kain bank employees.

translation.en: This piece of legislation has been in existence since 1986 under the military.
translation.pcm: Dis piece of legislature don dey so tey 1986 under di military

translation.en: For a long time, this part of the constitution was rendered ineffective by those who ordinarily should implement it.
translation.pcm: So tey, dis part of di constitution don dey ineeffective by those wey suppose dey implement am ordinarily

translation.en: Bankers have always been aware of this legislation but the level of compliance has not been encouraging.
translation.pcm: Bankers don aware of dis legislation but di level wey dem dey comply no dey encouraging

translation.en: In the 80s, bankers were handed such forms which they completed and submitted.
translation.pcm: For di 80s, dem dey hand form to bankers wey dem go complete and submit

translation.en: But as its always the case in the country, the implementation of that provision of the law was more or less abandoned, and it was no longer considered as a fundamental part of the banking profession.
translation.pcm: But as e dey go for awa kontri, dem don abandon di implementation of dat provision for di law , and dem no longer consideram as a fundamental part for di banking profession.

translation.en: Stakeholders blame the failure of authorities including the CBN, Chartered Institute of Bankers of Nigeria (CIBN) and Bankers Committee for certain abnormalities in the industry.
translation.pcm: Stakeholders dey blame di failure on top di authorities wey include di CBN, Chartered Institute of Bank of Naija (CIBN) and Bankers Committee for some kain abnormalities wey dey di industry.

translation.en: According to them, these regulators rely on the banks they are supposed to supervise, to supply them information.
translation.pcm: According to wetin dem dey tok, dem say diz regulators dey rely on di bank wey dem suppose supervise, make e supply information

translation.en: For instance, they argued that the failed banks episode happened barely some months after the regulators had given those banks clean bills of health.
translation.pcm: For instance, dem don argue am say di failed banks episode apun some months afta dem give di regulator for diz banks clean bill of health

translation.en: This suggests that the information supplied by the banks may have been doctored.
translation.pcm: Dis suggest say dem don doctor di information wey di bank supplied

translation.en: Nigeria has been battling with cases of corruption and money laundering, with bankers and bank officials accused of being accomplices.
translation.pcm: Naija don dey battle case like corruption and money laundering and dem dey accuse bankers and banking officials say dem be part of it

translation.en: Some monies have remained redundant in many accounts due to the death of the owners of the accounts, which some bank officials convert to theirs while leaving families of the account owners in penury.
translation.pcm: Some moni don remain redundant for plenti accounts bikos some account owners don kpeme which some bank officials go convert to dia own as dem go leave families of di account owners for penury.

translation.en: This is in spite of the fact that the banking sector is no stranger to self-regulation, given its tempting, delicate and fragile operating system.
translation.pcm: Dis dey in spite of di fact say di banking sector no strange to self-regulation,given its tempting, delicate and di operating system wey dey fragile

translation.en: As a matter of fact, the CIBN Act of 2007 has been regulating the banking system.
translation.pcm: Di CIBN Act of 2007 don dey regulate di banking system

translation.en: It has a code of conduct to which bankers agreed with the CBN.
translation.pcm: E get code of conduct wey bankers don agree pon wit CBN

translation.en: There is a disciplinary tribunal that has the power of the High Court, which ensures that reported infractions, unethical conduct and indiscipline are brought before the tribunal, and sanctions recommended for formal prosecution.
translation.pcm: Disciplinary tribunal wey get power for di high court dey and e dey ensure say dem bring reported infractions, unethical conduct and indiscipline before di tribunal, and sanctions wey dem recommended for formal prosecution.

translation.en: But one of the challenges has been the weak reporting system by bankers, leading to the inability of CIBN to take appropriate actions.
translation.pcm: But one of di challenges be di weak reporting system wey bankers get wey dey lead to di inability of CIBN make dem take appropriate actions.

translation.en: The spirit behimd the Act of 1986 is to make clear, the financial standing of bank employees at the time of employment, and after years of service, in a bid to ascertain that their legitimate earnings are commensurate with their current lifestyles.
translation.pcm: Di spirit wey stan gidigba for di back of di Act of 1986 na to make clear, di financial standing wey bank employee get for di time of employment, and afta years of service, in a bid wey go make dem ascertain say dem dey commensurate dia legitimate earnings wit dia lifestyles wey dey current

translation.en: This is coming on the heels of allegations that some bankers are direct beneficiaries of fraudulent transactions that are carried out in the bank.
translation.pcm: Na dis dey kom on top di heels of allegation say some bankers be direct beneficiaries for fraudulent transactions wey dem dey carry out for di bank

translation.en: What is common knowledge is the asset declaration by public officers including civil servants, politically exposed persons and those who work in the Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs).
translation.pcm: Wetin be common knowledge be say di declaration of assests by public officers wey include di civil servants, pesin wey dey politically exposed and those wey dey for di Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs).

translation.en: They are required to declare their assets every four years.
translation.pcm: Dem require dem make dem declare dia assets evri four years

translation.en: For political officeholders, upon their election or appointment, before they assume office, they are supposed to declare their assets at the point of entry and also at the point of exit.
translation.pcm: On top di election and appointment of political office holders, before dem assume office dem suppose declare di assets wey dey get pon entry kom declare am again for di exit point

translation.en: This declaration is done on oath.
translation.pcm: Dem do dis declaration by oath

translation.en: In other words, there is execution and attestation before a High Court or some other superior officer of the law.
translation.pcm: For anoda word, execution and attestation before di high court or some oda superior officer for di law dey

translation.en: The Nigeria Customs Service (NCS), Nigeria Immigration Service (NIS), among others, are already covered by the Code of Conduct Act with regard to the declaration of their assets.
translation.pcm: Di Naija customs service (NCS), Naija Immigration Service (NIS), among odas, dem don covered by di Code of Conduct Act wit regard to di declaration of dia assets.

translation.en: As it stands, financial experts believe that the impression created by the directive to bankers to comply with the pre-existing piece of legislation amounts to stigmatisation and also isolates bank employees, which puts them in the limelight.
translation.pcm: As e dey so finacial experts believe say di impression wey di directive to bankers create make dem comply wit di of legislation wey dey pre-exist dey amount to stigmatisation and e dey also isolates bank employees, wey dey puts dem in di limelight.

translation.en: In other words, there is the belief that the revisiting of the Act of 1986 encourages the policy of isolation that is causing apprehension in the industry.
translation.pcm: In oda words, d belief of revisiting of di Act of 1986 dey encourage di policy of isolation wey dey kos apprehension in di industry.

translation.en: There are concerns that the Act may cause enrolment into the banking profession to further go down as a result of stigmatisation.
translation.pcm: Dis na di concern say di Act fit kos enrolment into di banking profession to further go down as a result of stigmatisation.

translation.en: However, some stakeholders caution against the drama about stigmatisation, arguing that a lot of bankers, from the highest cadre to the lowest level, are living above their means.
translation.pcm: Some stakeholders don caution against di drama about stigmatisation, arguing say plenti bankers, from di highest cadre to di level wey low pass, dey live above dia means.

translation.en: According to them, an average banker even from their early point of calling, cuts corners by conniving with customers that want to beat the system.
translation.pcm: According to wetin dem tok , an average banker even from dia early point of calling, dey cut corners by conniving wit customers say dem go beat di system.

translation.en: They insist that for every major corruption, there is a banker that has facilitated the transaction.
translation.pcm: Dem insist say for evri major corruption, banker wey dey facilitate di transaction dey

translation.en: It is laudable that the EFCC is trying to use the Act for good reasons.
translation.pcm: E dey laudible say di EFCC dey try use di Act for reason wey good

translation.en: But the worry is that the banks essentially are not owned by the government per se although the government has shares in them.
translation.pcm: Di worry be say di banks wey di goment no own per se although di goverment get shares in dem

translation.en: Banks are used for saving money
translation.pcm: Dem dey use bank save moni

translation.en: More importantly, there are existing laws that can check illicit enrichment.
translation.pcm: Di koko be say laws wey dey check illicit enrichment dey

translation.en: Article 20 of the UN Convention Against Corruption is explicit on this.
translation.pcm: Article 20 for di UN Convention Against Corruption dey explicit on top dis

translation.en: Section 7 of the EFCC Act empowers EFCC to investigate persons whose lifestyles are not commensurate with their means of income.
translation.pcm: Section 7 for di EFCC act don empower EFCC make e dey investigate pesin wey hin lifestyle no commensurate wit di means of income wey dem get

translation.en: It is believed in certain quarters that the assets of this country have been plundered the most by politically exposed persons, many of whom remain untouchable.
translation.pcm: Dem believe am for some part say di politically exposed person dey plunder di assests for dis kontri plenti of dem dey untouchable

translation.en: As such, EFCC has been accused of not being fair and even-handed in its mandate on tackling public sector corruption including false declaration.
translation.pcm: Dem accuse EFCC say e no fair and even-handed

translation.en: If the banking sector is sanitised, it will have a ripple effect on all other sectors of the economy.
translation.pcm: If dem sanitise di banking sector, we go get ripple effect for oda sectors of di economy

translation.en: All these measures are taken to strengthen the fight against corruption, and not to stigmatise the banking profession or portray it as the scapegoat withim the system.
translation.pcm: Dem take all diz measure to strengden di fight against corruption, and not to stigmatise di banking profession or portray it as di scapegoat wey dey witin di system.

translation.en: Besides, the banking career is not a roguish profession.
translation.pcm: Besides, di banking career no be one kain rouguish profession

translation.en: Some bankers are at the forefront of exposing some of the mega corruption issues that we have seen the EFCC making headway.
translation.pcm: Some bankers be di forefront of exposing some of di mega corruption issues wey wedon see di EFCC making headway.

translation.en: Part of the essence of this law is to ensure that the country is free from financial crimes, and also to block the loopholes being exploited by unscrupulous players
translation.pcm: Part of why dis law dey be say e dey ensure make di kontri dey free from financial crimes, and make e dey also block loopholes wey unscrupulous players dey esploit

translation.en: While it is hoped that the Act of 1986 is a sincere attempt at sanitising the system, there should be a platform created to report thresholds of deposits on a daily basis, and the regulators should be able to access it to know the declarations made.
translation.pcm: While dem dey hope say make di Act of 1986 na sincere attempt at sanitising di system , dem suppose create platform wey go report thresholds of deposits on a daily basis, and di regulator suppose dey able to access it to know di declarations wey dem make.

translation.en: This makes for easy reference to what has been declared as legitimate income to check those living above their means.
translation.pcm: E dey make am easy reference to wetin dem don declare as legitimate income to check those wey dey live above dia means

translation.en: Moses Amadi, a researcher, sent this piece from Lagos
translation.pcm: Moses Amadi wey be researcher na hin send dis piece from Lagos

translation.en: I mistakenly killed a passerby but a robbery suspect was my target vigilante
translation.pcm: Vigilante tok say na mistake hin use kill passerby but na robbery suspect be my target

translation.en: A 30-year-old member of a local vigilante, Lukma Rasak, who was arrested for killing a passerby in Ijora, a Lagos suburb, said he made a mistake.
translation.pcm: One 30-year-old member of a local vigilante , Lukma Rasak wey dem arrest for kilin a passerby for Ijora wey be a Lagos suburb, say na mistake.

translation.en: The suspect was alleged to have shot dead a 28-year-old man, Musa Yahaya, in the area.
translation.pcm: Dem allege di suspect say hin shoot one 28-year-old man, Musa Yahaya , for di area

translation.en: The suspect had allegedly fled the scene of the crime having realized his mistake.
translation.pcm: Di suspect wey dem allege don flee commot for scene of di crime afta hin don realise hin mistake

translation.en: He was allegedly tracked down to his hiding place by policemen attached to Ijora Police Station, Lagos State Police Command.
translation.pcm: Policemen track am down to wia hin dey hide wey dey attached to Ijora police station , Lagos state police command

translation.en: Lagos State Police spokesman, Muyiwa Adejobi, in a statement issued on Wednesday night, said the crime occurred in the early hours of Tuesday, April 13, 2021.
translation.pcm: Muyiwa Adejobi wey be Lagos State tok tok pesin don yarn for one statement wey dem issues for Wednesday night say di crime occur for di early hours for Tuesday, April 13 2021

translation.en: Adejobi said the suspect was eventually arrested at about 2 pm after the victim, who was rushed to the hospital, was confirmed dead.
translation.pcm: Adejobi yarn say dem eventually arrest di suspect about 2pm afta dem rush di victim go hospital kom confirm am say hin don kpeme.

translation.en: He said detectives tracked the suspect to his hiding place, where he was arrested and his gun with some cartridges were recovered.
translation.pcm: Hin say detectives track di suspect go hin hiding place, wia dem arrest am and hin gun and some catridge wey dem recovered

translation.en: Constitution review: Senate holds public hearing in 12 states
translation.pcm: Constitutuion review; Senate don hold public hearing for 12 states

translation.en: The Senate Constitution Review Committee has said that a zonal public hearing on the review two public hearings per geopolitical zone.
translation.pcm: Di senate constitution review don tok am say di zonal public hearing on di review two public hearings per geopolitical zone.

translation.en: The event which would be held simultaneously across 12 states in Nigeria would witness two public hearings per geopolitical zone.
translation.pcm: Di event wey go simultaenously across 12 states for Naija go witness two public hearings per geopolitical zone.

translation.en: Also, a national public hearing is expected to be held in Abuja, the nations capital.
translation.pcm: Also a national public hearing suppose hold for Abuja wey be di nation a capital

translation.en: Chairman, Senate Committee on Constitution Review and Deputy President of the Senate, Senator Ovie Omo-Agege, disclosed this yesterday in Abuja.
translation.pcm: Chairman, Senate Committee on Constitution Review and Deputy President of di Senate, Senator Ovie Omo-Agege disclose am yesterday for Abuja

translation.en: Speaking while hosting members of the Legal Defence and Assistance Project (LEPAD) in his office led by its National Coordinator, Chimo Obiagwu (SAN), Senator Omo-Agege called on those who have already submitted memoranda to speak at the events.
translation.pcm: Speaking as hin dey host members of di legal defence and assistance projrct (LEPAD) for hin office wey na National Coordinator, Chino Obiagwu (SAN)lead am , Senator Omo-Agege called on those wey don already submit memeoranda to speak for di event

translation.en: According to him, the South East would hold the hearing in Owerri and Enugu, while the South South and South West would do it in Port Harcourt and Asaba as well as Akure and Lagos respectively.
translation.pcm: According to wetin hin tok , di South East go hold di hearing for Owerri and Enugu , while di South South and South West go do am for Port Harcourt and Asaba as well as Akure and Lagos respectively.

translation.en: Rabbit farming booms in Plateau
translation.pcm: Rabbit farming don boom for plateau

translation.en: The Secretary, Plateau Rabbit Breeders Association, Mr Pam Gyang, says rabbit farming has become popular in the state with many residents engaging in it.
translation.pcm: Di secretary, Plateau Rabbit Breeders Association, Mr Pam Gyang tok say rabbit farming don bikom popular for di state wit plenti residents engaging in it.

translation.en: Gyang who said this in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) on Tuesday in Jos, said it has become a household business just like poultry farming.
translation.pcm: Gyang tok am for an interview wit di News Agency of Naija on Tuesday for Jos, say e don bikom a household business just like poultry farming.

translation.en: Gyang said that many training outfits involved in the breeding and selling of live rabbits were springing up across the state.
translation.pcm: Gyang tok say plenti trainnig outfits wey dey involved for di breeding and selling of live rabbit don spring up across di state.

translation.en: The secretary said that rabbit rearing as a lucrative business could increase an individuals income and impact positively on the economy.
translation.pcm: Di secretary tok say rabbit rearing na lucrative business wey fit increase pesin income and impact positively on di economy.

translation.en: Rabbits are highly fertile and farmers sell according to their weight ranging from N1,800 to N5,000 or even more, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say rabbits dey highly fertile and farmers dey sell according to dia weight as e dey range from N1,800 to N5,000 or even more

translation.en: He said that during the lockdown occasioned by COVID-19 families came to the farm to request for rabbits cages and rabbits to startup farms at their backyards.
translation.pcm: Hin tok say for di lockdown wey COVID-19 occassioned families dey kom farm kom request for rabbits cages and rabbits to startup farms for dia backyards.

translation.en: He said that the high demand for rabbits meat as a result of its numerous health benefits over red meat aroused the interest of many farmers.
translation.pcm: Hin say di high demand for rabbits meat so tey di numerous health benefit over red meat don arouse di interest of plenti farmers.

translation.en: Gyang said that rabbit has low mortality rate and required minimal handling, adding that many people invested in rearing them to meet international market standard.
translation.pcm: Gyang say di get low mortality rate and e require minimal handling adding say plenti pipo don invest in rearing dem so e go meet international market standard.

translation.en: Our rabbit meat had gone as far as London and we still export them whenever they were demanded, â€œhe said.
translation.pcm: Hin say, awa rabbit meat don go as far as London and we go still export dem weneva dem demand for dem

translation.en: He also said that farmers could generate resources from the sale of the hide and skin of rabbit for textile industries and its faeces as source of fertilizer.
translation.pcm: Hin tok am say farmers dey generate resources from di sale of di hide and skin of rabbit for textile industries and hin faeces na source of fertilizer.

translation.en: Aero expands with Abuja-Bauchi flight
translation.pcm: Aero don follow Abuja-Bauchi expand flight

translation.en: Nigeria's oldest airline, Aero Contractors, has concluded an arrangement to commence flights from Abuja to Bauchi four times weekly beginning from Wednesday as part of its route expansion programme.
translation.pcm: Naijas oldest airline wey old pass don conclude for an arrangement say dem go commence flights from Abuja to Bauchi four times weekly beginning from Wednesday as part of its route expansion programme.

translation.en: The Bauchi flight would be closely followed by those of Maiduguri in Borno State and Calabar in Cross River on dates to be announced soon, according to the airline.
translation.pcm: According to di airline say dem go follow di Bauchi flight closely by those of Maiaduguri wey dey Borno state and Calabar wey dey Cross River on dates wey dem go announce soon

translation.en: The Managing Director of the Aero, Capt Abdullahi Mahmood, at a press conference in Lagos, said the Abuja-Bauchi flights would be operated every Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday.
translation.pcm: Di managing Director for di Aero, Capt Abdullahi Mahmood don tok am for one conference for Lagos say Dem go dey operate di Abuja-Bauchi flights Evri Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday.

translation.en: According to the schedule, the Bauchi flight will depart Abuja at 09:10 am, arriving at Bauchi at 10:10 am.
translation.pcm: According to wetin dem schedule, di Bauchi flight go depart Abuja at 09:10am and e go arrive for Bauchi at 10:10 am.

translation.en: The return leg will then depart Bauchi at 10:40 am, and arrive in Abuja at 11:40 on weekdays, while on Sunday the flight will depart Abuja for Bauchi at 09:50 am, with the return flight from Bauchi at 11:20 am.
translation.pcm: Di return leg do depart Bauchi for 10:40 and e go arrive for Abuja at 11:40 for weekdays , while for Sunday di flight go commot Abuja for Bauchi at 09:50 am, wit di return flight from Bauchi at 11:20 am.

translation.en: The MD explained that passengers from Lagos could fly to Bauchi via Abuja using the 06:45 am flight out of Lagos.
translation.pcm: Di MD don explain say di passengers wey dey kom from Lagos fit fly to Bauchi via Abuja using di di 06:45 am flight wey dey commot Lagos.

translation.en: I'm gonna sing for my life
translation.pcm: I go sing for my life

translation.en: Bauchi and Maiduguri are some of the underserved cities in Northern Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Bauchi and Maiduguri na some of di undeserving cities for di Northern Naija

translation.en: He added that the airlines Boeing 737-400 which would be used for the new routes had just been released from C-Check conducted at the Aero maintenance hangar
translation.pcm: Hin add am say na airlines Boeing 737-400 wey dem just release from C-Check conduct for di Aero maintenance hangar go be di one wey dem go use for di new routes

translation.en: Farmers raise concerns as CBN suspends Anchor Borrowers loans
translation.pcm: Farmers don raise concern as CBN don suspend anchor Borrowers loans

translation.en: Farmers and other stakeholders in the agricultural sector are expressing concern over the suspension of agricultural loans accessed through the Nigeria Incentive-Based Risk Sharing System for Agricultural Lending (NIRSAL) by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) recently.
translation.pcm: Farmers and oda stakeholders for di agricultural sector dey express dia concern over di suspension of agricultural loans wey dem dey access through di Naija Incentive-Based Risk Sharing System for Agricultural Lending (NIRSAL) by di Central Bank of Naija (CBN) recently

translation.en: I thought you were running from me
translation.pcm: I dey think say una dey run/jappa for me

translation.en: It handles most of the agric loans to farmers by the CBN, especially its popular Anchor Borrower Programme (ABP).
translation.pcm: E dey handle most of di agric loans to di farmers by di CBN especially its popular Anchor Borrower Programme (ABP).

translation.en: Now, the apex bank has said it suspects fraudulent activities in NIRSAL loans under the ABP and ordered for the suspension of such loans until all previously beneficiaries have paid back.
translation.pcm: Di apex bank say di fraudulent activities for NIRSAL loans under di ABP and dem order for di suspension of such loans until dem don pay all previous beneficiaries back.

translation.en: It is not yet clear if the suspension is on the CBN Anchor Borrowers Programme alone or also includes those of Micro finance banks through NIRSAL.
translation.pcm: E no dey clear yet if di suspension dey only on di Anchor Borrowers Programme alone or e also include those of Micro finance banks through NIRSAL.

translation.en: The suspension has grounded loan activities in NIRSAL and farmers are worried that, among others, the timing was wrong, as many of them have already gone far with plans to expand their agricultural production.
translation.pcm: Di suspension don ground loan activities fror NIRSAL and farmers dey worried say among odas, di timing dey wrong, as many of dem don go far wit plans say dem go expand dia agricultural production

translation.en: A farmer, Remini Femi, who appeared visibly worried said whats happening now is economically threatening and called on the CBN to please step in and save millions of Nigerians to access these loans for agricultural production.
translation.pcm: One farmer wey dey really worried say wetin dey apun now dey threaten di economy and e dey call on top di CBN make dem please step in and save millions of Naija pipo make dem access diS loans for agricultural production.

translation.en: Many farmers waiting for NIRSAL disbursement through their social media handle expressed sadness over the suspension of the loan facility as it threatened to ground their dreams for expansion.
translation.pcm: Plenti farmers wey dey wait for NIRSAL disbursement for di social media handle don express sadness over di suspension of di loan facility as e dey threaten to ground dia dreams for expansion.

translation.en: Reacting to the development in a chat with our Agric Editor, the leadership of the All Farmer Association of Nigeria, headed by Architect Kabiru Ibrahim, said though the CBN blames NIRSAL in the non-performance of the ABP, it should do the needful in fishimg out those responsible.
translation.pcm: As hin dey react to di development for di chat wit awa Agric Editor, di leadership of all di farmers association of Naija, wey Architect Kabiru Ibrahin dey head am, tok say thoughdi CBN dey blames NIRSAL for di non-performance of di ABP, make dem do di needful in fishing out those wey dey responsible.

translation.en: It should continue to provide qualified farmers the much-needed support.
translation.pcm: Make e dey kontinu to provide qualified farmers di support wey dem need

translation.en: â€œWe urge the CBN to do due diligence in prequalifying farmers who participate in the programme because several cases of briefcase farmers who pose as real farmers abound.
translation.pcm: We dey urge di CBN make dem do due dilligence in prequalifying farmers wey dey participate for di programme bikos several cases of briefcase farmers wey dey pose as real farmers abound.

translation.en: These collude with some NIRSAL officials to defraud the programme.
translation.pcm: Dem collude wit some NIRSAL officials make dem defraud di programme

translation.en: â€œTimely repayment which is not forthcoming in the ABP is largely due to this fraud.
translation.pcm: Timely repayment no dey forthkoming for di ABP bikos of di fraud

translation.en: Anyone who gives bribe to take a loan with an interest component has no desire to repay it.
translation.pcm: Anyone wey give bribe to take a loan wit an interest component no get desire to repay am

translation.en: â€œOur initial understanding of the role of NIRSAL was to primarily incentivize commercial banks to embrace lending for agricultural production but certainly not to prequalify prospective loan seeking companies.
translation.pcm: awa initial understanding of di role of di NIRSAL na to primarily incentivize commercial banks make dem embrace lending for agricultural production but certainly no be to prequalify prospective loan seeking companies.

translation.en: This is how corruption took over and the farmers are now the worse for it.
translation.pcm: dis na how corruption take take over and di farmers now be di worst for it

translation.en: We call on the CBN to reverse its decision on the disbursement of the ABP support to farmers, he said.
translation.pcm: Hin say we dey call on top di CBN make e reverse di decision on top di disbursement of di ABP support to farmers

translation.en: Dr Femi Oke, AFAN chairman, South-west Zone, said the suspension of the NIRSAL loans would greatly impact food production in the country.
translation.pcm: Dr Femi Oke wey be di AFAN chairman for South-west zone say di suspension of di NIRSAL loans go impact food production for di kontri greatly

translation.en: Oke, speaking to the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN), in Lagos, urged the CBN to investigate the allegations against NIRSAL without undermining the various efforts of farmers toward achieving food security and self-sufficiency.
translation.pcm: As Oke dey follow di News Agency of Naija (NAN) for Lagos don urge di CBN make dem investigate di allegations wey dey against NIRSAL witout undermining di various efforts wey farmers get toward achieving food security and self-sufficiency.

translation.en: He called on the CBN to resolve the issues surrounding the suspension of the NIRSAL loans
translation.pcm: Hin call on top di CBN make dem resolve di issues wey dey surround di suspension of di NIRSAL loans

translation.en: The AFAN official said many farmers were disappointed by the sudden suspension of the Anchor Borrowers Programme (ABP) and NIRSAL loans, as they provided a lot of support to smallholder farmers.
translation.pcm: Di AFAN official say dem disappointed plenti farmers by di suspension of di Anchor Borrowers Programme (ABP) and NIRSAL loans, as dem dey provide a lot of support to smallholder farmers.

translation.en: The CBN recently suspended all loans disbursed by NIRSAL, following widespread allegations of corruption by its officials, NAN also reported.
translation.pcm: NAN also reported say di CBN recently suspend all loans wey di NIRSAL disburse following di allegation of corruption by its officials

translation.en: Whats on your mind
translation.pcm: Wetin dey una mind

translation.en: The memo said the decision would only be reversed after all outstanding loans disbursed to farmers through NIRSAL were paid.
translation.pcm: Di memo say dem go only reverse di decision afta dem pay all outstanding loan wey farmers neva pay back

translation.en: According to Oke, â€œwhen we heard about the suspension of NIRSAL loans, we knew immediately that this is not good for the farmers and the sector.
translation.pcm: According to wetin Oke yarn wen we hear about di suspension of di NIRSAL loans, we don know immediately say dis no good for di farmers and di sector.

translation.en: From what we heard, the suspension is based upon the ABP.
translation.pcm: for wetin we hear, dem base di suspension for di ABP

translation.en: We want CBN to lay more emphasis on how it will go about it because some of the farmers have done their interview on NIRSAL loans, while others are awaiting disbursement of the funds.
translation.pcm: We want make CBN lay more emphasis on how dem go go about am bikos some of di farmers don go do interview on NIRSAL loans, while odas dey await di disbursement of di funds.

translation.en: What will be their fate now?
translation.pcm: wetin go be dia fate now?

translation.en: This is not good and we implore government to look into the issue and address it, he said.
translation.pcm: hin say, e no good and we dey implore make goverment chook mouth for di mata and address am

translation.en: Oke urged the federal government to intervene, in order not to jeopardise the efforts of farmers that have already invested in their farms, and those already waiting for the loans to enable them to prepare for the planting season.
translation.pcm: Oke don urge di goverment make di federal goverment intervene, in order make e no jeopardise di efforts wey farmers wey don invest for hin farm, and those wey dey wait for di loans wey go make dem plant dis season

translation.en: â€œSomethimg needs to be done immediately in order not to jeopardise the effort of the farmers that are still ready to go back to the farm.
translation.pcm: Dem need do something immediately make e no go jeopardise di effort of di farmers say dem ready to go back to di farm

translation.en: Very many farmers, specifically in the South-West, are waiting for the loan and they expect that by now it should have been disbursed.
translation.pcm: Plenti farmers specifically in di South-West dey wait on top di loan and dem dey expect say by now dem suppose disburse am

translation.en: Very few of our members have been able to access the loan, a very large number have not even gotten access to the interview.
translation.pcm: Very few of awa members don get access to di loan, plenti neva get access to di interview

translation.en: I have also not done the interview myself.
translation.pcm: me self neva do di interview

translation.en: I am still waiting to be selected.
translation.pcm: I still dey wait make dem select me

translation.en: Farmers are not happy about the suspension of the loan,â€ he stressed.
translation.pcm: hin stressed am say, farmers no dey hapi on top di suspension of loan

translation.en: The AFAN chairman said even the NIRSAL selection process had been slow due to the COVID-19 pandemic, such that only about 10 per cent of our farmers have benefited from the loan.
translation.pcm: Di AFAN chairman don tok am for di NIRSAL selection process say e dey slow bikos of di COVID-19 pandemic such dat na only about 10 per cent of awa farmers don benefit for di loan.

translation.en: We want the federal government to clarify if the suspension is on the CBN Anchor Borrowers Programme alone and on the Microfinance bank through NIRSAL,â€ he said.
translation.pcm: Hin say we want make di federal goverment clarify if di suspension go dey on di CBN Anchor Borrowers Programme alone and on di Microfinance bank through NIRSAL

translation.en: There is no immediate reaction from the management of NIRSAL over the suspension of the loans as an official, who craved anonymity, said only the CBN can talk on the matter and it has spoken.
translation.pcm: Immediate reaction from di NIRSAL no dey ova di suspension of di loans as an official, wey crave make e dey anonymous, tok say na only di CBN fit tok on top di mata and e don tok.

translation.en: Sources at the apex bank said the suspension was to ensure efficiency in the system and assured farmers of the bank's commitment to guarantee food security.
translation.pcm: Sources for di apex bank tok say di suspension dey to ensure efficiency for di system and assure farmers for di bank's commitment to guarantee food security

translation.en: Gunmen break into Italian residence of ex-Manchester star
translation.pcm: gunmen don break into reseidence for ex-Manchester star

translation.en: Armed men in the early hours of Friday held Chris Smalling, a footballer, and his family at gunpoint in their home in Italy.
translation.pcm: Armed men for di early hours of Friday hold Chris Smalling, one footballer, and hin family at gunpoint for dia home wey dey Italy

translation.en: According to reports, the footballer was inside the house with his model wife and two-year-old son when three masked men barged in and forced him to open the family's safe.
translation.pcm: According to wetin reports say, di footballer dey inside di house wit hin wife wey be model and hin pikin wey be 2-year-old wen three men wey wear mask barge in and force am make hin open di family safe

translation.en: Smalling was forced to hand over his Rolex watch, and other valuables from the safe
translation.pcm: dem force smalling make e hand over hin Rolex watch, and oda valuables wey dey di safe

translation.en: The police received a call from Smallings wife , Sam, around 5am,and officers arrived at the familys villa , located 25miles south of Rome.
translation.pcm: Di police received a call from Sam wey be Smallings wife around 5am,and officers arrive for di familys villa , wey dem fit locate 25miles south of Rome.

translation.en: The police are still investigating the incident and Roma has offered to support the player.
translation.pcm: di police still dey investigate di incident and Roma don offer say hin go support di player

translation.en: He lives with his wife Sam, a glamour model from Manchester.

translation.en: Woman stabs 14-year-old boy to death in Bayelsa

translation.en: A middle-aged woman, said to be mentally deranged has stabbed to death a 14-year-old boy in Yenagoa, Bayelsa state capital.
translation.pcm: One middle-aged woman wey dem tok say she dey mentally deranged don stab one 14-year-old boy for Yenagoa, wey be di Bayelsa state capital.

translation.en: The victim, identified as Joseph Thomas, was stabbed along Genesis street, off Okaka road of the city at about 7.30am on Tuesday morning.
translation.pcm: Dem stab di victim wey dem identify as Joseph Thomas along Genesis street wey dey off Okaka road of di city at about 7.30am on Tuesday morning.

translation.en: The incident threw the neighbours into shock which later degenerated into mob action against the suspected woman and nearly beat her to death.
translation.pcm: Di incident wey shock neighboour later degenerate into mob action against di woman wey dem suspect as dem nearly beat am to death

translation.en: It was gathered that the quick arrival of the Patrol team of the Bayelsa State Police Command rescued the woman from the angry mob who wanted to retaliate the boys death.
translation.pcm: Dem gather am for di quick arrival of di patrol team for di Bayelsa state police command wey rescue di woman from di angry mob wey wan retaliate di boys death.

translation.en: Some residents of the community told Daily Trust that the accused woman is believed to be deranged and had attempted to stab another boy few meters away from where she killed the 14-year boy.
translation.pcm: Some residents for di community don follow Daily Trust tok say di woman wey dem believe say e dey deranged don attempt to stab anoda boy few meters away from wia she killed di 14-year boy.

translation.en: Daily Trust leant that the woman had stabbed another boy in the arm along mountain of fire road, Okaka before proceeding to kill her victim.
translation.pcm: Daily trust learn am say di woman don stab anoda boy for arm along mountain of fire road, Okaka before she proceed go kill her victim.

translation.en: One of the residents of the Genesis streets identified as Panebi said the woman, who is an indigene of Enugu State, is known to preach the gospel of Christ in the early hours of the morning along the Okaka road.
translation.pcm: One of di residents of di Genesis street wey identify as Panebi tok say dem know di woman , wey be an indigene for Enugu State, say she dey preach di gospel of Christ for di early hours of di morning along di Okaka road.

translation.en: He said: But on this particular day, she was usually carrying a Bible and started displaying strange behaviors by displaying a dagger.
