translation.en: Hunger, poverty and the challenge of innovative food storage
translation.pcm: Hunger, poverty and di challenge for innovative food storage

translation.en: If you visit many offices across Nigeria at lunchtime during the months of May, June, July and August, chances are high that you will find a good number of workers munchimg away at mouth
translation.pcm: If una visit plenti offices across di kontri for lunchtime during di months of may, june, july and August, chances dey high say una go find a good number of workers wey dey munch am for mouth.

translation.en: Yes, with corn in season, one of the most popular delicacies at this time is the combination of roasted corn (popularly code-named as mouth organ) and the African pear.
translation.pcm: True as corn don dey season one of di delicacies for dis time na di combination of roasted corn ( wey dem popularly code-name as mouth organ) and di pear for Africa pear.

translation.en: Coconut is an occasional close substitute for pear and this writer has it on good authority that many people find the coconut and mouth-organ combination, just as delicious too.
translation.pcm: Coconut na ocassional substitute wey dey close to pear dis writer get good authority ova am say plenti pipo dey find di coconut and a mouth-organ combination say e delicious

translation.en: Outside of those months when both corn and pear are in season, this delicious combination is unavailable.
translation.pcm: Outside dis months wey corn and pear dey season di combination no dey dey available

translation.en: Interestingly, during those harvest months, enough corn and pear to sustain the country for a substantial period, perhaps even an entire year, may have been harvested.
translation.pcm: During di harvest months enough corn and pear wey go sustain di kontri for a substantial period, perhaps na an entire year, dem go don harvest am

translation.en: But with inadequate knowledge and utilisation of modern and cost-effective storage and preservation methods, tonnes of maize and pear end up wasted every year.
translation.pcm: But wit inadequate knowledge and how dem go utilize modern and cost-effective storage and preservation methods, tonnes of maize and pear just dey waste Evri year.

translation.en: The same applies to many other agricultural commodities in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di same dey apply to oda agricultural commodities for Naija

translation.en: At harvest periods, there is often a surplus, but in the absence of proper storage, a huge proportion of these harvests eventually goes to waste.
translation.pcm: For harvest periods, surplus dey often dey, but in di absence of proper storage, a huge proportion of dis harvest dey waste.

translation.en: These perennial losses pose a huge threat to the economic wellbeing of farmers, the majority of whom operate at the subsistence level.
translation.pcm: Dis perennial issues don pose one huge threat to di economic well-being of farmers, di major wey dey operate for di subsistence level.

translation.en: The challenge, which this problem of poor storage and preservation of food poses to our country, becomes even more haunting when one considers the difficulties with which we are likely to be confronted in the post-COVID era.
translation.pcm: Di challenge wey be di kwanta of poor storge and preservation of food dey pose to awa kontri, don bekom more haunting wen pesin dey consider di difficulties wey confront us for di post-COVID era

translation.en: It is, therefore, imperative that beyond improving the volumes of our agricultural output, we look critically at how to empower farmers across the country to better manage their harvests.
translation.pcm: E dey imperative say beyond di volume of awa agricultural output wey dey improve make we look critically at how we go empower farmers across di kontri manage dia harvests beta

translation.en: This will translate to immense economic value not only to the farmers themselves whose livelihoods will be enhanced, but also to the country as a whole, as more food will become more widely available and for extended periods, for consumption and export.
translation.pcm: Na dis go translate to immense economic value not only to di farmers demselves wey go enhance dia livelihoods, but also to di kontri as a whole, as plenti food go dey available for extended periods , for consumption and export

translation.en: Instructively, a number of research organisations and universities have over the years introduced different solutions to the problem of post-harvest losses.
translation.pcm: Plenti research organisations and universities don introduce different solutions to di kwanta of post-harvest losses as di years dey pass

translation.en: The innovations that have been developed, being home-grown, are unique because they reflect the realities of our local environment.
translation.pcm: Di innovations wey dem don develop, being home-grown dey unique bikos dem dey reflect di reality of awa local goverment

translation.en: Not only are they relatively cheap, as they are also often technically uncomplicated, but farmers can adopt them readily.
translation.pcm: No be say dem dey relatively cheap, as dem dey often dey technically uncomplicated, but farmers fit adopt dem readily

translation.en: In the area of fish farming for instance, there is an innovation known as the iced-fish box with which harvested fish may be stored in order to remain fresh on transportation to the market from the farm or ahead of processing and storage.
translation.pcm: For di area of fish farming, one innovation dey wey dem dey call am iced-fish box wey dem go use harvest fish go store am so e go remain fresh on transportation to di market from di farm or ahead of processing and storage.

translation.en: In addition, specialised smoking kilns have been developed to replace the labour-intensive, yet inefficient and unhealthy traditional fish smoking methods.
translation.pcm: Dem don develop special smoking kilns wey go replace di labour-intensive, traditional fish smoking methods wey no dey efficient and e dey unhealthy

translation.en: Output from these kilns is good enough for export and is several multiples of what is ordinarily obtainable by traditional fish-smoking methods.
translation.pcm: Outputs wey dey commot for dis kilns be good enough for export and e dey several multiples of wetin dem dey ordinarily obtain for traditional fish-smoking methods.

translation.en: Nigerian researchers have also produced composite packaging material that can be used for packaging such smoked fish or even smoked meat as the case may be, preserving the end-product and boosting its commercial appeal.
translation.pcm: Naija researchers don also produce composite packaging material wey dem fit use package dat kain smoked fish or even smoked meat as di case fit be, preserving di end-product and e dey boost di commercial appeal

translation.en: Whether it is beans, corn or rice that become discoloured, mouldy, smelly or infested with weevils, grains pose problems of storage for farmers, often leading to considerable financial losses.
translation.pcm: If to say na beans, corn or rice wey don discoloured, mouldy, smelly or e dey infected wit weevils, grains dey pose gbege of storage for farmers and e dey lead to considerable financial losses

translation.en: In the past, grains exported from Nigeria have also faced rejection because of the unacceptable levels of residual pesticides they contain.
translation.pcm: For di past, grains wey dem dey export from Naija don face rejection bikos of di unacceptable level of residual pesticides wey dem contain

translation.en: Local researchers have been active in the area of grain preservation, churning out a handful of innovative solutions over the years.
translation.pcm: Local researchers wey dey active for di area of grain preservation, churning out of a handful of innovative solutions ova di years

translation.en: For instance, there are solar dryers that have been developed for different products.
translation.pcm: For instance, solar dryers wey dem develop for different products dey

translation.en: Given the abundance of sunshime in our country and the simplicity of construction of these dryers, they are relatively affordable by the average farmer.
translation.pcm: If to say di abundance of sunshine wey dey awa kontri and di simplicity of construction of dis dryers, dem dey available for average farmers

translation.en: Construction can also be easily replicated in local settings.
translation.pcm: Dem fit replicate construction easily for di local setin

translation.en: Essentially, these solar dryers work to enhance the efficiency of drying of agricultural produce.
translation.pcm: Dis solar dryers work dey enhance di efficiency of drying of agricultural produce

translation.en: They do this by concentrating the rays of the sun on a particular surface, enhancing drying efficiency over the traditional method of spreading grains, cassava and plantain peelings and others, indiscriminately under the sun.
translation.pcm: Dem dey do dis as dem dey concentrate di rays of di sun on a particular surface, wey go dey enhance drying efficiency over di traditional method wey dem dey take use spread grains, cassava, plantain peeling and odas indiscriminately under di sun

translation.en: Specially constructed steel drums which when properly shut become airtight (hermetic) and with which farmers can store grains over several months have also been developed by local researchers.
translation.pcm: local researchers don develop specially constructed steel drums wey wen dem shut am bikom airtight (hermit) and e dey allow make farmers store grains ova several months

translation.en: There are specialised storage silos as well, which can help store and preserve grains over many months.
translation.pcm: Dem be specialised storage silos wey fit help store and preserve grains over plenti months

translation.en: There is in fact, a particular twin silo, which can jointly accommodate up to 100 tonnes of grains at a time.
translation.pcm: In fact one twin silo dey, wey fit accommodate 100 tonnes of grains at a time

translation.en: Local researchers have also developed bio-pesticides as an alternative to chemical pesticides.
translation.pcm: Local researchers don also develop bio-pesticide as an alternative to chemical pesticides

translation.en: Commonly available chemical pesticides though effective against pests are often harmful to man and the environment, too.
translation.pcm: Chemical pesticides wey dey available though effective against pest dey harmful to man and hin environment, too

translation.en: Bio-pesticides, on the other hand, are much safer and constitute no environmental hazard.
translation.pcm: Bio-pesticide for di oda hand, dey much safer and dem dey constitute no hazard for environment

translation.en: One of such pesticides (NSPRIDUST), an innovation by the Nigerian Stored Products Research Institute, is made from diatomaceous earth, a powdery form of a naturally occurring rock in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Dem make One of such pesticide (NSPRIDUST) wey be an innovation by di Naija stored product research institute, from diatomaceous earth, wey be a powdery form wey dey occure for rock naturally for Naija

translation.en: Bio-pesticides will help to make Nigerian grains potentially more acceptable in the export market.
translation.pcm: Bio-pesticides go help make Naija grains potentially dey more acceptable for di export market

translation.en: Fruits and vegetables are not left out of the problem of poor preservation and storage in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: We no fit leave fruit and vegetable out of di problem of poor preservation and storage for Naija

translation.en: While we import apples, pears, strawberries and other fruits round-the-clock, there is not much that can be said about Nigerias fruit exports.
translation.pcm: As we dey import apple, pears, strawberries and oda fruits round-di-clock plenti no dey wey we go yarn on top Naija's fruit exports

translation.en: Again, Nigeria's researchers have also over time, heralded different solutions to this problem.
translation.pcm: Again, over time Naija researchers don herald different solutions to dis yawa wey dey ground

translation.en: There is the specially constructed fruit and vegetable shed for instance, made of simple and locally available raw materials, and which helps farmers to preserve fruits and vegetables for longer.
translation.pcm: One shed wey dem construct specially for fruit and vegetable for instance, wey dem make of simple and raw materials wey be local ones , and e dey help farmers preserve fruits and vegegtables for long

translation.en: Then, there is the fruit dryer, which by drying certain fruits helps to preserve them.
translation.pcm: Den, di fruit dryer, wey dey dry certain fruits dey help to preserve dem

translation.en: Local researchers are working fervently on fruit and vegetable conservation using the principle of evaporative cooling
translation.pcm: Local researcher dey work fervently on top fruits and vegetable conservation using di principle of evaporative cooling

translation.en: Evaporative cooling is the cooling that results when water evaporates from a surface.
translation.pcm: Evaporative cooling na di cooling wey dey result make water evaporate from a surface

translation.en: Incidentally, fruit and vegetable preservation using evaporative cooling is not new, having been practised for decades in traditional settings in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Incidentally, di use of evaporative cooling for fruit and vegetable preservation no be new thing, as dem don dey practice am for traditional setin for Naija

translation.en: Researchers are now keen to find new ways to enhance the efficiency and efficacy of traditional evaporative cooling systems in order to preserve the shelf life of fruits and vegetables over a longer duration.
translation.pcm: Researchers don dey find way wey dem go take use enhance di efficiency of traditional evaporative cooling systems wey dem go use preserve di shelf life of fruits and vegetables ova a duration of time

translation.en: For tubers such as yams and potatoes, local researchers have long come up with such products as ventilated yam barns for the storage of yam tubers, diffused-light store for the storage of potatoes, cassava root warehouse for the storage of cassava roots among many others.
translation.pcm: For tubers of yam and potatoes, local researchers don kom up wit products like ventilated yam barns wey go dey store yam tubers, diffused-light store wey go dey for di storage of potatoes, cassava root warehouse wey go dey store cassava roots among odas

translation.en: There is no doubt that widespread adoption of these technologies by farmers across the country will help to considerably stem the tide of post-harvest losses in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Doubt no dey say widespread adoption of dis technologies by farmers across di kontri go help to considerably stem di tide of post-harvest losses for Naija

translation.en: This will, one must repeat, translate to significant economic value not only for the farmers and the wider agricultural value chain but for the entire country as well.
translation.pcm: Na dis, one suppose repeat go transalate to significant economic value wey no go be for only farmers and di agricultural chain rate wey wide but also for di entire kontri as well

translation.en: Getting the agricultural value chain to increasingly adopt these innovations will entail patient and systematic engagement.
translation.pcm: To get di agricultural value chain make e increasingly adopt diz innovations go entail patient and sysyematic engagement

translation.en: Farmers cooperatives and associations will be a good medium with which to reach farmers across the country with information and education.
translation.pcm: Farmers cooperatives and association go be good medium wey go help reach farmers across di kontri wit information and education

translation.en: So, is the media and media institutions.
translation.pcm: na so di media and media institutions

translation.en: Research institutes and faculties of agriculture in our various universities, being vital hotbeds of innovation, must work more collaboratively in order to jointly share and popularise innovations that are emanating therefrom.
translation.pcm: Research institutes and faculties for agriculture for awa various universities, wey be vital hotbeds for innovation, go work collaboratively so tey dem go jointly share and popularise innovations wey dem dey emanate diafrom

translation.en: Agricultural chambers of commerce are a potential source of popularising these innovations especially among policymakers and influencers should also be engaged.
translation.pcm: Agricultural chambers for commerce be potential source of popularising dis innovations especially as e dey among policymakers and influencers suppose be involved also

translation.en: The increasing penetration of smartphones across the country also presents an opportunity with which to reach millions of farmers with information and education.
translation.pcm: Di increasing penetration of smartphones across di kontri also present opportunity wey go reach millions of farmers wit information and education

translation.en: Pessu is the Executive Director of Nigerian Stored Products Research Institute, Ilorin
translation.pcm: Pessu na di executive director for Naija stored products research insitute for Ilorin

translation.en: Joblessness forced us into crime Suspects says
translation.pcm: Suspect tok say na joblessness force us go crime suspect

translation.en: A ten-man armed robbery gang arrested for allegedly attacking people in traffic in Lagos have all confessed that they went into crime because of their state of joblessness.
translation.pcm: One ten-man armed robbery gang wey dem arrest for alllegedly attacking di pipo in traffic for Lagos don confess say dem go crime bikos dem no get jobb

translation.en: Some of the suspects were arrested along rail-line at Ikeja while others were nabbed from their hideouts based on the confessional statement made by the suspects.
translation.pcm: Dem arrest some of di suspects along Rail-line for Ikeja while dem nab odas for dia hideouts based on di confessional statement wey di suspects make

translation.en: It was learnt that their arrest is a sequel to resolve by the state police command to tackle criminality in the metropolis.
translation.pcm: Dem learn am say dia arrest na sequel to resolve by di state police command to tackle ciminality for di metropolis

translation.en: The state Commissioner of Police, Hakeem Odumosu, had deployed more men to tackle the increasing cases of traffic robbery in the state.
translation.pcm: di commissioner of police, Hakeem Odumosu, don deploy more men make dem go tackle di case of traffic robbery wey dey increas for di state

translation.en: The Commissioner has rejigged the commands strategies to suppress, raid and arrest hoodlums at the identified areas/hideouts across the state.
translation.pcm: di commissioner don rejigged di command strategy make dem supresss am, raid and arrest hoodlums for di identified areas/hideouts wey dey acrosss di state

translation.en: One of the suspects, Olamide Johnson, 22, told police interrogators at the command headquarters, Ikeja, that he and members of the gang went into robbery because of their joblessness.
translation.pcm: one of di suspects, Olamide Johnson, 22, yarn di police interrogators for di command headquarters, Ikeja, say hin and members wey dey di gang go robbery on top say dem no get job

translation.en: We don't want to wait to die of hunger that was why we embarked on the easy way out, which is robbery.
translation.pcm: we no want make hunger kill us na why we embark on top di easy way out, wey be robbery

translation.en: We never knew that it is not so easy like we thought he said.
translation.pcm: hin tok say we neva know say e no easy as we dey think am before

translation.en: Lagos State Police Spokesman, Muyiwa Adejobi, who spoke on the arrest, said the command regularly arrested traffic robbers for allegedly being involved in acts of terror.
translation.pcm: tok tok pesin for Lagos state police, Muyiwa Adejobi don yarn on top di arrest say di command dey regularly arrest traffic robbers wey dem allege say dem dey involved in acts wey be terror

translation.en: Adejobi said during most of the attacks, the suspects had allegedly dispossessed innocent people of their belongings in the state.
translation.pcm: Adejobi tok am tok say durin most of di attack, di suspect don allegedly dispossess innocent pipo wey be dia belongin for di state

translation.en: In furtherance of the commands anti-crime measures, the police operatives attached to the Strike Team of the Command, on May 1, 2021, at 2 pm, arrested 11 suspected cultists and traffic robbers who were attacking and dispossessing innocent people of their belongings at Railway Crossing, Ikeja, along, Ikeja-Lagos.
translation.pcm: To further di command anti-crime measures, di police operatives join di Strike Team of the Command, on May 1, 2021, for 2 pm, dem arrest 11 cultists wey dem suspect and traffic thief dem wey dey attack and dispossessin innocent pipo of dia belongins for Railway Crossin, Ikeja, along, Ikeja-Lagos.

translation.en: The operatives who responded to a distress call from one of the victims (name withheld), raced to the area and arrested some of the suspects in action while others were arrested at their hideouts.
translation.pcm: Di operative wey respond to one distress call from one of di victim(dey no tell di name) run go di area and hin arrest some of di suspect for action wen dey kom arrest di oda for dia hideout

translation.en: They have confessed to the crime.
translation.pcm: Dey don confess to di crime

translation.en: The suspects also revealed that they attack their targets with iron rods, guns, cutlasses and charms during operation.
translation.pcm: Di suspect also reveal say dem attack dia target wit iron rod, gun, cutlass and charm wen dem dey operate

translation.en: In the course of the police investigation, the suspects identified one of their receivers as Idris Adamu, 42.
translation.pcm: Wen dem police dey do investigation, di suspect identify one of dia receiver wey be Idris Adamu, wey be 42

translation.en: He was immediately arrested at Alade Market, Lagos State.
translation.pcm: Dem immediately arrest am for Alade Market, for Lagos

translation.en: A gold necklace of one of the victims and many other suspected stolen items like phones, necklaces, watches etc.
translation.pcm: Gold necklace of one of di victim and many oda suspect den thins wey dem steal wey be phone, necklace, watch like dat like dat

translation.en: , were recovered from him,he said.
translation.pcm: Na hin dey collect from hin hand him tok

translation.en: He said police operatives were presently interrogating the suspects in order to extract more information on their mode of operations, membership and accomplices so as to apprehend other members of the gang and those who conspired with them in committing the dastardly act in the area and across the state.
translation.pcm: He tok say police operatives dey interrogatin di suspects dem so dem go fit get more information on how dem dey operate, membership and accomplice, sodem go fit catch oda members of di gang and di pipo wey dey join hand wit dem to dey commit dis bad act dem for di area and across di state.

translation.en: The suspects are Sadiq Masaki, 22, Oladimeji Olatunbosun, 24, Adam Hassan, 21, Tunde Afolayan, 24, Michael Ademola, 22, Olamide Johnson, 20, Abiodun Opeyemi, 22, Oluseyi Agbaje, 21, Daniel Ayomide, 20 and Adebayo Tobi, 21.
translation.pcm: Di suspects dem na Sadiq Masaki, 22, Oladimeji Olatunbosun, 24, Adam Hassan, 21, Tunde Afolayan, 24, Michael Ademola, 22, Olamide Johnson, 20, Abiodun Opeyemi, 22, Oluseyi Agbaje, 21, Daniel Ayomide, 20 and Adebayo Tobi, 21.

translation.en: The Commissioner of Police, Lagos State, Hakeem Odumosu, has ordered that the Strike Team should profile the suspects and go after their gang members and conspirators as the command will not spare anyone who engages in any act of criminality, no matter its magnitude,he said.
translation.pcm: Di Commissioner of Police, Lagos State, Hakeem Odumosu, has ordered that the Strike Team should profile the suspects and go after their gang members and conspirators as the command will not spare anyone who engages in any act of criminality, no matter its magnitude,he said.

translation.en: Adejobi further said that the police boss also directed that the Commander RRS, the Commander Task force and other tactical commanders should sectorise the state for easy operation and get rid of traffic robbers and other criminals in order to accord perfect and excellent service delivery as well as effective security to all and sundry in Lagos State.
translation.pcm: Adejobi tok again say police oga also direct Commander RRS, di Commander Task force and oda tactical commanders make dem sectorise di state for easy operation and make dem carri all di traffic robbers dem and oda criminals so dem fit deliver di service wella, make securitydey for evribodi wey dey Lagos State.

translation.en: Leicester blow Champions League chance as Kane signs off with Golden Boot
translation.pcm: Leicester blow Champion  Leaugue chance as Kane sign comot wit Golden Boot

translation.en: Leicester blew the chance to qualify for the Champions League for just the second time in the clubs history as the Foxes lost 4-2 to Tottenham on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Leicester blow di chance to qualify for Champion Leaugue for di second time for di club history as dem Foxes lost 4-2 give Tottenham for Sunday

translation.en: Jamie Vardy twice put Brendan Rodgerss men ahead from the penalty spot.
translation.pcm: Jamie Vardy don for second time put Brendan Rodger man ahead from di penalty spot

translation.en: But Harry Kane, on what could be his final appearance for Spurs, a Kasper Schmeichel own goal and a late double from Gareth Bale secured seventh place in the Premier League for Tottenham and a place in next seasons Europa Conference League.
translation.pcm: But Harry Kane, on top wetin fit be hin final appearance for Spurs, Kasper Scheichel goal and di late double wey kom from Gareth Bale secure dem seven place for di Premier League for Tottenham and kom place for next season for Europa conference leaugue

translation.en: Leicester spent more days in the Premier League top four than any other club this season, but for the second consecutive year they fell away in the final weeks of the campaign to miss out on the riches and prestige of Champions League football.
translation.pcm: prestige of champion league

translation.en: Chelseas 2-1 defeat at Aston Villa opened the door for the FA Cup winners to take advantage and move into fourth.
translation.pcm: Chelsea 2-1 defeat for Aston Villa don open di door for di FA Cup winner to take advantage kom move go fourth

translation.en: For much of a dramatic afternoon, it looked like Leicester would do just that as Vardy slotted home his first penalty on 18 minutes.
translation.pcm: For plenti drama afternoon, e look like say Leicester go do am as Vardy slot for house hin first plenalty for 18 minute

translation.en: Kane is keen to move on from his boyhood club after Tottenham also missed out on the Champions League for a second straight year.
translation.pcm: Kane is keen to move on from his boyhood club after Tottenham also missed out on the Champions League for a second straight year.

translation.en: But the England captain secured the consolation prize of winning the Golden Boot as he slammed home his 23rd Premier League goal of the campaign four minutes before half-time.
translation.pcm: But the England captain secured the consolation prize of winning the Golden Boot as he slammed home his 23rd Premier League goal of the campaign four minutes before half-time.

translation.en: Vardy was spot on again seven minutes into the second-half to put Leicester back in pole position to round off a fine season after lifting the FA Cup for the first time in their history last weekend.
translation.pcm: Vardy don dey for spot again seven minutes make e reach second half make dem put Leicester back for pole position make dem use am round off one fine season afta dem don lift di FA cup for di first time in dia hitori for last weekend

translation.en: Schmeichel was one of the heroes at Wembley eight days ago, but the Danes mistake cost his side dear with a place in the Champions League worth at least a £60 million.
translation.pcm: Schmeichel wey be one of di heroes for Wembley eight days ago, but di Danes mistake bikost am hin side wit a place in di Champions League wey worth at least £60 million

translation.en: The Leicester captain flapped at a corner to punch the ball into his own net 14 minutes from time.
translation.pcm: Di captain of Leicester flapp for one corner to punch di ball into im own net as e remain 14 minute make time end.

translation.en: With the home side then chasing a winner, Bale struck twice in the final 10 minutes to also sign off his loan spell from Real Madrid on a high.
translation.pcm: With as di home side dey take chase winner, Bale be strike twice for inside di final 10 minute to also take im end im loan spell for Real Madrid on a high.

translation.en: Leicester were furious
translation.pcm: Leicester dey furious die

translation.en: Kane was not penalised for handball before he teed up the Welshman to slot into an unguarded goal.
translation.pcm: Dem no penalise Kane for handball before hin teed up di Welshman to slot into goal wey dem no guard

translation.en: Bale then tapped home his 16th goal of the season after his initial effort came off the post deep into stoppage time.
translation.pcm: Bale den tapped home hin 16th goal for di season afta hin initial effort kom off for di post deep into stoppage time

translation.en: Gbaja: 1999 Constitution is a product of hurried national consensus
translation.pcm: Gbaja: 1999 constitution na product of national consensus wey dem do quick quick

translation.en: The Speaker, House of Representatives, Femi Gbajabiamila, has said the recent move to amend the 1999 Constitution is necessary to address its shortcomings.
translation.pcm: Di Speaker, House of Assembly, Femi Gbajabiamila, tok say di 1999 constitution wey dey wan correct recently na to tok about di place dem wey no good.

translation.en: Gbajabiamila was quoted to have said this in his address at the ongoing zonal public hearing on constitution review in Lagos State.
translation.pcm: Dem quote Gbajabiamila say hin tok am for hin address for di Zonal public hearing on top constitution review mata wey dey apun for Lagos state

translation.en: He said the 1999 Constitution was a product of a hurried national consensus taken to return the country to democracy.
translation.pcm: He tok say di constitution na product of national consensus wey dem rush do to return di kontri go democracy back.

translation.en: Our constitution falls short of this standard because the 1999 Constitution is the product of a hurried national compromise that we entered into two decades ago in order to ensure that the military returned to the barracks and that we returned to democratic government,he said.
translation.pcm: he tok say awa constitution no dey standard bikos 1999 constitution na national compromise wey dem rush do two decades ago bikos dey wan send soldiers dem go barracks back make we for return go democratic goment

translation.en: While noting that it was not the first time the task was taken, he said the present one by the 9th assembly might be the most important constitutional amendment process in the nations recent history because the decisions that would be taken will have far-reaching consequences for the future of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: As he take note say no be di first time wey dem go change constitution be dis, he tok say na dis one wey di 9th assembly do be dey important pass for how di constitution amendent dey go for di kontri recent history as e be say di decision wey dem go take go get plenti consequence for Nigeria future.

translation.en: A nations constitution is the foundation of its existence.
translation.pcm: National constitution na di foundation of hin existence

translation.en: It is supposed to set the terms of our nationhood and define who we are in a manner that reflects both our common truths and highest aspirations.
translation.pcm: E suppose set terms of how awa nation go be, make e define wu we be for manner wey go show awa common truth and aspiration wey high pass

translation.en: It was always the intention that we will one day as one people and one nation, return to amend this document so that it gives voice to the yearnings of the Nigerian people and sets out in clear details how we intend to achieve the shared ambitions of our nationhood.
translation.pcm: To kom back kom change di constitution as one pipo and one kontri na wetin dem get for mind dat time so e go hep di pipo get wetin dem want and e go hep show di kind way wey we want awa kontri be for detail.

translation.en: Providence has cast upon the 9th National Assembly the responsibility to write such a constitution for the Nigerian people,he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say; E dey important make di 9th National Assembly take responsibilty, make dem write dat kind constitution for Nigeria pipo

translation.en: 2023: Offa backs Kwara gov for second term
translation.pcm: 2023: Offa don back Kwara goment for second term.

translation.en: Indigenes of Offa LGA of Kwara State on Thursday threw their weight behind the second term bid of Governor Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq.
translation.pcm: Pipo from Offa LGA for Kwara state on Thursday don tok say dem support Governor Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for hin second term

translation.en: This is coming a week after the Olofa of Offa, Oba Mufutau Gbadamosi Esuwoye II, publicly endorsed the governor and months after a similar one by some stakeholders in Kaiama, Kwara North.
translation.pcm: Dis na afta one week wey di Olofa of Offa, Oba Mufutua Gbadamosi Esuwoye II, tok say hin back am for public and months afta some important pipo for Kaiama, Kwara North tok di same thin.

translation.en: According to the indigenes who expressed full support for the monarchs action, the new endorsement was hinged on what they described as the superlative performance of AbdulRazaq in the last two years.
translation.pcm: Accordin to di indegenes wey tok say dey support wetin dia monarch do, dia endorsement na bikos of wetin dey describe as di superlative performance of AbdulRazaq for di past two years

translation.en: Describing Abdulrazaq as a goal getter, the people said the difference in the development in the state is very clear, compared with what obtained in the past.
translation.pcm: Dem describe AbdulRazaq as goal-getter, di pipo tok say di difference for development for di state dey veri clear compared to wetin dey der for di past

translation.en: Speaking at a town hall meeting, the APC chairman in Offa, Abdullateef Afolayan, said, come 2023, there
translation.pcm: As he dey tok for one town hall meetin, APC chairman for Offa, Abdullateef Afolayan tok say for 2023

translation.en: s no vacancy in Kwara government house as were determined as a people to return Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq for a second term in office.
translation.pcm: Chance no dey for di Kwara Goment house as all di pipo don get di mind to put govenor Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for office again

translation.en: The meeting had critical stakeholders in the affairs of Offa, including representatives of Olofa, the Chief Imam of Offa, Christian Association of Nigeria
translation.pcm: important pipo for di mata dem wey concern Offa dey der, like di representative of Olofa, di Chief Imam of Offa, Christain Association of Nigeria

translation.en: (CAN) and Muslim leaders, youths as well as business community in attendance.
translation.pcm: (CAN) and Muslim leaders, youths and business community dey der

translation.en: Afolayans declaration was greeted with ecstasy by the Deputy Governor, Kayode Alabi, Special Advisers on Political, Political Communication and Strategy, Gidado Alakawa, Bashir Adigun and Saadu Salau, respectively, who graced the event.
translation.pcm: wetin Kayode Alabi declare make di Deputy goment, Kayode Alabi, Special Advisers on top Political Communications and Strategy, Gidado Alakawa, Bashir Adigun, Saadu Salau, respectively, wey kom di event dey veri hapi

translation.en: The representative of Olofa, the Asalofa of Offa, Alhaji Isiaka Shittu, said ongoing development efforts in the state by the governor, especially in Offa town should be commended, adding that renovation of the Offa General Hospital, rehabilitation of Offa roads and Offa water works are some of the areas where the governor has impacted on the town.
translation.pcm: Pesin wey represent Olofa, di Asalofa of Offa, Alhaji Isiaka Shittu tok on top di development mata wey dey ground for di state wey di governor do, especially for Offa town say na good work, e kom add di Offa General Hosital, di road wey dem repair and Offa water works na some of di area wia di governor done hep di town.

translation.en: The women, represented by the market women leader, Alhaja Idiat Yesufu, said the people know the level of development the present administration has achieved since assuming office.
translation.pcm: Di women, wey di Market women leader,  Alhaja Idiat Yesufu dey represent, tok say di pipo know di level of development wey di present administration don achieve since dey enta office

translation.en: She commended the governor for financial empowerment and support to traders in the state.
translation.pcm: chance no dey for di Kwara Goment house as all di pipo don get di mind to put government Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for office again.

translation.en: She said Offa women supported the endorsement of the governor by the Olofa, because we know how the present administration met Kwara and how it is today.
translation.pcm: She tok say Offa women follow support di endorsement wey  di Olofa give di goment, bikos we know how Kwara be before and how e be now.

translation.en: 5 years after: Why Nigeria still cant export beans to Europe
translation.pcm: 5 years afta: why Nigeria no still see beans export

translation.en: Nigerias hope of importing dry cowpea (beans) to the European Union countries has again been dashed this year.
translation.pcm: Nigeria hope to dey export dry cowpea(beans) to kontri dem wey dey European Union don spoil

translation.en: This is as a result of the extension of an earlier ban on the countrys dry beans by the European Union (EU) subsisting till 2022.
translation.pcm: Dis na bikos of di extension of di ban wey dey ground before on top di kontri dry beans by European Union wey go end by 2022

translation.en: The EU food safety authority had in 2015 banned Nigerian beans because it contained between 0.3mg per kg and 4.6mg per kg of Dichlorvos, a pesticide, when the maximum acceptable residue limit is 0.01 mg per kg.
translation.pcm: Di EU food safety authority don ban Nigeria beans for 2015 bikos he get like 0.3mg per kg to 4.6mg per kg Dichlorvos, one pesticide, wey be say di type wey suppose remain no suppose pass na 0.01mg per kg

translation.en: Dichlorvos is considered to be highly toxic and can cause difficulty in breathing, diarrhoea, vomiting, convulsions and dizziness among others.
translation.pcm: Dey consider say Dichlorvos get poison wey fit kos diffuculty for breathin, diarrhoea,vomitin, convulsion, dizziness  and oda sickness sef

translation.en: Experts say like many organophosphate (OP) insecticides, it also inhibits the enzyme cholinesterase, which results in disruption to the nervous and muscular systems.
translation.pcm: experts tok say like many organophosphate (OP) insecticide,e get enzyme cholinesterase sef wey dey kos disruption of di nervous system and muscular system

translation.en: Some experts also claimed that some farmers and middlemen use Sniper, another deadly chemical, to preserve their beans.
translation.pcm: some expert sef claim say some farmers and middlemen dey use Sniper, anoda chemical wey dey deadly use preserve dia beans

translation.en: An independent investigation conducted by this paper last year showed that most of the beans in the country are preserved with chemicals that are dangerous to human health.
translation.pcm: Independent investigation wey dis paper conduct last year show say most of di beans for di kontri dey perserved wit chemical wey dey dangerous to human health

translation.en: A food scientist, Idowu Amusa, listed the consequences of consuming foods preserved with Sniper and other harmful chemicals to include gastro-intestinal health issues, brain and other internal tissue damage, blood poisoning, food poisoning and could also lead to death.
translation.pcm: One food scientist, Idowu Amusa , list di consequences wey dey di consumption of food wey dem use sniper and oda harmful chemical preserve wey include gastro-intestinal issues, brain and oda internal damage, blood poisonin, food poisonin and e fit kos death

translation.en: The EU had in 2018 extended the ban on importation of dry beans from Nigeria until June 2019 owing to the continuous presence of the pesticide.
translation.pcm: Di EU don extend di ban from 2018 on importation of dry beans from Nigeria until June 2019 bikos of di pesticide wey dey always dey der

translation.en: The Nigeria Agricultural Quarantine Service (NAQS), the countrys produce regulator, had earlier assured farmers and other stakeholders that the country was working hard to ensure the ban is lifted in 2021.
translation.pcm: Nigeria Agricultural Quarantine Service (NAQS), di kontri produce regulator, don assure di farmers and oda stakeholders before say di kontri dey work hard to ensure say dem lift di ban for 2021

translation.en: However, a recent document from the EU has announced an extension of the ban, claiming that Nigeria failed to implement the unions food safety action plan submitted in 2018.
translation.pcm: One recent document from EU don announce extension of di ban, he tok say Nigeria no implement di Union food safety plan wey dem submit for 2018

translation.en: With the extension, beans produced in Nigeria will still not be allowed into any member country of the European Union.
translation.pcm: wit di extension, beans wey dem produce for Nigeria  no go fit enta any member kontri for European Union.

translation.en: This has been the situation for the past five years.
translation.pcm: Na like dis e don be for five years

translation.en: How it started
translation.pcm: How e take start

translation.en: In 2015, a consignment of Nigerian beans was rejected under the EU export regulations.
translation.pcm: For 2015, dem reject some beans from Nigeria bikos of di Eu export regulations

translation.en: An official of the NAQS told our Agric Editor that upon arrival at Tin Can Island, the NAQS team went to inspect the consignment and it was discovered that some of the containers were already powdery and the rejection was on the premise of chemical residue.
translation.pcm: One official for NAQS tell awa Agric Editor say as e reach Tin Can Island, di NAQS team go check di consignment and dey discover say some of di containers don dey turn power and dey reject am bikos of di chemical residue

translation.en: We took our own analysis from there and discovered that aside from the pesticide residue, there was also the presence of pests, which occasioned the powder form of the beans.
translation.pcm: We take awa own analysis from there, kom discover say aside from di pesticide residue wey dey, pest sef dey and na dem kos di powder form of di beans

translation.en: He said the agency has been carrying out aggressive campaigns to explain how and the need for farmers, as well as middlemen to preserve their beans with the acceptable chemical level.
translation.pcm: He tok say di agency don dey carry out serious campaign to explain how and di reason for farmers and middlemen make dem dey preserve dia beans wit acceptable chemical level

translation.en: The official, who did not want his name in print, said aside from the export problem, consuming such highly preserved beans is dangerous to human and animal health.
translation.pcm: Di official, wey no write hin name down, tok say aside from export wahala, to dey chop beans wey dey don too preserve dey dangerous to human and animal health.

translation.en: Nigeria is losing billions  Expert
translation.pcm: Expert tok say Nigeria dey lose billions

translation.en: Mr. Segun Ayeni, an agric economist, yesterday, told Daily Trust that Nigeria is losing billions of naira to the continued ban on the countrys beans since 2015 by the EU.
translation.pcm: One agric economist, Mr Segun Ayeni, tell Daily trust yesterday say Nigeria dey lose billions of naira sake of di ban wey dey kontri beans mata wey EU give dem for 2015.

translation.en: He said farmers, traders as well as the government could no longer make much money from the beans value chain because of the ban.
translation.pcm: He tok say traders and goment no dey see moni from beans value chain bikos of di ban

translation.en: All the traders in between, the warehouse people, the transporters and us, who are involved in the inspection and certification, that aspect has been broken down because they cannot generate any revenue along the value chain anymore, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say all traders wey dey between, di warehouse pipo, di transporters and we, wey dey involve for di inspection and certification, dat aspect don dey broken down bikos e dey no fit generate any revenue for di value chain.

translation.en: Reactions
translation.pcm: Pipo reaction dem

translation.en: The National President of the All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN), Architect Kabiru Ibrahim, while reacting to the ban by the EU, said it may not be unconnected with the countrys nonconformity with the Global Good Agricultural Practices protocol.
translation.pcm: Di National president of All Farmers Association Nigeria (AFAN), Architect Kabiru Ibrahim, as he react to di ban wey EU give dem, tok say he fit say he no dey connected wit di kontri noncomformity wit di Global Good Agricultural Practice Protocol

translation.en: In the production, we need to deploy good agricultural practices and in the preservation, we should not use large volumes of chemicals that will provide residual contents unacceptable for wholesome foods in Europe.
translation.pcm: For di production, we need deploy good agricultural practice, and for di preservation, make we no use plenti volume of chemicals wey go dey leave residual content wey dem no go accept as wholesome foods for Europe

translation.en: A general ban by the EU is not very well thought out because there are some farmers already complying with GAP standards.
translation.pcm: Dem no think di general ban for EU well bikos some farmers don already dey comply wit di GAP standard dem

translation.en: He added: We are working with some farmers to ensure compliance with GAP.
translation.pcm: He add say dem dey work wit some farmers to ensure  say dey comply wit GAP

translation.en: As the National President of AFAN, I am the chairman of the National Technical Working Group on Global GAP in Nigeria inaugurated in 2017 by then minister of Agriculture and Rural Development.
translation.pcm: As di National president of AFAN, I be di Chairman of di National Technical Working Group on Global GAP for Nigeria wey dem inaugurate for 2017 by Di Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development dat time

translation.en: He said the various exporters, agribusiness groups, Ministry of Trade and Investment, SON, NAFDAC and Quarantine Department have to work together and act in unison to make our produce acceptable globally.
translation.pcm: He tok say various exporters, agribusiness groups, Ministry of Trade and Invesment, SON, NAFDAC, Quarantine Department go need work together, make dem act as one to make wetin we produce acceptable globally

translation.en: Mr. Idowu Amusa, a food scientist, advised that farmers should grow organic foods only and if they must use pesticides on their farms, they should use only recommended pesticides brands and dosage.
translation.pcm: Mr Idowu Amusa, one food scientist, don advice say make farmers dey grow only organic food and if na must make dem use pesticide on top dia farm, make dem use only pesticide brand and di dosage wey dem recommend

translation.en: Allow enough time between application of pesticides and use of the food produce and where possible, the food product should be rightly labelled with relevant information on cultivation to consumers, he said.
translation.pcm: He tok say make dem dey allow time between wen dey use di pesticide and wen dey use food produce, and if he possible, make dem label di food product wit information wey dey relevant about di food cultivation for consumers

translation.en: Tuchel eyes first Chelsea trophy as Leicester chase FA Cup history
translation.pcm: Tuchel dey eye Chelsea first Trophy as Leichester dey chase FA Cup history

translation.en: Thomas Tuchel plans to ruin Leicesters bid to make history, as the Chelsea manager eyes the first trophy of his reign in Saturdays
translation.pcm: Thomas Tuchel plan make hin win Leichester as dey wan make history, as hin be Chelsea manager, he dey eye di First Trophy fo hin reign on Saturday

translation.en: FA Cup final at Wembley.
translation.pcm: FA Cup for Wembley

translation.en: Tuchel has enjoyed a superb run since replacing the sacked Frank Lampard in January.
translation.pcm: Tuche don enjoy hin work wella since hin replace Frank Lampard for January

translation.en: The German has led Chelsea to the FA Cup and Champions League finals, while taking them back into the Premier Leagues top four.
translation.pcm: Di German don lead Chelsea go FA Cup aand Champions League final, as he dey take dem go Champions League top-four back

translation.en: Winning his maiden silverware in English football would be further evidence of Tuchels impact.
translation.pcm: If hin win hin Maiden Silverware for English football, e go be evidence of Tuchel impact

translation.en: But Leicester, two points above Chelsea in the Premier League, will pose a significant threat to Tuchels ambitions under the astute guidance of boss Brendan Rodgers.
translation.pcm: But Leichester wey get two points pass Chelsea for Champions League, go be serious threat for Tuchel ambition, as he be say na under dia boss Brendan Rogers correct guidance dem dey

translation.en: The Foxes are aiming to win the FA Cup for the first time in their first final appearance since 1969.
translation.pcm: Foxes dey aim to win FA Cup for the first time for dia first appearance since 1969

translation.en: No club have appeared in more FA Cup finals without lifting the trophy than Leicester, who have lost four times in the showpiece match.
translation.pcm: No club don reach plenti FA Cup final  wey no kom carry Trophy pass Leichester, dey don lose four times for the showpiece match

translation.en: In contrast, Chelsea have won the FA Cup eight times, with their last victory coming against Manchester United in 2018.
translation.pcm: For di oda hand, Chelsea don win di FA Cup eight times, dia last win na against Manchester United for 2018

translation.en: The Blues, beaten in last years final against Arsenal, will be making their fourth appearance in the competitions denouement in the last five years.
translation.pcm: Blues wey Arsenal beat for last year final, go show face di fourth time for the competition final for di last five years

translation.en: Having already beaten managerial luminaries Pep Guardiola, Jurgen Klopp, Jose Mourinho, Diego Simeone, Zinedine Zidane and Carlo Ancelotti since arriving at Chelsea, Tuchel will pit his wits against Rodgers for the first time as Blues boss.
translation.pcm: Afta he don beat star manager dem like Pep Guardiola, Jurgen Klopp, Jose Mawainho, Diego Shineon, Zinedine Zidane, Carlo Ancelotti since he reach Chelsea, Tuchel go go against Rodgers for di first time as Chelsea boss

translation.en: After a frustrating end to his spell at Paris Saint-Germain  where he won the French title and reached last seasons
translation.pcm: Afta one frustratin end for hin spell for Paris Saint-Germain, wer hin win French Title, wey hin reach last season join

translation.en: Champions League final before being forced out following a power struggle with sporting director Leonardo  Tuchel has quickly erased any doubts about his suitability for Chelsea.
translation.pcm: Champions league final before dey force am comot afta one power struggle wit Sport Director Leonardo, Tuchel quick comot any doubt for hin mind about hin sustainability for Chelsea

translation.en: New technologies, researches that may lessen your farming drudgery
translation.pcm: New tecnology, wetin dem find wey fit reduce yawa wey dey farm labor.

translation.en: For many farmers in Nigeria, the absence of improved technologies to make farming easy and smooth, particularly for the younger generation, has been very challenging.
translation.pcm: For many farmers for Nigeria, improved technology dem wey go make farming easy and smooth, wey no dey before, especially for di young pipo, na serious challenge

translation.en: Despite having 16 agricultural research institutions and four conventional universities of agriculture in the country, research and development has been on the slow pace.
translation.pcm: Upon say na 16 agriculral Institutes and four conventional University dey di kontri, research and development don dey veri slow

translation.en: Recently, Daily Trust Spoke with Professor Ishiyaku Mohammed,the Executive Director of the Institute of Agricultural Research(IAR), Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria and he
translation.pcm: Recently, Daily trust speak wit Professor Ishiyaku Mohammed, di executive director for di Institute for Agricultural research(IAR), Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria and he

translation.en: explained some of the newest researches and technologies the institute developed for farmers.
translation.pcm: explain some of di new research and technology wey di Institute develop for farmers

translation.en: Recent varieties released
translation.pcm: Recent variety wey dem release

translation.en: In the most recent situation, about 28 different varieties of sorghum were released.
translation.pcm: For di most recent situation, na like 28 different Sorghum dem release

translation.en: About the same number was released for groundnut varieties.
translation.pcm: Na like di same number dem release for groundnut sef

translation.en: The institute also released up to 20 varieties of cowpea and 66 different maize varieties, then 13 different varieties of cotton.
translation.pcm: Di institute release like 20 variety for cowpea sef and 66 different maize variety, afta, 13 different variety of cotton

translation.en: They have very important economic attributes that increase the income of farmers and provide a different product for utilisation, either as food, fiber, or for making textile products in the case of cotton, or even for providing oil in the case of groundnut and cotton.
translation.pcm: Dey get economic attributes wey dey veri important wey go increase di income of farmers and provide different product for utilisation, whether na as food, fiber, or for makin textile products for cotton case, or even if na to provide oil groundnut and cotton case.

translation.en: The IAR has also generally awoken the conscience of farmers to the existence of modern agricultural technologies.
translation.pcm: Di IAR don wake di concience of farmers generally make dem know say modern technologies dey

translation.en: Our scientists have, over the years, fabricated machines and tools towards reducing drudgery.
translation.pcm: awa scientists dem don dey create machine and tool wey we go fit use reduce drudgery for some years now

translation.en: For example, there are hand held planters and tractors.
translation.pcm: For example, planter and tractors don dey wey dem fit use hand hold

translation.en: And  we are in the process of perfecting roll weeders  because people have been complaining that farmers still use hand held hoes for weeding.
translation.pcm: And we don dey find way wey we go use perfect rollin weeders bikos pipo don dey complain say farmers dey use hoe wey dem dey use hand hold comot weed

translation.en: So we have responded by introducing the development of mechanical weeders.
translation.pcm: Na so we answer dem wit di mechanical weeder wey we dey develop

translation.en: We have threshers for maize, beans, sorghum and groundnut.
translation.pcm: we get thresher dem for maize, beans, sorghum and groundnut

translation.en: Dryers are important when you produce crops when theres still rainfall, so you need to find a place where you would at least dry them.
translation.pcm: Dryers dey important wen you produce crop wen rain still dey fall, so you need find place wia you go fit dry dem

translation.en: Drying is also useful in storing products like tomatoes, he stated.
translation.pcm: hin tok say dryin sef dey important if you wan store product like tomato

translation.en: Something new on ginger seed
translation.pcm: somethin new for ginger seed

translation.en: He continued, The IAR also delved into an emerging area of science called biotechnology.
translation.pcm: He kom continue tok say IAR sef enta one area for science wey just dey emerge wey dem call biotechnology

translation.en: Our scientists are developing ways of rapidly propagating crops.
translation.pcm: awa scientists don dey develop wetin dem go use propagate crops fast

translation.en: For example, right now, we have an order to micro-propagate ginger.
translation.pcm: For example, we get order make we for micro-propagate ginger .

translation.en: Production of ginger is determined by how much planting material you have, and the planting material is very expensive, so our scientists have developed ways that inside a bottle you can develop from 1 to 2 inches piece of ginger.
translation.pcm: Na how your plantin material plenti reach go determine di ginger production, di plantin material dem dey veri expensive, na hin make awa scientist dem develop way wey be say you fit develop like 1 to 2 inches of ginger piece inside bottle

translation.en: You can produce more than 200 plantlets that can be grown in the field.
translation.pcm: You fit produce more dan 200  plantlets wey dem fit grow for field

translation.en: Right now, we are receiving orders from some farmers who are looking for this.
translation.pcm: Right now, we dey receive order from some farmer wey dey find am.

translation.en: We do it for sugarcane also.
translation.pcm: We dey do am for sugarcane sef

translation.en: This technique helps in propagating disease- free crops, sometimes planting materials can be infected by disease.
translation.pcm: Dis technique dey help to propagate disease-free crop, sometimes, plantin materials fit don get disease

translation.en: The more you plant, the more the disease is propagated into others.
translation.pcm: Na as your plant reach, na hin di disease sef dey propagate for odas

translation.en: But these techniques try to purify the materials to be disease-free.
translation.pcm: But dis technique dey try purify material make dem dey disease-free

translation.en: So it is called tissue cultural techniques, where the crop is planted inside a bottle and made to proliferate.
translation.pcm: Na Tissue Cultural Technique dey call am, na der dem dey plant for bottle, make e for proliferate

translation.en: Each plantlet can now give rise to several plantlets etc.
translation.pcm: Each plantet fit give rise to plenti plantet now etc.

translation.en: New technology for bio-fertiliser, irrigation
translation.pcm: New technology for bio-fertiliser, Irrigation

translation.en: Technologies as we develop them go through two stages.
translation.pcm: Technology as we develop am dey go through two stage

translation.en: The first stage is scientific.
translation.pcm: Di first stage dey scientific

translation.en: Here, scientists get convinced that these techniques have become a technology or a tool of solving a problem, then it will go to the farmers to test themselves.
translation.pcm: For this part, scientist dem go don dey sure say dis technique get di kind technology or tool wey dem go fit use solve di kasala, afta, di farmers go test am diasef.

translation.en: Then based on the opinion of the farmers, it can be propagated further.
translation.pcm: Den, based on farmers opinion, dem fit still propagate am

translation.en: So in the area of the crop varieties I have counted to you in the last few years, we have released varieties of cowpea that is insect-resistant.
translation.pcm: So, for di area crop variety wey i don dey count give you for di last few years now, we don release variety of cowpea wey dey insect-resistant.

translation.en: It is called SAMPEA20T for maize; the same year we released six different varieties of maize with yield potentials of 6-8 tonne per hectare and then in 2020.
translation.pcm: Na SAMPEA20T dem call maize own; na di same year wey we release six different maize wey get potential to yield 6-8 tonne per hectare and for 2020 den.

translation.en: Three varieties of improved sorghum (sweet sorghum) were released, together with an additional six varieties of maize.
translation.pcm: Dem release three types for improved sorghum (sweet sorghum), wit anoda six type of maize

translation.en: So in the recent times, this is what we have released.
translation.pcm: For dis recent time, na wetin we release be dat

translation.en: We are about releasing a technology for bio-fertiliser, which is a capsule of some materials that contain some useful microorganisms that can assist in fixing nitrogen, which will benefit the plant in its growth and development as if it had been added with fertiliser.
translation.pcm: We wan release one technology for bio-fertiliser, na capsule wey get of some kind material,wey kom still get some kind microorganism wey dey useful as e be say dem fit help fix nitrogen, wey go benefit how plants take dey grow and develop as dem add fertilizer sef

translation.en: We have developed improved techniques for irrigation so that it will reduce wastage of water by farmers, he added.
translation.pcm: He tok say we don develop develop technique for irrigation wey we improve so e go dey reduce how farmers take dey waste water.

translation.en: The Guild at 60, inspiring the living, honouring the dead
translation.pcm: Di Guild at 60, inspirin di livin, honorin di dead

translation.en: By Lanre Idowu
translation.pcm: Wey Lanre Idowu write.

translation.en: Sixty years ago, on Saturday, May 20, 1961, the Nigerian Guild of Editors was born, a child of great hope at the old National Press Club located then at Abibu Oki in the heart of Lagos.
translation.pcm: Sixty years ago,on Saturday, May 20,1961, dem born Di Nigerian Guide of Editors, Pikin wey get great hope for di old National Press Club wey dey Abibu Oki for di heart of Lagos den

translation.en: It was named the Guild of Newspaper Editors of Nigeria, designed to serve as an exclusive club of professional news managers where editors as the ultimate gatekeepers on media content could come together seasonally to interrogate issues of professional media practice unfettered by labour matters.
translation.pcm: Dem name am Di Guild of Nigerian Editors

translation.en: The editors had been effectively sidelined from the Nigeria Union of Journalists, which predated the Guild by six years, on account that as management staff, they could not be trusted to effectively represent the interests of the rank and file journalists.
translation.pcm: Dey don sideline di editors well from di Nigerian Union of Jornalists wey don dey exist like six years before Guild, bikos dem bi management staff, dey no fit trust dem make dem represent di interest of di rank and file journalists

translation.en: So in response to the reverse discrimination of the NUJ, the need to instill professional guidance, and protect their interests in light of the unfolding socio-political developments in the early days of independent Nigeria, the Guild emerged to occupy the strategic middle ground of professional managers between owners and the general rank of journalists.
translation.pcm: As answer for di reverse discrimination wey NUJ dey do, dia need to make Professional Guidance, make dey kom stil protect dia interest for di socio-economic development wey dey unfold for the early days of nigeria wey dey independent, di Guild emerge make dem fit occupy middle ground of professional managers wey dey strategic between owner and di general rank of journalist dem

translation.en: Lateef Jakande (1929-2021) of the Nigerian Tribune was its first founding president.
translation.pcm: Lateef Jakande (1929-2021) for Nigerian Tribune be di first foundin president

translation.en: His cabinet had the likes of Babatunde Jose (1925-2008) of the Daily Times as the vice president, Abiodun Aloba (1921-2001) of the Morning Post as the secretary, and Nelson Ottah of the Drum as the assistant secretary.
translation.pcm: hin Cabinet get pipo like Babatunde Jones (1925-2008) of Di Daily times as Vice president, Abiodun Aloba (1921-2001) of mornin Post as di Secretary and Nelson Ottah of Di Drum as vice Secretary

translation.en: The Guild was established to advance the interests of the profession, deepen editors relationships with their various publics ranging from the media itself, to governments, professional and trade associations and other groups that make up civil society.
translation.pcm: Dem establish Di Guild make dem use advance di interest of di profession, make e deepen editors dem relationship wit public, from media, goment, association wey dey professional and di one for trade and oda groups wey dey civil society

translation.en: It was to be a proactive agent of development to anticipate problems and tackle them, and clarify issues before they got out of hand.
translation.pcm: Na make e for be proactive agent for development, wey go dey expect kasala, dey tackle am and make e clarify issues before e too serious.

translation.en: The promise of its birth was soon tested by the crisis that erupted in the early life of the First Republic.
translation.pcm: Dey test di promise of hin birth soon for di crisis wey start for di early time of di First Republic

translation.en: A good number of the editors became casualties of the cat-and-mouse politics of the era.
translation.pcm: some editor kom be di casualty of di cat-and-mouse politics for dat era

translation.en: Jakande was tried alongside Chief Obafemi Awolowo for Treasonable Felony and was jailed in 1963.
translation.pcm: Jakande go court wit Chief Obafemi Awolowo for Treasonable Felony and dey jail am for 1963

translation.en: That same year, Jose was appointed managing director of the Daily Times, and had become, technically, ineligible to continue on the executive of the Guild as only defacto editors could hold executive office.
translation.pcm: Dat same year dem appoint Jose as managing Director for Daily times, he no fit be executive again for Di Guild again technically as e be say na only defacto editor dey executive position

translation.en: By that time also, Aloba was fighting for his job as the Post was enmeshed in a probe into its finances.
translation.pcm: Dat time sef, Aloba dey fight for hin job as e be say dem dey probe di Post bikos of dia finance

translation.en: With the leadership of the Guild challenged on several fronts, the Guild soon lost direction and could not serve as a moral compass.
translation.pcm: As di leaders of di Guild don get challenge for different levels, Di guild soon lose dia way, dey no know right or wrong thin again

translation.en: The Guild was to undergo a name change to accommodate the electronic media, which added to its problems of identity in subsequent years.
translation.pcm: Di Guild be wan change dia name so dem go fit accomodate electronic media, e kom add for dia identity kasala for years later

translation.en: The Guild soldiered on under military rule, 1966-1979, playing an active role in the struggle for press freedom and enhanced respectability for journalism and journalists.
translation.pcm: Di Guild continue under military rule, 1966-1979, dey continue dey play active role for press freedom stuggle, dey kom enhance di respect wey dey for journalists and journalism

translation.en: In the light of its membership expansion, and the introduction of assorted job titles, the Guild has continued to grapple with the question of who is an editor.
translation.pcm: Sake of say dia members dey increase, and dem introduce different job title dem, di Guild don continue to dey struggle on top di question of who dem fit call editor.

translation.en: This issue featured in the crisis that attended the Minna convention of 1982.
translation.pcm: Dis issue dey di crisis wey dem table for Minna convention for 1982

translation.en: Along with capitulation to partisan political interests of the day arising from creeping geopolitical and sectional interests into the affairs of the Guild, the Guild slid into the doldrums for six years before it was resuscitated in 1988.
translation.pcm: As di Guild affairs dey sttuggle wit partisan political interest wey dey kom from Geopolitical and sectional interest wey dey creep, di Guild no work for six years before dey kom start am back for 1988.

translation.en: The membership question resurfaced in 2008 and 2017.
translation.pcm: Di membership question kom back for 2008 and 2017

translation.en: Its ghost is yet to be laid to rest.
translation.pcm: Dey neva stop.

translation.en: In nine days Nigerian editors will meet in Kano to elect a new team to pilot its affairs with major issues of membership, funding yet to be successfully resolved.
translation.pcm: In nine days, Nigeria editors go meet for Kano to elect new team wey go dey lead dia dem, especially for dia member issue and moni mata wey dey neva resolve

translation.en: In light of major developments in the industry, not the least digital publishing, and redefinition of the shape and practice of the business of editing, and Nigerias unfolding political developments, a lot is expected from the body to give quality leadership.
translation.pcm: Sake of di major development for di industry,

translation.en: For now, it is meet and proper to congratulate the industry for keeping the Guild relevant till now.
translation.pcm: For now, he dey proper to congratulate di industry say dey try wella to make di Guild still dey relevant till now.

translation.en: Tomorrow, the Guild is a major actor in the industrys effort to honour the memory of nine media leaders who passed on in the past year.
translation.pcm: Tomorrow, di Guild na major part for di industry effort to honour di memory of nine media leader wey die last year

translation.en: The Newspaper Proprietors Association of Nigeria, the Broadcasting Organisations of Nigeria, the Nigerian Guild of Editors, and the Nigeria Union of Journalists, will jointly celebrate Alhaji Lateef Jakande, founding president of the NPAN and NGE, Prince Tony Momoh, former NGE president, Mr. Ben Egbuna, former director general of the FRCN, Mr. Eddie Aderinokun, former editor of Morning Post, Mr. Sam Nda-Isaiah, departed chairman of Leadership Newspapers, Chief Gbolabo Ogunsanwo, former editor of Sunday Times, Mr. Bisi Lawrence, former general manager of Lagos State Broadcasting Corporation, Malam Wada Maida, former president of the Guild and chairman of the News Agency of Nigeria, and Malam Ismail Isa, former president and life patron of the NPAN in An Afternoon of Tributesin Lagos, designed to honour the departed and inspire the living.
translation.pcm: Di newspaper proprietors association of Nigeria, di broadcastin association of Nigeria, di Nigerian Guild of editors, di Nigerian union of journalists go celebrate Alhaji Lateef Jakande togeda, foundin president of NPAN, NGE, Prince Tony Momoh, former NGE president, Mr John Egbuna, former director general for FRCN, Mr Eddie Aderinokun, former editor for morningg Post, Mr Sam Nda-Isaiah, Chairman wey depart for Leadership newspaper, Chiel Gbolabo Ogunsanwo, former editor for Sunday times, Mr Bisi Lawrence, former general manager for Lagos State broadcasting Corporation, Malam Wada Maida, former president for di Guild and Chairman for News Agency Of Nigeria,and Malam Ismail Isa, former president and life Patron of NPAN for one aftanoon wey dem dey give tribute for Lagos, honour pipo wey don dia, dey kom still inspire di pipo dey alive

translation.en: Happy Diamond anniversary to the Nigerian Guild of Editors, and congratulations to the organised media for shedding its traditional bashfulness to honour its own.
translation.pcm: Hapi diamond anniversary to di Nigeria Guild of editors

translation.en: We need more quality intervention programmes to maintain the relevance of the media as guardians and shapers of our public morality.
translation.pcm: We need more quality interventiom programme wey go maintain di relevance of media as pipo wey dey shape and guide awa public morality

translation.en: Idowu is editor in chief of Media Review and the supervising trustee of the Diamond Awards for Media Excellence (DAME)
translation.pcm: Idowu na editor in chief for media review and di trustee wey dey supervise di Diamond Award for Media Excellence (DAME)

translation.en: Presidential transition bill passes second reading
translation.pcm: Presidential transition bill don pass second readin

translation.en: The presidential transition bill has passed through a second reading at the House of Representatives.
translation.pcm: DI bill for presidential transition don pass second readin for House of Representatives.

translation.en: The bill titled, Transition and Assumption of Office Bill, 2020, sponsored by Kpam Sokpo, seeks to provide for the procedure and ceremony for transition and assumption of the Office of the President and Vice President by the president-elect and vice president-elect.
translation.pcm: Di bill wey dem call, Transiton and Assumption of Office Bill 2020, wey Kpam Sokpo sponsor, be want provide for di procedure and ceremony for di change and assumption of di Office of president and Vice-president by di president and Vice-president wey dem elect

translation.en: The bill provides that after the declaration of the final results of a presidential election by the Independent National Election Commission (INEC), the transition committee shall ensure that the president-elect and vice-president-elect are provided with adequate security among others.
translation.pcm: Di bill dey tok say afta di Independent National Electoral Commision(INEC) don declare who win presidential election, di transition comittee go make sure say di president-elect and vice-president-elect get security wey sure

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that the bill also proposed sanctions including jail terms for breach of its provisions.
translation.pcm: Daily trust report say go e fit send pipo go jail if dey breach hin comtact

translation.en: The bill reads in part, The Committee shall ensure that the President-elect and Vice President-elect receive security briefings from the relevant national security agencies.
translation.pcm: One part for di bill tok say, di committee go make sure say di president-elect and Vice president-elect go  collect security briefin from National Security Agency wey dey relevant

translation.en: The President-elect and Vice President-elect shall, in consultation with the Committee, carry out such preparations as may be necessary for the purpose of assuming office.
translation.pcm: Di president-elect and Vice president-elect go follow di committee tok, make dem prepare all di tin wey dey necessary bikos dey wan enta office .

translation.en: Ripples in Ogun over LG polls nomination form charges
translation.pcm: Small gbege dey for Ogun bikos of di moni for dia LG Nomination form

translation.en: Stakeholders Thursday kicked against nomination form charges for aspirants in the July 24 local government election in Ogun State.
translation.pcm: Stakeholders dey against di nomination form moni for aspirant for july 24 Local Goment election for Ogun State

translation.en: The chairman of the state electoral body, Babatunde Osibodu, had on Tuesday announced N200,000 and N100,000 as charges for chairmanship and councillorship aspirants forms respectively.
translation.pcm: Di Chairman for di state electoral bodi, Babatunde Osibodu, tok on Tuesday say moni for Chairman form na N200,000 and Councillor form na N100,000

translation.en: Osibodu also announced a nomination form fee waiver for female candidates contesting in the election.
translation.pcm: Osibodu kom still announce say di female candidates wey dey contest fit no pay di nomination form moni

translation.en: Reacting, the State Chairman of New Nigeria Peoples Party, Oginni Olaposi, described the charges as fraud.
translation.pcm: Di state chairman for New Nigeria Peoples Party, Oginni Olaposi, tok say di moni na fraud

translation.en: The NNPP also accused Governor Dapo Abiodun of downplaying the principle of democracy by changing the free, fair and credible election to another thing.
translation.pcm: Di NNPC sef accuse governor Dapo Abiodun say e dey spoil Democracy Principle, as e dey don turn di free, fare, credible election to anoda thin.

translation.en: Also speaking, an Egba-born politician and philanthropist, Olumide Aderinokun, described the nomination form charges as barbaric, and warned the government against turning the election into revenue generation.
translation.pcm: One politician and Philanthropist wey dem born for Egba, Olumide Aderinokun sef tok say moni wey dem dey use buy Nomination form dey barbaric, e kom warn goment say make dem no turn election to opportunity take collect moni

translation.en: The Action Alliance (AA) Chairman, Sanyaolu Abayomi, threatened that the party might sue the commission if it went ahead with the election.
translation.pcm: Action Alliance (AA), Sanyaolu Abayomi don threaten di commission say hin parti go sue dem if dey still go do di election

translation.en: Abayomi who spoke after the stakeholders meeting said the commission erred in not allowing at least four political parties to make their input before and during the stakeholders meeting on the forthcoming election.
translation.pcm: Abayomi wey tok afta di stakeholders meething tok say di commission do mistake as dey no allow like four political parti tok dia own about di election wey dey wan do before and wen dem dey do di stakeholder meetin

translation.en: He said: We do not agree with the time given  that 30 days ultimatum.
translation.pcm: He tok say; we no gree di 30 days ultiatum wey dey give us

translation.en: Because, I think in the timetable that was released earlier, they gave us 90 days, and thats what we want to challenge today.
translation.pcm: bikos, I think say di timetable wey dem release before, dey giv us 90 days, na wetin we wan challenge today be dat
