translation.pcm: We don hand ham over to di NDLEA so dat dem go fit carry out further action on di matter.

translation.en: He will be arraigned before court, and if he is found guilty, he can be suspended.
translation.pcm: Dem go carry him matter go court and if he dey guilty dem go suspend ham from work

translation.en: We will find out for how long this has been happening and whether there are other people involved in similar scandal, Kofar Nassarawa said.
translation.pcm: Kofar Nassarawa tok say dem go find out since wen doz things  don dey apun and check if oda pipo dey involve in di yawa.

translation.en: He added that the service will continue to work hard to detect similar practices in the facility.
translation.pcm: He add to hin tok say di service go continue to work hard  to see if dat kind thing still dey apun for di facility.

translation.en: Daily Trust recalled that in 2020, a woman was arrested for sneaking a phone to another prisoner on death row.
translation.pcm: Daily trust even note ham say in 2020, dey arrest one woman wey dem see as she dey carry phone for di prisoner wey dey death row

translation.en: Similarly, another woman was apprehended with cannabis concealed in a carton of instant noodles.
translation.pcm: He also tok say dem catch one man wey dem see with hard drugs wey she put inside noodles carton.

translation.en: Centre lauds INEC for creating gender, inclusivity depts
translation.pcm: Di centre dey hapi as INEC create gender inclusivity department

translation.en: The Centre for Transparency Advocacy (CTA) has commended the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) for its re-organisation that led to the creation of the Gender and Inclusivity Department (GID)
translation.pcm: The centre for transparency advocacy (CTA) give kudos to di pipo wey dey INEC for di rearrangement wey dem do, wey kom lead to di creation of gender and inclusivity department (GID)

translation.en: that hitherto was a unit in the commission.
translation.pcm: say dem dey unit for di commission.

translation.en: The Executive Director of the centre, Faith Ossai Nwadishi, in a statement, expressed joy that INEC was poised to reposition itself bearing in mind the realities of today and the need to promote inclusiveness in its operations.
translation.pcm: Faith Ossai Nwadishi  wey be di Executive director for di centre tok say she dey hapi say INEC don reposition itself, she know say di need to promote very well dey di operation wey dem just start.

translation.en: She also noted that in this new arrangement, INEC created two departments out of the present Department of Legal Services, Clearance and Complaints (LSC&CC) and that the new departments are Department of Litigation and Prosecution (DL&P) and Department of Legal Drafting and Clearance (LDCD).
translation.pcm: She tok say di new arrangement wey INEC just create so, say dem (INEC) don create two department from di wey dey di department of Legal service, di department of clearance and complaint (LSC&CC) and tok di new department, na department of Litigation & prosecution (DL&P) and di department of legal drafting

translation.en: She said the centre agrees and supports INEC in the review and realignment of some of its departments for improved effectiveness and efficient management of its human resources and assets.
translation.pcm: She tok say di center don agree and stand gidigba for INEC for di review and realignment of some of im department make im dey very very capable to fit produce result and efficient for  di management of im human resources and assets.

translation.en: 6 NIPP plants, 22 new substations added to power grid in 6 years Report
translation.pcm: dem don add 6 NIPP plant dem, 22 new substation for di power grid wey dey 6 years report.

translation.en: Generation Companies (GenCos) and 22 power substations built and operated between 2015 and now, have significantly driven improvement on the national electricity grid to the 5,800 megawatts (MW) highest peak energy recorded in March 2021.
translation.pcm: Generation companies (GenCos) and 22 power substation wey dem build and dey operate between 2015 and now, don make improvement dey for di national eletcricity grid to di 5,800 megourtt wey be di highest peak energy wey dem record for March 2021.

translation.en: This is according to the latest NIPP report on power projects execution since 2015, obtained from the Niger Delta Power Holding Company (NDPHC) by Daily Trust.
translation.pcm: Dis dey according to di latest NIPP report on top power project execution since 2015, wey Daily trust obtained from di Niger Delta power holding company (NDPHC).

translation.en: The NIPP is an intervention vehicle warehoused in NDPHC and owned by the federal, state and local governments.
translation.pcm: Di NIPP na di intervention vehicle warehouse wey di federal, state and local goment own for NDPHC.

translation.en: In 2015, the power grid hovered between 4,500 megawatts (MW) enabled by the commissioning and utilisation of the Geregu, Omotosho, Olorunsogo, Alaoji, Calabar and Ihovbor NIPP GenCos
translation.pcm: For 2015, di power grid don dey between 4,500 megourtts (MW) wey don bikom useful by di commissioning and utilisation of Geregu, Omotosho, Olorunshogo, Alaoji, calabar, Ihovbor NIPP GesCos

translation.en: that added nearly 1,000MW to the grid.
translation.pcm: Dat one add nearly 1,000MW

translation.en: However, the grid continued to rise with all-time peak electricity reaching 5,801.60MW as of March 2021, according to the statistics from the Independent System Operations (ISO) arm of the Transmission Company of Nigeria (TCN).
translation.pcm: Howeva, di grid continue to dey rise wit all-time peak electricity wey don reach 5,801.60MW as of March 2021, according to di statistics wey we get from independent system operation (ISO) arm of di Transmission company of Nigeria. (TCN)

translation.en: NDPHC started the NIPP intervention with the first phase in power generation.
translation.pcm: NDPHC don start di NIPP intervention wit di first phase wey dey power generation.

translation.en: It began to build 10 power GenCos known as the 'The Big Ten' around gas-producing states including Ondo, Ogun, and Kogi states.
translation.pcm: E don begin dey build 10 power GenCos wey dem dey call ' The Big Ten' around gas-producing state dem wey include Ondo, Ogun, and Kogi states.

translation.en: However, until 2015, some of them were still ongoing.
translation.pcm: Howeva, work still dey go on dem till 2015

translation.en: The second phase was then launched from 2015 to include intervention projects focusing on transmission, distribution, and renewable energy towards meeting NDPHC mandate of Lighting the Nation.
translation.pcm: Dem lunch the second phase for 2015 to include intervention project, wey go focus on transmission, distribution, and energy wey dem don renew towards meeting NDPHC mandate for lighting di nation.

translation.en: Currently, there are six power GenCos producing about 3,400MW electricity in the national grid while the four other GenCos are ongoing.
translation.pcm: currently, dem bin dey six power GenCos wey dey produce about 3,400MW electricity for di national grid while di four oda GenCos dey ongoing.

translation.en: Even among the four, some of its turbines have been commissioned and operational since 2015.
translation.pcm: Even among di four, some of im turbines don dey commission and dey operational since 2015.

translation.en: Analysis of the report indicates that the NIPP intervention in the transmission section of the power sector value chain, NDPHC has completed 22 substations comprising 10 units of 330/132 kilovolts (kV) level and 12 units of 132/33kV substations.
translation.pcm: Explanation of di report show say di NIPP intervention for di transmission section wey dey di power sector value di chain, NDPHC don complete 22 substations wey bin dey compromise 10 units of 330/132 kilovolts (KV) level and 12 units of 132/33KV  substations.

translation.en: It has also completed 2,194 kilometres of 330kV power transmission line and 887km of 132kV transmission lines.
translation.pcm: E don also complete 2,194 kilometres wey dey 330KV power transmission line and 887km wey dey 132KV transmission lines.

translation.en: These infrastructures since 2015, have added 5,590MVA energy supply capacity at the 330kV level and 3,793MVA at the 132kV level.
translation.pcm: Dis infracstructure since 2015, don add  5,590MVA energy supply capacity wey dey 330KV level and 3,793MVA wey dey 132KV level.

translation.en: To promote renewable and clean energy, the NIPP in the second phase became a major driver of the federal government's energy mix by 2030 known as Vision 30-30-30) which seeks to make renewable energy to be at least 30 per cent of the energy grid by 2030.
translation.pcm: To promote energy wey dey clean and improve, di NIPP for di second phase don turn to major driver of di federal goment energy mix by 2030 wey dem dey call vision 30-30-30 wich seek energy wey go improve to at least 30 percent of di energy grid by 2030.

translation.en: While it has installed 20,000 Solar Home Systems (SHS) in some northern states, the NIPP is delivering a huge part of the ongoing five million SHS to households nationwide under the Economic Sustainability Plan (ESP).
translation.pcm: While e don install 20,000 solar home systems for some northen states, di NIPP don dey deliver a huge part of the ongoing five million SHS to domot nationwide under di Economic Sustainability plan (ESP).

translation.en: There is also intervention in the gas sector towards solving the major challenges of the power plants which is the availability of gas-to-power.
translation.pcm: Dia bin dey intervention for di gas sector wey go solve major challenge of di power plant wich be di availability of gas-to-power.

translation.en: According to the Managing Director of NDPHC, Mr Chiedu Ugbo, in an interview with Daily Trust, the company is achieving this through the Fuel & Gas/Public Private Partnership (PPP) model.
translation.pcm: According to di oga patapata for NDPHC, Mr Chiedu Ugbo, for interview wey im get with Daily Trust,di company dey achieve dis tru di fuel and gas or public private partnership model.

translation.en: It created a department for this to spearhead its gas pipelines and feed stock connecting all the 10 NIPP GenCos.
translation.pcm: E don create a department for dis to spearhead im gas pipeline and feed stock wey dey connect all di 10 NIPP GenCon.

translation.en: In terms of power distribution, the report said the NIPP intervention has seen the completion of over 360 NIPP injection substations with a combined capacity of about 3,540MW.
translation.pcm: wen dem tok power distribution, di report tok say di NIPP intervention bin don see di completion of ovr 360 NIPP injection substations wit a combined capacity wey reach 3,540 MW.

translation.en: To complement these substations, NDPHC has also built about 2,600km of 11kV power distribution lines and 4600km of 33kV distribution lines which directly supply electricity to transformers in residential areas.
translation.pcm: To complement dis substations, NDPHC don build about 2,600KM of 11KV power distribution lines and 4600KM of 33KM distribution lines wey dey supply electricity directly to transformer

translation.en: There have also been 296 Appropriated Distribution Projects, which included injection substations, 1924 of 33kV lines, 4600km of 11kV line and other infrastructure.
translation.pcm: Dia bin dey 296 appointed project wey dem don distribute, wich injection substations dey inside, 1924 of 33kv lines, 4600km of 11kv lines wit dem oda infastruction

translation.en: NDPHC has also increased its distribution capacity with the installation of 25,900 Completely Self-Protected (CSP) transformers across the country, added Mr Ugbo.
translation.pcm: NDPHC sef don increase im distribution capacity wit di installation of 25,900 completely self-protected (CSP)  transformer wey dey across obodo, nah Mr Ugbo add dis one.

translation.en: In spite of these achievements that have helped to improve the national grid operations, the report highlighted threats to the infrastructure especially at the power distribution level.
translation.pcm: On top all dis achivement wey don help to improve di operation of national grid, di report highlight threat to di infastructure especially for di one wey dey di power distribution level.

translation.en: Some of the challenges NDPHC has met in distribution include theft of equipment and infrastructure, vandalism, lack of cooperation from Distribution Companies (DisCos).
translation.pcm: Some of di wahala wey NDPHC dey see for dis distribution be say dem dey tif dia equipment and infrastructure, vandalism, and lack of cooperation from Distribution companies (DisCos

translation.en: The others are community issues regarding land and Right of Way (ROIs), vehicular accidents that have damaged some power infrastructure and the rising insecurity across facility areas, it stated
translation.pcm: Di oda nah community wahala wey dey regard land and Right of way ( ROIs), motor accident wey don damage some power infrastructure and rising insecurity wey dey facility areas, e start

translation.en: In a comment to evaluate the viability of the NIPP interventions to Nigerian electricity consumers, the President, Nigeria Consumer Protection Network (NCPN), Barrister Kunle Kola Olubiyo, said the essence of the power sector privatization exercise concluded in November 2013 was to promote competitive economy and inclusive growth by private sector drivers.
translation.pcm: for a comment wey go empty di property of di NIPP intervention to Nigerian wey dey comsume electricity, di President for di Nigeria consumer Protection Network ( NCPN), Barrister Kunle Kola Olubiyo, im tok say di reason for di power sector privatatization exercise wey dem conclude for November 2013 hapen to promote competitive economy and inclusive growth by

translation.en: He however said despite this, the sector has not attained such viability, and so there was the need for the government to deepen the interventions through NIPP.
translation.pcm: Im howeva tok say despite dis, di sector neva reach dat kin viability, so di goment need to deepen di interventions tru NIPP.

translation.en: In spite of all the tremendous milestone achievements by NIPP/NDPHC, there are major areas of impediments on the full realisation of the lofty ideals of NIPP as championed by the management of NDPHC.
translation.pcm: On top all di tremendous milestone wey NIPP/NDPHC don achieve, dia bin major area of impediment wey dey full realizeation of di lofty idea wey di management of NDPHC championed.

translation.en: Mr Olubiyo said some of these challenges include the delay in taking over projects by the DisCos which should be captured in their Capital Expenditure (CAPEX).
translation.pcm: Mr Olubiyo tok say di wahala dem dey face include delay in taking over projects by di DisCos wich dem suppose capture for dia capital Expenditure ( CAPEX)

translation.en: He also said the delay in the implementation of the Eligible Customers regulation by the Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) was a hindrance.
translation.pcm: Im continue im tok say nah di Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) bin di inderance for di delay in di implementaion of di regulations of eligeable consumer

translation.en: With the huge power assets that NIPP has provided, the Manufacturers Association of Nigeria (MAN) and other dedicated power users can decide to connect to the NIPP plants and facilities directly and enjoy uninterrupted power supply, but this is being delayed.
translation.pcm: wit di kin huge power assets wey NIPP don provide, di Manufacturers Association of Nigeria ( MAN) and oda dedicated power users fit decide to connect to di NIPP plants and facilities directly and dey enjoy uninterrupted power supply, but dis bin dey delay.

translation.en: Another challenge for the NDPHC is funding, which according to him, should be raised by the equity stakeholders (federal, state and local governments) for more power sector projects.
translation.pcm: Anoda wahala wey NDPHC dey get nah funding, wich im think say di equity stakeholders suppose raise for more power sector projects.

translation.en: The leadership of the power sector will also need to address the low tariff for NIPP Plants and the low load (energy) dispatch of the available units from TCN.
translation.pcm: Di leadearship of di power sector go need to address di low tariff wey dey NIPP plants and di low load (Energy) dispatch wey dey available units from TCN

translation.en: Consumers are looking for more electricity, why should energy from NIPP GenCos be restricted?
translation.pcm: Consumer dem dey look for more electricity, why energy from NIPP GenCos con dey restricted ?

translation.en: Olubiyo queried.
translation.pcm: Nah so Olubiyo ask.

translation.en: Unlike elsewhere, Ramadan season in Nigeria has unfortunately been turned into a season of unnecessary controversy.
translation.pcm: unlike oda places, Ramadan season for Nigeria don unfortunately turn into a season wey dey get unnecessary controversy

translation.en: Starting from the recurrent controversy over the advent of the Ramadan crescent that ushers in the month and the exit of its moon that marks its end,
translation.pcm: Di controvercy don start from di arrival of di Ramadan crescent wey dey usher in di new month and di moon go waka commot to show e end.

translation.en: the Ramadan period equally witnesses controversy over ideological, jurisprudential or political stances expressed by some Ulama in the course of their Quranic tafseer sessions.
translation.pcm: di Ramadan peroid dey equally witness controversy ova ideological, jurisprudential or political stances wey some Ulama expressed for di course of dia Quranic trfseer sessions

translation.en: Yet, over the past couple of years, there has been unnecessary controversy over which charitable deed between sponsoring the broadcast of Quranic tafseer and charitable mass feeding for the needy is more worthwhile in Ramadan.
translation.pcm: ova many many years, dia bin don dey unnecessary controversy ova say wich charitable work better pass between make dem dey suponsor broadcast Quranic tafseer abi make dem dey do charitable mass feeding of di needy for Ramadan.

translation.en: As in other Muslim societies, Ramadan usually inspires a phenomenal rise in individual and societal spirituality in Nigeria where many wealthy individuals sponsor live or recorded broadcasts of Quranic tafseer by various Ulama.
translation.pcm: As e dey go for oda Muslim societies, Ramadan dey always inspire a phenomenal risefor individual and for societal spirituality for Nigeria wer plenty  wealthy pipo dey sponsorlive or recorded broadcast for Quranic tafseer by different Ulama

translation.en: Many others also spend more on charitable mass feeding for the poor.
translation.pcm: Many oda pipo dey spend more on top charitable feeding of di poor.

translation.en: However, while almost, if not all, who sponsor the broadcast of tafseer do also spend on charitable feeding, not all who spend on charitable feeding sponsor the broadcast of tafseer.
translation.pcm: Howeva, while almost, if no be all, who dey sponsor di broadcast tafseerb dey spend for di charitable feeding too, no be all wey dey spend for charitable feeding dey suponsor di broadcast of tafseer.

translation.en: During Ramadan in a typical northern Nigerian city, television and radio stations make a killing with the sale of airtime for tafseer and other religious lectures sponsored by individuals, firms and groups.
translation.pcm: Ramadan period for northern Nigeria, television and radio stations dey make profit wit di sale of airtime for tafseer and oda religious lectures wey individual, firms and groups sponsor

translation.en: From the sheer number of sponsored broadcasts of tafseer and other religious lectures on the more than 10 radio stations in Kano, for instance, one may wonder whether they do other programmes in Ramadan.
translation.pcm: from di kin number of sponsor broadcast of tafseer an dem oda religious lecture wey dey for like 10 radio stations for Kano, for example, one fit begin dey wonda weda dem dey do oda programme for Ramadam period.

translation.en: Now, while sponsoring tafseer broadcast is absolutely worthwhile, especially during Ramadan, the amount of resources spent in this regard might be disproportionate considering the desperate need for food that the largely hunger-stricken audiences are languishing in.
translation.pcm: E good say dem dey sponsor tafseer broadcast, especially for Ramadan, di amount wey dem dey spend for dis regard be like say im dey imbalance if we consider di kin hunger wey dey wire di needy

translation.en: After all, given the choice, they would certainly choose food handouts over such sponsored broadcasts as public tafseer sessions are everywhere during Ramadan for one to choose which to attend.
translation.pcm: afta all, if dem get chance to choose, dem go certainly choose food hangout ova dat kin sponsored broadcast, as e don be say public tafseer session dey evriwia for Ramadan wey persin fit choose wich to attend.

translation.en: Besides, looking at the underlying dynamics and politics of sponsoring Ramadan tafseer broadcast, one cannot rule out Riyaa, sectarian and even political interests as some of the motives behind sponsoring the broadcast of some tafseer and other religious lectures.
translation.pcm: Besides, di kin underlying dynamics and politics wey dey for sponsoring Ramadan tafseer broadcast, persin no fit rule out Riyaa, sectarian and even political interest wey be di main motives for di sponsor of tafseer and dem oda religious lectures.

translation.en: Interestingly, while some sponsors compete in sponsoring the broadcast of tafseer by some prominent Ulama, some Ulama sponsor the broadcast of their own tafseer in the absence of a willing sponsor; others even beg for sponsors to sponsor theirs.
translation.pcm: Wetin dey interesting be say, while some sponsor dey compete for who go sponsor di broadcast of tafseer wey some prominent Ulama dey anchor, some of di Ulama dey sponsor dia own broadcast tafseer even if dem no see persin wey wan sponsor;  odas even dey beg for sponsor wey go sponsor dia programme.

translation.en: Also, as the contents of some tafseer and other religious lectures feature some serious flaws, sponsoring their broadcast is a gross misplacement of priority.
translation.pcm: Also, di content wey some tafseer and oda religious lectures dey feature get some serious flaws, to dey sponsor dis kin broadcast nah big misplacement of priority

translation.en: Equally interesting, others sponsor the broadcast of Adhan (Kiran Sallah) in a city like Kano
translation.pcm: anoda thing wey dey interesting be say, some dey sponsor di broadcast of Adhan ( Kiran sallah) for inside city like Kano.

translation.en: where, thanks to the sheer proliferation of mosques, regular Adhan reaches every nook and cranny.
translation.pcm: wia, thank you to sheer wey dey increase for Mosques, regular Adhan don dey reach evri corner

translation.en: Anyway, while Ikhlas is always the most fundamental yardstick that determines the worthwhileness or otherwise of both charitable feeding and the sponsoring of Ramadan tafseer broadcast, striking an appropriate balance between the two guarantees the perfect outcome.
translation.pcm: Anyway, Ikhlas bin di ogbonge yardstick way dey determine if weda charitable feeding and di sponsoring of Ramadan tafseer  broadcast dey worthy or not, striking appropriate balance between di two go give better outkom.

translation.en: Because as much as Ramadan is the month of the Quran when Muslims are expected to be particularly committed to it in terms of reading, learning its meanings and living accordingly,
translation.pcm: Even though say Ramadan be di month of di Quran wey be say Muslims suppose dey commited in terms of reading, learning wetin im mean and to dey live dia lives accordingly

translation.en: it's equally the month of generous charity when Muslims, particularly the wealthy, are expected to do much more in terms of charitable works especially mass feeding.
translation.pcm: Di month nah di month of generous charity wey be say Muslims, particularly di ones wey dey wealthy suppose dey do charity work, especially mass feeding.

translation.en: However, while that's simply the bottom line, which also explains why the controversy is absolutely unnecessary, the so-called liberal Muslims have blown it out of proportion.
translation.pcm: Howeva, while dat one com be di bottom line, wich explain why di controversy no dey necessary, di Liberal Musilims don over do am

translation.en: Capitalizing on public frustration amid the unbearable hunger ravaging the largest segment of the society, they question the worthwhileness and relevance of sponsoring the broadcast of Ramadan tafseer under the prevailing circumstances.
translation.pcm: capitalizing on top public frustration wey dey inside di hunger wey dey wire di society, dem dey kwesion weda di sponsoring of di broadcast Ramadan tafseer dey worthy or relevance for under dis kin condition wey we dey find ourselves.

translation.en: Also, feigning empathy and concern, they address the two charitable works as though mutually exclusive and thus people should choose between them.
translation.pcm: As dem don pretend show empathy and concern, dey tok say di two charity work be di same and make pipo choose between dem.

translation.en: Unsurprisingly, and under the pressure of the hard conditions, many people, including many otherwise discerning folks, fell for that propaganda not realising its context, which is the raging face-off between the so-called liberal Muslims, on the one hand, who are hell-bent on undermining Islamic and moral values in the society, and the wholehearted Muslims, on the other, especially the Ulama among them who are committed to encouraging people to never neglect their religious commitments in pursuit of their legitimate worldly pursuits.
translation.pcm: Under di hard condition wey pipo dey, e no surprise to dey see many pipo, including di ones wey fit discern, fall for di propaganda wey dem no know e context, nah im be di raging face-off wey dey between di Liberal Muslims, for anoda side, dem bin wan undermine Islamic and moral values for di society by force, togada with di

translation.en: Also, contrary to their claim, such so-called liberal Muslims aren't actually disturbed by the plight of the vulnerable, which explains why they never urge those spending huge resources on other things, no matter how absolutely worthless, to divert the resources to charitable courses.
translation.pcm: Also, contrary to wetin dem claim, di Liberal Muslims no dey disturb by di kin wahala wey dey for di vulnerable, dis don explain why dem neva urge those wey dey spend huge resources on top oda things, no mater how worthless im be, make dem divert di resources to charitable course.

translation.en: Likewise, they never urge that the massive amounts of resources their elite role models spend on maintaining their extravagant lifestyles should be diverted to the feeding of the poor or sheltering them.
translation.pcm: Dem neva urge dat di kin massive amounts of  resources dia elite role spend on top say dey wan maintain dia big lifestyles suppose dey diverted for di feeding of di poor or to take give dem shelter

translation.en: Instead, their conscience comes alive only when the resources are meant for, say, Hajj, Umrah, Daawah etc.
translation.pcm: Instead, dia conscience go kom alive wen resources dey for only, say, Hajj, Umrah, Daourh

translation.en: Federers conqueror amazed by dream day at the office
translation.pcm: Federers conqueror dey amazed by dream day wey dey di office

translation.en: After wrecking Roger Federers return to the tennis courts, Pablo Andujar said it was the sweetest moment of a lengthy career.
translation.pcm: Afta  im don wreck, Roger Federers return to di tennis courts, Pablo Andujar tok say dat na di sweetest moment a lengthy career.

translation.en: The Spaniard beat Federer 6-4, 4-6, 6-4 on the Geneva clay on Tuesday to overturn the Swiss tennis greats hopes of stringing a run of matches together ahead of a series of major tournaments the French Open, Wimbledon and the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.pcm: Spaniard beat Federer 6-4,4-6,6-4 on top di Geneva clay for Tuesday to scata  di swiss tennis great hopes wey dem wan use run di match togeda ahead different major tournaments wey French open, Wimblendon and di Tokyo olympics.

translation.en: At match point on Tuesday, Andujar, the world number 75, held his head in his hands in disbelief after beating the 20-time Grand Slam champion.
translation.pcm: For match point on Tuesday, Andujar, wey be di world number 75, hold im head for im hand in disbelief afta he don beat di 20-time Grand slam champion.

translation.en: I still cannot believe,the 35-year-old told ATPTour.com.
translation.pcm: I no fit believe am, nah wetin di 35-year-old tell ATPTour.com.

translation.en: Memories of Nigeria's colours in black and white (III)
translation.pcm: Di memories of Nigeria colo wey dey for black and white(iii)

translation.en: Sometime after that, and after I had two popular cartoon strips in the now-defunct newspaper called The Democrat, and got my first four rejection letters from Marvel Comics, I somehow remained a young man full of hope.
translation.pcm: sometimes afta dat, and afta I don get like two popular strip wey dey for di now default news paper wey dem dey call The Democrat, I get my first four letters wey reject me from Mavel Comics, I gada myself remain a young man wey still get hope.

translation.en: Nigeria, even with monumental ups and downs, still allowed me to dream, to be an artist or writer at the worlds foremost pop culture company in another country, on another continent.
translation.pcm: with di kin ups and downs wey dey for Nigeria, im still allow me get dream, to be artist wey dey work for a ogbonge culture company wey for anoda kontiri, anoda continent

translation.en: Fast-forward to 2002, one day as I was setting out to the post office in the city centre to drop off my latest art samples to Marvel's Submissions Editor, I couldn't get a bus.
translation.pcm: Fast-forward to 20002, one day as I dey sit down for di post office wey dey di centre of di city to drop off my latest art sample to Marvel Submission Editor, I no fit get bus

translation.en: Loads of people were walking on foot, while some gathered in clusters, with worried looks on their faces.
translation.pcm: Plenty pipo dey use leg take waka, some gada for group, dem dey worry.

translation.en: A bit weirded out, I walked back home, only to hear that riots had broken out.
translation.pcm: I dey weird out, waka go home, only to hear say raiot don start.

translation.en: Again, many lives were lost, and families and friends were torn apart as a move by Christians to Kaduna South, and Muslims to Kaduna North from the South, began.
translation.pcm: again, many pipo die for di riot, farmilies and friends tear apart as Christian dey beingn move to Kaduna South and Muslims begin move from Kaduna South to di North

translation.en: My Kaduna, my Nigeria, really was falling apart.
translation.pcm: My Kaduna, my Nigeria, don dey fall apart.

translation.en: A small consolation was that some Christian friends who stayed in certain areas, like my mine, felt safe and didn't move.
translation.pcm: Di small consolation wey I get be some Christian friend wey stay for certain areas, like me, dem feel safe and no go anywia

translation.en: So, while the violence raged in other parts, my friends and I would play soccer on the street, and exchange VHS tapes, and bootleg VCDs.
translation.pcm: So,  as di violence dey intense for oda parts, I go dey play soccer for my street, dey exchange VHS tapes and bootlegs VCDs

translation.en: The concept of hating someone because of his ethnicity or religion, frankly, seemed incredulous to us.
translation.pcm: Di idea to dey hate persin bikos of im religion or ethnic dey incredible for us.

translation.en: But a fellow teen, who had moved to my neighbourhood a couple of years earlier, would provide me with my first, bare-faced encounter with bigotry.
translation.pcm: But one teen, wey just move to our domot some years, nah im make me get encounter with intolerance.

translation.en: Assuming we somehow were all Muslim, playing soccer, this new guy made a clear call for us to go and attack the infidels who lived down the road.
translation.pcm: if to say we be Muslims, playing soccer, dis new guy call us make we go attack di infidel wey dey live down di road.

translation.en: We all looked at each other most comically, with puzzled expressions, after which we burst into laughter, then sternly told him to get lost.
translation.pcm: we com look each oda jokingly, we dey confuse, afta wich we burst to laughter, we com tell say make im get out.

translation.en: As if that wasn't bad enough, my heartbreak would worsen with the appearance of labels and slurs from both sides.
translation.pcm: As if dat one no bad reach, my heartbreak for don worse as I see di apprearance of labels and slur from both of dem.

translation.en: My perfect Kaduna was now in smoking ruins, and close-knit families and bosom friends would part ways, not because they stopped loving each other, but because it was the safest thing to do.
translation.pcm: My perfect Kaduna don dey fall apart, and families and friends don dey part ways, no be say dem no love each oda but bikos say dat na di safest thing to do.

translation.en: After that end of innocence, I faced university with cautious optimism.
translation.pcm: afta di wahala don end, I begin face university with cautious optimism.

translation.en: Many old friends were there, as Zaria was a stones throw from Kaduna, figuratively speaking.
translation.pcm: literally, many old friend dey there, as Zaria no too far from Kaduna.

translation.en: Many new friendships were begun as well, many of them remaining till today, some even stronger.
translation.pcm: Many pipo dey get new friend, some dey till today, some don dey stronger

translation.en: The best part of that part, is that none of those friendships, new or old, are coloured by religion or ethnicity.
translation.pcm: The best part be say, all dis friend dem weda new or old, no dey base on religion or ethnicity

translation.en: It seemed to some us who noticed, that the Kaduna we knew, loved, and lost, wasn't really gone.
translation.pcm: Some of us wey notice know say, di Kaduna wey we know, love and don lose, neva really destroy.

translation.en: It couldn't be gone, for the simple reason that it actually resided in our hearts, and so was hard to kill.
translation.pcm: E no fit go bikos say nah for our heart im reside, so e go hard to kil patapata

translation.en: The almost two decades I spent as a journalist after all that, showed me things which many cannot even begin to experience in a whole, robust lifetime.
translation.pcm: Afta all di almost 29 years wey I don spend as a journalist, show me things wey plenty pipo no fit experience for dia life.

translation.en: I had front row seats to riots, violent attacks, concerts by superstars, movie premieres, and all kinds of generation-defining moments.
translation.pcm: I get front row seat to fight for, gbege attack, concerts by superstars dem, movies premieres and all kin generation-defining moments

translation.en: I also got to regularly interview some of the biggest newsmakers in Nigeria, during moments when they had the most chutzpah, or none at all.
translation.pcm: I also get to dey interview for some big big newsmaker wey dey Nigeria, during moment wey dem get most chutzpah, or nothin at all.

translation.en: It was a Nigeria without social justice warriors, virtue-signalers, outrage-peddlers, or cancel culture-purveyors.
translation.pcm: Nah di Nigeria wey no get worrior wey no fit fight for  social justice, virtue-signalers, outrage-peddlers, or cancel culture- purveyor.

translation.en: It was a Nigeria that, while flawed, still reminded me of my Kaduna of old, even if it wasn't a mirror image.
translation.pcm: Nah di Nigeria wey dey flawed, still dey remind me of my old Kaduna, even though di image different to each oda.

translation.en: But a body can only take so much for such a long time.
translation.pcm: But bodi no fit take all of dem for too long.

translation.en: On the bed, I looked around my old room once more, everything just as I left it pre-Coronavirus lockdown.
translation.pcm: On top of bed, I con look around my old room again, evrithin just dey as I leave am before im coronavirus lockdown.

translation.en: I smiled to myself, as I had at that moment decided on my next steps.
translation.pcm: I com smile to myself, nah from dat moment I begin to dey decide on di kin steps wey I go take.

translation.en: I twirled the rubber band round the stack of photos twice, and put them back into the longbox.
translation.pcm: I com twist di rubber band round di sack of fotos two times, com put am back for inside longbox.

translation.en: Maybe one day I will look at the other ones, the colour photos, which carry relatively more recent memories.
translation.pcm: Maybe one day I go look oda ones, di colour foto, wey carry more recent memories.

translation.en: Maybe I won't.
translation.pcm: Maybe I no go do am.

translation.en: One thing remains clear: It is my mother, and my father, and the relationships they had or didn't have with me, that made me the kind of kid
translation.pcm: One thing dey clear say: nah my mother, and father, and di kin relationship wey dem get or wey dem no get wit me, nah im make me di kin child wey I be.

translation.en: I was to the other kids who knew me, as well as the man I grew up to be, to those who know me.
translation.pcm: Wetin I be to oda kids wey know me, also di kin man wey I be, to pipo wey know me.

translation.en: But I find it unsettling, and relieving mostly relieving that in my stack of black and white photos, I have realized that while my head guides the kind of person I have become, it is my heart that has kept me Nigerian all these years.
translation.pcm: But I find am as wahahla, and e dey relieve more for my sack of black and white fotos, I don realize say while my head guide di kin persin wey I be, nah my heart don dey keep me Nigerian all dis years.

translation.en: 42 Niger communities under Boko Haram control Senator Musa.
translation.pcm: 42 Niger communities wey dey under Boko Haram dey control Senator Musa.

translation.en: The Senator representing Niger East in the National Assembly, Senator Mohammed Sani Musa, has said that about 42 communities in Niger State have fallen under Boko Haram control.
translation.pcm: Di Senator wey dey represent Niger East for di National Assembly, Senator Mohammed Sani Musa, im tok say about 42 communities wey dey Niger State don fall under Boko Haram control.

translation.en: Some 5,000 villagers have been displayed in the last three days.
translation.pcm: Dem don showcase 5,000 villagers for di last three days.

translation.en: This is coming a day after Niger State governor, Sani Bello, raised the alarm that the insurgents have hoisted their flag in some communities.
translation.pcm: Dis dey kom after Niger state governor, Sani Bello, don raise alarm say di insurgents don hoist dia flag for some communities.

translation.en: Speaking on the floor of the Senate on Tuesday while moving a motion on the killings in Shiroro, Munya and Rafi local government areas of Niger State, Senator Musa said over 475 persons had been killed by bandits and terrorists in Niger East between January 2020 to date.
translation.pcm: Speaking on di ground of senate on Tuesday while dem dey move on a motion on di kilins wey dey apun for Shiroro, Muya and Rafi local goment areas for Niger state, Senator Musa tok say bandit and terrorist don kil ova 475 persins for Niger East between 2020 till date.

translation.en: The lawmaker expressed worry that for almost seven years now Niger East Senatorial District of Niger State have come under constant and sustained multiple deadly attacks by heartless, venomous and hydraheaded Boko Haram terrorists.
translation.pcm: Di lawmakers don express im worry dat almost seven years now Niger East Senatorial Districts wey dey Niger Delta don dey under eviriday and dey sustain plenty deadly attack by heartless, venomous, hydraheaded Boko Haram terrorist.

translation.en: The result has been total collapse of the local economies of the affected victims, total collapse of educational system in the affected areas, famine due to collapse of agricultural activities, displacement as a result of desertion of crisis prone areas, depopulation as a result of wanton deaths, among others.
translation.pcm: Di result don dey total collapse wey dey di local economies of di affected victims, total collapse of educational system for di affected areas, famine don dey bikos of di collapse of agricultural activities, displacement wey be as a result of distortion of crisis prone areas, depopulation as a result of wanton death, wey dey among odas.

translation.en: He said the attacks are taking place in the absence of the slightest hindrance, resistance or confrontation from authorities.
translation.pcm: Im tok say di attack are taking places for di absence of di slightest hindrances, resistance of confrotation from authorities.

translation.en: They have kidnapped many and their wives seized from them and forcefully attached to Boko Haram members.
translation.pcm: Dem don kidnap many and don seize dem wives from dem com forcefully attached dem to Boko Haram members.

translation.en: Three military camps in Allawa, Bassa and Zagzaga in the two local government areas have been sacked and some security personnel killed by the insurgents in the last one month of renewed attacks.
translation.pcm: Three military camps wey dey Allour, Bassa and Zagzaga for di two local goment area don get sack, di insurgents don kil some security personnel in di last one month of di renewed attack

translation.en: I can authoritatively confirm that the Boko Haram terrorist have mounted their flags in many of the villages they have captured such as Kaure, Alawa and Magami.
translation.pcm: I fit confirm am authoritatively say Boko Haram terrorist don mount dia flags for many places wey dem don capture like Kure, Alour and Magani

translation.en: Inhabitants of these war-torn parts of the State have been abandoned and left to their fate thereby compelling them to wallow in perpetual agony and abject misery.
translation.pcm: Dey don abandoned pipo wey dey dis wat-torn part of di states and leave dem make dem face dia wahala, make dem dey in agony wey no get end and dey deep inside poverty.

translation.en: Furthermore at this moment primary schools in Gwada, Kuta, Pandogari and Minna have hurriedly been turned to IDP camps following the sacking of nearly 5600 villagers from their ancestral homes in Shiroro, Rafi and Munya local government areas in the last few weeks by bandits who raided the towns and villages.
translation.pcm: futhermore, for dis moment primary schools for Gwada,Kuta, Pandogari and Minna dem don carry dem do IDP camp as dem dey follow di sacking of almost 5600 villagers from dia ancestral homes in Shiroro, Rafi and Munya local goment area for di last few weeks by di armed rubber  wey don raid  di town and villages.

translation.en: And what this means is that if they can launch attacks without hindrance in Niger East Senatorial District
translation.pcm: Wetin dis mean be say if dey fit attack without hindrance for Niger East Senatorial districts.

translation.en: then I don't see how we can be safe in Abuja anymore.
translation.pcm: I no know how we wan take bikom safe for Abujan again.

translation.en: He said between March 2021 to date same terrorists have killed more than 25 gallant soldiers, mobile policemen and other security personnel, while more than 16 civilians were killed, many others unaccounted for.
translation.pcm: Im tok say March 2021 to date some jaguda don kil more 25 gallant soldier dem, policemen and oda security personnel while 16 civillians die, and dem no fit account for many odas.

translation.en: If this menace is not drastically addressed, the attacks will continue and the danger is that it may escalate further to other communities.
translation.pcm: If dem no address dis threat drastically, di attack go continue and di danger wey day dat one be say e fit bikom wetin we no fit handle further to oda communities.

translation.en: which are mostly farming communities and they are farmers, may desert their farms this season and this will negatively affect the food sufficiency and economic diversification policy of the Federal Government,he added.
translation.pcm: Wey bin farming communities and dem bin farmers, dem fit comot dia farm dis season and dis fit negatively affect food surficiency and economic diversification policy of di Federal Goment, im added.

translation.en: My sojourn in Adamawa State
translation.pcm: My visit go Adamour state

translation.en: Working with the government at any level offers innovators like me the chance to bring more impact and transformation than we ordinarily would in our fields.
translation.pcm: Working wit di goment for any level don offer innovators like me di chance to dey bring more beta and transformation wey we ordinarily no fit do for our field

translation.en: I strongly believe that the government, as an institution, is the greatest vehicle for systemic change and positive transformation one could ever find.
translation.pcm: I strongly believe say di goment, as institution, be di greatest vehicle for systemic change and positive transformation wey persin no fit find anywia.

translation.en: Therefore, whenever I come across opportunities to work with any government body, whether locally or internationally, I am immediately struck with great excitement because it represents a great opportunity for me to learn from and contribute to the civil service in fields that are exciting and transformative to people beyond what my usual entrepreneurial endeavours entail.
translation.pcm: For dat, weneva I kom across opportunities to work wit dem goment bodi, weda local or nah for outside country, I dey always dey hapi bikos say e represent a great opportunity for me learn from and fit contribute to di civil service wey dey fields dat are exciting and dey transformative for pipo beyond wetin my

translation.en: One of my recent sojourns of such nature is to Adamawa State, which is fascinating for me because of its diversity, resilience and outstanding potential.
translation.pcm: One of my recent visit of such nature nah to Adamour state, wey dey fascinating for me bikos of im diversity, resilience and outstanding potencial.

translation.en: I began actively working in Adamawa State a few years ago, with the international organisation, OXFAM, on a project in line with European Union's support to food security and resilience in northern Nigeria where we deployed a mobile solution to integrating the agricultural value chain.
translation.pcm: I begin dey work actively for Adamour state some years ago, wit di international organisation, OXFAM, on top a project wey dey in line wit European Union's support to food security and resilience for Nothen Nigeria were we deployed a mobile solution to integrating di agricultural value chain.

translation.en: We worked with field officers representing Fufore, Guyuk, Mubi South and Song Local Government Areas in Adamawa State to enhance their agricultural and agribusiness practices with technology.
translation.pcm: We don work wit field officers wey dey represent Fufore,Guyuk,Mubi South and Song local goment areas wey dey Adamour state to enhance agriculture and Agricbusiness practices wit tecnology.

translation.en: However, my return to Adamawa State last year was towards a grander and even more exciting task.
translation.pcm: Howeva, my return to Adamour state last year dey towards a grannder and dey get more exciting task.

translation.en: It involved a preposition to work with the state government to transform the Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Development and Poverty Alleviation as well as the Wealth Creation Agency (PAWECA) with the general aim of reducing poverty and sustainably improving prosperity especially for the teeming young people in the State.
translation.pcm: E don involve a preposition to take work wit di state goment to transform di ministry of Entrepreneurship and Development and poverty Alliviation togeda wit di wealth creation Agency( PAWECA) wit di general aim of how to dey reduce poverty and dey sustainably dey improve prosperity for di teeming young pipo wey dey di state.

translation.en: For some context, I was incredibly delighted to learn that the state government had established the Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Development to help lay focus on entrepreneurship and technical skill acquisition.
translation.pcm: For some context, I dey very delighted to learn dat di state goment don establish di ministry of entrepreneurship and Development wey go help lay focus on entrepreneurship and to acquire technical skil.

translation.en: Having been non-existent until the Government of Ahmadu Umar Fintiri's administration established it, the ministry has become a key pillar of the administration's strategies towards economic development in the state.
translation.pcm: E no exist untill di goment of Ahmadu Umar Fintiri administration com establish am, di ministry don bikom di key pillar of di administration strategies wey dey towards economic development of di state.

translation.en: The role of these institutions is as salient as it is needed in Adamawa State, with its fair share of youth unemployment, security and other challenges.
translation.pcm: Di role of dis institution dey sailent as im supporse be for Adamour state, wit im fair share of youth unemployment, security and oda challenges.

translation.en: It is, however, very evident that the Adamawa State Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Development, as well as the Poverty Alleviation and Wealth Creation Agency (PAWECA), can be adequately utilised in transforming the local economy, boosting youth entrepreneurship and drastically reducing unemployment in the state.
translation.pcm: Im dey, howeva, very very evident dat the Adamour state ministry of Entrepreneurship and development, togeda wit Poverty Alleviation and Wealth Creation Agency (PAWECA), e fit dey adequately utilised for trasforming di local economy, boosting youth entrepreneurship and to dey reduce unemployment drastically for di state.

translation.en: But like most government institutions, this requires disciplined and dedicated efforts to achieve.
translation.pcm: But as im be for most goment institutions, dis dey require discipline and dedicated effort to fit achieve dem

translation.en: Typically, where they exist, complex internal organisational challenges shackle the growth and efficiency of these types of institutions.
translation.pcm: Typically, for wia dey exist, complex international organisational challenges don shackle di growth and efficiency of dis kin institutions.

translation.en: To understand this conundrum, I spoke with Adamawa State's Secretary to the State Government, Malam Bashiru Ahmad, who is not only passionate about the issue but remarkably informed about local and global efforts around it and as such uniquely positioned to help chart a way for solving it.
translation.pcm: For persin to understand dis conundrum, I tok to Adamour state's secretary to di state goment, Malam Bashiru Ahmed, who no dey only passionate about di issue but dey remarkably informed about local and global effort wey dey around am and as such uniquely position to help chat oury solving am

translation.en: He reiterated Governor Fintiri's commitment to solving youth unemployment and enhancing the local economy by boosting entrepreneurship.
translation.pcm: Im repeat Governor Fintiri commitment to take solve youth wey no get job and enhance di local economy by boosting entrepreneurship.

translation.en: Malam Bashiru also expressed his ideas and understanding around reforming and improving the capacity of ministries and agencies of government, arguing that the desired transformation can only be possible by enhancing the culture of innovation, embracing the use of technology, and improving internal processes and procedures so that effective service and programme delivery can be achieved.
translation.pcm: Malam Bashiru don express im idea and understanding wey dey around reforming and improving di  capacity of ministries and agencies of goment, arguing dat di desire transformation only fit be possible if dem enhance di culture of innovation, embrace di use of technology, and if dem improve internal processeces and procedures so dat

translation.en: This is because the challenges that most public and even private institutions seek to solve continue to generate demands that can only be met by technologically savvy, innovation-driven, forward-thinking, and efficient institutions.
translation.pcm: Nah bikos of di challege wey most public and private institution dey seek to solve continue to dey generate demands wey only technologically savvy, innovation-driven, forward thinking, and efficient institution fit do.

translation.en: In the course of the weeks to follow after this encounter, I also met the Commissioner of the Ministry of Entrepreneurship, and Youth Development, Ilya James, and the head of the Poverty Alleviation and Wealth Creation Agency (PAWECA), Hajiya Aisha Bawa Bello, to examine what they have and lay grounds for developing initiatives based on global best practices.
translation.pcm: In di course of di weeks to follow afta dis encounter, I also meet di Commissioner of di Ministry of Entrepreneurship and Youth Development, Ilya James and di head of Poverty Alliviation and Wealth Creation (PAWECA) Hajiya Aisha Bello, make dem examine wetin dem have and dia lay grounds for developing initiatives base on

translation.en: We are to establish an organisational culture that is efficient and result-driven and equip the ministry and agency to become innovation-driven through the use of technology.
translation.pcm: we wan establish organisational culture wey dey efficient and fit give result and go equip di ministry and agency to bikom innovation-driven through di use of technology.

translation.en: In a demonstrable, result-oriented way we would also initiate human-centred design thinking among staff and optimise internal processes to ensure quality service delivery.
translation.pcm: In a way wey dey demostrable and fit give result we go initiate human-centre design thinking among staff and optimaize internal processes to ensure quality service delivery

translation.en: Lastly, we will offer tools for the adequate monitoring and measuring of organisational performance of the ministry and agency.
translation.pcm: last last, we go offer tools wey go dey for di monioring and measuring of organaisational performance of di ministry agency.

translation.en: These will go hand in hand with already existing as well as newly-hatched programs and campaigns of the two institutions.
translation.pcm: Dis go go hand in hand for di already existing togada wit newly-hatched programs and campaings of di two institutions

translation.en: Governor Fintiri's administration, by its sheer resolve and commitment towards capacity development in partnership with various global and indeed local partners like the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) and the Nigerian Content Development Board (NCDB), upgrading of vocational and fabrication centres like the Vocational Technical Training Centers (VTTC) after years of utter neglect, strengthening the technical departments of polytechnics and universities in the state and declaring free education in the stateâ€™s public schools including enrolling 38,000 Almajiri children back to school, I think will create a tremendous explosion of buried talent and potential that will certainly be instrumental to the development of the entire Northeastern region with all its peculiar social challenges.
translation.pcm: Governor fintiri administration, by im sheer resolve and commitment wey dey towards capacity development ey dey in partnership wit various global and indeed local partner like di United Nation and Development Programme (UNDP) and di Nigerian Content Development Board (NCDB), upgrading vocational and fabrication centres like di vocational

translation.en: I am also quite inspired by Governor Fintiri's obsession with local content participation policies in all projects and programmes, which is evident in the governor's drive for local content participation in the NEDC Rapid Response projects coupled with being the key galvaniser and pivot of the North East Governor's forum.
translation.pcm: I dey quite inspired by di kin obsession wey Governor Fintiri get for local content participation policies wey dey all project and programme, wey dey evident for di goment derive for local content participation in di NEDC rapid response projects togeda wit bin di key galvaniser and pivot wey dey di North East Governor's forum.

translation.en: As I landed this week in Yola, the state capital of Adamawa, amidst all these aspirations for the great Fombina, as the region is historically referred to, I was beset with a renewed melancholy at the loss of one of the greatest sons of Adamawa, and Nigeria's foremost public servant and academic, Dr. Mahmud Tukur, who in his lifetime had epitomised a brand of active patriotism hinged on developing capacities of people and promoting values at all cost.
translation.pcm: As I land for Yola dis week, di state capital of Adamour, amidst all dis aspirations for di great Fombina, as dem dey call di religion historically, I dey beset wit a renewed melanchonly for di loss of one of di greatest sons of Adamour, and Nigeria ogbonge public servant and academic Dr. Mahmud Tukur, who for im life time don

translation.en: May Allah grant him great rewards and enable us to fulfill his dreams and aspiration for Nigeria as a whole.
translation.pcm: We pray make Allah grant im great rewards, and make us fulfill im dream and aspiration for Nigeria as a whole.

translation.en: Sinner sets up Nadal clash in Rome second round
translation.pcm: Sinner do set up Nadal clash for Rome second round

translation.en: Jannik Sinner booked a second-round showdown with nine-time champion Rafael Nadal at the Italian Open after a 6-2, 6-4 win over Frenchman Ugo Humbert on Monday.
translation.pcm: Jannik sinner do book a second-round showdown wit nine-time champion Rafael Nadal fot Italian open afta a 6-2, 6-4 over Frenchmen Ugo Humbert on Monday.

translation.en: The Italian teenager will face the 20-time Grand Slam winner for the second time, having impressed against Nadal in last years
translation.pcm: Di Italian teenager go  face di 20-time Grand slam winner for di second time, afta im don impress against Nadal in last years.

translation.en: French Open quarter-finals despite losing in straight sets.
translation.pcm: French Open quarter-finals even though dem don lose for straight sets.

translation.en: Nadal has a 9-2 record on clay this season but was beaten in the last eight at both previous Masters events, in Monte Carlo and Madrid.
translation.pcm: Nadel don have a 9-2 record on clay dis season but dey beat am for di last eight for both previous masters events, for Monte Carlo and Madrid.

translation.en: Aslan Karatsev matched Sinner with his 20th win of the season.
translation.pcm: Aslan Karatsev don dey same wit Sinner wit im 20th win of di season.

translation.en: The Russian beat Miomir Kecmanovic 7-6 (7/2), 6-4 in the opening round.
translation.pcm: Di Russian beat Miomir Kecmanovic 7-6 (7/2), 6-4 for di opening round.

translation.en: Nigerians angry as Governors mull N408/litre fuel price
translation.pcm: Nigerians don vex as Governors don mull N408 per litre for fuel price.

translation.en: Nigerians have expressed anger over the proposal of the Nigerian Governors Forum (NGF) committee on fuel subsidy, to push for the full deregulation of the downstream petroleum sector that will leave petrol price at N408.5 per litre.
translation.pcm: Nigerians dem don express dia anger ova di proposal of di Nigeria goment Forum (NGF) committees on top fuel subsidy, to push for deregulation of di downstream.

translation.en: At a virtual meeting on Wednesday, the committee chaired by Kaduna State governor Nasir El-Rufai in a report, recommended a Premium Motor Spirit (PMS) otherwise called petrol price of between N408.5 per litre and N380 per litre while calling for the immediate removal of fuel subsidy.
translation.pcm: for a virtual meeting wey apun for Wednesday, di committee wey di state governor of Kaduna Nasir El-Rufai chaired inside a report, recommended a Premium Motor Spirit(PMS) wey dem dey also call petrol price wey between N408.5 per litre and N380 per litre while dem dey call for immediate removal of fuel subsidy

translation.en: El-Rufai said the current subsidy regime was unsustainable, and only smugglers and illegal marketers benefit from it.
translation.pcm: El-Rufai tok say dem no fit sustain di current subsidy regime, and only smugglers dem and dem illegal markets dey benefit from am.

translation.en: He also said Nigeria could not fully benefit from the recent production cut by Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC), which was meant to keep fuel prices high, because of subsidies.
translation.pcm: Im also tok say Nigeria no fit benefit from di recent production wey Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC), which dem suppose keep di fuel price high, bikos of subsidies.

translation.en: Between N70 billion and N210bn is estimated to be spent every month to keep gasoline price at N162 per litre, this is below the cost price and the remittance to the federation account will shrink to less than N50bn per month or even zero if threats persist, he said.
translation.pcm: Nah between N70 billion and 210 bn dem estimate to be dey spend evri month for di price of gasoline to remain 165 per litre, dis dey below di cost price and di moni wey den give to di federation account go shrink to less dan 50bn per month or even zero if threats persist, im tok.

translation.en: The committee recommends PMS pump price increment from the current N162per litre to N408.5 per litre
translation.pcm: Di committee don recommend PMS pump price increment from di current N162per litre to N408.5 per litre

translation.en: Reacting to this on Thursday, Nigerians across the states unleashed their anger on the governors.
translation.pcm: Reacting to dis on Thursday, Nigerians across di states don show dia anger on di governors.

translation.en: In Anambra state, a civil servant, Mr. Uzoma Okeke said the proposal was unthinkable given the state of the nationâ€™s economy.
translation.pcm: ForAnambra state, a civil servant, Mr. Uzoma Okeke tok say di proposal dey unthinkable if we dey look di state of economy of the nation.

translation.en: A bus driver, Michael Okafor said he was already struggling to buy petrol at N170/litre in the state.
translation.pcm: A driver wey im name be, Michael Okafor tok say im don dey struggle to buy petrol for N170/litre inside di state.

translation.en: In Jos, Plateau State, Malam Nura Alhassan, a tailor, expressed dismay over the development.
translation.pcm: Inside Jos for Plateau State, Malam Nura Alhassan wey be tailor, don express im disappointment on top di development.

translation.en: If the proposal becomes reality, the poor in this country will suffer a lot because whatever figure is increased, the effect will fall on the ordinary Nigerian.
translation.pcm: If di proposal don turn reality, di poor inside dis kontiri go suffer plenty bikos say whateva figure dem don increase, nah ordinary Nigerian go feel am.

translation.en: More persons reacted to this in Kaduna, Port Harcourt, Abeokuta, Jos and Kano.
translation.pcm: More pipo dem don react to dis inside Kaduna, Port Harcourt, Abeokuta, Jos and Kano.

translation.en: For instance, in Kano, Buhari Abba Rano, 36, said, With this level of insecurity around Nigerian governors are busy commissioning fake projects and loitering around Abuja and overnight agitating for complete deregulation.
translation.pcm: For instance, inside Kano, Buhari Abba Rano, 36, tok say Wit dis kin level of insecurity wey dey around Nigerian governors dem dey busy dey start fake projects dem and loitering around Abuja and overnight agitating for complete deregulation.

translation.en: This this shows that our crude oil has become useless and they don't care about the lives of the common man.
translation.pcm: Dis don show say our crude oil don dey useless and dem no care about di dem lives of di common man.

translation.en: Fatima Baba Kura said: I believe this proposed price will set back the country to a worse state than it is.
translation.pcm: Fatima Baba Kura tok im believe say dis price wey dem propose go kos set back for di kontiri to a worse state than wetin im don be.

translation.en: In Lagos, many Nigerians expressed shock over the proposed fuel price increment from the governors who are supposed to defend their people.
translation.pcm: Inside Lagos, many Nigerians dem don express shock ova di don already propose fuel price increment from di governors dem who suppose to dey defend dia pipo.

translation.en: A student, Miss Onyekachi Emeka said the price increase would trigger a hike in transportation fare.
translation.pcm: A student, Miss Onyekachi Emeka tok say di price increase go fit trigger increase inside transportation fare.

translation.en: Across Akwa Ibom, Abia and Edo states, the residents corroborated the views of other Nigerians as they described the proposal as unfair to the Nigerian populace who have already had enough of the inflation rate, high cost of food and fuel and the deteriorating security situation.
translation.pcm: For inside Akwa Ibom, Abia and Edo states, di residents dem don corroborated di view of oda Nigerians dem as dem dey described di proposal as unfair to di Nigerian pipo dem who don already have enough of di inflation rate, high cost of food and fuel and di security situation wey don dey spoil.

translation.en: Discard proposal, experts, union tell FG
translation.pcm: Experts dem don tell FG say make im don discard proposal

translation.en: Experts who reacted to this development have urged the federal government to discard the governors proposal in the best interest of Nigerians.
translation.pcm: Experts wey react to dis development don bin urge di federal goment make dem discard di governors dem proposal for di best interest of dem Nigerian.

translation.en: A petrol industry commentator, Siraju Oyewale said arbitrary fixing of fuel price is antithetical to the principle of deregulation.
translation.pcm: Di pesin wey dey for in charge petrol industry, Siraju Oyewale tok say  arbitrary fixing of fuel price dey diffirent to di principle of deregulation.

translation.en: I have a problem with people sitting down and fixing prices of petrol.
translation.pcm: I get problem wit pipo wey dey sit down dey sit down dey fix prices for petrol.

translation.en: That is not deregulation.
translation.pcm: Dat one no dey deregulation

translation.en: That is still price regulation.
translation.pcm: Dat one still be price regulation.

translation.en: Politicians, or even government agencies fixing prices is antithetical to the principle of deregulation.
translation.pcm: Politicians dem, or even dem goment agencies wey dey fix prices dey different to di principle of deregulation.

translation.en: Although he supports deregulation, Oyewale said the price would initially rise above the current price but not up to N380.
translation.pcm: Even though say im support deregulation, Oyewale tok say di price go rise above di current price but e no go reach N380.

translation.en: Oyewale also said Nigeria must refine its crude oil locally to tackle the rising petrol import cost by NNPC.
translation.pcm: Oyewale also tok say Nigeria must to refine im crude oil for locally level to tackle di petrol import cost  wey dey rise by NNPC.

translation.en: An Abuja based economic expert, Samson Simon Galadima said selling petrol at more than twice the current price would further exacerbate inflationary pressure, hence, impoverishing Nigerians even more as purchasing power is diminished.
translation.pcm: An economic expert wey dey stay for Abuja, Samson Simon Galadima tok say selling petrol for price wey dey twice di current price go further exacerbate inflationary pressure, hence, impoverishing Nigerians dem even more as purchasing power don reduce.

translation.en: Galadima said a lasting solution to Nigeria's fuel price instability will be a deeply diversified energy-mix because our overdependence on petrol is quite unhealthy.
translation.pcm: Galadima tok say lasting solution to Nigeria's fuel price wey no stable go dey deeply diversified energy-mix bikos our overdependence on petrol no dey healthy.

translation.en: President of the Independent Marketers Association of Nigeria (IPMAN), Chinedu Okoronkwo said it was wrong for the NGF to fix fuel price.
translation.pcm: President of di Independent Marketers Association of Nigeria (IPMAN), Chinedu Okoronkwo tok say e dey wrong for di NGF to dey fix fuel price.

translation.en: He said full deregulation would encourage more local and foreign investors to invest in the sector and grow the economy but that the governor's proposal should not be honoured.
translation.pcm: Im tok say full deregulation go encourage more local and foreign investors dem to invest inside di sector and grow di economy but dat di governor's proposal should not be honoured.

translation.en: Only FG can tell us how much to sell fuel NNPC
translation.pcm: NNPC tok say nah only FG fit tell us how much to dey sell fuel

translation.en: The Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) has said it will not go with the proposal by NGF that a litre of petrol should be sold at N380.
translation.pcm: Di Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) don tok say e no go go wit di proposal by NGF dat make dem sell a litre of petrol for N380.

translation.en: NNPC's spokesman Dr Kennie Obateru who disclosed this to Daily Trust on Thursday said fuel price as it is now is a policy issue and only the federal government could direct the corporation to sell at specific price.
translation.pcm: Persin wey dey speak for NNPC Dr Kennie Obateru wey torchlight dis to Daily Trust on Thursday tok say as di fuel price be now, e don dbikom policy issue and nah only di federal goment fit direct di corporation to sell for a specific price.

translation.en: We are still waiting for the conclusion of the ongoing meeting between the organised labour and the Federal Government.
translation.pcm: We still dey wait for di conclusion of di meeting wey dey go on  between di organised labour and the Federal Goment.

translation.en: It is after the outcome of the meeting that we can say the price can be announced.
translation.pcm: nah afta di outkom of di meeting we fit announce di price

translation.en: NNPC said the NGF only made a proposal which could be accepted or discarded by the federal government.
translation.pcm: NNPC don tok say di NGF only made a proposal wey fit be accepted or discarded by di federal goment.

translation.en: PDP govs lack moral standing to demand for restructuring APC chieftain
translation.pcm: PDP goment lack moral standing to dey demand for restructuring APC chieftain

translation.en: A chieftain of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and Director General of the Progressives Governors Forum (PGF), Salihu Mohammed Lukman has said governors elected on the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) lack the moral standing to demand for executive bill and restructuring of the country.
translation.pcm: A chieftain of di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and Director General of the Progressives Governors Forum (PGF), Salihu Mohammed Lukman tok say dem governors wey dem elect on di platform of di pipos Democratic parti (PDP) don lack di moral standing to demand for executive bill and restructuring of di ogbodo.

translation.en: PDP governors had a few days ago after their meeting in Ibadan, asked President Muhammadu Buhari to send an executive bill to the National Assembly to amend the countrys Constitution to devolve more powers to the states among others.
translation.pcm: Few days ago afta PDP governor dem don do dia meeting for inside Ibadan, dem ask President Muhammadu Buhari make im send executive bill to di National Assembly make dem amend di kontiri's Constitution to devolve plenty powers to di states among odas.

translation.en: But reacting in a statement yesterday, the PGF Director General said there was nothing new in the resolutions as progressive governors in line with recommendations contained in the APC Committee on True Federalism, have already taken a position on the matter and since communicated it to the top echelon of the National Assembly.
translation.pcm: But reacting in a statement yesterday, di PGF Director General tok say nothing dey new inside di resolutions as progressive governors in line wit recommendations wey dem contain for di APC Committee on top True Federalism, don already take a position on top di matta and since don communicate am to di top echelon of di National Assembly.

translation.en: Having mismanaged opportunities to initiate all the recommendations being proposed by the PDP governors between 1999 and 2015, how can anybody in PDP claim any moral standing to demand for any executive bill?
translation.pcm: Has dem don mismanage dem opportunities to initiate all di recommendations dem wey dem bin don propose by di PDP governors dem between 1999 and 2015, how anybodi for inside PDP go dey claim any moral standing to dey demand for any executive bill?

translation.en: If the issue is as simple as getting the President to transmit executive bill, what stops all the PDP Presidents from initiating it for sixteen years?
translation.pcm: If to say di issue is dey as simple as getting di President to transmit executive bill, wetin stop all di PDP President dem from initiating am for sixteen years?

translation.en: Lightning kills 18 elephants in India
translation.pcm: Nah 18 elephants dem lightning kil for India.

translation.en: A herd of 18 wild Asiatic elephants were found dead in India's eastern state of Assam, possibly because of a massive lightning strike, local officials said on Friday.
translation.pcm: Dem see herd of 18 wild Asiatic elephants wey die for inside India's eastern state of Assam, di fit apun bikos of a massive lightning strike, local officials tok am for Friday.

translation.en: Fourteen adult elephants were found dead by villagers on Thursday.
translation.pcm: some village pipo dem see fourteen adult elephants on Thursday

translation.en: Another four bodies were found scattered on the foothills of the Kundoli reserve forest area of Assam, 160 kilometres from the state capital of Dispur, local wildlife official, M.K Yadava, told Reuters.
translation.pcm: dem see anoda bodies dem wey dem dey scata on top di foothills of di Kundoli reserve forest area of Assam, wey dey 160 kilometres from di state capital of Dispur, local wildlife official, M.K Yadava, tell Reuters.

translation.en: The state government ordered a high-level inquiry into the incident on Friday, Assam's Forest and Wildlife Minister, Parimal Suklabaidya, said.
translation.pcm: Di state goment don order a high-level inquiry wey dey into di incident on Friday, nah Assam's Forest and Wildlife Minister, Parimal Suklabaidya, tok am.

translation.en: A preliminary report suggests the deaths could be due to lightning although we need to find out through forensic tests if there could be any other reason like poisoning or disease, the minister added.
translation.pcm: A preliminary report reason say di deaths fit be due to lightning even though say we need to find out through forensic tests if im possible say somethin else fit be di reason like poisoning or disease, nah wetin di minister talk be dat.

translation.en: Locals, who found the elephants, said the animals could have been killed by a lightning strike late on Wednesday, a local forest ranger said, adding that he had seen burnt trees in the area.
translation.pcm: Di pipo dem wey find di elephants dem, tok say im possible say nah lightning kil di animals dem on Wednesday, nah a local forest ranger tok am, im add say im see trees wey dey burn for di area.

translation.en: The ranger declined to be named as he was not authorised to speak to the media.
translation.pcm: Di ranger no tok im name as im no suppose tok to di media.

translation.en: A former deputy national publicity secretary of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Comrade Timi Frank, faulted the appointment of Major- General Farouk Yahaya as the Chief of Army Staff.
translation.pcm: Di former deputy for national publicity secretary of di All Progressives Congress (APC), Comrade Timi Frank, im fault di appointment of Major- General Farouk Yahaya as di Chief of Army Staff.

translation.en: Frank, in a statement in Abuja, noted that President Muhammadu Buhari's penchant to elevate junior officers in the security establishments to superintendent over their seniors was against the much-cherished military tradition of seniority and subordination.
translation.pcm: Frank tok for inside a statement for inside Abuja, dat President Muhammadu Buhari's penchant wan elevate junior officers inside di security establishments to superintendent ova dia seniors dem dey against di much-cherished military tradition of seniority and subordination.

translation.en: He said the elevation of Yahaya above his seniors was a direct hit against the military, which will see senior, capable officers being purged through compulsory retirement as seen in the past.
translation.pcm: Im tok say di elevation of Yahaya above im seniors dem nah direct hit against di military, wich go see senior, capable officers dem wey dem purge through compulsory retirement as we dey see am for di past.

translation.en: The development, he said, was capable of breeding widespread distrust, discontent, disloyalty, low morale and lack of motivation in the military and other security agencies.
translation.pcm: Im tok say di development dey capable to dey breeding widespread distrust, discontent, disloyalty, low morale and lack of motivation inside di military and oda security agencies dem.

translation.en: The All Progressives Congress (APC) has expressed excitement over the recent appointment of Ahmed Mustapha Habib as the new Director-General of the National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA).
translation.pcm: Di All Progressives Congress (APC) don express im excitement ova di recent appointment of Ahmed Mustapha Habib as di new Director-General of di National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA).

translation.en: The appointment was announced earlier by the presidential spokesman, Garba Shehu.
translation.pcm: Nah di Presidential tok tok persin, Garba Shehu, nah im announce di appointment
