translation.pcm: Police don yarn say members of di public no go get access to di Capitol floor durin Biden inauguration.

translation.en: There will be no public access to the Capitol grounds during Joe Bidens inauguration as U.S. president on Jan. 20, acting Capitol Police chief Yogananda Pittman said.
translation.pcm: Actin oga pata-pata of Capitol Police, Yogananda Pittman tok say public access no go dey to di Capitol floor durin Joe Biden inauguration as U.S. president on Jan. 20.

translation.en: Pittman took over the leadership from Steven Sund after he stepped down amid criticism of the forces handling of rioters who breached the Capitol building last week.
translation.pcm: Pittman take over leadership from Steven Sund afta Sund step down becos of plenti criticism on how police take handle pipo wey riot for di Capitol building last week.

translation.en: She said law enforcement from the federal, state and local levels were working together and comprehensive, coordinated plans were in place to ensure safety.
translation.pcm: She tok say law enforcement agents from di federal, state and local level dey work togeda, and comprehensive, coordinated plan don dey ground to ensure safety.

translation.en: Several police officers have been suspended as investigations into the January 6 riot continue, she said.
translation.pcm: She tok say dem don suspend plenti police officers as dem continue to dey investigate di January 6 riot.

translation.en: Why Zuba fruit market needs urgent intervention
translation.pcm: Reason why Zuba fruit market need kia-kia intervention.

translation.en: For traders and farmers of fruits and vegetables in the country, the Zuba international market, as it is called, is a major selling hub.
translation.pcm: For traders and farmers wey dey sell fruit and vegetables in di kontri, di Zuba international market, as dem dey call am, na major selling place.

translation.en: The market serves not only the Federal Capital Territory (FCT) but neighbouring states as well.
translation.pcm: No be only di Federal Capital Territory (FCT) dis market dey serve but all di states wey dey around too.

translation.en: No doubt, the market is a source of income for thousands of people, mostly women and young ones trading in fresh produce in and around Abuja, the nations capital.
translation.pcm: No be lie say di market na wia thouands of pipo dey see moni, most of dis pipo be women and small pikin wey dey buy and sell fresh produce inside and around Abuja wey be di nation capital.

translation.en: Hundreds of tonnes of fruits like oranges, pawpaw, banana, plantain, pineapple, coconut, watermelon and others, as well as vegetables, make it to the market daily.
translation.pcm: Na plenti tonnes of fruits like orange, pawpaw, banana, plantain, pineapple, coconut, watermelon, vegetable and odas, dey enta di market evriday.

translation.en: Our reporter who visited the market on Tuesday witnessed increased activities around imported apple and coconut businesses as a major wholesale ground for retailers.
translation.pcm: Awa tori-pesin wey go di market on Tuesday see say buying and selling plenti for imported apple and coconut business, and di market na major wholesale ground for people wey wan re-sell.

translation.en: Over 70 percent of the fruits consumed in the FCT and neighbouring states come from this market, where thousands congregate as early as 5am every day to do business.
translation.pcm: Na dis market over 70 percent of di fruits wey dem dey chop inside di FCT and states wey dey around dey from kom. Pipo gada as earli as 5am evriday to do business.

translation.en: Tonnes of plantain displayed for sale in the market on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Plenti tonnes of plantain na im dem display to sell in di market on Tuesday.

translation.en: However, despite the huge potentials of the market to strengthen the horticultural business locally and internationally, there are challenges that have remained for many years.
translation.pcm: Even say dis market get big potentials to strengthen di agric business locally and internationally, e get plenti challenges wey don dey for many years.

translation.en: The market is still very much unorganized, and the fruits are mostly placed on dirty grounds, raising serious public health concern, especially as the country joins the rest of the world to combat the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.pcm: Di market still dey very rough, and na dirty ground dem dey put all di fruits. Dis dey make pipo worri on di health implication, especially as di kontri dey follow di rest of di world fight COVID-19  disease.

translation.en: Also, fresh fruits share common ground with rotten ones and wastages that are already infested with germs and diseases.
translation.pcm: Also, na di same place dem dey pack fresh fruits and rotten ones put, and even di ones wey be wastage wey don get germs and diseases.

translation.en: Dusts from thousands of legs walking around the filthy environment also expose many people to germs, making them vulnerable to diseases.
translation.pcm: Plenti pipo also dey open to germs wey dey cause diseases becos of di dust from many legs wey dey walk for di dirty environment.

translation.en: Again, the absence of necessary infrastructures like cold rooms, good road network, water, standard shops, clean ground facilities for placing fruits, and a host of other factors heighten major safety concern and place everyone eating fruits in Abuja and its environs at high risk.
translation.pcm: Again, di lack of necessary tins like cold room, gud road, water, standard shops, clean ground wey dem go dey put di fruits, and odas dey increase pipo concern on how safe di fruits dey, and e dey put evribodi wey dey chop fruits for Abuja and nearby at high risk.

translation.en: But despite these challenges, activities in the market put money in the pockets of many and generate revenue for the government too.
translation.pcm: But even as dis challenges dey so, activities for di market dey put moni for many pipo pocket, and e dey generate revenue for di government too.

translation.en: Our reporter spoke to a number of farmers and dealers who have been doing business in the area for many years.
translation.pcm: Awa tori-pesin follow som farmers and dealers who don dey do business for di area for plenti years tok.

translation.en: Tarsoo Alex, who has orange orchards in Vandikya, Benue State, said he supplied over 60 bags of oranges to the market on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Tarsoo Alex, who get orange farm for Vandikya, Benue State, tok say e supply more dan 60 bag of orange to di market on Tuesday.

translation.en: But he lost about five bags to excessive heat, occasioned by scorching sun.
translation.pcm: But na about five bag e loose becos of too much heat, wey di plenti sun cause.

translation.en: He was afraid that if buyers did not come early, he could lose more.
translation.pcm: E dey fear say if buyers no kom early, e fit loose more.

translation.en: According to him, a bag of oranges costs between N6,000 and N7,500, but his income is significantly reduced by huge cost of transportation from his farm in Benue to Zuba.
translation.pcm: As e tok, 1 bag of orange na between N6,000 and N7,500, but im profit don too reduce becos of transportation wey cost from im farm for Benue to Zuba.

translation.en: To address the issue of wastages, he said many of the farmers were embracing jute bags, which allow air to penetrate instead of polythene bags that generate excessive heat for the fruits.
translation.pcm: To stop di issue of wastage, e tok say plenti of di farmers don dey use jute bags, wey go allow air enter, instead of nylon bag wey go cause plenti heat for di fruits.

translation.en: Unlike oranges, plantains are everywhere now because this is its season, a young man who preferred to be simply called Pastor told our reporter.
translation.pcm: Unlike orange, plantain dey evriwia now becos na di season be dis, one young man wey go like make dem call am just Pastor na im tell awa tori-pesin dis.

translation.en: He said that before noon, all the plantains would have been bought.
translation.pcm: E tok say befor aftanoon, dem go don buy all di plantain finish.

translation.en: He helps farmers to sell their produce.
translation.pcm: E dey help farmers sell dia market.

translation.en: It is usually sold in dozens (12 bunches), which cost between N5,000 and N8,000, depending on the size of the bunches on each unit of 12.
translation.pcm: Na for dozen  (12 bunch) dem dey sell am, and na between N5,000 and N8,000, as each one big reach.

translation.en: Watermelons are sorted as grades 1, 2 and 3, with 50 pieces in each dozen.
translation.pcm: Na grade by grade dem dey select Watermelons, from grade 1, 2 and 3, and na 50 pieces dey for each dozen.

translation.en: Their prices also depend on grades, with the least costing as low as N9,000.
translation.pcm: Dia price also depend on d grade, u fit get di smallest one for N9,000.

translation.en: Regular customers can get lower prices.
translation.pcm: Regular customer fit get am for lower price.

translation.en: The same selling pattern goes for pawpaw and pineapples, but coconut is sold in bags while apples are graded and sold in cartons.
translation.pcm: Na di same way dem dey sell pawpaw and pineapple, but na for bag dem dey sell coconut, while na for carton dem dey sell apple, but na grade dem dey grade am too.

translation.en: In 2018, Daily Trust on Sunday uncovered a massive use of carbide to ripen fruits in the market, which health experts said could cause cancer.
translation.pcm: On one Sunday for 2018, Daily Trust discover plenti place wia dem dey use carbide to make fruit ripe for di market. Plenti health expert don yarn say dis fit cause cancer.

translation.en: The report eventually led to a crackdown on perpetrators by the market union leaders through their task force.
translation.pcm: Di report na im make di market union leaders go use dia task force arrest di culprits.

translation.en: Our reporter observed a significant improvement as the chemical is no longer seen to be used as was the previous practice.
translation.pcm: Awa tori-pesin observe say big improvement dey, as dem no see anybodi dey use di chemical like befor again.

translation.en: But theres the need to protect the health of consumers who patronise the market.
translation.pcm: But e dey important to protect di health of pipo wey dey patronise di market.

translation.en: Sultan asks Nigerians to stop blaming military for Constitutional crisis
translation.pcm: Sultan don tell Nigerians say make dem no dey blame di military for Konstitutional crisis.

translation.en: Alhaji Saad Abubakar III, the Sultan of Sokoto, has asked Nigerians to stop blaming the military for constitutional crisis.
translation.pcm: Alhaji Saad Abubakar III, di Sultan of Sokoto, don tell Nigerians say make dem stop to dey blame di military for konstitutional crisis.

translation.en: Social commentators, activists, government critics, among many others have at different times identified what they consider as gaps in the constitution, attributing the development to the military.
translation.pcm: Pipo wey be social commentator, activist, government critic, and many odas for different time don see wetin dem consida as gap for di konstitution, and dem don blame di military for dis development.

translation.en: In his remarks at the North West Zonal Public Hearing on the Constitution Review organised by the House of Representatives for Stakeholders from Sokoto, Kebbi and Zamfara, the monarch advised Nigerians to face the reality and suggest whether to have a new constitution or amend the current one before the 2023 general elections.
translation.pcm: Durin im tok for di North West Zonal Public Hearing on Konstitution Review wey di House of Representatives organise for Stakeholders wey com from Sokoto, Kebbi and Zamfara, na im di monarch advise Nigerians say make dem face di reality, and make dem tok weda to get a new constitution or amend di one wey we dey use befor di 2023 general election.

translation.en: Please, stop flogging the military, forget about what the military did and face the reality on ground.
translation.pcm: Di monarch beg say make we stop to dey abuse di military, make we forget wetin di military don do and face di reality wey dey.

translation.en: We have the constitution given to us by the military and the military made the constitution; the military also created 36 states, created Abuja and moved the capital from Lagos State to Abuja.
translation.pcm: We get di konstitution wey di military give us, and na di military create di konstitution; na dis same military create di 36 states, create Abuja, kom move di capital from Lagos to Abuja.

translation.en: The military had set up governments in so many states with the appointment of 99 percent civilians in the government and all of you agreed to it.
translation.pcm: Di military don set up government for plenti state, and na 99 percent civilians dem put for inside di government, and na all of una agree laidat.

translation.en: So, stop flogging the military, look at the constitution, if it is good for us or not; that is all.
translation.pcm: So, make una no dey abuse di military, look di konstitution, if e gud for us abi e no gud; Na im be dat.

translation.en: If you think we need to change the constitution, this is the time.
translation.pcm: If una tink say we need change di constitution, na di time be dis.

translation.en: If you think we need to just amend it, this is the time; but it is just two years to 2023 elections.
translation.pcm: If una tink say na amend we need amend am, na di time be dis; but na jus two years remain for 2023 election.

translation.en: Can we afford a new constitution or should we make just some amendments so that when the new governments come in, they can bring fresh faces, minds to fashion our new constitution?
translation.pcm: Shey we fit afford a new konstitution abi make we jus do som amendment so dat when di new government enta, dey fit bring new face and mind to create awa new konstitution?

translation.en: Those are the questions I want you to think about here, the Sultan told the hearing.
translation.pcm: Na di question wey I wan make una dey tink about for hia be dat, di Sultan yarn for di meeting.

translation.en: The monarch retired from the Nigerian Army where he rose to the rank of Brigadier General.
translation.pcm: Na from di Nigerian Army di monarch retire afta he don reach di rank of Brigadier General.

translation.en: 2023: PDP, APC bicker over burning of INEC offices
translation.pcm: 2023: PDP, APC quarrel on top INEC offices wey dem dey born.

translation.en: The Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and the All Progressives Congress (APC) are bickering over the burning of offices of the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) in some parts of the country.
translation.pcm: Di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and di All Progressives Congress (APC) dey quarrel on top di office of di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) wey dem dey burn for som part of di kontri.

translation.en: The PDP, in a statement by its spokesperson, Kola Ologbondiyan, alleged that the APC had been promoting acts of violence including the burning of INEC offices to build up an emergency situation and frustrate the smooth conduct of the 2023 general elections.
translation.pcm: Di PDP,throughdia tok-tok pesin, Kola Ologbondiyan, yarn say di APC don dey promote different act of violence, including di burning of INEC offices to create trouble wey go scatter di easy conduct of di 2023 general election.

translation.en: It is despicable that having realised that it has no place in the 2023 election, given its abysmal failure in governance, APC leaders are seeking to set our country ablaze and truncate our hard-earned democracy.
translation.pcm: E dey veri evil say becos dem don sabi say dem no get leg for 2023 election, becos of dia bad failure for governance, APC leaders wan put fire for awa kontri and block di demokracy wey we suffer for.

translation.en: The PDP invites Nigerians to note the failure of the APC and its leaders to forcefully condemn this clear assault on our frontline institution of democracy.
translation.pcm: Di PDP dey call on Nigerians to note di failure of di APC and im leaders, and to seriously condemn dis violent attack on dis important institution of awa demokracy.

translation.en: This is also as the APC administration has failed to take decisive steps to protect INEC facilities from assailants.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say di APC administration no take step to ensure say INEC facilities dey protected from attackers.

translation.en: Our party wants the APC to know that May 29, 2023 date is sacrosanct for it to leave office, free our nation from its stranglehold and fizzle out from our political firmament, it stated.
translation.pcm: Awa party wan make di APC sabi say May 29, 2023 na unchangeable day for dem to kommot for office, free awa nation from dier grip and disapear from awa politikal space.

translation.en: Reacting, APC in a statement by Secretary of the Caretaker Committee, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe alleged that the PDP had undemocratic plans.
translation.pcm: In reaction, di APC tokthroughdi Secretary of dia Caretaker Committee, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe say di PDP get undemocratik plans.

translation.en: The party said using lies and sponsored media attacks on the President Muhammadu Buhari-led APC government, the PDP has shown its hands as sponsors behind the politically-motivated attacks on some of our public and democratic institutions in the country, all in a clearly desperate bid to destabilise this government.
translation.pcm: Di part tok saythroughlies and sponsored media attacks on di President Muhammadu Buhari APC government, di PDP don show say na dem dey sponsor di politikally-motivated attack on som of awa public and democratik institution for di kontri, and na clear attempt to destabilise dis government by fire by force.

translation.en: The APC said, Perhaps, the PDP thinks Nigerians have forgotten its long and documented penchant of eroding and destroying democratic institutions.
translation.pcm: The APC said, Perhaps, the PDP thinks Nigerians have forgotten its long and documented penchant of eroding and destroying democratic institutions.

translation.en: To name one, was it not the same PDP that attempted to discredit INEC and the entire 2019 election with a bogus tale of a server that never existed and employed hackers to disrupt the communication network of the electoral body during the 2019 election?
translation.pcm: For example, no be di same PDP wey try discredit INEC and di whole 2019 election wit fake tori of server wey no dey, na dem still employ hackers to scatter di communication network of di electoral bodi during di 2019 election?

translation.en: The APC cannot be at home and burn its house.
translation.pcm: Di APC no fit dey e house com burn di house.

translation.en: A winner cannot destroy the process that brought it to success.
translation.pcm: A winner no fit scatter di process wey bring am success.

translation.en: From the 2015 to 2019 elections, Nigerians spoke clearly through their votes for the APC by mandating us to rescue the country from the PDPs 16-year misadventure.
translation.pcm: From di 2015 to 2019 election, Nigerians don talk clearlythroughdia vote for di APC, and dem don give us di authority to rescue di kontri from di PDP 16-year problem.

translation.en: The PDP should address itself to the reality that it stands rejected by the electorate.
translation.pcm: Make di PDP accept di reality say di electorate don reject am.

translation.en: Its undemocratic plan is ill-fated and will fail woefully.
translation.pcm: Dia undemocratik plan no dey favourable, and e go fail badly.

translation.en: Hawan Daushe: Police use teargas to foil attack in Kano
translation.pcm: som thugs dey trow stones on top di police but di police overpower dem befor di pipo fit pass.

translation.en: Swift intervention by the police operatives saved thousands of spectators of Hawan Daushe, a traditional Sallah Durbar, from what would have been a massive attack by a gang of lawless youths in Kano.
translation.pcm: Fast intervention by di police don save thousands of pipo wey go Hawan Daushe, a traditional Sallah festival, from somtin wey for don be a big attack by a gang of lawless youths for Kano.

translation.en: The youths in their numbers blocked the road a few meters from Kofar Kudu, the venue of the durbar to launch an attack on the retreating crowd of unsuspecting spectators before the police swiftly intervened by firing teargas.
translation.pcm: Di plenti youths block di road som few meters from Kofar Kudu wey be di venue of di durbar to launch attack on di crowd of pipo wey dey kom back, befor di police quickly intervene wit teargas.

translation.en: Thugs pelted stones at the police but they were overpowered before the people were able to pass.
translation.pcm: Som thugs dey trow stones on top di police but di police overpower dem befor di pipo fit pass.

translation.en: The incidents had trapped many of the durbar spectators at the emirs palace till about 7 pm.
translation.pcm: Di incident don hold many of di pipo wey com watch di durbar for di emir palace till about 7 pm.

translation.en: The incident started immediately after the governors convoy had left the emirs palace after the ceremony.
translation.pcm: Na immediately di governor convoy comot for di emir palace afta di ceremony, na im di incident start.

translation.en: The gang mobilized and blocked the road to rob the public and cause mayhem in the area.
translation.pcm: Di gang mobilize and block di road to rob di pipo and cause kasala for di area.

translation.en: Hawan Daushe has always been characterized by thugs clashes which usually leave scores injured.
translation.pcm: E don becom normal tin for thugs to fight and injure pipo evritime dem do Hawan Daushe.

translation.en: But there was no report of injury from Fridays incident.
translation.pcm: But we no hear say anybodi injure from di incident on Friday.

translation.en: This is the first Sallah durbar organised by the Emir of Kano, Alhaji Aminu Ado Bayero, since his enthronement last year.
translation.pcm: Na di first Sallah durbar wey Alhaji Aminu Ado Bayero go organise as di Emir of Kano, since wey he don climb di throne last year.

translation.en: The annual event was cancelled last year as a measure to curb the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic in the state.
translation.pcm: Dem cancel di event last year as a way to stop di spread of COVID-19 pandemic for di state.

translation.en: Fridays event, which started around 5 pm, witnessed a large turnout from various sections of Kano society.
translation.pcm: Na plenty pipo kom di event from different part of Kano society after e start by 5pm.

translation.en: Governor Abdullahi Umar Ganduje and many political elites were also in attendance.
translation.pcm: Governor Abdullahi Umar Ganduje and plenti political big-men sef dey dere.

translation.en: The event as usual started from Kofar Kwaru where the emir rode on a horse alongside his royal guards in traditional regalia to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, where he paid Sallah homage to his stepmothers in the stead of his biological mother who passed on, weeks ago.
translation.pcm: As e dey always be, di event start from Kofar Kwaru wia di emir go climb horse inside im traditional regalia, wit dem royal guard to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, wia e go pay Sallah homage to e stepmothers, as replacement for e own mama who die som weeks ago.

translation.en: After the visit to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, the Emir rode back to the palace through Kofar Kudu where he received homage from his district heads and other titleholders in a traditional display of horsemanship before he retreated to the palace thereby drawing the curtain for the famous Hawan Daushe.
translation.pcm: Afta di visit to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, di Emir climb e horse back to di palacethroughKofar Kudu wia e receive homage from e district heads and oda pipo wey get title in a show of traditional horsemanship befor e go back to di palace. And dis na im be di end of di popular Hawan Daushe.

translation.en: Chadian rebels, government forces clash in area where Deby was shot
translation.pcm: Chadian rebels don clash wit government forces for area wia dem shoot Deby.

translation.en: Government troops and rebels clashed on Thursday in a region of western Chad where president Idriss Deby Itno was killed earlier this month.
translation.pcm: Government troops don clash wit rebels on Thursday for one place in di Western region of Chad wia dem kill president Idriss Deby Itno earlier dis month.

translation.en: The fight in the desert region of Kanem, near Chads border with Niger, pits Libya-based rebels against forces loyal to a new military junta led by Debys son.
translation.pcm: Di fight for di desert region of Kanem, near Chad border wit Niger, put Libya-based rebels against forces wey dey loyal to di new military junta wey Deby son dey lead.

translation.en: Fiercely criticised for authoritarianism and inequality, Deby was seen as a trusty ally by many Western countries including the former colonial power France.
translation.pcm: Na many western kontries including di former colonial power France, strongly criticise Deby for total control of power and inequality, and dem see am trusty ally.

translation.en: He was seen as a stabilising force in the fight against jihadism in the wider Sahel region on the southern fringes of the Sahara desert.
translation.pcm: Dem see am as a stabilising force in di fight against jihadism in di wider Sahel region for di southern part of di Sahara desert.

translation.en: Fighting is continuing in Kanem  we are going to have continue to fight, otherwise they will destabilise us, junta spokesman General Azem Bermandoa Agouna told AFP.
translation.pcm: Junta tok-tok pesin General Azem Bermandoa Agouna tell AFP say fighting go kontinue for Kanem, e tok say dem go need kontinue dey fight, if not, dem go scatta dem .

translation.en: The Military Transition Council (CMT) is headed by 37-year-old Mahamat Idriss Deby.
translation.pcm: Na 37-year-old Mahamat Idriss Deby head di Military Transition Council (CMT).

translation.en: For now the fight against the Front for Change and Concord in Chad (FACT), drawn mainly from the Goran ethnic group, is going on about 300 kilometres (180 miles) north of the capital NDjamena.
translation.pcm: For now, di fight against di Front for Change and Concord for Chad (FACT), wey kom mainly from di Goran ethnic group, dey go on about 300 kilometres (180 miles) north of di kapital N'Djamena.

translation.en: Security sources, without giving further details, said the Chadian army bombarded FACT positions.
translation.pcm: Security pipo tok say Chadian army bombard FACT positions. Dem no give plenti tori for di matta.

translation.en: Deby, 68, died on April 19, from wounds he suffered fighting the Libya-based rebels, according to the authorities.
translation.pcm: Accordin to di authorities, Deby, wey be 68 die on April 19, due to di wound wey he carry wen e dey fight di Libya-based rebels.

translation.en: The insurgents had launched an offensive in the northern Tibesti region on April 11 as presidential elections were unfolding.
translation.pcm: Di insurgents don launch one offensive attack for di northern Tibesti region for April 11 as dem dey prepare for presidential election.

translation.en: A career soldier who seized power in 1990 and exercised it ruthlessly for 30 years, Deby died on the day that the electoral commission confirmed that he had won a landslide victory.
translation.pcm: As a career soldier wey seize power for 1990 kom use am anyhow for 30 years, Deby die for di day wey di electoral commission confam say e win.

translation.en: Hundreds arrested at protests
translation.pcm: Dem arrest ova hundred pipo for protests.

translation.en: FACT is led by Mahamat Mahadi Ali, a veteran insurgent who previously lived in France.
translation.pcm: FACT leader na Mahamat Mahadi Ali wey be ogbologbo insurgent wey don live for France befor.

translation.en: The group vowed to pursue its offensive after a pause for Debys funeral on April 23.
translation.pcm: Di group swear say dem go kontinue dia attack, afta dem don wait small say make dem do Deby burial on April 23.

translation.en: Experts believe FACT has between 1,500 and 2,000 fighters.
translation.pcm: Experts believe say FACT get between 1,500 and 2,000 fighters.

translation.en: The Chadian army claimed on April 19 to have killed 300 rebels and captured 246 others, who were being taken to the capital NDjamena to stand trial but military casualties have not been made public.
translation.pcm: Di Chadian army claim for April 19 say dem don kill 300 rebels, and dem don catch 246 odas, wey dem dey carry go di kapital for N'Djamena to go face trial. But dem neva announce au many soldiers die.

translation.en: The armed forces recently sent reinforcements to Kanem, security forces said.
translation.pcm: Security forces tok say e neva tey wey di armed forces send reinforcements go Kanem.

translation.en: On Sunday, the CMT announced there would be no mediation or negotiation with FACT and called on Niger to help it capture the groups chief.
translation.pcm: On Sunday, di CMT announce say mediation or negotiation no go apun wit FACT, and e don call on Niger to help dem catch di leader of di group.

translation.en: The CMT took over on April 20, immediately after Debys death was announced, as parliament and government were dissolved.
translation.pcm: Di CMT take over on April 20, immediately dem announce di death of Deby, wey dem kom scatta parliament and government.

translation.en: It has promised an 18-month transition period before free and transparent elections.
translation.pcm: E don promise 18-month transition period befor dem go conduct free and transparent election.

translation.en: At least six people died on Tuesday in banned protests against the junta, according to the authorities, while a local NGO reported nine fatalities.
translation.pcm: As di authorities tok, up to six pipo die on Tuesday for we-no-go-gree against di junta, but as one local NGO tok, na nine pipo loose dia lives.

translation.en: Prosecutors said Thursday that they were interviewing over 700 people arrested at demonstrations on Tuesday and Wednesday.
translation.pcm: Prosecutors tok on Thursday say dem dey interview ova 700 pipo wey dem arrest for we-no-go-gree on Tuesday and Wednesday.

translation.en: Dozens of arrested protesters were brought in police vehicles to the capitals high court Thursday from different police stations around the city.
translation.pcm: Many dozens of protesters wey dem arrest na im dem bring inside police motor kom high court for Thursday from different police stations around di city.

translation.en: A majority of them have already been through and many have been released, NDjamena prosecutor Youssouf Tom told AFP.
translation.pcm: Dem don clear many of dem, and dem don release plenti. ,N'Djamena prosecutor Youssouf Tom tell AFP.

translation.en: On Monday, the military junta appointed Albert Pahimi Padacke as transitional prime minister.
translation.pcm: On Monday, di military junta appoint Albert Pahimi Padacke as di transitional prime minister.

translation.en: He called for a nationwide effort to speed the return to civilian rule.(AFP)
translation.pcm: E call for a nationwide effort to make di return to civilian rule quick.(AFP)

translation.en: Politicians urged not to overheat polity over insecurity
translation.pcm: Make Politicians no overheat di polity ova insecurity.

translation.en: A former Deputy National Chairman of the defunct Congress for Progressive Change (CPC), Alhaji Salihu Mustapha, has urged top politicians to stop making statements that will overheat the polity, ignite crises and plunge Nigeria into another civil war.
translation.pcm: Befor-befor Deputy National Chairman of di former Congress for Progressive Change (CPC), Alhaji Salihu Mustapha, don tell top politicians make dem stop to dey tok tins wey go overheat di polity, cause crises and push Nigeria into anoda civil war.

translation.en: Alhaji Mustapha, who is contesting for the chairmanship of the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) ahead of the partys national convention, in a statement on Sunday, said a united Nigeria should be the concern of all to enable the country to conduct a successful transition in 2023.
translation.pcm: Alhaji Mustapha wey dey contest for di chairmanship of di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) ahead of di party national convention, tok on Sunday say, awa consign suppose be di Nigeria wey evribodi dey united so dat di kontri go fit conduct a successful transition for 2023.

translation.en: He explained that no country survived civil war twice, and therefore appealed to Nigerians to support President Muhammadu Buhari-led government in proffering solutions to the challenges bedevilling the nation.
translation.pcm: E explain say no kontri don eva survive civil war two times, so e dey beg Nigerians, make dem support di President Muhammadu Buhari government to provide solution to di problems wey dey face di nation.

translation.en: He said, I condemn the attempt by some groups and persons to politicise our security challenges.
translation.pcm: E tok say make we condemn di attempt by som pipo to turn awa security matta into politiks .

translation.en: As Nigerians, we should learn from the ethnic crises in Rwanda and elsewhere.
translation.pcm: As Nigerians, we suppose learn from di my-pipo, una-pipo crises wey apun for Rwanda and oda place.

translation.en: Violence has never solved any countrys problems.
translation.pcm: Violence neva eva solve any kontri problem befor.

translation.en: War or violence does not recognise religion or tribe.
translation.pcm: War or violence no dey recognise religion or tribe.

translation.en: It is a consuming fire.
translation.pcm: Na fire wey dey destroy tins.

translation.en: It is not a respecter of anybody  the poor or rich, old or young.
translation.pcm: E no respect anybodi, weda di poor or rich, old or young.

translation.en: Nigerians who were born after the civil war should learn lessons from Rwanda in 1994.
translation.pcm: Make Nigerians wey dem born afta di civil war learn lesson from Rwanda in 1994.

translation.en: War is bad, war is evil.
translation.pcm: War no gud, war na evil.

translation.en: Let us be properly guided.
translation.pcm: Make all of us dey well guided.

translation.en: He that rushes to war or advocates war should know that war brings death and destruction.
translation.pcm: Pesin wey dey rush go war, or pesin wey dey call for war suppose sabi say na death and destruction war dey bring.

translation.en: Serena suffers shock loss in historic 1 000th match
translation.pcm: Serena don loose for historic 1000th match

translation.en: Serena Williams, playing the 1 000th Tour-level match of her glittering career, suffered a shock 7-6(6)
translation.pcm: Serena Williams, wey play di 1000th Tour-level match of her glittering career, don suffer a shock 7-6(6)

translation.en: 7-5 defeat by Argentinas
translation.pcm: 7-5 defeat by Argentina

translation.en: Nadia Podoroska in the the Italian Open second round on Wednesday.
translation.pcm: Nadia Podoroska for di Italian Open second round on Wednesday.

translation.en: Playing her first competitive match in nearly three months, the 23-times Grand Slam champion twice came back from a break down but struggled on her first serve as Podoroska took the opening set in the tiebreak.
translation.pcm: Na di first competitive match wey she go play for up to three months, di 23-times Grand Slam champion kom back twice from a break down but struggle for her first serve as Podoroska take di opening set in di tiebreak.

translation.en: Podoroska, who reached the French Open semifinals last year, produced a string of heavy topspin forehands to take control of the match with an early break in the second set.
translation.pcm: Podoroska, wey reach di French Open semifinal last year, produce a string of heavy topspin forehands to take control of di match wit early break in di second set.

translation.en: Although Podoroska was broken to love on her first attempt to serve out the match, she maintained her composure to break again and secure a place in the round of 16.
translation.pcm: Even say Podoroska brake to love for her first attempt to serve out di match, she maintain her composure to break again and secure a place in di round of 16.

translation.en: Defeat for Williams, who received an opening round bye in Rome, was a major blow to her preparations for the French Open, starting on 30 May.
translation.pcm: Defeat for Williams, wey receive an opening round bye for Rome, na big blow to her preparation for di French Open, wey go start on 30 May.

translation.en: It was the Americans 149th defeat in her 1 000 career WTA matches.
translation.pcm: Na di American 149th defeat wey she go get for her 1000 career WTA match.

translation.en: World number two Naomi Osaka also crashed out of the tournament, losing 7-6(2) 6-2 to American Jessica Pegula.
translation.pcm: World numba two, Naomi Osaka sef don komot for di tournament, afta she loose 7-6(2) 6-2 to American Jessica Pegula.

translation.en: Osaka, a four-times Grand Slam winner, has often struggled on clay and her defeat in Rome followed a second-round loss at the Madrid Open this month.
translation.pcm: Osaka, wey be four-times Grand Slam winner, dey struggle for clay most times, and her defeat for Rome kom afta she loose second-round for di Madrid Open dis month.

translation.en: Man nabbed over threat to employer
translation.pcm: Dem don arrest one man, sake of say e threaten im oga

translation.en: The police in Edo State  have arrested a 25-year-old man, identified as  Mike Ashien, for allegedly threatening to  kidnap and murder his employer.
translation.pcm: Di police for Edo State don arrest one 25-year-old man, wey e name be Mike Ashien, sake of say e threaten to kidnap and kill im oga.

translation.en: It was gathered that the suspect is an  employee of a domestic oil company located in Ugbogui community, Ovia South-West LG  of the state.
translation.pcm: We hear say di suspect na employee of one domestic oil company wey dey Ugbogui community, for Ovia South-West LG of di state.

translation.en: It was further gathered that the suspect hid his phone number and called his employer demanding N10 million from him or have him kidnapped and killed.
translation.pcm: We also hear say di suspect hide im fone number, kom call im employer begin dey ask for N10 million, if not e go kidnap and kill am.

translation.en: It was also gathered that after the threat, his employer reported the matter to the state police Commissioner, Philip Ogbadu,  who ordered an investigation in the matter.
translation.pcm: We still hear say afta di threat, e oga report di matta to di state police Commissioner, Philip Ogbadu, who give order say make dem investigate di matta.

translation.en: Speaking with journalists, the suspect said pressing family problem forced him into the act.
translation.pcm: Wen jurnalists dey follo di suspect yarn, e tok say na family problem wey hold am for neck force am commit di crime.

translation.en: My boss pays me N20,000 monthly but  it is not enough for me and l
translation.pcm: As e tok; My oga dey pay me N20,000 evri month but e no dey reach me, and I

translation.en: just threatened him to get more money from him, but I have learnt my lesson and  I am now regretting, he said.
translation.pcm: jus shakara am to get more moni from e hand. But I don learn my lesson and I don dey regret am.

translation.en: IAR researches on Tela maize to tackle pests, drought
translation.pcm: IAR don dey do research on Tela maize as a way to tackle pests and drought

translation.en: In 2019, Nigeria joined six other African countries  Kenya, Mozambique, Tanzania, Uganda, South Africa and Ethiopia  to enter into a Tela maize project.
translation.pcm: For 2019, Nigeria join six oda African kontri Kenya, Mozambique, Tanzania, Uganda, South Africa and Ethiopia to enta a Tela maize project.

translation.en: The Tela maize project is a public-private partnership to develop and commercialise the transgenic insect-protected and drought-tolerant maize varieties to boost the farmers productivity.
translation.pcm: Di Tela maize project na public-private partnership wey go develop and commercialise di transgenic insect-protected and drought-tolerant variety  of maize to increase di productivity of farmers.

translation.en: Tela maize is double-dose (moderate drought and insect resistance) maize varieties designed to help farmers have better yields.
translation.pcm: Tela maize na double-dose (moderate drought and insect resistance) maize variety wey dem design to help farmers get beta yield.

translation.en: At the Institute of Agricultural Research (IAR), Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, a team of scientists are working on the maize varieties to ensure that by 2022, farmers across the country would have access to it after it has gone through all the necessary regulations.
translation.pcm: For di Institute of Agricultural Research (IAR), Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, a join-bodi of scientists dey work on di maize variety to ensure say by 2022, farmers all ova di kontri go fit get am afta e don follow all di necessari regulation.

translation.en: Professor Mohammed Faguji, a seed breeder and the executive director of the IAR, said global warming brought two adverse conditions (drought and flooding), in addition to pests that made farming difficult for many smallholder farmers.
translation.pcm: Professor Mohammed Faguji wey be seed breeder and di executive director of di IAR, tok say na two bad condition global warming bring (drought and flooding), plus pest wey make farming difficult for many small-scale farmers.

translation.en: The Tela maize, he said, was to solve those problems.
translation.pcm: He tok say na dose problem di Tela maize go solve.

translation.en: Daily Trust on Sunday visited the field where the varieties are undergoing confined field trials to evaluate the efficacy and efficiency of the drought and pest-resistant attributes before seeking the approval of the necessary authorities  for environmental release and subsequently, commercialisation, with 2022 as the target year.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust visit di farm on Sunday wia dem dey do different confined field trials to evaluate di efficacy and efficiency of di drought and pest-resistant quality befor dem collect di approval of di necessari authorities to release am to di environmental and afta, begin dey sell am for 2022.

translation.en: Professor Rabiu Adamu is the principal investigator (lead researcher) of the genetically modified Tela maize project.
translation.pcm: Professor Rabiu Adamu na di principal investigator (lead researcher) of di genetically modified Tela maize project.

translation.en: He told Daily Trust on Sunday at the trial fields in Zaria that the research had two strong aims: to produce transgenic hybrid varieties of maize for the first time in Nigeria
translation.pcm: E tell Daily Trust on Sunday for di experiment farm wey dey Zaria say di research get two strong pupose: to produce transgenic hybrid variety of maize for di first time in Nigeria,

translation.en: that are resistant to most maize pests, particularly the major pests of maize, stem borers and the fall army worms, and to produce maize hybrid
translation.pcm: wey dey resistant to most maize pest, especially di major ones, stem borers and di fall army worms, and to produce maize hybrid

translation.en: that are also tolerant to drought.
translation.pcm: wey also dey tolerant to drought.

translation.en: These hybrids are genetically modified, using biotechnology to make them resistant.
translation.pcm: Dis hybrids dey genetically modified, and na biotechnology dem use make dem resistant.

translation.en: So they have a gene from soil-dwelling bacterial that is inserted into the maize gene that compasses resistance to insect pests, especially those that damage maize, that is the fall army worm and the complex of stem borers, which are three: the pink stem borer and the other species the maize stalk-borer -Busseolafusca and Sesamiacalamistis.
translation.pcm: Dem get gene from bacteria we dey live for soil wey dem put inside di maize gene, and e include resistance to insect pests, especially dose ones wey dey spoil maize, di fall army worm and di complex of stem borers, wey be three: di pink stem borer and di oda specie, di maize stalk-borer -Busseolafusca and Sesamiacalamistis.

translation.en: These are the two key stem borers of maize in this part of the country.
translation.pcm: Dis na di two main stem borers of maize for dis part of di kontri.

translation.en: These hybrids we are testing are genetically modified to resist damage by insect pests, especially stem borers and fall army worms as you have seen in the field, he explained.
translation.pcm: Dis hybrid wey we dey test dey genetically modified to resist damage by insect pests, especially stem borers and fall army worms as u don see for di farm, e explain.

translation.en: He said the current crop in the field was the third Confined Field Trials (CFT).
translation.pcm: E tok say di current crop wey dey di farm na di third Confined Field Trials (CFT).

translation.en: We are hoping to environmentally realise these hybrid in Nigerian  fields in other research institutes and some out stations to test them to confirm and validate the implicating of the gene, not only here.
translation.pcm: No be only hia we dey hope to realise dis hybrid, but for Nigerian farm, for oda research institute and some out station to test dem to confam and validate di implication of di gene.

translation.en: Thereafter, we will write a memo to the regulator to allow us conduct more trails outside the conferment in other farmers fields   and other research institutes, he added.
translation.pcm: E kontinue say, afta, we go write memo to di regulator say make e allow us conduct more trails outside di conferment, for oda pipo farm and oda research institute.

translation.en: Speaking on when the farmers are likely to get the seeds, he said that after one year when the results are ready, they would submit the dossier to the National Biosafety Management Agency (NBMA) for permission to take it to the  farmers to do national multiplication trails.
translation.pcm: On wen di farmers go fit get di seeds, e tok say afta one year wey di result don ready, dem go submit di report to di National Biosafety Management Agency (NBMA) for permission to take am to di farmers to do national multiplication trail.

translation.en: Out of the 16 entries, the best performing hybrids selected by the famers will be evaluated and reports submitted to the National Varietal Release Committee in Ibadan.
translation.pcm: Out of di 16 entry, dem go evaluate and submit di report of di best hybrid wey di famers select to di National Varietal Release Committee for Ibadan.

translation.en: Once they accept that the varieties have met the minimum requirement for them to be released as hybrid, they can be released to farmers, he said.
translation.pcm: E tok say once dem accept say di varieties don meet di minimum requirement for dem to release dem as hybrid, dem go fit release am to  di farmers.

translation.en: The scientists are tentatively looking at December 2022 for its release so that in about three years, farmers everywhere will have access to the seed.
translation.pcm: If possible, di scientists dey reason December 2022 for di release so dat in about three years, farmers for evriwia go get access to di seed.

translation.en: Dr Muhyideen  Oyekunle, the  lead, Trials and Pipeline Testing, who took our reporter around,  explained the biotic and abiotic attributes of the ongoing  progress of the Tela maize research planted in three plots to evaluate the efficacy of the resistance to drought, fall army worm and stem borers.
translation.pcm: Dr Muhyideen Oyekunle, di leader, Trial and Pipeline Testing, wey carry awa tori-pesin waka explain di biotic and abiotic attribute of di ongoing progress of di Tela maize research wey dem plant for three plots to evaluate di efficacy of di resistance to drought, fall army worm and stem borers.

translation.en: In the field, there are very clear differences, the non-GM maize, which infected pests almost completely ravaged by the fall army worm, stem borers, whereas the GM varieties were completely untouched even though the two varieties (Tela Maize and the traditional seeds that do not have biotech protection are planted in close proximity) side-by-side.
translation.pcm: For di farm, plenty difference dey, di one wey no be GM maize, get infected wit pests, di fall army worm, stem borers, almost finish am completely, but notin touch di GM variety, even say dem plant di two (Tela Maize and di traditional seed wey no get biotech protection) side-by-side.

translation.en: The ongoing field results as seen by our reporter shows great prospect although the yield remains to be seen and evaluated.
translation.pcm: Di ongoing field result wey awa tori-pesin see show say great prospect dey, even say dem go still need see and evaluate di yield.

translation.en: Until then, there is solution to pests and drought problems on sight.
translation.pcm: Until then, solution to pests and drought problems dey road.

translation.en: Some of the varieties are yellow but most of them are white, however, in the trials, more than 90 percent are white maize because it is preferred by industry players.
translation.pcm: Som of di varieties na yellow but most of dem be white. For di trial, more dan 90 percent na white maize becos na im industry players prefer.

translation.en: But the scientists major challenges are COVID-19 pandemic and the issue of misperception and misinformation about the technology.
translation.pcm: But di scientists major problem na COVID-19 pandemic and di issue of misperception and misinformation about di technology.

translation.en: People who dont know how the technology works like to use the social media and other non-scientific avenues to confuse and mislead the public and other scientists, the lead researcher, Professor Adamu said.
translation.pcm: Pipo wey no sabi how di technology dey work like to dey use social media and oda non-scientific way to confuse and mislead di public and oda scientists. Di lead researcher, Professor Adamu na im tok so.

translation.en: The Tela maize scheme is a collaboration between the African Agricultural Technology Foundation (AATF) and the IAR under the Tela maize project implemented in seven African countries.
translation.pcm: Di Tela maize scheme na join-bodi between di Afrikan Agricultural Technology Foundation (AATF) and di IAR under di Tela maize project wey dey happun for seven Afrikan kontris.

translation.en: It builds on the success on breeding work under the Water Efficient Maize for Africa (WEMA) project designed to develop drought-tolerant and insect-protected maize varieties.
translation.pcm: E dey build on di success on breeding work under di Water Efficient Maize for Afrika (WEMA) project wey dem design to develop different type of maize wey dey resistant to drought and wey dey protected from insect.

translation.en: 2023: Middle Belt, southern leaders ask APC, PDP to zone presidential ticket to South
translation.pcm: 2023: Middle Belt and Southern leaders don tell APC and PDP say make dem zone presidential ticket to di South.

translation.en: The Southern and Middle Belt Leaders Forum (SMBLF) has asked the ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) to zone their 2023 presidential tickets to the South.
translation.pcm: Di Southern and Middle Belt Leaders Forum (SMBLF) don tell di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) say make dem zone dia 2023 presidential tickets to di South.

translation.en: The forum also urged the federal government to heed the genuine and reasonable nationwide calls for a transparent national dialogue and take urgent steps towards restructuring and birthing a new constitution to bring back equitable harmony to the country.
translation.pcm: Even say Podoroska brake to love for her first attempt to serve out di match, she maintain her composure to break again and secure a place in di round of 16.

translation.en: The resolutions were contained in a communique signed by National Leader of the Forum and former minister of Information, Chief Edwin Clark;
translation.pcm: Dis suggestion dey inside one statement wey di National Leader of di Forum and former minister of Information, Chief Edwin Clark;

translation.en: Afenifere leader, Chief Ayo Adebanjo; President General of Ohaneze.
translation.pcm: Afenifere leader, Chief Ayo Adebanjo; President General of Ohaneze.

translation.en: Ndigbo Worldwide, Prof George Obiozor; National President, Middle Belt  Forum, Dr Pogu Bitrus; and National Chairman, PANDEF, Senator Emmanuel Ebok Essien, among others.
translation.pcm: Ndigbo Worldwide, Prof George Obiozor; National President, Middle Belt  Forum, Dr Pogu Bitrus; and National Chairman, PANDEF, Senator Emmanuel Ebok Essien, and odas sign.

translation.en: According to the communique, the leaders demanded restructuring of the country before 2023, and asked the federal government to declare a national emergency on security.
translation.pcm: As e dey for di statement, di leaders dey ask for restructuring of di kontri befor 2023, also dem tell di federal government say make e declare a national emergency on security.

translation.en: We insist that it is imperative to immediately restructure the country considering the precarious prevailing atmosphere before any further elections.
translation.pcm: We insist say e dey very important to immediately restructure di kontri, due to di prevailing insecure atmosphere befor any further election.

translation.en: Reminds all leading political parties, especially the APC, PDP and other political parties, that the basis of any viable democracy, especially in a diverse and complex country such as Nigeria, rests in fair and even sharing of power
translation.pcm: We dey remind all di leading politikal party especially di APC, PDP and odas, say di basis of any viable demokracy, especially for diverse and complex kontri like Nigeria, na equal sharing of power

translation.en: That the Northern part of the country would have fully enjoyed the Office of the Presidency, for the full statutory period of right years by 2023, hence, should yield to the South.
translation.pcm: Say di Northern part of di kontri go fully enjoy di Office of di Presidency, for di full statutory period of right years, by 2023, make dem surrender to di South.

translation.en: Enjoins political stakeholders from the South not to be lured into the unpatriotic step of seeking such other positions as national chairmen and vice president of the main political parties, but join forces to demand and ensure that the presidency moves to the South in 2023.
translation.pcm: Encourage politikal stakeholders from di South say make dem no for allow anybodi deceive dem to take di unpatriotic step of contesting for oda position like national chairmen and vice president of di main politikal parties, instead, make dem join hand demand and ensure say presidency move to di South for 2023.

translation.en: Emphasises that, if the security situation is not dealt with and banditry stopped or reduced to the barest minimum, it would not be feasible to have proper elections in 2023.
translation.pcm: E emphasize say, if dem no deal wit di security situation to allow banditry stop or dey reduced to di barest minimum, e no go possible to hold proper election for 2023.

translation.en: Insists that cattle rearing is a generally, private business enterprise, as such, the federal government should avoid committing state resources to promote any particular business, beyond providing the enabling environment, in the performance of its regulatory roles.
translation.pcm: Di statement insist say cattle rearing na private business, and so, make di federal government no try use di nation resources to promote any particular business, apart from say make e provide di enabling environment, for di performance of e regulatory roles.

translation.en: The leaders reaffirmed their commitment to the unity of Nigeria, adding that it can only be sustained on the principles of equity, fairness and justice.
translation.pcm: Di leaders reaffirm dia commitment to di unity of Nigeria, dem tok say na only on di principle of equity, fairness and justice we fit sustain awa unity.

translation.en: But, the Ambassador Aminu Wali-led faction of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Kano State has said the North-East should produce the next president.
translation.pcm: But, di Ambassador Aminu Wali faction of di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for Kano State don tok say na di North-East suppose produce di next president.

translation.en: Chairman of the faction, Mamina Bako Lamido, who spoke on behalf of other executive members said Bala Mohammed was fit for the job.
translation.pcm: Di chairman of di faction, Mamina Bako Lamido, wey tok on behalf of oda executive members tok say Bala Mohammed dey fit for di job.

translation.en: The PDP faction gave its backing when it received executive members of a group canvassing support for the governor, known as Bala Abdulkadir Mohammed Vanguard (BAM-V), at the partys secretariat in Kano at the weekend.
translation.pcm: Di PDP faction show dia support wen di executive members of a group wey dey gada support for di governor, wey be Bala Abdulkadir Mohammed Vanguard (BAM-V), visit dem for di party secretariat wey dey Kano durin di weekend.

translation.en: Lamido said for fairness and equity, the party should zone its presidential ticket to both North-East and South-East, adding that if the ticket goes to the North-East, Bala Mohammed should be given the mandate.
translation.pcm: Lamido tok say for fairness and equity, make di party zone im presidential ticket to both North-East and South-East, say if di ticket go di North-East, make dem give Bala Mohammed di mandate.

translation.en: Speaking earlier, BAM-V Director-General, Mohammed Abubakar Jibo, said the group was at the partys secretariat to canvass support for Mohammed ahead 2023.
translation.pcm: As e don tok befor, BAM-V Director-General, Mohammed Abubakar Jibo, tok say di group go di party secretariat to gada support for Mohammed ahead of 2023.

translation.en: Lagos-Ibadan rail tentatively for commissioning June 10  FG
translation.pcm: We fit commission Lagos-Ibadan rail on June 10 - FG

translation.en: The Federal Government has fixed June 10 as tentative date for the commissioning of the flagship Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail.
translation.pcm: Di Federal Government don fixed June 10 as di date wey dem fit commission di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail.

translation.en: Minister of Information and Culture, Alhaji Lai Mohammed, announced this during an inspection of the project with the Minister of Transportation, Mr. Rotimi Amaechi, on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Minista of Information and Culture, Alhaji Lai Mohammed, na im announce am wen e go inspect di project wit di Minista of Transportation, Mr. Rotimi Amaechi, on Sunday.

translation.en: Mohammed, who spoke briefly with newsmen at the Wole Soyinka Station in Abeokuta, said the inspection on Sunday was to ensure that all the Ts are crossed
translation.pcm: Mohammed, wey tok small wit tori-pipo for di Wole Soyinka Station wey dey Abeokuta, say di inspection on Sunday na to make sure say everytin don set.

translation.en: and Is dotted ahead of the commissioning.
translation.pcm: befor di commissioning.

translation.en: Daily Trust had earlier reported how the China Civil Engineering and Construction Corporation (CCECC), the contractor handling the project, has been pressured to deliver all the 10 stations ahead of the commissioning.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust don tok am befor, au dem pressure di China Civil Engineering and Construction Corporation (CCECC), di kontractor wey dey handle di project, say make e deliver all di 10 stations befor di commissioning.

translation.en: The stations are Ebute-Metta, Apapa, Agege, Agbado, Kajola, Papalanto, Abeokuta, Omi Adio, Olodo and Moniya.
translation.pcm: Di stations na Ebute-Metta, Apapa, Agege, Agbado, Kajola, Papalanto, Abeokuta, Omi Adio, Olodo and Moniya.

translation.en: Most of the stations have reached are between 90 and 100 percent completion stage.
translation.pcm: Most of di stations wey we don reach dey between 90 and 100 percent completion stage.

translation.en: The Ministers as well as the Permanent Secretary in the Ministry of Transport, Dr. Magdalene Ajani, Managing Director of the Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC), Engr.
translation.pcm: Di Ministas and di Permanent Secretary of di Ministri of Transport, Dr. Magdalene Ajani, Managing Director of di Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC), Engr.

translation.en: Fidet Okhiria and other officials of the Ministry started the inspection from the Mobolaji Johnson Station (Ebute-Metta) before heading to the Bola Tinubu Station (Apapa).
translation.pcm: Fidet Okhiria and oda officials of di Ministri start di inspection from di Mobolaji Johnson Station (Ebute-Metta) befor dem go di Bola Tinubu Station (Apapa).

translation.en: The Ebute-Metta Station is the biggest station in the train corridor.
translation.pcm: Di Ebute-Metta Station na di biggest station for di train corridor.

translation.en: It is reputed to be the most magnificent government building in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Dem see dis station as di most magnificent government building for Nigeria.

translation.en: According to the Transportation Minister, all the equipment and facilities have been installed ahead of the takeoff of operation.
translation.pcm: Accordin to di Transportation Minista, dem don put all di equipment and facilities wey di place need befor di takeoff of operation.

translation.en: The Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail is the lot 2 of the 2,700km Lagos-Kano standard gauge which construction started in 2017 with extension to Nigerias
translation.pcm: Di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail na di lot 2 of di 2,700km Lagos-Kano standard gauge wey dem start di construction for 2017 wit extension to Nigeria

translation.en: Premier Ports in Apapa to aid massive cargo movement and decongest the ports.
translation.pcm: Premier Port for Apapa to ensure massive cargo movement and decongest di ports.

translation.en: Mohammed said, Tentatively, the Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge would be commissioned on June 10.
translation.pcm: Mohammed tok say tentatively, dem go commission di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge on June 10.

translation.en: What the Honourable Minister is doing is to ensure that all the Is are dotted and the Ts are crossed before June 10.
translation.pcm: Wetin di Honourable Minista dey do na to ensure say evritin don set befor di commissioning on June 10.

translation.en: You can see right from Apapa to Agege, Papalanto to this place, you have seen us go down to engage the contractor to ensure that everything is in order.
translation.pcm: Una go see say we don waka from Apapa to Agege, Papalanto reach hia, and una see say we don go follow di contractor dem yarn say evritin must set.

translation.en: Because this is one of the flagships of this administration, one of the landmark achievements of this administration.
translation.pcm: Di reason be say dis na one of di flagship of dis administration, one of di landmark achievement of dis administration.

translation.en: Not only this is the first time we are having a dual standard gauge but you can see the passion by which the Minister supervises the project.
translation.pcm: No be only say na di first time wey we go get double standard gauge but una dey see di passion wey di Minista dey use supervise di project.

translation.en: Gunmen shoot herbalist, abduct two women
translation.pcm: Gunmen don shoot herbalist, and kidnap two women

translation.en: Gunmen believed to be kidnappers have shot a popular alternative medicine producer, Alhaji Laminu Jibrin, after attacking his home located in Tafa town along Abuja-Kaduna highway, in Kaduna State.
translation.pcm: Som gunmen wey pipo feel say dem be kidnappers don shoot one popular traditional medicine producer, Alhaji Laminu Jibrin, afta dem attack e house wey dey Tafa town along Abuja-Kaduna highway, for Kaduna State.

translation.en: The attackers, said to be about 20 in number, stormed into the mans residence around 1:00 am on Monday, after forcing its gate open.
translation.pcm: Di attackers, wey be about 20 for numba, burst inside di man house around 1:00 am on Monday, afta dem force di house gate open.

translation.en: A resident, who sought anonymity, said the attackers met the herbalist packaging some herbal products and mistook him for a worker of the company.
translation.pcm: One of di neighbour wey dey live for di area, wey no go like mention e name tok say di attackers meet di herbalist wen e dey package som herbal product, but dey tink say na one of di worker of di company.

translation.en: Some of them beat his wife up just as they were asking her of his whereabouts, the source said.
translation.pcm: Som of dem beat e wife as dem dey ask wia her husband for dey, di neighbour tok.

translation.en: It was further learnt that the man had retaliated with a stick in his possession against the gunmen, who responded with the shooting that injured him on his shoulder.
translation.pcm: We hear say di man attack di gunmen wit one stick wey dey e hand, but di men respond wit di shooting wey injure am for e shoulder.

translation.en: The mans wife, and another woman among his neighbours, were abducted later by the gunmen, just as he was taken to an undisclosed hospital along with his little child, who was hit on his abdomen by a bullet, where they were receiving medical attention.
translation.pcm: Di gunmen later kindnap di man wife, and anoda woman wey be one of e neighbours. Dem don carry di man go one hospital wia e dey collect treatment wit e small pikin wey bullet nack for belle.

translation.en: Efforts to speak to the police area commander in Jere,
translation.pcm: All awa effort say make we follo di police area commander for Jere,

translation.en: ACP Faruk Umar, were not successful, as he did not respond to the phone calls from our reporter.
translation.pcm: ACP Faruk Umar, tok no dey successful, sake of say e no gree pick any of awa tori-pesin call.

translation.en: Poultry feed crisis: Why more interventions are needed
translation.pcm: Poultry feed crisis: Why we need more intervention.

translation.en: The crisis in the feed industry hit its peak late last year when many poultry farmers started shutting down their farms due to a jump in operation cost, mainly caused by the high cost of feeds.
translation.pcm: Di crisis wey dey di poultry feed industry pass be careful late last year wen many poultry farmers begin dey close down dia farms, sake of say price of feed don high, and dis don make dia cost of operation too much.

translation.en: The leadership of the Poultry Association of Nigeria, an umbrella body of poultry farmers in the country, held an emergency meeting in Abuja, warning that if something urgent was not done, the poultry industry might fold up.
translation.pcm: Di leadership of di Poultry Association of Nigeria, di association wey all di poultry farmers for di kontri dey under, do emergency meeting for Abuja, to warn say if dem no do sometin kia-kia, di poultry industry fit die.

translation.en: The director-general of the association, Onallo S. Akpa, while calling for immediate intervention by the federal government, raised an alarm that maize that cost N80,000 per ton and soybeans N120,000 per ton in January 2020, cost N200,000 per ton (maize) and N250 per ton
translation.pcm: Di director-general of di association, Onallo S. Akpa, wen e dey call for immediate intervention by di federal government, tok say maize wey be N80,000 per ton and soybeans wey be N120,000 per ton for January 2020, don be N200,000 per ton (maize) and N250,000 per ton

translation.en: (soybeans) as of January 2021.
translation.pcm: (soybeans) for January 2021.

translation.en: Apparently, in a move to avert a crisis in the feed value chain, the Central Bank of Nigeria quickly moved in by agreeing to release, in tranches, about 300,000 metric tons of maize to the industry.
translation.pcm: Clearly, as a way to prevent crisis for di feed distribution industry, di Central Bank of Nigeria put bodi quickly, as dem don agree to release about 300,000 metric ton of maize to di industry batch by batch.

translation.en: The gesture, which the stakeholders believe was timely, seems to have reduced tension in the sector.
translation.pcm: Dis intervention, wey di stakeholders believe say e dey on time, be like say e don reduce di earlier tension wey dey di sector.

translation.en: The target, according to the bank, is to ensure the poultry industrys sustainability, job retention, circular flow of income, cheaper nutrition and poverty alleviation.
translation.pcm: Di target, accordin to di bank, na to ensure say di poultry industry dey sustainable, job retention dey, circular flow of income kontinue, cheaper nutrition dey possible and poverty reduce.

translation.en: Last month, about 50,000MT was said to have been allocated to stakeholders in the feed milling industry, with others set to be released in due course.
translation.pcm: Last month, about 50,000MT na im dem give stakeholders for di feed milling industry, and dem go release di remaining small time.

translation.en: Stakeholders believe the quick release of the remaining tonnages will further redress the feed challenges in the sector ahead of the forthcoming Easter celebration.
translation.pcm: Stakeholders believe say quick release of di remaining tonnes go solve more of di feed challenges wey dey di sector befor di Easter celebration wey dey come.

translation.en: The ongoing intervention is being executed in collaboration with players like AFEX Commodities Exchange Ltd, which are facilitating the release of the grains.
translation.pcm: Di current intervention na join-bodi between di CBN and partners like AFEX Commodities Exchange Ltd, wey dey kontrol di release of di grains.

translation.en: The shortfall in maize production has been one of the major challenges in the agricultural sector as according to the PAN DG, the produce is the most highly consumed in northern Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Di reduction for maize production don be one of di major challenges for agricultural sector, becos as di PAN DG tok, dis na di food wey dem dey chop pass for northern Nigeria.

translation.en: This is why many feed producers and other stakeholders are advocating for more interventions by the apex bank in the area of maize and soybeans production.
translation.pcm: Dis na di reason why many feed producers wit oda stakeholders dey ask for more support from di CBN in di area of maize and soybeans production.

translation.en: The General Manager of Premier Feeds Ltd, Austin Daylop, a beneficiary of the intervention, noted that as the new farming season for maize and soybean approaches, decisive actions needed to be taken to meet the demands of the growing population and prevent Nigeria from getting into a cycle of shortfalls.
translation.pcm: Di General Manager of Premier Feeds Ltd, Austin Daylop, wey be one of di beneficiary of di intervention, tok say as di new farming season for maize and soybean dey kom, we go need take quick action to meet di demand of di growing population, and also ensure say e no scarce for Nigeria.

translation.en: The Anchor Borrowers Programme by CBN in partnership with the Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) is one such solution.
translation.pcm: Di Anchor Borrowers Programme wey CBN join bodi with di Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) do na one of dat solution.

translation.en: A similar scheme should also be introduced for maize and soybean production.
translation.pcm: We go need establish dat kind programme for maize and soybean production too.

translation.en: It will definitely help to mitigate rural-urban migration by the farmers brought on by the insecurity challenges, especially in the Northern states where maize and soybeans are cultivated.
translation.pcm: E go surely help us reduce rural-urban migration of di farmers wey insecurity cause, especially for di Northern states wia dem dey plant maize and soybeans.

translation.en: Continuing the collaborative partnerships between the relevant government authorities and industry stakeholders such as the Maize Growers Association of Nigeria (MAGPAMAN) and Poultry Association of Nigeria (PAN) will help to provide critical field data so that policymakers can understand the input required to expand the yield capacity of local farmers, he said.
translation.pcm: If we kontinue di join-bodi between di concerned government authorities and industry stakeholders like di Maize Growers Association of Nigeria (MAGPAMAN) and Poultry Association of Nigeria (PAN) we go fit provide important field data, so dat policymakers go fit undastand di input wey dem need to expand di product capacity of local farmers.

translation.en: Ayodeji Balogun, CEO, AFEX, said: By facilitating the release of the 300,000MT maize, leveraging support from credible players in the ecosystem, including our team at AFEX, the CBN will offer over 35,000 farmers and agro-processors a channel through which they can trade maize at a subsidized rate, and thereby reduce the adverse effect of the maize price hike, increase local demand and also improve farmers livelihoods.
translation.pcm: Ayodeji Balogun wey be di CEO of AFEX, tok say: Wit di release of 300,000MT of maize,throughdi support from credible players for di ecosystem, plus awa team for AFEX, di CBN go fit give ova 35,000 farmers and agro processors a channel wey dem go fit dey buy and sell maize for subsidized rate, and laidat, dem go fit increase local demand, improve di way of life of di farmers and reduce di negative effect of di increase for maize price.

translation.en: Oil prices fall on demand, COVID-19 concerns
translation.pcm: Oil price don fall on demand, becos of COVID-19

translation.en: Oil prices edged lower on Monday as climbing Coronavirus cases and tighter restrictions in Europe and China fueled worries over a slower recovery in fuel demand.
translation.pcm: Oil price don go down on Monday as Coronavirus cases dey go up, tighter restriction of movement for Europe and China don increase di worry ontop weda improvement go dey for fuel demand.

translation.en: Encouraging gross domestic product (GDP) and industrial production data from China helped to limit the downside to some extent.
translation.pcm: Industrial production data and beta gross domestic product (GDP) from China na e help to reduce di downside small.

translation.en: Brent crude for March delivery eased 0.2 percent to 54.98 dollars a barrel, after falling 2.3 percent on Friday.
translation.pcm: Brent crude for March delivery don drop from 0.2 percent to 54.98 dollars per barrel, after e fall by 2.3 percent on Friday.

translation.en: Similarly, U.S. oil futures were down by 0.1 percent at 52.36 dollars after falling more than 2 percent in the previous session.
translation.pcm: Also, U.S. oil future drop by 0.1 percent at 52.36 dollars afta e drop more dan 2 percent for di session befor.

translation.en: The total number of global Coronavirus cases topped 95 million, while the death toll surpassed 2 million.
translation.pcm: Di total numba of Coronavirus case fo di world don pass 95 million, and di numba of death don pass 2 million.

translation.en: China reported more than 100 new COVID-19 cases for the sixth consecutive day, while the number of hospitalised COVID-19 patients with serious symptoms in Japan topped 970, marking a record high since the onset of the pandemic in the country.
translation.pcm: More dan 100 new COVID-19 cases na e China don declare for di sixth consecutive day, while di numba of COVID-19 patients wey dey hospital wit serious symptom for Japan don pass 970. Dis na very high record since di pandemic start for di kontri.

translation.en: Portugal imposed a new nationwide lockdown, while the British government announced that it will close all travel corridors from Momday in order to restrict the spread of new Coronavirus variant cases.
translation.pcm: Portugal don declare fresh lockdown fo di kontri, while di British government don announce say e close all di travel corridor from Monday so dat dem fit prevent di spread of new Coronavirus cases.

translation.en: New Coronavirus infections have been decreasing in Germany but the countrys health minister said that more needed to be done to bring it permanently under control.
translation.pcm: New Coronavirus infection don dey reduce for Germany, but di kontri minista of health tok say dem go need to put more effort to kontrol di disease pata-pata.

translation.en: Chancellor Angela Merkel and Germanys 16 state premiers will discuss what to do next on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Di Chancellor, Angela Merkel and oda 16 state premiers for Germany go join-head tok wetin to do next on Tuesday.

translation.en: Ratels Sports Foundation partners MGGN to empower the girl-child
translation.pcm: Ratels Sports Foundation don join hand wit MGGN to empower di girl-child

translation.en: Ratels Sports Foundation has partnered organisers of the Most Gorgeous Girl Nigeria, MGGN, to host a Women mini football tournament in Abuja to celebrate the first edition of the beauty pageant which will hold in the city of Abuja.
translation.pcm: Ratels Sports Foundation don join hand wit di organisers of di Most Gorgeous Girl Nigeria, MGGN, to host mini football tournament for wey go be only women for Abuja. Dis na to celebrate di first edition of di beauty pageant wey go happun for di city of Abuja.

translation.en: Grace Ene, who is the Chief Executive Officer of  MGGN, organisers of the beauty pageant , said Barrister Paul Edehs Ratel Sports Foundation, has agreed to partner with the initiative through the mini tourney which is aimed at creating more awareness, empowerment and hope for the girl-child.
translation.pcm: Grace Ene, di Chief Executive Officer of MGGN, wey be di organisers of di beauty pageant , tok say Barrister Paul Edeh, Ratel Sports Foundation, don agree to join hand wit di organization,throughdi mini tourney wey go be a to create more awareness, empowerment and hope for di girl-child.

translation.en: She said We are glad about this initiative and partnering with one of the leading Sports Foundations in the country, Ratels Sports Development Foundation.
translation.pcm: As she tok; We dey hapi about dis programme and say we join hand wit Ratels Sports Development Foundation wey be one of di leading Sports Foundation for di kontri.

translation.en: Through this event, we have been able to share the belief that the girl-child deserves more in our community and with Ratels support, we are hopeful that it will create more love and awareness across all quarters.
