translation.pcm: Tru dis event, we don make pipo know say di girl-child deserve more for awa community, and wit di support of Ratels, we dey hope say e go spread more love and awareness for all di place.

translation.en: On his part, the founder of Ratels Sports Foundation, Barrister Edeh, said, Todays event is unique because we are doing it in partnership with a new brand that is in town, the Most Gorgeous Girl Nigeria, which is a beauty pageant.
translation.pcm: For e side, di founder of Ratels Sports Foundation, Barrister Edeh, tok say, "Today event dey unique, unto say we dey do am join hand wit di Most Gorgeous Girl Nigeria wey beauty pageant, and a new brand wey jus dey town".

translation.en: They were able to identify areas that we are inclined to support.
translation.pcm: Dem don sight areas wey we go like support.

translation.en: These are areas that we are happy to invest in.
translation.pcm: And dis na tins wey we dey happy to put awa moni inside.

translation.en: Today we have four teams all based in Abuja playing in this tournament and as you can see, they played good football even in the rain.
translation.pcm: Today we get four teams for Abuja wey dey play for dis tournament, and as u dey see so, dem play beta ball even for inside di rain.

translation.en: Edeh also spoke on the financial implication as he said the four teams were supported to participate in the epoch making event.
translation.pcm: Edeh yarn about di financial implication too, he tok say na all di four teams dem use money support so dem go fit participate for di event.

translation.en: It may interest you to know that this mini tournament cost us some money because the girls had to play like eight matches within the space of four hours.
translation.pcm: As e tok; "U fit wan know say dis mini tournament cost us money, sak of say di girls need play like eight matches within four hours.

translation.en: We paid match indemnities, fed and transported the teams and of course we gave quality footballs to them, he said.
translation.pcm: We pay match damages, feed and transport di teams, and of course we give dem quality balls.

translation.en: 15 arrested for killing 706 cows, 75 sheep in Kaduna community
translation.pcm: Dem don arrest 15 pipo for Kaduna community, sake of say dem kill 706 cows, and 75 sheep.

translation.en: Fifteen suspects have been arrested by police in Kaduna State for allegedly killing 706 cows and 75 sheep in Atyap chiefdom of Zangon Kataf Local Government Area (LGA), Kaduna State.
translation.pcm: Police don arrest Fifteen suspects for Kaduna State say dem kill 706 cows and 75 sheep for Atyap chiefdom wey dey Zangon Kataf Local Government Area (LGA), for Kaduna State.

translation.en: The suspects are said to have dumped the animals in a ditch.
translation.pcm: Dem tok say di suspects dump di dead animals for pit.

translation.en: The Police Public Relations Officer, ASP Muhammad Jalige, in a statement, expressed concern about the nature of crime which he said was perpetrated by agents of doom in their quest to set the state ablaze.
translation.pcm: Di tok-tok pesin of police, ASP Muhammad Jalige, for e statement, show im concern about di type of crime wey he tok say agents of destruction wey wan scatter di state commit.

translation.en: He noted that the command cannot hold back and watch criminals take laws into their hands, noting that the command is not leaving anything to chance in ensuring that thorough investigation is carried out to prevent future occurrence of such dastardly act.
translation.pcm: E tok say di police command no go fit relax dey look, make criminals take justice to dia own hand. E also yarn say di command no go kommot face for anytin we go make sure say dem do beta investigation, so dat dis kind evil act no go happun again.

translation.en: He added, On 24th March, 2021 at about 10:00am
translation.pcm: He add am join say, On di 24th of March, 2021 around 10:00am

translation.en: some herdsmen reported at Divisional Police Headquarters Zonkwa, Kaduna, that some uncertain number of persons had attacked some of their herds killing 706 cows and 75 sheep and dumped them in a ditch.
translation.pcm: som herdsmen report for di Divisional Police Headquarter wey dey Zonkwa, for Kaduna, say som pipo don attack, kill and dump about 706 of dia cows and 75 of dia sheep for inside pit.

translation.en: On getting the complaint, operatives immediately swung into action, visited the scene of the incident, took necessary photographs and expanded their investigation which led to the arrest of 15 within the following villages; Mate, Unguwan Tabo, Unguwan Rohogu, Runji, Mashan, Mashan Daji and Wawan Rafi all of Atyap chiefdom in Zangon Kataf LGA Kaduna state.
translation.pcm: As dem get dis report, officers take action immediately, dem visit di place, take important photos and start di investigation wey later make dem arrest 15 suspects for inside dis villages; Mate, Unguwan Tabo, Unguwan Rohogu, Runji, Mashan, Mashan Daji and Wawan Rafi wey dey Atyap chiefdom for Zangon Kataf LGA of Kaduna state.

translation.en: Enugu Police arrest suspected rail track vandal, recover firearm, others
translation.pcm: Enugu Police don arrest and recover some guns and oda weapon from suspected rail track thief.

translation.en: The Enugu Police Command has announced the arrest of one Ejike Okeke, who specialises in rail track vandalism, and recovered one locally-made pistol with one live cartridge from him.
translation.pcm: Di Enugu Police Command don announce di arrest of one Ejike Okeke, wey be expert for rail track vandalism, dem recover one locally-made pistol an one live cartridge from e hand..

translation.en: Okeke, 18, of Nkwubor-Nike Village, Enugu East Local Government Area of the state, identified as a member of a syndicate of rail track vandals, was arrested on May 9 at about 11am, according to a statement yesterday by the Commands spokesperson, ASP Daniel Ndukwe.
translation.pcm: As di police tok-tok pesin ASP Daniel Ndukwe tok yesterday, dem arrest Okeke wey be 18, from Nkwubor-Nike Village, for Enugu East Local Government Area of di state, around 11am on May 9, afta dem discover say e be member of a gang wey dey expert in removing and stealing rail track.

translation.en: Ndukwe said that the arrest was achieved by police operatives attached to the Enugu Metro Area Command, in conjunction with operatives of the Vigilance group of Nchatancha-Nike in Enugu.
translation.pcm: Ndukwe tok say na join-bodi of di police officers wey dey attached to di Enugu Metro Area Command, and officers of di Vigilance group of Nchatancha-Nike for Enugu State carry out di arrest.

translation.en: He said that Okeke and others, who ran on sighting the operatives, were found attempting to vandalise railway tracks at Nkwubor rail-line, adding that investigation was ongoing to apprehend his other gang members that fled.
translation.pcm: E tok say dem catch Okeke and odas wey run komot as dem see di officers, as dem dem dey try destroy railway track for Nkwubor rail-line. E add am join say, investigation dey go on to catch im oda gang members wey run komot.

translation.en: In another development, operatives attached to Awkunanaw Police Division on May 11 at about 7:30am, recovered one custom-coloured Toyota Camry Car with registration number:
translation.pcm: For anoda tori, officers wey dey attached to Awkunanaw Police Division on May 11, around 7:30am, recover one Toyota Camry wey get custom colour wit registration numba:

translation.en: ENU 556 MH, along Amagugwu Road, Awkunanaw, Enugu.
translation.pcm: ENU 556 MH, along Amagugwu Road, for Awkunanaw, Enugu.

translation.en: Preliminary investigation shows that the car was stolen from where it was parked at Abakaliki Road, Enugu, by the criminal gang, who abandoned the vehicle and fled due to intense pressure mounted by operatives.
translation.pcm: Preliminary investigation show say na thief di gang wey abandon di car thief am from wia di owner park am for Abakaliki Road, but na di pressure form security officers make dem leave di car run.

translation.en: In the meantime, discreet investigation to fish out the fleeing suspects had commenced, the police said.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, police don tok say dem don start underground investigation to fish out di suspects wey run komot.

translation.en: Wave of insecurity a threat to 2023 polls  Okorie
translation.pcm: Insecurity na threat to 2023 election -Okorie

translation.en: A former presidential candidate, Chekwas Okorie, has said the current wave of insecurity and spate of killings in the country are threats to the 2023 general elections.
translation.pcm: Befor-befor presidential candidate, Chekwas Okorie, don tok say di current wave of insecurity and flood of killings in di kontri na threat to di 2023 general election.

translation.en: Okorie told Daily Trust in a telephone interview last night that if the situation is not nipped in the bud, future elections would be threatened.
translation.pcm: Okorie yarn Daily Trust for fone interview yesterday night say if dem no kontrol di situation, future elections for di kontri go dey at stake.

translation.en: He said the National Assembly in collaboration with the executive arm of government should adopt measures that would save the nation and deepen democracy in the country.
translation.pcm: E tok say make di National Assembly join-bodi wit di executive arm of government to adopt measures wey go save di nation and make demokracy for di kontri stand well.

translation.en: Danger signs are all over the place and that is why some of us are very worried.
translation.pcm: Danger sign dey evriwia and na why som of us dey very worried.

translation.en: I pray very hard that it should be addressed.
translation.pcm: I pray very well say make dem find solution.

translation.en: The president has a big role to play in this regard.
translation.pcm: Di president get big role to play for hia.

translation.en: The National Assembly also has its own role to play in collaboration with the executive arm of government so that Nigeria can move ahead.
translation.pcm: Di National Assembly sef get e own role to play in di join-bodi wit di executive arm of government so dat Nigeria go fit move ahead.

translation.en: The danger signs are all over the place; even a blind man can see it.
translation.pcm: Di danger signs dey evriwia; even blind man fit see am.

translation.en: If nothing is done, we are in a big trouble, he said.
translation.pcm: If dem no do anytin, na big trouble we dey.

translation.en: Asked to state the consequences in the event the situation is not addressed, the APC chieftain said, In the event it is not addressed, my fear is that we may not even get to 2023, in one peace and this means that Nigeria will disintegrate.
translation.pcm: Wen dem tell am say make e mention di problem wey go dey if dem no address di situation, di APC leader tok say, "If e happun say dem no address di situation, my fear na say we fi no even reach 2023, and wetin dis one mean be say Nigeria go break-up.

translation.en: There will be warlords; Nigerian Army will not be able to even deal with the situation.
translation.pcm: Different warlords go rise up; Nigerian Army no go fit even deal wit di situation.

translation.en: There will be what is called lost command because there are some soldiers with weapons which when put together will not even be up to 50 percent of what is in private hands.
translation.pcm: We go get wetin dem dey call lost command becos som soldiers dey wey get weapon wey be say if we join dem togeda, e no go even reach 50 percent of wetin dey ordinary man hand..

translation.en: The way I have seen Nigeria in recent times, we are now more divided along ethnic lines than religious lines.
translation.pcm: Di way wey I take see Nigeria dis days, we don dey more divided for ethnic line pass religious line.

translation.en: Even when we belong to the same religion, we are getting more ethnic conscious.
translation.pcm: Even wen we belong to di same religion, we dey see awasef as different tribe.

translation.en: LCCI Agric group gets new chairman
translation.pcm: LCCI Agric group don get new chairman

translation.en: The Agriculture and Agro-Allied Group of the Lagos Chamber of Commerce and Industry (LCCI) has elected Mrs. Edobong Akpabio as the new chairman to steer the ship of the group and take charge of its affairs for the next two years.
translation.pcm: Di Agriculture and Agro-Allied Group of di Lagos Chamber of Commerce and Industry (LCCI) don elect Mrs. Edobong Akpabio as di new chairman wey go drive di ship of di group and take charge of e affairs for di next two years.

translation.en: This followed the expiration of the term of office of the previous executives of the group.
translation.pcm: Dis one happun afta di term of office of di former executives of di group don expire.

translation.en: LCCI is the premier Chamber of Commerce and one of the leading voices in the organised private sector (OPS) in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: LCCI na di lead Chamber of Commerce and one of di leading voices for di organised private sector (OPS) for Nigeria.

translation.en: Mrs. Edobong Akpabio is a Co-Founder/Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Visionage Agrotech Farms Limited and Organic Green Animalia Farms Limited, two notable Agribusiness organisations.
translation.pcm: Mrs. Edobong Akpabio na di Co-Founder/Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Visionage Agrotech Farms Limited and Organic Green Animalia Farms Limited, wey be two respected Agribusiness organisation.

translation.en: She had her tertiary education at the University of Uyo, where she obtained a Bachelor of Arts Degree in English Studies in 1988 and a Post-Graduate Diploma in Logistics and Supply Chain Management from the Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife in 2005.
translation.pcm: She graduate from di University of Uyo, wia she collect Bachelor of Arts Degree for English in 1988 and Post-Graduate Diploma for Logistics and Supply Chain Management from Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife for 2005.

translation.en: Akpabio has contributed immensely to the reversal of importation of agricultural products and has assisted in local content drive and sustainability.
translation.pcm: Akpabio don contribute well well for di reversal of importation of agric products, and she don assist for local content drive and sustainability.

translation.en: The Director General of LCCI, Dr. Muda Yusuf said that Mrs. Akpabios election will ensure and enhance the Chambers role as leading advocate of best business policy and practice, with the view to promoting and protecting Small and Medium Enterprises, which in turn will impact positively on the economy.
translation.pcm: Di Director General of LCCI, Dr. Muda Yusuf tok say di election of Mrs. Akpabio go ensure and improve di role of di Chamber as a leading advocate of best business policy and practice, wit di aim to promote and protect Small and Medium Enterprises, wey go also impact di economy positively.

translation.en: INEC fixes June 19 for Jigawa, Kaduna bye-elections
translation.pcm: INEC don fix June 19 for Jigawa and Kaduna bye-elections

translation.en: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) has fixed Saturday, 19 June 2021 for the conduct of the bye-elections in Gwaram Federal Constituency, Jigawa State and Sabon Gari state constituency in Kaduna State.
translation.pcm: Di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) don fix Saturday, 19 June 2021 as di day wey dem go do di bye-election for Gwaram Federal Konstituency, Jigawa State and Sabon Gari state konstituency for Kaduna State.

translation.en: National Commissioner and Chairman, Information and Voter Education Committee (IVEC), Festus Okoye, who said this on Friday in Abuja in separate statements, said the official notifications for the elections would be published on 17 May 2021.
translation.pcm: Di National Commissioner and Chairman for Information and Voter Education Committee (IVEC), Festus Okoye, wey tok dis for different statements on Friday for Abuja, say dem go publish di official notifications for di elections on 17th, May 2021.

translation.en: The developments followed the death of the member representing Gwaram Federal Constituency of Jigawa State in the House of Representatives, Hon.
translation.pcm: Dis one happun afta di member wey dey represent Gwaram Federal Konstituency of Jigawa State for di House of Representatives, Hon.

translation.en: Yuguda Hassan Kila on 4 March 2021, as well as the declaration of the seat of the member representing Sabon Gari state constituency in Kaduna Assembly, Hon.
translation.pcm: Yuguda Hassan Kila die on 4th March 2021, and di announcement say di seat of di member wey dey represent Sabon Gari state konstituency for Kaduna Assembly, Hon.

translation.en: Aminu Abdullahi Shagali, vacant.
translation.pcm: Aminu Abdullahi Shagali, don vacant.

translation.en: According to him, political parties would conduct their primaries between May 18 and 24, 2021, adding that the access code for online submission of nomination forms will be available for collection from May 24, 2021, at the commissions headquarters in Abuja while the last day for submission of the list of nominated candidates is 28 May 2021 at 6.00 pm.
translation.pcm: As di chairman tok, politikal parties go conduct dia primaries between May 18 and 24, 2021. E add am join say di access code for online submission of nomination forms go dey available for collection from May 24, 2021, for di commission headquarters wey dey Abuja, while di last day for submission of di list of candidates wey dem nominate na 28 May 2021 by 6.00 pm.

translation.en: All political parties must pay attention to Section 87 of the Electoral Act relating to the nomination processes and submit to the commission the names and particulars of candidates that scored the majority of lawful votes and emerged from valid party primaries.
translation.pcm: All di politikal party must pay attention to Section 87 of di Electoral Act wey relate to di nomination process, and submit di name and particulars of candidates wey get di majority of lawful votes and emerge from valid party primaries to di commission.

translation.en: Political parties shall submit the names of their polling agents for the election to the INEC Electoral Officer for Gwaram Local Government Area on/or before June 1, 2021, and campaigns by political parties shall end on June 17, 2021.
translation.pcm: Politikal parties must submit di name of dia polling agents for di election to di INEC Electoral Officer for Gwaram Local Government Area on/or befor June 1, 2021, and campaigns by politikal parties go end on June 17, 2021.

translation.en: The detailed timetable and schedule of activities for the bye-election have been uploaded on the commissions website and other social media platforms.
translation.pcm: We don upload di details of di timetable and schedule of activities for di bye-election on di website of di commission and oda social media platform.

translation.en: The commission wishes to reiterate that since work on the expansion of voter access to polling units in the country is ongoing, the bye-election will hold in the existing polling units and voting points across the constituency covering Gwaram Local Government Area of Jigawa State and Sabon Gari Local Government Area of Kaduna State, Okoye said.
translation.pcm: Di commission go like tok am again say since work dey go on di expansion of voter access to polling units for di kontri, di bye-election go hold for di existing polling units and voting points across di konstituency wey  cover Gwaram Local Government Area of Jigawa State and Sabon Gari Local Government Area of Kaduna State, - Okoye tok.

translation.en: He also urged all political parties to strictly adhere to the timetable and schedule of activities and avoid rancorous primaries and violence during the campaigns and throughout the electoral process.
translation.pcm: E also encourage all di politikal parties to strictly follow di timetable and schedule of activities and make dem avoid hate primaries and violence durin di campaign and tru-out di electoral process.

translation.en: Explosions: Senate urges clampdown on illegal gas retailers
translation.pcm: Explosions: Senate don call for restriction of illegal gas retailers

translation.en: The Senate on Tuesday urged the Department of Petroleum Resources (DPR) to clamp down on illegal roadside retailers of liquefied petroleum gas, those operating within residential areas and licensed plants who lack basic and standard minimum requirements.
translation.pcm: Di Senate on Tuesday tell di Department of Petroleum Resources (DPR) say make dem clamp down illegal roadside retailers wey dey sell liquefied petroleum gas, dose we dey operate for residential areas and gas plants wey get license but lack di basic and standard minimum requirement.

translation.en: It also mandated its committees on Gas and Industries to investigate the causes of the recent cases of gas explosions across the country with a view to finding permanent and sustainable solutions that would save the lives of the people.
translation.pcm: Di Senate also mandate im committees on Gas and Industries say make dem investigate di causes of recent cases of gas explosion across di kontri, and make dem suggest how to find permanent and sustainable solution wey go save di live of di pipo.

translation.en: These followed the adoption of a motion by Senator Ibikunle Amosun, who expressed sadness over the loss of at least eight lives in gas-related explosions and fire incidences in Abeokuta metropolis, Ogun State, in quick successions within two weeks last month.
translation.pcm: Di Senate tok dis afta dem adopt di motion by Senator Ibikunle Amosun, wey express e sadness ova di loss of at least eight lives for gas-related explosion and fire incidence for Abeokuta metropolis, Ogun State, within two weeks last month.

translation.en: The Senate, accordingly, called on the Federal and State Fire Services to enforce the mandatory use of fire safety equipment in homes and places of work.
translation.pcm: Di Senate, also call on di Federal and State Fire Service to enforce di compulsory use of fire safety equipment for homes and places of work.

translation.en: It also urged the Standards Organization of Nigeria, the DPR, the National Orientation Agency and marketers of gas and highly inflammable products to embark on aggressive, consistent sensitization and awareness campaigns on safe ways of using gas cylinders and other inflammable materials to save lives.
translation.pcm: Dem also encourage di Standard Organization of Nigeria, di DPR, di National Orientation Agency and marketers of gas and highly inflammable products to embark on aggressive, consistent sensitization and awareness campaigns on di safe ways to use gas cylinders and oda inflammable materials.

translation.en: Members of the Muslim community in Ebonyi State on Thursday urged Governor David Umahi to contest for president in 2023.
translation.pcm: Members of di Muslim community for Ebonyi State on Thursday tell Governor David Umahi say make e contest for president for 2023.

translation.en: Leader of the group, Alhaji Abass Egwu, made the appeal at the state government house in Abakiliki, when he led the group members to pay this years

translation.en: Iheanacho, Ndidi win FA Cup as Leicester City beat Chelsea in final
translation.pcm: Iheanacho and Ndidi win FA Cup as Leicester City beat Chelsea for final

translation.en: Nigerian duo, Kelechi Iheanacho and Wilfred Ndidi are FA Cup winners after helping Leicester City to beat Chelsea 1-0 in the FA Cup final played on Saturday.
translation.pcm: Two nigerians, Kelechi Iheanacho and Wilfred Ndidi don be FA Cup winners afta dem help Leicester City beat Chelsea 1-0 for di FA Cup final wey dem play on Saturday.

translation.en: It is Leicester Citys
translation.pcm: Na Leicester City

translation.en: first FA Cup in the clubs 137-year history.
translation.pcm: first ever FA Cup for di club 137-year old history.

translation.en: Youri Tielemanss sensational strike in front of 22,000 fans at Wembley was the difference between the two teams.
translation.pcm: Youri Tieleman amazing strike for di front of 22,000 fans for Wembley na im be di difference between di two teams.

translation.en: The largest crowd for a sports event in England since the coronavirus pandemic hit 14 months ago were treated to a goal worthy to win any trophy as the Belgian midfielder blasted into the top corner on 63 minutes.
translation.pcm: Di largest sport event crowd for England since wey di coronavirus pandemic start 14 months ago enjoy a goal wey fit to win any trophy as di Belgian midfielder shoot inside di top corner for 63 minutes.

translation.en: Kasper Schmeichel produced a stunning save to deny Mason Mount late on and Chelsea also had a goal ruled out by a VAR review for offside.
translation.pcm: Kasper Schmeichel show one amazing save wey deny Mason Mount a goal, and Chelsea sef get one goal wey VAR cancel as offside.

translation.en: Five years after the Foxes stunned the Premier Leagues giants to become champions, Leicester have now claimed English footballs other prestigious trophy at the fifth time of asking.
translation.pcm: Five years afta Foxes shock di Premier League giants to become champions, Leicester don finally claim di English football oda prestigious trophy di fifth time since dem don dey try.

translation.en: Four times they had previously lost the final, but the last of those was 52 years ago.
translation.pcm: Dem don lose di final four times, but di last one wey dem lose na 52 years ago.

translation.en: A historic week for Brendan Rodgerss men could get even better as they are on the verge of sealing a place in next seasons Champions League.
translation.pcm: Di historic week fit even get beta for Brendan Rodgers players, as dem dey close to qualifying for next Champions League season.

translation.en: The sides meet again in three days time at Stamford Bridge in a pivotal clash to decide who secures a top-four finish in the Premier League.
translation.pcm: Di sides go meet again in three days time for Stamford Bridge to decide who go secure di top-four finish for di Premier League.

translation.en: Chelsea need a quick response after losing for just the fourth time in 27 games since Thomas Tuchel replaced the sacked Frank Lampard in January.
translation.pcm: Chelsea go need a quick comeback afta dem lose for di fourth time in 27 games since Thomas Tuchel replace Frank Lampard wey dem sack for January.

translation.en: The Blues also have a Champions League final to look forward to against Manchester City in two weeks time but could end the campaign without silverware or a place in Europes premier club competition next season.
translation.pcm: Di Blues also get Champions League final wey dem dey prepare for against Manchester City in two weeks time, but dem fit end di campaign witout trophy or place for Europe premier club competition next season.

translation.en: Chelseas success under Tuchel has come thanks to an excellent defensive record, but their struggles at the other end were again exposed.
translation.pcm: Chelsea success under Tuchel don kom, sake of dia beta defensive record, but dia struggle for  di oda end don show again.

translation.en: Tuchels men dominated before half-time but laboured to create clear-cut chances despite Leicester losing defensive lynchpin Jonny Evans to injury midway through the first half.
translation.pcm: Tuchel men dominate befor first-half but dem struggle to create straightforward chances even afta Leicester defensive lynchpin Jonny Evans carry injury for di middle of di first half.

translation.en: Wayward Werner Timo Werners
translation.pcm: Wayward Werner Timo Werner

translation.en: wayward finishing has characterised his first season in England since joining from RB Leipzig for Â£47 million ($66 million) and the German international had another day to forget in front of goal.

translation.en: Tuchel turned away in disgust after Werner blazed high and wide from the edge of the box with the Leicester defence stretched midway through the first half.
translation.pcm: Tuchel turned away in disgust after Werner blazed high and wide from the edge of the box with the Leicester defence stretched midway through the first half.

translation.en: Werner then came closest to breaking the deadlock before half-time as his header drifted just wide and evaded Cesar Azpilicueta as the Chelsea captain launched himself in at the far post.

translation.en: The welcome return of noise echoing down from 6,000 fans of each side from both ends of the ground helped mask a general lack of quality on the field.

translation.en: Another 10,000 local supporters, key workers and Football Association stakeholders were also in attendance as Wembley gears up for hosting matches at Euro 2020 next month at 25 percent capacity.
translation.pcm: Another 10,000 local supporters, key workers and Football Association stakeholders were also in attendance as Wembley gears up for hosting matches at Euro 2020 next month at 25 percent capacity.

translation.en: One moment of magic proved decisive as Tielemans collected possession midway inside the Chelsea half and strode forward before unleashing an unstoppable strike into the top corner past Kepa Arrizabalaga.
translation.pcm: One moment of magic proved decisive as Tielemans collected possession midway inside the Chelsea half and strode forward before unleashing an unstoppable strike into the top corner past Kepa Arrizabalaga.

translation.en: Tuchel flexed the strength in depth of his squad in an attempt to find an equaliser as Callum Hudson-Odoi, Ben Chilwell, Kai Havertz, Olivier Giroud and Christian Pulisic were all introduced off the bench.
translation.pcm: Tuchel flexed the strength in depth of his squad in an attempt to find an equaliser as Callum Hudson-Odoi, Ben Chilwell, Kai Havertz, Olivier Giroud and Christian Pulisic were all introduced off the bench.

translation.en: But they were denied by the brilliance of Schmeichel in the Leicester goal.

translation.en: Chilwell, whose every touch was booed by the Leicester supporters, nearly came back to haunt his old club as his header was turned onto the post by the Dane.

translation.en: Mount then could not believe his luck as his sweetly struck shot was turned behind by a brilliant stop from Schmeichel.
translation.pcm: Mount then could not believe his luck as his sweetly struck shot was turned behind by a brilliant stop from Schmeichel.

translation.en: Even when the Leicester keeper was beaten, Chelsea were denied by a VAR review.
translation.pcm: Even when the Leicester keeper was beaten, Chelsea were denied by a VAR review.

translation.en: A Wes Morgan own goal looked set to send the game to extra-time, but Chilwell had strayed offside in the build-up.

translation.en: Leicester players and fans celebrated the decision like a goal and were in raptures again moments later after seeing out a nervy finale.
translation.pcm: Leicester players and fans celebrate di decision like a goal and were in raptures again moments later after seeing out a nervy finale.

translation.en: Tinubu, govs, other S/West leaders reject secession
translation.pcm: Tinubu, govs, oda S/West leaders reject secession

translation.en: Amidst agitation for the Oduduwa Republic in the South-West, leaders of the All Progressives Congress (APC) in the geo-political zone Sunday met in Lagos where they expressed strong opposition to the agitation.
translation.pcm: Inside di agitation for Oduduwa Republic for South-West, leaders of di All Progressives Congress (APC) for di geo-political zone meet for Lagos on Sunday, and dem show dia strong opposition to di agitation.

translation.en: The meeting held in Lagos House, Marina, was at the instance of the former interim National Chairman of the APC, Chief Bisi Akande.
translation.pcm: Di meetin wey hold for Lagos House, Marina, na base on di call of di former interim National Chairman of di APC, Chief Bisi Akande.

translation.en: At the meeting was a national leader of the APC, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, governors of Lagos, Babajide Sanwo-Olu,  Dapo Abiodun (Ogun), Adegboyega Oyetola (Osun) and Chief Bisi Akande.
translation.pcm: Dose wey dey di meetin na national leader of di APC, Asiwaju Bola Tinubu, governor of Lagos, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, Dapo Abiodun of Ogun State, Adegboyega Oyetola of Osun and Chief Bisi Akande.

translation.en: Others were General Alani Akinrinade (rtd), former governor of Ogun State, Aremo Segun Osoba, Minister of Industry, Trade and Investment, Otunba Niyi Adebayo and Chief Pius Akinyelure among others.
translation.pcm: Odas wey follow dey di meetin na General Alani Akinrinade (rtd), former governor of Ogun State, Prince Segun Osoba, Minista of Industry, Trade and Investment, Otunba Niyi Adebayo and Chief Pius Akinyelure wit odas.

translation.en: Daily Trust learnt that the meeting was in response to the raging agitation for Yoruba nation by a section of the region with several rallies held in South-West states to agitate for Oduduwa Republic.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust hear say di meetin na in response to di raging agitation for Yoruba nation by some pipo for di region, wit different rally wey dem don hold for South-West states to agitate for Oduduwa Republic.

translation.en: In a communiquÃ© read by Chief Akande, the South West leaders asked security agencies and the federal government to reduce tension in the country following the worsening security challenges bedeviling the nation.
translation.pcm: Inside one statement wey Chief Akande read, di South West leaders tell security agencies and di federal government say make dem reduce tension for di kontri afta di worsenin security challenges wey dey torment di nation.

translation.en: The communique reads in part; We note with significant concern the security situation in the country.
translation.pcm: Na part of wetin dey di statement be dis; We note wit significant concern di security situation for di kontri.

translation.en: Terrorism and violent criminality threaten many areas, adversely affecting the lives and livelihoods of too many innocent and peace-loving Nigerians.
translation.pcm: Terrorism and violent criminality dey threaten many areas, badly affecting di live and livelihood of plenti innocent and peace-loving Nigerians.

translation.en: We urge the federal government to continue to make the necessary expenditures and allocate sufficient resources to enable the military and security agencies to tackle the difficult security challenges confronting us.
translation.pcm: We encourage di federal government to kontinue to make di necessary expenditure and allocate sufficient resources wey go enable di military and security agencies tackle di hard security challenges wey dey face us.

translation.en: For Nigeria to overcome these challenges, we must do so with unity of purpose and action.
translation.pcm: For Nigeria to overcome dis challenges, we need do so wit unity of purpose and action.

translation.en: The desire for peace and the chance for a prosperous and just society is universal and transcends all regional, religious or ethnic divisions.
translation.pcm: Di desire for peace and di chance for a prosperous and just society dey universal and e pass all form of regional, religious or ethnic division.

translation.en: Sadly, many public figures have made statements that spark division and undermine the needed unity of purpose.
translation.pcm: Sadly, many public figure don tok tins wey fit cause division and destroy di unity of purpose wey we need.

translation.en: We restate our abhorrence of violence as a means to achieve either political or economic power and influence.
translation.pcm: We dey restate awa extreme dislike of violence as a means to achieve either politikal or economic power and influence.

translation.en: We strongly condemn violence of any form in any part of the country, regardless of ethnic or regional identity of the perpetrators of the violence or of the victims.
translation.pcm: We strongly condemn any form of violence for any part of di kontri, regardless of where di victims or pipo wey cause di violence kom from.

translation.en: Government must do all it can to protect potential victims and to assist those who have previously been victimized by terrorism or widespread banditry.
translation.pcm: Government need do evritin wey e fit do to protect potential victims and to help dose wey don be victims of terrorism or widespread banditry befor.

translation.en: We endorse the position of the Southern Governors taken at their May 11, 2021 summit in Asaba, Delta State, regarding ranching.
translation.pcm: We support wetin di Southern Governors tok about ranching for dia May 11, 2021 summit wey happun for Asaba, Delta State.

translation.en: We do so because such a decision will lessen tensions between farmers and herders while also helping the long-term economic viability of both the farming and herding communities.
translation.pcm: We support becos dat kind decision go fit reduce di tension between farmers and herdsmen, and e go also help di long-term economic development of di farming and herding communities togeda.

translation.en: 2023: INEC verifies voting points for conversion to polling units
translation.pcm: 2023: INEC don verify voting points for conversion to polling units

translation.en: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) on Tuesday commenced a nationwide verification exercise of the voting points (VPs) proposed to be converted to polling units (PUs) across the country.
translation.pcm: Di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) on Tuesday begin a nationwide verification exercise of di voting points (VPs) wey dem propose say dem wan convert to pollin units (PUs) tru-out di kontri.

translation.en: INEC Chairman Prof. Mahmood Yakubu said this on Tuesday in Abuja, when he visited some of the proposed centres and existing PUs in the FCT and Nasarawa State.
translation.pcm: INEC Chairman, Prof. Mahmood Yakubu na im tok am on Tuesday for Abuja, wen e visit som of di centres wey dem wan use and som current PUs for di FCT and Nasarawa State.

translation.en: Speaking with newsmen at the commissions Local Government office in Karu, Nasarawa State, Yakubu said the purpose of the verification exercise was to ensure the right thing was done in the conversion of the VPs to PUs.
translation.pcm: Prof. Yakubu, wen e dey follow tori-men yarn for di commission Local Government office wey dey Karu, Nasarawa State, tok say di purpose of di verification na to make sure say dem do di right tin befor dem convert di VPs to PUs.

translation.en: All the national commissioners are out, visiting the states of the federation to verify the work of converting the voting points to polling units, he said.
translation.pcm: E tok say; All di national commissioners don kommot, dem dey visit di states of di federation so dem go fit verify di work of convertin di voting points to polling units.

translation.en: Meanwhile, the commission yesterday said it has upgraded 956 voting points to polling units in Sokoto State.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, di commission tok am yesterday say dem don upgrade 956 voting points to polling units for Sokoto State.

translation.en: A guide to soya bean farming as planting begins June
translation.pcm: A guide to soya bean farming as planting go begin by June

translation.en: Soya is a plant grown mostly for its edible bean which can be used for different purposes.
translation.pcm: Soya na plant wey dem dey grow, mostly becos of e beans wey dem fit use do different tins.

translation.en: It is a legume known for its high nutritious value.
translation.pcm: Na legume wey get high nutritious value.

translation.en: Our agric editor who has been monitoring the soya bean value-chain reports that despite the fact that Nigeria is said to be the largest producer of the crop in Africa, its production level has not attained its full capacity.
translation.pcm: Awa agric editor wey don dey monitor di soya bean value-chain tok say, even say dem know Nigeria as di largest producer of soya for Afrika, di production level still neva reach im full capacity.

translation.en: This is because soya bean farming in the country is still largely done by small farmers who grow the crop as a minor crop alongside major crops like maize, cowpea (beans) and cassava.
translation.pcm: Dis na becos most of dose wey dey plant soya bean for di kontri be small farmers. Dem no dey plant am as di main crop, but dem dey use am support oda major crops like corn, cowpea (beans) and cassava.

translation.en: Some soya bean farmers that spoke with Daily Trust believe that the crop can be grown in many states in Nigeria using low agricultural input.
translation.pcm: Som soya bean farmers wey follow Daily Trust yarn believe say wit small agricultural tools and effort, we fit grow di crop for many states for Nigeria.

translation.en: Why more farmers should go into soya bean farming
translation.pcm: Di reason why more farmers suppose enta soya bean farming

translation.en: Mallam Yinusa Jimoh, an Ilorin-based retired agric extension officer, told Daily Trust on phone that aside from its domestic and economical values, soya bean improved soil fertility and could be used to control striga.
translation.pcm: Mallam Yinusa Jimoh, wey be Ilorin-based retired agric extension officer, tell Daily Trust for fone say apart from di domestic and economical values wey soya bean get, e dey also improve soil fertility and dem fit use am kontrol striga.

translation.en: He said the market for soya bean in Nigeria was growing fast, with opportunities for improving the income of farmers.
translation.pcm: E tok say di market for soya bean dey grow fast for Nigeria, and opportunity dey for farmers to improve dia income.

translation.en: A handbook on soya bean produced by the International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) shows that the rapid growth in the poultry sector in the past five years has also increased demand for soya bean meal in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: One handbook wey di International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) produce on soya bean show say di fast growth for poultry sector during di past five years don also increase di demand for soya bean meal for Nigeria.

translation.en: The IITA handbook reads in part: It is also a prime source of vegetable oil in the international market.
translation.pcm: The IITA handbook reads in part: It is also a prime source of vegetable oil in the international market.

translation.en: Soya bean has an average protein content of 40 percent and is more protein-rich than any of the common vegetable or animal food sources found in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Soya bean get average protein content of 40 percent and e get more protein pass any of di common vegetable or animal food source wey dey for Nigeria.

translation.en: According to IITA, SALMA Oil Mills in Kano, Grand Cereals in Jos, ECWA Feeds in Jos, AFCOT Oil Seed Processors in Adamawa and PS Mandrides in Kano all process soya bean.
translation.pcm: Accordin to IITA, SALMA Oil Mills for Kano, Grand Cereals for Jos, ECWA Feeds for Jos, AFCOT Oil Seed Processors for Adamawa and PS Mandrides wey dey Kano dey all process soya bean.

translation.en: This means that there is a ready market for interested farmers in the country.
translation.pcm: Wetin dis one mean be say ready market dey for farmers wey get interest for soya farming for di kontri.

translation.en: Presently at the local market, a measure of soya bean costs around N600; depending on the area, while a 50kg bag costs around N17,000.
translation.pcm: Right now, for di local market, one de-rica of soya bean na N600; dependin on di area, while dem dey sell 50kg bag for around N17,000.

translation.en: The global demand for the crop nears about 11 million tonnes, while Africas annual expenditure of soya bean is about 619 thousand tonnes.
translation.pcm: Di global demand for di crop na about 11 million tonnes, while di yearly amount of soya bean wey dem dey chop for Afrika na about 619 thousand tonnes.

translation.en: Best ways to farm soya bean
translation.pcm: Di best way wey we fit take use farm soya bean

translation.en: According to a long time soya bean farmer, Dr Awoniyi Joseph, planting of soya bean usually starts in June, and that it grows well on all kinds of soil, except deep soils with poor water retention.
translation.pcm: Accordin to a long time soya bean farmer, Dr Awoniyi Joseph, soya bean planting dey always start for June, and e dey grow well on all type of soil, except deep soil wey no fit hold water.

translation.en: Dr Joseph informed farmers that an important factor to consider when embarking on soya bean farming in Nigeria was rainfall.
translation.pcm: Dr Joseph yarn farmers say one important tin to consider wen pesin wan start soya bean farming for Nigeria na rainfall.

translation.en: He said Nigeria had a very favourable climatic condition that was ideal for soya bean to flourish.
translation.pcm: E tok say Nigeria get very gud climate wey dey perfect for soya bean to flourish.

translation.en: According to him, good harvest depends mostly on adequate irrigation as the crop can also be grown in areas with lesser amounts of rainfall through irrigation.
translation.pcm: As Awoniyi tok, gud harvest depend mostly on regular irrigation, becosthroughirrigation, di crop fit grow for areas wey no get plenti rainfall.

translation.en: According to IITA, soya bean should not be planted in sandy, gravelly, or shallow soils to avoid drought stress, advising that it should not be grown in waterlogged soils or soils with surfaces that can crust, as this will lead to poor seedling emergence
translation.pcm: Accordin to IITA, make dem no plant soya bean for sandy, gravelly, or shallow soils to prevent drought stress, dem advise say make dem no plant am for soil wey get plenty water or soil wit surfaces wey fit break, cos dis no go make di seed komot well.

translation.en: Clear all vegetation before land preparation.
translation.pcm: Clear all di plants wey dey, befor u prepare di land.

translation.en: The seedbed may be prepared manually with a hoe or an animal-drawn implement or tractor, IITA advised.
translation.pcm: U fit prepare di seedbed manually wit a hoe or animal-drawn equipment or tractor, IITA advise.

translation.en: Well-prepared land ensures good germination and reduces weed infestation.
translation.pcm: Land wey dem prepare well dey allow di seed germinate well, and e dey reduce weed infestation.

translation.en: You can plant on ridges or on a flat seedbed, the IITA added.
translation.pcm: IITA add am join say; U fit plant on ridges or on flat seedbed.

translation.en: Experts warn that soya bean variety selection should be based on maturity, yield potential, lodging, drought tolerance and resistance to pests and diseases.
translation.pcm: Experts don warn say to choose di type of soya bean wey u go plant, u need look at di period wey e dey take mature, di yield potential, lodging, and how well e fit tolerate drought and resist pest and disease.

translation.en: John Stephen, a soya bean farmer in Garam, a Niger State community neighbouring the FCT, insisted that the maturity period should be the first consideration when choosing a variety suited to your geographical zone.
translation.pcm: John Stephen, wey be soya bean farmer for Garam, one community for Niger State, close to di FCT, insist say na di maturity period u need to consida first wen u wan choose di type of soya bean wey fit ur location.

translation.en: Stephen advised that, Consider varieties that are earlier maturing rather than late maturing in areas with low rainfall.
translation.pcm: Stephen advise say, for areas wey get low rainfall, make u consida di seed wey dey mature early rada dan di one wey dey mature late.

translation.en: Although later maturity increases the yield potential, it is risky to grow late maturing varieties in drier environments because of late season drought.
translation.pcm: Although seed wey dey mature late dey always get beta yield, but e dey risky to plant late maturing seed for dry environments becos of late season drought.

translation.en: IITA advised farmers to use high quality seeds of the selected variety as soya bean seeds easily lose their viability.
translation.pcm: IITA advise farmers say make di type of seed wey dem go choose be of high quality becos soya bean seeds dey quick lose dia viability.

translation.en: According to the institute, it is common for soya bean, even when stored properly, not to germinate after 12 to 15 months in storage.
translation.pcm: According to di institute, e dey common for soya bean not to grow afta 12 to 15 monts wey e don dey for storage, even wen dem keep am well.

translation.en: Therefore, use seeds that are not more than 12 months old to ensure good germination.
translation.pcm: So, make u use seed wey never pass 12 monts so e go fit germinate well.

translation.en: Sort out the good seeds for planting to ensure that they are free from insects, disease infestation and weed seeds.
translation.pcm: Select di gud seed komot for planting so u go fit make sure say dem no get insect, disease, or weed seeds.

translation.en: Do not purchase seeds from the open market as the germination potential is not guaranteed.
translation.pcm: Make u no buy seed from open market, cos di ability for di seed to germinate no guarantee.

translation.en: Planting poor quality seeds will not produce a good yield,
translation.pcm: Planting seed wey get poor quality no go produce beta yield.

translation.en: the institute advised in the handbook.
translation.pcm: Di institute advise for di handbook.

translation.en: Conducting germination test
translation.pcm: Conducting germination test

translation.en: If possible, IITA recommends seed test before planting.
translation.pcm: If e dey possible, IITA recommend say make u test di seed befor planting.

translation.en: The institute recommends that the germination rate should be 85 percent or more to obtain a good stand.
translation.pcm: Di institute recommend say make di germination rate be 85 percent or more to get gud stand.

translation.en: According to IITA, to conduct a quick seed germination test, select 400 seeds randomly and sow 100 seeds each in four wooden or plastic boxes or a prepared seedbed.
translation.pcm: Accordin to IITA, to conduct a quick seed germination test, make u select 400 seeds randomly, den plant 100 seeds each for four woodin or plastik boxes or seedbed wey u don prepare.

translation.en: Sow one seed per hole at a distance of 10cm between the seeds.
translation.pcm: Plant one seed per hole wit a distance of 10cm between di seeds.

translation.en: Soak cloth or paper-lined germination boxes or the seedbed well with water before sowing and provide water every morning and evening.
translation.pcm: Soak di woodin or plastik boxes or di seedbed well wit water befor planting and make u dey put water evri mornin and evenin.

translation.en: Start counting the seedlings five days after sowing and complete the counting within 10 days.
translation.pcm: Begin dey count di seedlings five days afta planting and complete di counting within 10 days.

translation.en: A total count of 320 germinated seeds or more indicates a germination rate of 80 percent and above.
translation.pcm: If u fit count a total of 320 seeds wey germinate, e mean say di germination rate of di seed na 80 percent and above.

translation.en: When the percentage of germination is 80 percent or less, the seed rate has to be increased accordingly to achieve 100 percent.
translation.pcm: Wen di percentage of germination na 80 percent or less, u go need increase di seed rate to achieve 100 percent.

translation.en: Fertiliser application
translation.pcm: Fertiliser application

translation.en: IITA advises that a good fertiliser recommendation for soya bean production depends on a good soil test.
translation.pcm: IITA advise say to recommend beta fertiliser for soya bean production, pesin go need to do a gud soil test.

translation.en: Under normal conditions, soya bean as a legume should provide itself with nitrogen through biological nitrogen fixation.
translation.pcm: For normal kondition, soya bean as legume wey e be suppose provide esef wit nitrogenthroughbiological nitrogen fixation.

translation.en: Until nodulation occurs, the soya bean plant depends on soil nitrogen for growth.
translation.pcm: Until nodulation don happun, di soya bean plant go dey depend on di soil nitrogen to grow.

translation.en: Phosphorus is often the most deficient nutrient, therefore, apply optimum phosphorous fertiliser for good yield.
translation.pcm: Phosphorus na im di plant dey lack pass, derefor, make u put di best phosphorous fertiliser so e go fit grow well.

translation.en: The institute further advises farmers to incorporate the fertiliser into the soil during harrowing and levelling of the field.
translation.pcm: Di institute still advise farmers say make dem put di fertiliser inside di soil wen dem dey harrow and level di farm.

translation.en: Pests, diseases and weeds
translation.pcm: Pests, diseases and weeds

translation.en: Perennial and most annual weeds are a problem to soya bean in its early growth stages.
translation.pcm: Na problem Perennial and most annual weeds be to soya bean wen e jus dey grow

translation.en: A properly timed weed control programme can minimise the effects of weeds.
translation.pcm: Gud weed kontrol programme for di proper time fit reduce di effect of weed.

translation.en: Weed control in soya bean could be manual or chemical, or both.
translation.pcm: Weed kontrol for soya bean fit be manual or chemical, or both.

translation.en: Manual weed control
translation.pcm: Manual weed kontrol

translation.en: : Carry out the first weeding at two weeks after planting and the second at five to six weeks after planting.
translation.pcm: : Make u do di first weedin two weeks afta plantin and di second one, five to six weeks afta plantin.

translation.en: Avoid weeding immediately after a rainfall as this will lead to transplanting the weeds.
translation.pcm: Make u no weed di farm immediately rain fall, becos dis go make di weed grow for anoda place.

translation.en: Poor hoe weeding or delay in weeding can cause significant reduction in yield.
translation.pcm: bad weedin or delay fit make di yield reduce badly.

translation.en: Chemical weed control:
translation.pcm: Chemical weed kontrol:

translation.en: Herbicides, if used properly, are safe and effective in controlling weeds in soya bean cultivation.
translation.pcm: Herbicides na safe and effective way to kontrol weed for soya bean farming, if we use am wella.

translation.en: The choice of herbicide, however, depends on the predominant weed species and the availability of the herbicide.
translation.pcm: Di kind herbicide wey u go use kom depend on di kind weed wey dey dere and if di herbicide dey available.

translation.en: Herbicides are available for pre-emergence or post-emergence weed control in soya bean.
translation.pcm: Herbicides dey available for pre-emergence or post-emergence weed kontrol for soya bean.

translation.en: If herbicide is applied at planting, one weeding may be required at five to six weeks after planting.
translation.pcm: If u use herbicide durin plantin, u go need weed di farm five to six weeks afta plantin.

translation.en: Several different insects infest soya bean fields, but few are normally of any economic importance, and the species that cause damage are usually not abundant enough to warrant control measures.
translation.pcm: Na different insects dey affect soya bean farm, but na only few of dis insects no get any economic importance, and dose ones wey fit damage crops no dey plenty reach di amount wey go need kontrol measures.

translation.en: In the vegetative stage, the crop is very tolerant of caterpillars but very susceptible to silverleaf whitefly attack.
translation.pcm: Durin di vegetative stage, di crop dey immune to caterpillars but e dey very weak to silverleaf whitefly attack.

translation.en: Harvest
translation.pcm: Harvest

translation.en: Soya bean for shelling and fresh use are ready for harvest from 65 days after sowing.
translation.pcm: Soya bean dey ready to harvest for shelling and fresh use from 65 days afta planting.

translation.en: However, dry soya beans require 100 or more days to reach harvest.
translation.pcm: Howeva, dry soya beans need 100 or more days befor u fit harvest am.

translation.en: Soya bean farmers advise that for green shell beans, soya bean could be harvested when pods are green, full and plump.
translation.pcm: Soya bean farmers don advise say for beans wey get green shell, u fit harvest am wen di pods dey green, full and plump.

translation.en: FIFA, UEFA licensed agents storm Kano in search of talented players
translation.pcm: Agents wey get license for FIFA and UEFA don storm Kano to search for talented players

translation.en: A team of European scouts under the umbrella of 60 Goals Soccer Star Project has arrived the city of Kano to conduct an U-16 football talent hunt beginning from June 1.
translation.pcm: A team of European scout, unda di umbrella of 60 Goals Soccer Star Project don arrive for Kano city to conduct one U-16 football talent hunt from June 1.

translation.en: Addressing a press conference Wednesday, the licensed agents said their decision to conduct the scouting programme in Kano was informed by the high number of young and talented players available for selection.
translation.pcm: Wen dem dey follow tori pipo yarn on Wednesday, di agents tok say dia decision to conduct di scoutin programme for Kano na becos of di high numba of young and talented players wey dey available for selection.

translation.en: The Chief Executive Officer, 60 Goals Soccer Star Project who is also a FIFA intermediary agent, Jane Ndubuisi added that the project is introduced to empower Kano youths through football.
translation.pcm: Di Chief Executive Officer of 60 Goals Soccer Star Project, Jane Ndubuisi, wey be FIFA middle-man agent too, add am join say dem bring di project to empower Kano youthsthroughfootball.

translation.en: We are here, therefore, to pick talents and to help them achieve their dreams.
translation.pcm: We dey hia, to pick talents and to help dem achieve dia dreams.

translation.en: She urged parents to encourage their wards to combine football with education.
translation.pcm: She tell parents say make dem encourage dia children to join football wit education.

translation.en: On his part, Miroslav Marjanovic expressed hope that as many players as possible would be given the opportunity to showcase their skills during the exercise.
translation.pcm: For e side, Miroslav Marjanovic get hope say durin di  exercise, many players go get di opportunity to showcase dia skills.

translation.en: He said Youths from rural areas will be given the opportunity to showcase their talent and the best among them would be selected for trials abroad.
translation.pcm: E tok say Youths wey kom from rural areas go get opportunity to showcase dia talent and dem go select di best among for trial abroad.

translation.en: My hope is that many of the players here in Kano are going to succeed for themselves and their immediate society.
translation.pcm: My hope be say many of di players hia for Kano go succeed for demsef and dia immediate society.

translation.en: In a similar vein, Milan Martinovic noted that the screening is packaged to give youthful players the avenue to express themselves for opportunities to become professional footballers.
translation.pcm: Also, Milan Martinovic yarn say dem package di screening to give youthful players di opportunity to show demsef for opportunity to becom professional footballers.

translation.en: For the president of 60 Goals Soccer Star Project and Ex Nigerian U-23 player Francis Ikechukwu, a level playing field will be provided for all the participants.
translation.pcm: Francis Ikechukwu wey be di president of 60 Goals Soccer Star Project and former Nigerian U-23 player tok say dem go provide a level playing field for all di participant.

translation.en: What we need is talent and
translation.pcm: Wetin we need na talent and

translation.en: its only your ability that will give you the chance no matter what, because we dont know corruption, he said.
translation.pcm: na only ur ability go give u di chance no matta wat, becos we no sabi corruption, e tok.

translation.en: How to use SEEDCODEX to check fake seeds
translation.pcm: How to use SEEDCODEX to check fake seeds

translation.en: If you are planning to buy genuine seed, then look for the ones that have SEEDCODEX tag by the National Agricultural Seed Council (NASC).
translation.pcm: If u dey plan to buy correct seed, make u find di ones wey get SEEDCODEX tag by di National Agricultural Seed Council (NASC).

translation.en: The SEEDCODEX tag is an electronic seed verification and authentication system attached to every seed pack.
translation.pcm: Di SEEDCODEX tag na electronic seed verification and authentication system wey dey attached to every seed pack.

translation.en: Farmers can scratch it and text the code to a dedicated number for verification.
translation.pcm: Farmers go fit scratch am and send di code to one numba for verification.

translation.en: The Director General of the council, Dr Phillips Ojo, stated this in Abuja at a press briefing to highlight the readiness of the agency to provide quality, certified seeds for the 2020/2021 planting season.
translation.pcm: Di Director General of di council, Dr Phillips Ojo, tok dis for Abuja wen e dey follow tori-pipo yarn about di readiness of di agency to provide quality and certified seeds for di 2020/2021 plantin season.

translation.en: Our call to farmers is that only seeds affixed with the NASC SEEDCODEX tags fall under this category and it should be what they should buy from the shelves of their seed suppliers.
translation.pcm: Awa call to farmers na say only di seeds wey get di NASC SEEDCODEX tag fall for dis category and na im make dem buy from dia seed suppliers.

translation.en: The SEEDCODEX tag, as you are aware, is the output of the NASC electronic seed verification and authentication system that enhances the efficiency of our seed certification and quality assurance scheme which we put in place to prevent seed adulteration by unscrupulous seed merchants.
translation.pcm: Di SEEDCODEX tag, as u know, na di result of di NASC electronic seed verification and authentication system wey go enhance di efficiency of awa seed certification and quality assurance program wey we establish to prevent seed adulteration by greedy seed merchants.

translation.en: Farmers should know that all certified seeds packs in Nigeria must carry this authentication tags with code affixed on them for farmers to send to a dedicated number to instantly verify the authenticity of seeds they purchased and report any unscrupulous seed dealers in the national seed space to NASC, Dr Ojo said.
translation.pcm: Farmers suppose know say all di certified seeds packs for Nigeria must get dis authentication tags wit di code on dem, so farmers go fit send di code to immediately verify if di seed wey dem buy na original and dem go fit report any mago-mago seed dealer for di national seed business to NASC, Dr Ojo yarn.

translation.en: Melania Trumps chief of staff resigns
translation.pcm: Melania Trump chief of staff don resign

translation.en: Stephanie Grisham, U.S. First Lady Melania Trumps chief of staff, says she is resigning effective immediately.
translation.pcm: Stephanie Grisham, wey be chief of staff of U.S. First Lady Melania Trump, don tok say she dey resign immediately.

translation.en: A longtime associate of Mrs Trump, Grisham was also a former White House spokeswoman.
translation.pcm: Grisham na former White House tok-tok pesin and longtime pesin of Mrs Trump.

translation.en: She said it had been an honour to serve the Trump administration.
translation.pcm: She  tok say na honour e be for her to serve di Trump administration.

translation.en: Grisham gave no reasons for her unexpected move.
translation.pcm: Grisham no give any reason for her decision.

translation.en: It remained unclear whether her departure was related to the storming of the Capitol by supporters of outgoing president Donald Trump.
translation.pcm: We still neva know weda her resignation na becos of di attack on di Capitol by pipo wey dey support outgoing president Donald Trump.

translation.en: Traffickers conceal drugs inside statue of Blessed Virgin Mary
translation.pcm: Traffickers hide drugs for inside statue of Blessed Virgin Mary

translation.en: Drug traffickers looking for a fail-proof way to smuggle illicit drugs decided on the religious route by stuffing their stash in a statue of the Blessed Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus.
translation.pcm: Drug traffickers wey dey find easy way to smuggle illegal drugs don follow di religious route as dem load di statue of di Blessed Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus wit drugs.

translation.en: NDLEA operatives embedded in two courier companies intercepted the drugs concealed in the statue and some in auto spare parts to be dispatched to Canada and the United Arab Emirates.
translation.pcm: NDLEA operatives wey dem plant for two courier companies seize di drugs wey dem hide inside di statue, and som odas for inside motor spare parts wey dem wan ship go Canada and  UAE.

translation.en: A stash of 140 grammes of methamphetamine stuffed inside a statue of Mary headed for the Philippines was intercepted in one of the courier companies.
translation.pcm: About 140 grammes of methamphetamine wey dem wan send go Philippines, inside di statue of Mary na im officers seize for one of di courier company.

translation.en: Another 500 grammes of heroin concealed in auto spare parts headed for Canada was intercepted in a second courier company.
translation.pcm: Anoda 500 grammes of heroin wey dem dey send go Canada for inside motor spare parts na im dem seize for di second courier company.

translation.en: A separate package of 3.1kg of Indian hemp concealed inside spices and another one kilogramme of Indian hemp concealed in local herbs head for the UAE were also seized, according to Femi Babafemi, director of media and advocacy at the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency.
translation.pcm: Accordin to Mr Femi Babafemi wey be di director of media and advocacy for NDLEA, dem seize anoda two separate package of Indian hemp wey dem wan send go UAE. 3.1kg wey dem hide inside spices and anoda one kilogramme wey dey inside local herbs.

translation.en: In a related development, the NDLEA in sting operations arrested 31 suspects in Ondo State for being in possession of 276 kg of assorted illicit drugs.
translation.pcm: For anoda development, di NDLEA for different sting operation arrest 31 suspects for Ondo State, unto say dem catch dem wit 276 kg of assorted illegal drugs.

translation.en: Those arrested included seven females.
translation.pcm: Som of dose wey dem arrest na seven female.

translation.en: They were arrested during a two-week raid which began on April 6.
translation.pcm: Dem arrest dem durin a two-week raid wey begin for April 6.

translation.en: Babafemi said that the sting operations were carried out to curb the increasing rate of drug abuse among youths and even the elderly in Ondo State.
translation.pcm: Babafemi tok say dem do di sting operations to stop di rate of drug abuse wey dey increase among youths and even di elderly for Ondo State.

translation.en: He added that the illicit drugs seized were 74.285kgs of Indian hemp, 267grammes of other psychotropic substances;
translation.pcm: E add am join say di illegal drugs wey dem seize na 74.285kgs of Indian hemp, 267 grammes of oda psychotropic substance;

translation.en: 201kgs of skuchies (a combination of Indian hemp, tramadol, ethanol, and Zobo).
translation.pcm: 201kgs of skuchies (combination of Indian hemp, tramadol, ethanol, and Zobo).

translation.en: NDLEA dismantled or destroyed most of the vending spots where the drugs were being dispensed, he said.
translation.pcm: NDLEA scatter or destroy most of di spots wia dem dey sell di drugs. E yarn.

translation.en: In Akwa Ibom, the NDLEA also seized 62.150kg of illicit drugs in Oron and Uyo.
translation.pcm: Inside Akwa Ibom, di NDLEA also seize 62.150kg of illegal drugs for Oron and Uyo.

translation.en: Babafemi quoted the NDLEA commander in the state, Obot Bassey, as saying that four suspects were arrested in two sting operations conducted on April 22 and April 23.
translation.pcm: Babafemi yarn wetin di NDLEA commander for di state, Obot Bassey tok, say na four suspect dem arrest inside two sting operations wey dem do for April 22 and April 23.

translation.en: He stated that NDLEA chairman, retired Brig.-Gen.
translation.pcm: E tok am say di NDLEA chairman, retired Brig.-Gen.

translation.en: Buba Marwa, had commended operatives in the two states and those of Operations and General Investigations Directorate in Lagos for their steadfastness.
translation.pcm: Buba Marwa, don commend di operatives for di two states and dose wey dey Operations and General Investigations Directorate for Lagos on dia steadfastness.

translation.en: Pastor Adefarasin, if Nigeria is a scam; then were all scammers
translation.pcm: Pastor Adefarasin; if Nigeria na scam; den all of us na scammers

translation.en: It is the bounden duty of every citizen to hold the government to account.
translation.pcm: Na di compulsory duty of everi citizen to hold di government to account.

translation.en: In fact, citizenship is a call to duty  for the state.
translation.pcm: In fact, citizenship na call to duty for di state.

translation.en: And there is no compelling duty which supersedes citizens subjecting their employees  the government  to scrutiny and constant vigilance.
translation.pcm: And no compulsory duty wey pass make citizens dey scrutinize and monitor dia employees “ di government“ frequently.

translation.en: Criticising the government is within the rights of every citizen, and active citizenship demands taking the government through its paces.
translation.pcm: Criticising di government na part of di rights of everi citizen, and active citizenship get to do wit takin di governmentthroughe pace.

translation.en: No government is without criticism, and none is too special for criticism.
translation.pcm: No government wey dem no dey criticise, and no government too special for pipo to criticise.

translation.en: However, we must distinguish between any government and Nigeria as a country.
translation.pcm: But, we need differentiate between any government and Nigeria as a kontri.

translation.en: Governments will come and go, but Nigeria remains.
translation.pcm: Government go kom and go, but Nigeria go remain.

translation.en: We must understand Nigeria is its people.
translation.pcm: We need understand say Nigeria na di pipo wey dey inside.

translation.en: So, when we cast pejoratives at the country we are only slinging shots at ourselves.
translation.pcm: So, wen we belittle di kontri, we just dey shoot awasef for leg.

translation.en: If we say, Nigeria is a scam, inadvertently we are implying, Nigerians are scammers.
translation.pcm: If we tok say Nigeria na scam, indirectly wetin we mean be say, Nigerians be scammers.

translation.en: Nigeria did not become a scam, as some of those reviling the nation say, by accident; it became whatever it is by the machination of all of us.
translation.pcm: Nigeria no be scam, like som of dose wey dey abuse di nation dey always tok, unknowingly; Na we turn Nigeria to anytin wey e be.

translation.en: Nigeria is not a mere geographical expression.
translation.pcm: Nigeria no be just a place somwia.

translation.en: Nigeria is its people.
translation.pcm: Nigeria na di pipo.

translation.en: The good, the bad and the ugly  we made it so.
translation.pcm: Di gud, di bad and di ugly “ na we make am be laidat.

translation.en: Whatever is ailing the country we are a vector of the causative factors.
translation.pcm: Anytin wey dey affect di kontri, na we be di agent wey cause am.

translation.en: If Nigeria is a scam  as alleged by Pastor Paul Adefarasin  then we are all scammers.
translation.pcm: If Nigeria na scam as Pastor Paul Adefarasin tok, den we all be scammers.

translation.en: Though I concede that Adefarasins outburst might have come from a place of patriotism, his cataloguing of Nigeria as a scam and fraud falls short of tact and critical reasoning.
translation.pcm: Even say I agree, say Adefarasin anger na becos of di love wey e get for di kontri, im comment say Nigeria na scam and fraud no dey reasonable.

translation.en: If Nigeria is a fraud; then we are all fraudsters  leaders and followers alike.
translation.pcm: If Nigeria na fraud; den all of us be fraudster, leaders and followers join.

translation.en: We all have contributed in no small measure to the discomfiture of the entity.
translation.pcm: All of us don contribute to di dissapointment of di entity.

translation.en: We live in a country where pastors run their ministries like conglomerates.
translation.pcm: We dey live for a kontri wia pastors dey run dia ministry like business.

translation.en: They run them like business enterprises  but evading tax in the process.
translation.pcm: Dem dey run am like business enterprise but dem no dey pay tax for dere.

translation.en: CAMA; a law to regulate the business undertakings of the religious industry and to bring some transparency and accountability into the spiritual business was introduced by the government.
translation.pcm: CAMA; Government introduce a law wey go regulate di business undertaking of di religious industry and wey go bring som transparency and accountability inside di spiritual business.

translation.en: However, the staunchest antagonists of this law have been pastors.
translation.pcm: But na pastors dey against dis law pass.

translation.en: Yet, these same people who do not want to live by the law are the loudest voices when passing capital sentences on Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Still, na dis same pipo wey no wan follow di law be di loudest voice wen dem dey pass capital sentence on Nigeria.

translation.en: Interestingly, these pastors run their churches in conformity with the law in other countries.
translation.pcm: Funny tin be say, dis pastors dey follow di law of oda kontri dey run dia church for dose kontri.

translation.en: They submit their finances for regular checks by the authorities in the UK, the US and other places.
translation.pcm: Dem dey submit dia finance for regular check by di authorities for UK, US and oda places.

translation.en: But in Nigeria they live in triumph of the law.
translation.pcm: But for Nigeria dem dey live above di law.

translation.en: Pastor Chris Oyakhilome has been spreading injurious falsehood regarding COVID vaccine.
translation.pcm: Pastor Chris Oyakhilome don dey spread harmful lies about COVID vaccine.

translation.en: He claims it is the concoction of the anti-Christ.
translation.pcm: E claim say na di concoction of di anti-Christ.

translation.en: He was fined 125,000 pounds for making potentially harmful and unsubstantiated claims about the vaccine by the UK.
translation.pcm: Dem fine am 125,000 pounds for Uk, sake of say e dey tok harmful and unsubstantiated tins about di vaccine.

translation.en: But in Nigeria where he continues to traffic in COVID conspiracies, he has not been made to account for his transgressions because he is a man of god.
translation.pcm: But for Nigeria wia e dey kontinue to bring different COVID conspiracy, dem neva call am to kom explain im offence, sake of say na man of god e be.

translation.en: Perhaps, this is why Nigeria is a scam.
translation.pcm: Maybe na why Nigeria be scam.

translation.en: If Nigeria is a scam, then it is because of pastors who sit on high and trample on the laws governing the land.
translation.pcm: If Nigeria na scam, den na becos of pastors wey dey siddun for top, kom dey step on di law wey dey govern di land.

translation.en: If Nigeria is a fraud, then it is because of pastors who go into concordats with politicians every election season; campaigning for them on the pulpit and commanding the bloodhounds of hell against those who do not accept their anointed candidates.
translation.pcm: If Nigeria na fraud, den na becos of pastors wey dey sign agreement wit politicians everi election period; dey campaign for dem on di altar, dey command di demons of hell untop dose wey no gree accept dia anointed candidate.

translation.en: The clergy is as tainted as the political class.
translation.pcm: Clergymen dey as corrupt as di politikal class.

translation.en: Also, a civil servant, who earns N150,000 monthly but has kids in UK schools and with real estate dotting major cities in the country, will revile Nigeria submerging his own hypocrisy in lamentations and jibes at the state.
translation.pcm: Also, civil servant, wey dey collect N150,000 per month, but get pikin for UK school, and property for all ova di major cities of di kontri, go abuse Nigeria and carry all im hypocrisy put for lamentation and insult to di state.

translation.en: He ignores conveniently his complicity in the corruption ravaging the country.
translation.pcm: E go calm down ignore e own contribution for di corruption wey dey destroy di kontri.

translation.en: In addition, some citizens spurn laws, rules and regulations.
translation.pcm: Also, som citizens dey reject laws, rules and regulations.

translation.en: Where there are traffic lights, they ignore them; where there are procedures, they bypass them, and where there are standards put in place for effective service delivery and operations, they abandon them.
translation.pcm: Wia traffic light dey, dem go ignore am; wia protocol dey, dem go bypass am, and for places wia dem don get standard for gud service delivery and operations, dem go abandon am.

translation.en: Yet, they all blame â€˜Nigeria for the jeopardous status quo as if the country exists without its people.
translation.pcm: Still, all of dem go blame Nigeria for di bad status quo as if say di kontri dey exist witout di pipo.

translation.en: The problem with Nigeria is a people problem.
translation.pcm: Di problem wey Nigeria get na pipo problem.

translation.en: But the tragedy is that no one wants to accept liability for the appalling state of things.
translation.pcm: But di bad tin be say nobodi wan take responsibility for di terrible way wey tins be.

translation.en: We cast the blame at the feet of abstract Nigeria.
translation.pcm: We dey blame di Nigeria wey no exist.

translation.en: We are all complicit in the degenerative emasculation of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Na all of us get hand for inside di bad situation of Nigeria.

translation.en: Instead of abiding in wilful fatalism about Nigeria, we should project goodness and positivity into the system while working at making our country what we want it to be.
translation.pcm: Instead make we dey follow di tin wey we don conclude about Nigeria, make we forsee goodness and positivity into di system, and make we dey work to make awa kontri di tin wey we want make e be.

translation.en: Nigeria is what we make of it.
translation.pcm: Nigeria go be wetin we want make e be.
