translation.pcm: Di best tin wey dem fit do na to negotiate for governor wey go serve di interest of a godfather or cabal.

translation.en: Therefore, the two parties are not the best options.
translation.pcm: So, di two parties no be di best option.

translation.en: A very good person could emerge using his resources or with the help of other well-meaning patriotic people.
translation.pcm: Beta pesin fit kom outside on e own, or wit di help of oda beta patriotic pipo.

translation.en: He could win through any efforts including negotiating with even any of the two parties or another party.
translation.pcm: E fit use any way win, even if e negotiate wit any of di two parties or anoda party sef.

translation.en: This is a possibility.
translation.pcm: E dey possible

translation.en: It has happened before.
translation.pcm: E  don happun befor.

translation.en: An example, in the neighbouring Kaduna State, is Nasir Elrufai.
translation.pcm: One example wey dey near us na Nasir Elrufai for Kaduna State.

translation.en: He is one of the best in his generation but security in the state is beyond him because he depends on his personal intelligence and capacity.
translation.pcm: Im be one of di best for im generation, but di security situation for di state don pass im power, sake of say e dey depend on im personal intelligence and capacity.

translation.en: A better person than him in Kano will not make it the desired place unless certain fundamentals are changed.
translation.pcm: Pesin wey beta pass am for Kano no go make di place beta unless dem change som important tins.

translation.en: I do not claim to have all the answers or even to be exclusively original in the ideas below.
translation.pcm: I no claim say I get all di answer or even say na me get all di idea wey dey down.

translation.en: Some of them are even modifications of Aminu Kanos ideas.
translation.pcm: Som of dem na part of Aminu Kano idea.

translation.en: There are many better ideas in the minds of more intelligent people.
translation.pcm: Plenti beta idea dey for di mind of more intelligent pipo.

translation.en: The ideas I am suggesting are based on my little experience as a labourer of politicians and some training outside this country.
translation.pcm: Di idea wey I dey suggest na base on my small experience as labourer of politicians and som trainin wey I get outside dis kontri.

translation.en: Kano is on the crossroad, therefore, these ideas could be useful.
translation.pcm: Right now, Kano dey crossroad, and dis ideas fit dey useful.

translation.en: Some people need to come together and organise a political movement not owned by any individual but people willing to sacrifice.
translation.pcm: Som pipo need kom togeda to organise one political movement wey no dey in kontrol of anybodi but pipo wey wan sacrifice.

translation.en: It should kindly consider the suggestions below:
translation.pcm: Make dem look di suggestion below:

translation.en: There is a need to initiate political organisation at the lowest level and making the members own it.
translation.pcm: Need dey for us to start political organisation at di lowest level and make sure say na di members dey in kontrol.

translation.en: No material reward but sacrifice.
translation.pcm: Material reward no go dey, but sacrifice.

translation.en: This is possible with mobilisation and the right messages.
translation.pcm: Dis dey possible wit mobilisation and di right message.

translation.en: Before the election, the movement or party must take a comprehensive inventory of the state and design a comprehensive action plan with specific measurable targets.
translation.pcm: Befor di election, di movement or party need take detail inventory of di state and design comprehensive action plan wit specific targets wey dey measurable .

translation.en: There should be operational guidelines for all appointees including the governor, which must be popularised for every citizen to know and challenge if breeched.
translation.pcm: Operational guidelines go dey for all appointees plus di governor, and dem go need announce am so every citizen go fit know and challenge, if dem no follow am.

translation.en: No one who seeks any position should be given such a position in the movement or party from the lowest level to the highest.
translation.pcm: Anybodi wey dey find position inside di movement or party, go begin from di lowest level to di highest.

translation.en: Some will argue this kills ambition.
translation.pcm: Som pipo go argue say dis strategy go kill ambition.

translation.en: What is needed now is not ambition but a sustainable system owned by the people.
translation.pcm: Wetin we need now no be ambition but sustainable system wey dey in kontrol of di pipo.

translation.en: Similarly, no one should be given any position until he fulfils certain basic conditions of competence and honesty as well as bringing references and guarantors.
translation.pcm: Also, make dem no give anybodi any position unless e don fulfil som basic condition of competence and honesty, and e go bring reference and guarantor.

translation.en: All public officials must publicly declare their assets and those of their family members on the assumption of office, which must be verified by forensic experts.
translation.pcm: All public officers must declare dia asset publicly, and dia family members own join, immediately dem reach office. And forensic experts go need verify everytin .

translation.en: Their salaries, expenses (including travels, entertainment etc) must be made public periodically.
translation.pcm: From time to time, di public need dey know dia salary and expenses (plus travel, entertainment etc).

translation.en: No one who becomes a governor or attains any position should ever be allowed to act unilaterally.
translation.pcm: Anybodi wey becom governor or reach any position no go ever do tins on e own.

translation.en: The governor must never be allowed
translation.pcm: Di governor no go ever

translation.en: To make appointments unilaterally.
translation.pcm: Make appointment alone.

translation.en: There must be criteria, expectations or set targets for such appointments for periodic assessments and evaluations;
translation.pcm: Criteria, go dey, dem go need set expectation or target for dose kind appointment, and dem go need dey assess and evaluate am from time to time.

translation.en: All contracts must be transparently awarded after evaluation by experts from within and outside the bureaucracy.
translation.pcm: All contract wey dem go award go dey fair and transparent, and expert inside and outside di government bureaucracy must evaluate am.

translation.en: Allocations of plots must also be transparent.
translation.pcm: Allocation of plots must dey transparent too.

translation.en: No governor should be allowed to have absolute control of the treasury and it should be administered by competent staff.
translation.pcm: No governor go get total kontrol of di treasury and na competent staff go dey in charge .

translation.en: The governor should only be seen as the leader who guides institutions to develop and end one-man rule.
translation.pcm: Di governor go be di leader wey go guide all di institution to develop and end one-man rule.

translation.en: If the governor is liberated from this prison of power, he will lead the state to greatness.
translation.pcm: If di governor dey free from dis prison of power, e go lead di state to greatness.

translation.en: He will lead by example and corruption will be minimised because the avenues of abuse of power have been blocked.
translation.pcm: E go lead by example and corruption go reduce becos dem don block all di way wey e fit use abuse power.

translation.en: A governor should be seen to supervise public servants and ensure everyone performs his duties diligently.
translation.pcm: Governor suppose dey to supervise public servants and make sure say everybodi do im duty well.

translation.en: He should inspire his people with exemplary lifestyles, commitment to service and transparency.
translation.pcm: E suppose inspire im pipo wit good lifestyle, commitment to service and transparency.

translation.en: Niger republic, 6 other countries lose right to vote in UNGA -Guterres
translation.pcm: Niger republic and 6 oda kontries don lose di right to vote for UNGA -Guterres

translation.en: Niger and six other nations lost their right to vote in the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA) because they have not paid their dues, UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres has said.
translation.pcm: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres don tok say Niger and six oda nations don lose dia right to vote for di United Nations General Assembly (UNGA), sake of say dem neva pay dia dues.

translation.en: The other countries losing their UNGA voting rights are Iran, Libya, the Central African Republic, Congo Brazzaville, South Sudan and Zimbabwe, the Jerusalem Post reported on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Di oda kontris wey lose dia UNGA votin right na; Iran, Libya, di Central African Republic, Congo Brazzaville, South Sudan and Zimbabwe, di Jerusalem Post report on Tuesday.

translation.en: Three more countries  Comoros, Sao Tome and Principe and Somalia  will be allowed to continue to vote despite missing dues payments, because they sufficiently demonstrated that they are incapable of paying.
translation.pcm: Three more kontris “ Comoros, Sao Tome and Principe and Somalia “ go get di chance to kontinue to vote, even say dem no pay dia dues too, but sake of say dem show say dem no get di capacity to pay.

translation.en: Guterres wrote a letter to General Assembly President Volkan Bozkir of Turkey that the countries in arrears to the UN will have their UNGA voting rights suspended in accordance with the UN Charter.
translation.pcm: Guterres write letter give di General Assembly President, Volkan Bozkir of Turkey say dem go suspend di UNGA votin right of kontris wey dey owe di UN, accordin to di UN Charter.

translation.en: The Charter stipulates the suspension of voting rights if a member state fails to pay its fees for more than two years, the report said.
translation.pcm: Di Charter tok say make dem suspend di votin right, if one member state no pay im fees for more dan two years.

translation.en: Under the article, a member-state in arrears in the payment of its dues in an amount that equals or exceeds the contributions of two preceding years can lose its vote in the General Assembly.
translation.pcm: Inside di article, a member-state wey owe dues wey dey equal or pass di amount of im contribution for two years fit lose im vote for di General Assembly.

translation.en: Iran owes 16.2 million dollars, more than any other country.
translation.pcm: Iran dey owe 16.2 million dollars, money wey pass any oda kontri own.

translation.en: Meanwhile, Iran has blamed U.S. sanctions for blocking the Islamic Republic from paying its required contribution to the UN, the newspaper reported.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, Iran don blame U.S, say na dia sanctions no make di Islamic Republic pay im contribution to di UN.

translation.en: Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Saeed Khatibzadeh said the funds designated for UN payments are frozen in two South Korean banks, due to the U.S. sanctions.
translation.pcm: Iran Foreign Ministry tok-tok pesin, Saeed Khatibzadeh yarn say di money wey dem wan use pay UN dey frozen for two South Korean banks, sake of U.S. sanctions.

translation.en: He said the Islamic Republic has a total of USD 7 billion in those banks, the report said.
translation.pcm: E tok say di Islamic Republic get a total of USD 7 billion for dose banks, di report tok.

translation.en: Khatibzadeh demanded that the UN guarantee the payments are safely transferred without using U.S. banks.
translation.pcm: Khatibzadeh tok say make di UN guarantee dem say dem go transfer di payments successfully witout using U.S. banks.

translation.en: Given that the United States has encroached upon Irans international assets before, the Islamic Republic of Iran insists that the UN not use an American intermediary bank to receive our countrys membership fee.
translation.pcm: Sake of say di United States don seize Iran international asset befor, di Islamic Republic of Iran don insist say make di UN no use any American bank receive awa kontri membership fee.

translation.en: Alternatively, this organization guarantee the financial transfer channel, Iran International News quoted Khatibzadeh as saying.
translation.pcm: As an alternative, dis organization dey guarantee di financial transfer channel, Iran International News quote Khatibzadeh.

translation.en: BREAKING: Paris Saint-Germain win French Cup
translation.pcm: BREAKING: Paris Saint-Germain win French Cup

translation.en: Paris Saint-Germain have won the French Cup by beating Monaco 2-0 in Wednesdays
translation.pcm: Paris Saint-Germain don win di French Cup as dem beat Monaco 2-0 for Wednesday

translation.en: final at the Stade de France.
translation.pcm: final wey dem play for di Stade de France.

translation.en: Goals from Mauro Icardi and Kylian Mbappe won a largely uninspiring final for PSG who now go into the weekends final round of Ligue 1 fixtures with a record-equalling 10th league title still a possibility.
translation.pcm: Goal wey Mauro Icardi and Kylian Mbappe score won a largely uninspiring final for PSG who now go into the weekends final round of Ligue 1 fixtures with a record-equalling 10th league title still a possibility.

translation.en: The French champions have now won the French Cup six times in the last seven seasons having reached the final every year since 2015.
translation.pcm: The French champions have now won the French Cup six times in the last seven seasons having reached the final every year since 2015.

translation.en: It was also the second trophy of coach Mauricio Pochettinos managerial career after he won the Champions Trophy for PSG in January, although this will for many count as his first major honour.
translation.pcm: It was also the second trophy of coach Mauricio Pochettinos managerial career after he won the Champions Trophy for PSG in January, although this will for many count as his first major honour.

translation.en: We work every day to experience this kind of feeling, reward and recognition, said Mbappe.
translation.pcm: We work every day to experience this kind of feeling, reward and recognition, said Mbappe.

translation.en: Its the work of a whole group, staff, all the people who work every day for us, the club and of course the supporters who couldnt be there.
translation.pcm: Its the work of a whole group, staff, all the people who work every day for us, the club and of course the supporters who couldnt be there.

translation.en: We think a lot about the fans and this title is for them as well.
translation.pcm: We think a lot about the fans and this title is for them as well.

translation.en: Monaco meanwhile continue their wait to win the French Cup for the first time since 1991, in their first final since 2010 when they were also beaten by PSG.
translation.pcm: Monaco meanwhile continue their wait to win the French Cup for the first time since 1991, in their first final since 2010 when they were also beaten by PSG.

translation.en: Niko Kovacs side have however had a positive season and can finish it on a happier note at the weekend by qualifying for the Champions League for the first time since 2018.
translation.pcm: Niko Kovacs side have however had a positive season and can finish it on a happier note at the weekend by qualifying for the Champions League for the first time since 2018.

translation.en: Maiden Davnotch Tennis Championship attracts 300 players
translation.pcm: Maiden Davnotch Tennis Championship attract 300 players

translation.en: No fewer than 300 players are expected to participate in the maiden Davnotch National Open Tennis Championship coming up between May 14 and 22 at tennis courts of the Moshood Abiola National Stadium, Abuja.
translation.pcm: At least 300 players go participate for di maiden Davnotch National Open Tennis Championship wey go kom up between May 14 and 22 for di tennis court of Moshood Abiola National Stadium wey dey Abuja.

translation.en: Ifedayo Akindoju, Chairman Caretaker Committee of the Nigeria Tennis Federation (NTF) said this in Abuja on Monday while briefing newsmen on preparations for the championship.
translation.pcm: Ifedayo Akindoju, Chairman Caretaker Committee of di Nigeria Tennis Federation (NTF) yarn dis for Abuja on Monday wen e dey follow tori-men tok on di preparations for di championship.

translation.en: He said about a N3.5million would be raked at the end of the championship as prize by the winners of the various categories.
translation.pcm: E tok say about N3.5million na im be di prize wey winners of different category go win for di end of di championship.

translation.en: Akindoju also said that the championship would serve as the federations hunting ground for talents for the national team ahead of several international competitions lined up for the federation this year.
translation.pcm: Akindoju also tok say di championship go serve as di huntin ground for talent wey go dey di national team, to prepare for di plenti international competition wey dey for di federation dis year.

translation.en: I can tell you the winner of the mens singles and the ladies singles will go home with N500,000 and for the Wheelchair event (male and female), it is N150, 000 each.
translation.pcm: I fit tell you say di winner of di mens singles and di ladies singles go carry N500,000 go house, and for di Wheelchair event (male and female), na N150, 000 each.

translation.en: Wheelchair event is not actually an open event, and as such it is for the top 16 athletes in the ladder.
translation.pcm: Di Wheelchair event no be open event, so na for di top 16 athletes wey dey di ladder.

translation.en: Recently in Lagos, we had a ladder tournament on wheelchair alone, so we have the latest rankings of all wheelchair players in Nigeria, and because it is closed, we have top 16 in men and top 16 in women to compete in this event.
translation.pcm: Recently for Lagos, we host ladder tournament for wheelchair only, so we get di latest ranking of all wheelchair players for Nigeria, and becos say e don end, we get top 16 for men and top 16 for women wey go compete for dis event.

translation.en: We equally have the doubles event for the men; the winner will take home N100,000 and this will be the same for the ladies, Akindoju said.
translation.pcm: We get di doubles event for di men too; di winner go carry N100,000 go house and dis go be di same tin for di ladies too, Akindoju tok.

translation.en: According to him, the championship is open for athletes who are 14 years and above.
translation.pcm: As e yarn, di championship dey open for athletes wey be 14 years and above.

translation.en: Also speaking, Emmanuel Ochei, a representative of Davnotch Nigeria Ltd, said the company was sponsoring the championship as part of its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and that it would not relent in lending support for sports development.
translation.pcm: Also speakin, Emmanuel Ochei, wey be representative of Davnotch Nigeria Ltd, tok say di company go sponsor di championship as part of im Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and say e no go stop to dey give support for di development of sports.

translation.en: The Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) has revealed that it is currently considering equity participation in a number of private refineries in the country.
translation.pcm: Di Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation (NNPC) don yarn say e dey consider equity participation for som private refineries wey dey di kontri.

translation.en: The NNPC in a statement Monday night said the move is in line with a Federal Governments policy directive, which stipulates the mandatory participation of the Corporation in any privately-owned refinery that exceeds 50,000 barrels per day capacity in keeping with its statutory role of safeguarding national energy security.
translation.pcm: Di NNPC tok am for one statement on Monday night say di move dey in line wit one Federal Government policy directive, wey tok say di compulsory participation of di Corporation for any privately-owned refinery wey don pass 50,000 barrel per day capacity to keep wit e statutory role of safeguardin national energy security.

translation.en: In this regard, the Corporation has identified at least six refinery projects in which it intends to seek equity participation, five of them are at the development stage with the Dangote Refinery being the largest of them, the statement said.
translation.pcm: Ontop dis one, di Corporation don identify at least six refinery projects wey e won get equity participation. Five of dem dey di development stage, and na Dangote Refinery be di biggest. Di statement yarn.

translation.en: The statement by the Corporations spokesperson, Dr Kennie Obateru, explained that NNPCs National Oil Company of Nigeria primarily has a dual role of providing stewardship for the nations hydrocarbon resources and adding value to the resources for the benefit of all Nigerians and other stakeholders.
translation.pcm: Di statement by di tok-tok pesin of di Corporation, Dr Kennie Obateru, explain say NNPC National Oil Company of Nigeria get double role; to manage di nation hydrocarbon resources, and to add value to di resources for di benefit of all Nigerians and oda stakeholders.

translation.en: These roles enable it to achieve the twin objectives of providing energy security for the country and stimulating the nations economic development and growth, Obateru said.
translation.pcm: Dis function dey make am achieve di double objective of providin energy security for di kontri and to stimulate di nation economic development and growth. Obateru yarn.

translation.en: He said that NNPCs strategic objective to ensure energy security and stimulate economic growth with limited resources requires it to consider strategic partnerships with competent investors in sectors of the oil and gas value chain especially where it currently operates on a sole risk basis.
translation.pcm: E tok say NNPC strategic objective to ensure energy security and stimulate economic growth wit limited resources require say make e consider strategic partnership wit competent investors for sectors of di oil and gas value chain especially wia e currently dey operate on sole risk basis.

translation.en: The oil refining sector is one of such segments where NNPC is revisiting its strategy in order to strengthen domestic refining capacity and guarantee National Energy Security, he added.
translation.pcm: E add am join say; Di oil refinin sector na one of dose segment wia NNPC dey revisit e strategy, so e go fit strengthen domestic refinin capacity and also guarantee National Energy Security.

translation.en: He said the new vision is to grow domestic refining capacity, improve petroleum products supply from our local refineries and become a net exporter of petroleum products.
translation.pcm: E tok am say di new vision na to develop domestic refinin capacity, improve petroleum products supply from awa local refineries and to becom a net exporter of petroleum products.

translation.en: The Corporation assured that the move to seek equity participation in the private refineries would not undercut its commitment to the rehabilitation of its own refineries and strengthen the domestic refining sector.
translation.pcm: Di Corporation assure say di move to get equity participation for di private refineries no go reduce di commitment to revive e own refineries and strengthen di domestic refinin sector.

translation.en: Obateru stressed that the overall goal is to boost the nations refining capacity with a view to becoming a net exporter of petroleum products in the soonest possible time and boosting the nations economy.
translation.pcm: Obateru emphasise am say di main goal na to boost di nation refinin capacity to become a net exporter of petroleum products in di closest possible time and to also boost di nation economy.

translation.en: Amaechi, Lai Mohammed inspect Lagos-Ibadan rail project ahead of commissioning
translation.pcm: Amaechi, Lai Mohammed inspect Lagos-Ibadan rail project in preparation for commissionin.

translation.en: Minister of Transportation, Mr Rotimi Amaechi and his Information and Culture counterpart,
translation.pcm: Di Minista of Transportation, Mr Rotimi Amaechi and im Information and Culture colleague,

translation.en: Alhaji Lai Mohammed are inspecting the Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge project ahead of the commissioning by President Muhammadu Buhari.
translation.pcm: Alhaji Lai Mohammed dey inspect di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge project in preparation for di commissionin by President Muhammadu Buhari.

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that though no specific date has been fixed for the commissioning, it has been slated for June.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust report say; even say dem neva fix one particular date for di commissionin, dem don plan am to happun for June.

translation.en: Our correspondent gathered that the $1.7bn project with extension to the Lagos Ports in Apapa might be commissioned on or before June 12 to commemorate Democracy Day.
translation.pcm: Awa tori-pesin hear say dem fit commission di $1.7bn project wey extend reach di Lagos Ports for Apapa on or befor June 12 to celebrate Democracy Day.

translation.en: This was why the Ministers are conducting another inspection to ensure that all the finishing touches on the project were fully carried out.
translation.pcm: Na why di Ministas dey do anoda inspection to make sure say dem do all di finishin touches wey di project need.

translation.en: Daily Trust had earlier reported how the China Civil Engineering and Construction Corporation (CCECC), the contractor handling the project, has been pressured to deliver all the 10 stations ahead of the commissioning.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust don tok am befor, how dem don pressure di China Civil Engineering and Construction Corporation (CCECC), di contractor wey dey handle di project, say make dem deliver all di 10 stations before di commissionin.

translation.en: The stations are Ebute-Metta, Apapa, Agege, Agbado, Kajola, Papalanto, Abeokuta, Omi Adio, Olodo and Moniya.
translation.pcm: Di stations na Ebute-Metta, Apapa, Agege, Agbado, Kajola, Papalanto, Abeokuta, Omi Adio, Olodo and Moniya.

translation.en: Most of the stations have reached almost 90 to 100 percent completion stage while only finishing touches were being done.
translation.pcm: Most of di station don almost reach 90 to 100 percent completion stage, and na only finishin touches dem dey do.

translation.en: The Ministers, as well as the Permanent Secretary in the Ministry of Transport, Dr Magdalene Ajani, Managing Director of the Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC), Engr Fidet Okhiria and other officials of the Ministry, started the inspection from the Mobolaji Johnson Station (Ebute-Metta) before heading to the Bola Tinubu Station (Apapa).
translation.pcm: Di Ministas, plus di Permanent Secretary of di Ministri of Transport, Dr Magdalene Ajani, Managing Director of di Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC), Engr Fidet Okhiria and oda officials of di Ministry, begin di inspection from di Mobolaji Johnson Station (Ebute-Metta) befor dem move to di Bola Tinubu Station for Apapa.

translation.en: The Ebute-Metta Station is the biggest station in the train corridor.
translation.pcm: Di Ebute-Metta Station na di biggest station for di train corridor.

translation.en: The Ministerial team inspected all the convenience facilities, the operational rooms, the nursing room, the waiting areas, among others.
translation.pcm: Di Ministerial team inspect all di convenience facilities, di operational rooms, di nursin room, di waitin areas, and odas.

translation.en: Zimbabwe loses 2 more ministers to COVID-19
translation.pcm: Zimbabwe don lose 2 more ministas to COVID-19

translation.en: Two ministers serving in the Zimbabwean government died of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) within a matter of days, prompting the country to announce on Saturday plans to further tighten lockdown measures.
translation.pcm: Two ministas wey dey serve for di Zimbabwean government don die of di Coronavirus (COVID-19) within few days, and dis don make di kontri announce on Saturday, dia plan to tighten lockdown measures.

translation.en: Late on Friday, the government announced that Transport Minister, Joel Matiza, had died after falling ill with COVID-19, less than two days after the country lost Foreign minister Sibusiso Moyo to the same disease.
translation.pcm: Late on Friday, di government announce say Transport Minista, Joel Matiza, don die had afta e fall sick wit COVID-19. Dis na less dan two days afta di kontri lose Foreign minista Sibusiso Moyo to di same disease.

translation.en: Four government ministers have succumbed to the coronavirus in Zimbabwe so far.
translation.pcm: Four government ministas don die for Zimbabwe becos of di coronavirus.

translation.en: According to unconfirmed media reports, several other cabinet ministers are fighting for their lives in a private hospital.
translation.pcm: Accordin to som report from di media, plenti oda cabinet ministas dey fight for dia lives for different private hospital.

translation.en: We are in a dark cloud that we have to clear very soon, deputy health minister John Mangwiro told dpa.
translation.pcm: We dey inside dark cloud wey we need clear veri soon, deputy health minista John Mangwiro tell dpa.

translation.en: Mangwiro revealed plans to intensify the current lockdown, which has been in place since early January and includes a strict nightly curfew.
translation.pcm: Mangwiro tok dia plans to intensify di current lockdown  and compulsory night curfew, wey don dey since early January.

translation.en: Restaurants, bars and gyms have also been forced to close.
translation.pcm: Dem don force Restaurants, bars and gyms say make dem close.

translation.en: We have seen people not adhering to the lockdown regulations announced early this month, he added.
translation.pcm: E add am say; We don see pipo wey no dey obey di lockdown regulations wey dem announce early dis month.

translation.en: Zimbabwe has registered 30,523 cases of infection since the start of the pandemic, including 962 deaths.
translation.pcm: Zimbabwe don register 30,523 case of infection plus 962 deaths since wey di pandemic start.

translation.en: The numbers may seem relatively low compared to other countries.
translation.pcm: Di numbers fit dey low if u compare am to oda kontri.

translation.en: However, the outbreak is putting the nations health system under considerable pressure.
translation.pcm: But, di outbreak dey put di nation health system under big pressure.

translation.en: Zimbabweans have taken to the social media to blame President Emmerson Mnangagwa and his predecessor, the late Robert Mugabe, for the countrys dilapidated health infrastructure.
translation.pcm: Zimbabweans don blame President Emmerson Mnangagwa and im predecessor, di late Robert Mugabe, for social media, untop di kontri bad health infrastructure.

translation.en: Health workers recently went on strike over a lack of protective equipment and poor salaries.
translation.pcm: Health workers go on strike recently untop di lack of protective equipment and poor salary.

translation.en: How Kadunas N2tr economy struggles with shutdown
translation.pcm: How Kaduna N2tr economy dey struggle wit shutdown

translation.en: Kaduna state, especially its metropolis witnessed what was described as a major shutdown on Monday as the Nigerian Labour Congress (NLC) protested the mass sack of workers by the state government.
translation.pcm: Kaduna state, especially di city witness wetin we fit call major shutdown on Monday wen di Nigerian Labour Congress (NLC) protest di mass sack of workers by di state government.

translation.en: There are fears that the shutdown which affected the transport, finance and power sectors could affect the robust economy of the state believed to be among the top performers in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Pipo get fear say di shutdown wey affect di transport, finance and power sector fit affect di robust economy of di state, wey we feel say e dey part of di top performers for Nigeria.

translation.en: According to a statistics report by the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) released in 2019, as of 2017, Kaduna has a nominal Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of N2.69 trillion and ranked as the 10th largest economy in Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Accordin to one statistics report by di National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) wey dem release for 2019, as of 2017, Kaduna get nominal Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of N2.69 trillion and dem rank am as di 10th largest economy for Nigeria.

translation.en: Services and agriculture dominated the GDP by N1.37tr.
translation.pcm: Services and agriculture na im dominate di GDP by N1.37tr.

translation.en: However, these services were worst affected by the mass shutdown yesterday which became widespread since Sunday.
translation.pcm: Howeva, dis services dey affected by di mass shutdown wey happun yesterday, and dem don dey announce am since Sunday.

translation.en: According to a 2020 report by the Oxford Business Group, since 2015, the state has attracted investments in excess of $800 million.
translation.pcm: Accordin to one report by di Oxford Business Group for 2020 , na since 2015 di state don get investment, in excess of $800 million.

translation.en: At the moment, companies have committed to investing about $2.1 billion over the next two years.
translation.pcm: Presently, companies don plan to invest about $2.1 billion ova di next two years.

translation.en: In terms of IGR, the Oxford Business Group report quoted Governor Nasir el-Rufai as saying the state doubled its IGR from N13bn in 2015 to N26bn in 2017.
translation.pcm: For IGR, di Oxford Business Group report quote wetin Governor Nasir el-Rufai tok say di state double im IGR from N13bn for 2015 to N26bn for 2017.

translation.en: It further rose to N44bn in taxes in 2019 after the tax process became simplified through legislation.
translation.pcm: E still increase to N44bn wit tax, for 2019 afta dem make di tax process simplethroughlegislation.

translation.en: Daily Trust further learnt that some of the industries outside the city centre were not affected.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust hear say som of di industry wey dey outside di city centre no dey affected.

translation.en: Olam Farms located on the outskirt of the Kaduna  Abuja road was not affected as its staff members were in the office yesterday after the Sallah break
translation.pcm: Olam Farms wey dey for di outskirt of Kaduna-Abuja road no dey affected becos im staff members dey office yestaday afta di Sallah break

translation.en: We are aware of the situation
translation.pcm: We know about di situation

translation.en: but you know we are not really in the city centre
translation.pcm: but u know say we no really dey di city centre

translation.en: , so I dont think we need to bother ourselves at least for now, said a senior official.
translation.pcm: so I no tink say we need boda awasef for now. One senior official tok.

translation.en: Billions lost already
translation.pcm: Dem don lose Billions already.

translation.en: Meanwhile, experts said billions of naira would have been lost to the grounding of businesses in the state.
translation.pcm: Meanwhile, experts tok am say na billions of naira dem go don lose untop di groundin of businesses for di state.

translation.en: An ex banker and economist said the strike would have been avoided if the state governor had negotiated with the unions.
translation.pcm: One former banker and economist tok say dem for don avoid di strike if di state governor don negotiate wit di union.

translation.en: Goods are transported to the north through Kaduna and from the north through Kaduna to other parts of Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Na Kaduna Goods wey dey go north dey pass, and from di north, e go pass Kaduna go oda part of Nigeria.

translation.en: Imagine the losses because of the power outage, the logistics, transportation and others.
translation.pcm: Imagine di loss wey happun becos of di power outage, di logistics, transportation and odas.

translation.en: It runs into billions imagine the hospitals, hotels, transportation, micro businesses that have shut down.
translation.pcm: Na billions e go be. Imagine di hospitals, hotels, transportation, small businesses wey shut down.

translation.en: The economy is crippled.
translation.pcm: Di economy don crash.

translation.en: It will further increase the very bad security situation.
translation.pcm: E go increase di veri bad security situation more.

translation.en: John Okon, another analyst said over N50 million may have been lost in the two days so far especially as power outages persisted and fuel stations were shutting down.
translation.pcm: John Okon, wey be anoda analyst yarn say na more dan N50 million dem go don lose for di two days, especially as light no dey, and fuel stations don shut down.

translation.en: By Chris Agabi, Simon Echewofun Sunday & Hussein Yahaya
translation.pcm: By Chris Agabi, Simon Echewofun Sunday & Hussein Yahaya

translation.en: Arteta must deliver next season
translation.pcm: Arteta must deliver next season

translation.en: As I have already mentioned, Arsenal do not intend to sack Mikel Arteta and the club management will back him to turn the Gunners around next season.
translation.pcm: As I don mention befor, Arsenal no get am for mind to sack Mikel Arteta and di club management go back am to turn di Gunners around next season.

translation.en: No one can say for certain if Arsenal have made the right decision but the club intends to bring in more talented players this summer.
translation.pcm: Nobodi dey sure if Arsenal don take di right decision, but di club dey plan bring more talented players dis summer.

translation.en: Serious questions are being asked about the managers ability and even in his own dressing room players are looking at him and wondering if he is the right man for the job.
translation.pcm: Pipo dey ask serious questions about di manager ability, and even e own dressin room players dey look am dey wonder if na im be di right man for di job.

translation.en: At 39 years-of-age Arteta has a reputation, built alongside Pep Guardiola, as a brilliant coach.
translation.pcm: For 39 years, Arteta get reputation, wey e build wit Pep Guardiola, as a brilliant coach.

translation.en: However, after seventeen months in charge the fortunes of Arsenal have not progressed and many would argue that the team performances are inferior to those of Unai Emery, the man he replaced and who knocked him out of the Europa League.
translation.pcm: But, afta seventeen months wey e don dey in charge, di fortune of Arsenal neva improve and plenti pipo go argue say di performance of di team dey low pass wen Unai Emery, di man wey e replace, wey knock am out of Europa League dey dia.

translation.en: Arteta captained Arsenal and was welcomed by the fans as their new champion but they are getting restless and agitated as they watch Chelsea and Tottenham move further ahead.
translation.pcm: Arteta na captain for Arsenal befor and di fans welcome am as dia new champion. But dem don dey lose patience and dem dey agitated as dem see sayChelsea and Tottenham done move ahead.

translation.en: The Super League disaster will not be forgotten for a long time
translation.pcm: Di Super League disaster  no be sometin wey pipo go forget for a long time

translation.en: but I can tell you that the Kroenke owners are going nowhere
translation.pcm: but I fit tell u say di Kroenke owners no dey go anywia.

translation.en: so it is up to Arteta to mend bridges, build a strong team and get his tactics right next season otherwise the proud Gunners could well crash and burn.
translation.pcm: So, e dey Arteta hand to improve tins, build strong team and get im tactics right next season, if not di proud Gunners fit crash and burn.

translation.en: De Gea wont accept being No2
translation.pcm: De Gea no go gree to be No 2

translation.en: Despite Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea having a contract until 2023 his agents are testing the waters to see which clubs would be interested in signing him.
translation.pcm: Even say Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea get im contract till 2023, im agent dey test microphone, to see di club wey go wan sign am.

translation.en: I am hearing from inside Old Trafford that despite being on good terms with current No1 Dean Henderson, De Gea will not sit back and accept a role on the bench for much longer.
translation.pcm: I dey hear for inside Old Trafford say even say e get gud parole wit di current No 1 Dean Henderson, De Gea no go siddun take bench for long.

translation.en: I am picking up interest from Atletico Madrid, Paris Saint Germain and Real Madrid.
translation.pcm: I dey hear say Atletico Madrid, Paris Saint Germain and Real Madrid get interest.

translation.en: The 30-year-old is arguably at the peak of his career although some inside the club believe he has declined slightly over the past two years.
translation.pcm: We no go deny say di 30-year-old dey on top of im career, even say som pipo for inside di club believe say e don drop small for di past two years.

translation.en: Manager Solskjaer said, Goalkeeper departments are a very tight knit group.
translation.pcm: Manager Solskjaer tok say, Goalkeeper departments dey veri tight knit group.

translation.en: They work in preparation, they have different gym sessions, individual sessions to the rest of the squad and they stay together more.
translation.pcm: Dem dey work for preparation, dem get different gym session, personal session to di rest of di squad and dem dey stay togeda more.

translation.en: Naturally they create a bond and the spirit in the goalkeeping department has been top.
translation.pcm: Naturally dem dey create a bond and di spirit for di goalkeepin department dey high.

translation.en: Its a healthy competition.
translation.pcm: Na beta competition.

translation.en: I am sure the coach is right however if De Gea doesnt regain recognition for the No1 stitched onto the back of his shirt and is left on the bench in crucial games, I am reliably informed he will move out of Old Trafford.
translation.pcm: I am sure the coach is right however if De Gea doesnt regain recognition for the No1 stitched onto the back of his shirt and is left on the bench in crucial games, I am reliably informed he will move out of Old Trafford.

translation.en: I take West Brom to bounce back yet again
translation.pcm: I take West Brom to bounce back yet again

translation.en: After one season back in the Premier League we again say goodbye to West Bromwich Albion.
translation.pcm: After one season back in the Premier League we again say goodbye to West Bromwich Albion.

translation.en: The key to yet another quick bounce back from the Championship will be whether or not fire-fighting manager Sam Allardyce can be persuaded to stay.
translation.pcm: The key to yet another quick bounce back from the Championship will be whether or not fire-fighting manager Sam Allardyce can be persuaded to stay.

translation.en: He is disappointed to have lost his reputation as never having been relegated with any club and the board at West Brom have a lot of work to do if they want to keep him.
translation.pcm: He is disappointed to have lost his reputation as never having been relegated with any club and the board at West Brom have a lot of work to do if they want to keep him.

translation.en: Ainsley Maitland-Niles, Conor Gallagher and Okay Yokuslu will return to their parent clubs after being on loan but Matheus Pereira, Callum Robinson, Hal Robson-Kanu and Karlan Grant can impress in the lower league.
translation.pcm: Ainsley Maitland-Niles, Conor Gallagher and Okay Yokuslu will return to their parent clubs after being on loan but Matheus Pereira, Callum Robinson, Hal Robson-Kanu and Karlan Grant can impress in the lower league.

translation.pcm: Who is the fastest player in the Manchester City squad?

translation.en: No, it isnt Raheem Sterling.
translation.pcm: No, it isnt Raheem Sterling.

translation.en: Manager Pep Guardiola set up a practice whereby each player had to control the ball and sprint 10 yards.
translation.pcm: Manager Pep Guardiola set up a practice whereby each player had to control the ball and sprint 10 yards.

translation.en: There are some very fast movers in the City squad but Gabriel Jesus proved he was the fastest.
translation.pcm: There are some very fast movers in the City squad but Gabriel Jesus proved he was the fastest.

translation.en: The best is yet to come from Havertz
translation.pcm: The best is yet to come from Havertz

translation.en: Thomas Tuchel has been singing the praises of Kai Havertz and pointed to his two goals recently scored against Fulham.
translation.pcm: Thomas Tuchel has been singing the praises of Kai Havertz and pointed to his two goals recently scored against Fulham.

translation.en: Tuchel recognises that since Kai arrived at Stamford Bridge from Bayer Leverkusen, things have not gone well for the German.
translation.pcm: Tuchel recognises that since Kai arrived at Stamford Bridge from Bayer Leverkusen, things have not gone well for the German.

translation.en: Moving from a foreign country and having to handle lockdown restrictions made things difficult and of course he caught Covid-19 and had to battle back to fitness.
translation.pcm: Moving from a foreign country and having to handle lockdown restrictions made things difficult and of course he caught Covid-19 and had to battle back to fitness.

translation.en: The upcoming Champions League final and the next pre-season, Tuchel believes, will show the best of the attacking midfielder and forward.
translation.pcm: Di upcomin Champions League final and di next pre-season, Tuchel believe, say e go show di best attackin midfielder and forward

translation.en: Solskjaer is turning United into winners again
translation.pcm: Solskjaer dey turn United into winners again

translation.en: Manchester United might have big problems with the fans actively showing aggression  towards the owners but inside the club there is a new belief, a new harmony and renewed confidence that they can achieve.
translation.pcm: Manchester United fit get big problem wit dem fan wey dey show active aggression toward di owners but inside di club new belief dey, new harmony and new confidence say dem fit achieve

translation.en: The man responsible is Ole Gunner Solskjaer and after speaking with many United staff and supporters this week, everyone recognises that it is time to praise the manager for achieving so much in the last eighteen months.
translation.pcm: Di man wey dey responsible na Ole Gunner Solskhaer and afta him tok wit many United staff and supporters dis week, evribodi recognise say na time to praise di manager say him achieve plenti for inside eighteen months wey pass

translation.en: Solskjaer paved the way to sign Bruno Fernandes and Edinson Cavani and both have proven to be excellent additions to Uniteds line-up.
translation.pcm: Solskjaer na him pave way give Bruno Fernandes and Edinson Cavani and two of dem don prove say dem be excellent additions for United line up

translation.en: Cavani has confirmed that he is staying for another season and it is mainly his belief in Solskjaer which has persuaded him.
translation.pcm: Cavani don confirm say him dey stay for anoda season and na him belief for Solskjaer persuade am

translation.en: Paul Pogba looks settled and happy and his relationship with the manager is at an all-time high.
translation.pcm: Paul Pogba be like say him settle and dey hapi and him relationship wit di manager dey beta

translation.en: When United fall behind in a matches these days, they get back up, fight and more often than not they win.
translation.pcm: Wen United fall back for match dis days, dem go back up, dem fight and plenti time  na hin dey no win

translation.en: There is one thing to thank out-going Executive Vice-Chairman Ed Woodward for and that is allowing Solskjaer time to succeed in the job, survive the rough patches and turn his players into winners.
translation.pcm: E get one thin, na to thank Executive Vice-Chairman wey dey comot, Ed Woodward for and na bikos na hin dey allow Solskjaer time to succeed hin job, kom survive di rough patch and kom turn hin player to winner

translation.en: Solskjaer is now the most important and the strongest foundation brick of the revitalised United and critics, staff and fans believe this is the beginning of a golden era for the Reds.
translation.pcm: Solskjaer don kom be di important and di strongest foundation brick of di revitalise United and critic, staff and dem fan believe say dis na beginnin of golden era for di Red

translation.pcm: Tell- make dem sign tale

translation.pcm: Kane dey think about if make him comot

translation.en: I noticed a significant silence during the match against Leeds at the weekend.
translation.pcm: I notice significant silence wen dem dey play di match against Leeds for di weekend

translation.en: Harry Kane usually runs as much, if not more, than any other player and constantly barks out orders and instructions to other players to play more effectively.
translation.pcm: Harry Kane wey dey usually run , even if e no plenti, pass oda player and constanly dey give order and instruction to oda players to play well well.

translation.en: Against Leeds he was very quiet and more so than I think I have ever seen him.
translation.pcm: Wen dem play against Leeds him dey very quite and I think say I neva see am like dat before

translation.en: I suspect this is a tell-tale sign that Harry is seriously doubting his tenure at Spurs and is already looking for a way out.
translation.pcm: I dey suspect say dis na tell-tale sign say Harry dey seriously dey doubt hin tenure for Spurs  and hin dey find way to comot

translation.pcm: Wolves dey desperate for striker

translation.en: Nuno Espirito Santos has at last recognised that during the transfer window he must prioritise signing a new striker.
translation.pcm: Nuno Espirito Santos don last recognise say durin di transfer window hin must prioritise na #to sign new striker

translation.en: Winger Pedro Neto and midfielder Ruben Neves are the leading scorers which pinpoints the weakness in Wolves strike force.
translation.pcm: Winger Pedro Neto and midfielder Ruben Neves dem be di leadin scorers wey dey pinpoint di weakness for Wolves strike force

translation.en: Fabio Silva and Raul Jimenez are next on the list however Jimenez has been out of action since November after fracturing his skull.
translation.pcm: Fabio Silver and Raul Jimenez na dem be di next for di list howeva Jimenez don comot  for action since November  afta wey him use fracture hin skull.

translation.en: Wolves have 13 goals less this season than last year.
translation.pcm: Wolves get 13 goals  less for dis season dan last year

translation.en: The Wolves board have promised Nuno money to sign a proven goalscorer.
translation.pcm: Wolves board don promise Nuno say moni to sign goalscorer wey don himsef wella.

translation.en: Jimenez by the way will be told on May 18th if he is medically safe to play in the final two games of this season.
translation.pcm: Dem go tell Jimenez for May 8th say if hin dey medically safe to play for final two games for dis season

translation.en: He has been training for two months but was banned from heading the ball and having physical contact with his teammates.
translation.pcm: Him don dey train for two month but dem ban am to dey head di ball and to dey get physical contact wit hin teammate

translation.en: Sir Alex praises McTominay
translation.pcm: Sir Alex na hin dey tok say him praise McTominay

translation.en: When the great Sir Alex Ferguson speaks about Manchester United he is always worth listening to.
translation.pcm: Wen di great Sir Alex Ferguson dey tok about Manchester United,  hin dey always dey worthy to dey hear

translation.en: His admiration for Scott McTominay is immense and the master says the midfielder should automatically play in every United game.
translation.pcm: Him admiration for Scott McTominay  dey immense and di master tok say di midfielder suppose automatically play for evri United game

translation.en: Scott McTominay is now emerging as one of Uniteds big players,Sir Alex said.
translation.pcm: Scott McTominay don dey emerge as one of United big player na Sir Alex tok ham

translation.en: When you watch United pick their team for an important game, McTominays name is in it.
translation.pcm: If you see say United pick dia team for important game, McTominay name dey always dey part

translation.en: Hes a good character and a great trainer.
translation.pcm: Hin be good character and hin be good great trainer

translation.en: I signed him when he was just a kid of seven or eight years of age
translation.pcm: Na for wen him don be pikin of seven or eight na hin I don sign am

translation.en: and he was actually a centre-forward.
translation.pcm: And him be actual centre forward

translation.en: What higher praise can a player receive.
translation.pcm: wetin be di highest praise wey player fit receive
