translation.pcm: Na three astonish football fact be dat

translation.en: *Manchester United have not lost an away game in the PL for a year and four months!
translation.pcm: Manchester United neva lose any away game for di PL for like one year and four month

translation.en: If they do not win their next game, Sheffield United will become the first team since the 1904-05 season to have gone without winning two consecutive games.
translation.pcm: If they do not win their next game, Sheffield United will become the first team since the 1904-05 season to have gone without winning two consecutive games.

translation.en: A political scientist and public affairs commentator, Prof Jibrin Ibrahim said there appears to be aunity of purpose between the secessionist agitators and political leaders from the region.
translation.pcm: Prof. Jibril Ibrahim wey be political scientist and public affairs tok say unity of purpose between secessionist and political leaders from di region

translation.en: He however predicted the relationship to be short-lived.
translation.pcm: e predict say di relationship go dey short-lived

translation.en: Prof Ibrahim said the proscribed group has, by now,engaged in a total attack against the Nigerian state through years ofeffective pursuance of its agenda.
translation.pcm: Prof Ibrahim tok say di proscribe group has, by now, show in a total attack against di Nigerian state though year of effective pursaunce of em agenda

translation.en: According to him,The major problem is that their elite have kept quiet for too long, and that is very disappointing because the people of the South-East are spread all over Nigeria.
translation.pcm: According to wetin e tok, di major wahala be say dia elite don keep quiet for too long, and e dey very disappointing bikos di pipo of di South-East are spread all over Nigeria

translation.en: They have fruitful investments all over the country which they are going to lose by going to war.
translation.pcm: Dem get fruitful investment all ova di kontri which dem go lose if dem go to war

translation.en: The feeling I have is that they dont seem to care, he said.
translation.pcm: E tok say e feel say dem no really care

translation.en: The people are questioning the imposed model of political leadership in the region.
translation.pcm: Di pipo dey question di impose model of politicak leadership for di region

translation.en: All over the region, you have politicians who were manufactured into office.
translation.pcm: All ova for di region, na politician wey dem manufacture into office full dia

translation.en: In Imo State, for instance, you have a governor who came fourth in the elections but became first through the Supreme Courts verdict.
translation.pcm: Imo State, for example, na governor wey finish fouth for election but e bikom first by di Supreme Court verdit

translation.en: There is also the case of Okigwe North Central zone where a man who was disqualified succeeded in being manufactured into office.
translation.pcm: Di case of Okigwe North Central zone where a man wey dem disqualify succeed to dey manufacture into office

translation.en: part of the narrative is about the functionality or legitimacy of political leadership in the region, Odinkalu said.
translation.pcm: part of di narrative dey about di functionality or legitimacy of di political leadership for di region, Odinkalu tok

translation.en: Unfortunately it points to the failing nature of the Nigerian state; the more non-state actors like the proscribed IPOB issue such directivesand these directives are successful-the more we see this kind of failure by the state.
translation.pcm: E point to di failure of di Nigeria kontri; di plenty non-state pipo like IPOB dey giove directives and di directives dey dey successful na di more we go dey see dis failure by di state.

translation.en: It does not in any way portend well for our national security.
translation.pcm: E no tok well about awa national security at all at all

translation.en: What we know for a fact is that unfortunately and consistently when IPOB attacked and even force people to do things against their will and the security agencies have not been able to prevent that.
translation.pcm: Wetin we know be say wen IPOB attack and dem dey force pipo to do things against dia wish and security agencies no fit prevent am

translation.en: So, it is our understanding that people just chose to comply mainly because of safety reasons, Adamu said.
translation.pcm: E just dey wetin we know say pipo dey comply bikos of safety reasons.

translation.en: With regards to the governors, he said they are playing the political card, saying:I think they are being politically correct mainly to help themselves and to avoid issues that may come.
translation.pcm: On governors dem, e tok say dem dey play politics card; dey tok say e think say dem dey dey politically correct mainly to help demsef and to avoid issues wey fit kom dia way

translation.en: The governors are sitting on the fence but what I would like to remind them is that this is a phase in an insurgency.
translation.pcm: Di governors dem dey sit on fence but wetin I go like remind dem be say dis na one phase for insurgency.

translation.en: It appears this phase is to target security infrastructure.
translation.pcm: E be like say dis chapter na to target security infrastucture.

translation.en: Phase two would be to target individuals and it is very likely that phase three would be to target government offices and all that.
translation.pcm: Phase two go be to target pipo and e dey be like say phase three to be to target goment officials

translation.en: South-East shut down
translation.pcm: South-East don shut down

translation.en: Streets in the five states making the southeast of Nigeria were deserted on Monday as residents complied with the sit-at-home order by the proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB).
translation.pcm: di streets for five states wey form di southeast of Nigeria dey deserted on Monday as residents comply wit di sit at home order by di Indigenous pipo of Biafra

translation.en: Our correspondents report that government offices, schools, hotels, shopping malls, and banks were under lock and key as markets and roads were empty in the major cities of Aba, Owerri, Awka, Ebonyi and Enugu among others.
translation.pcm: Awa correspondents report say goment officials, schools, hotels, shopping malls, and banks dey lock and market and roads sef dey empty for major cities of Aba, Owerri, Awka, Ebonyi and Enugu and odas join

translation.en: IPOB praised the people for compliance, boasting that very soon the stage will be set for our referendum to decide our fate.
translation.pcm: IPOB throw twale for di pipo as dem comply, dey tok say soon dem go do dia referendum wey go decide dia fate

translation.en: Daily Trust reports that four persons were reportedly killed in Ebonyi as security operatives engaged members of IPOB enforcing the sit-at-home order in the area.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust report say four pipo na em die for Ebonyi as security operatives fight wit IPOM wey dey enforce sit-at-home order for di area

translation.en: People who were on essential duties, such as doctors, nurses, journalists were periodically checked by security operatives before allowed to proceed on their journey.
translation.pcm: Pipo wey dey essential duty such as doctors, nurses, journalist dey dey checked by security operatives before dem allow dem to continue dia journey

translation.en: Similarly, the streets of Owerri, the Imo State capital and its environs were empty as residents observed the sit-at-home order.
translation.pcm: Like so, di streets of Owerri, di Imo State capital and oda places for dat area dey empty as resident observe di sit-at-home order.

translation.en: Our correspondent gathered that there was a heavy military presence along Aba Owerri Road, specifically at Naze
translation.pcm: Awa tori pipo ear say heavy mioitary presence dey along Aba Owerri Road, specifically for Naze

translation.en: No 1, Akachi Road where some air force personnel were allegedly killed on Saturday.
translation.pcm: No 1, Akachi Road wey dem tok say dem kil some air force pipo for Saturday

translation.en: There was also a heavy security presence at Okigwe Road and at Imo State University roundabout.
translation.pcm: Plenty security presence also dey Okigwe Road and for Imo State University round about.

translation.en: Men of the anti-kidnapping unit in their patrol vans took over Umezurike Hospital off Royce Road.
translation.pcm: Men of anti-kidnapping unit for dia patrol vans take ova Umezurike Hospital off Royce Road.

translation.en: Heavy security presence was also witnessed at Airport Junction Aba-Owerri Road and Obiangwu-Ngor Okpala, where a former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, was killed on Sunday.
translation.pcm: Heavy security presence also dey Airport Junction Aba-Owerri Road and Obiagwu-Ngor Okpala, wey dem kil former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, on Sunday

translation.en: The sit-at-home order also gained compliance in Aba, Abia State.
translation.pcm: Di sit for house order also gain compliance for Aba, Abia State

translation.en: Our reporter who monitored the situation around three major axes in the city.
translation.pcm: Awa tori pipo wey monitor di situation for di three major area in di city

translation.en: There was heavy shooting at Nnodo in Ebonyi Local Government Area of Ebonyi State between suspected members of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) and the police.
translation.pcm: Heavy shoot dey apun for Nnodo for Ebonyi Local goment Area of Ebonyi State between members of di indigenous pipo of Biafra (IPOB) wey be suspect and di Police

translation.en: Daily Trust also gathered that the shooting erupted between the police and members of the IPOB when they were enforcing the sit-at-home order on residents in the area.
translation.pcm: Daily Trust also gather say di shooting skyrocket between di Police and members of di IPOB wen de dey enforce di dit at home order in residents for di area.

translation.en: A reliable source who doesnt want his name in print told our correspondent that motorbikes and cars were set ablaze during the attack.
translation.pcm: A reliable source wey no wan make hin name dey mention for print tell awa correspondent say motorbikes and cars were set ablaze durin di attack

translation.en: Our reporter learnt that Igbo residents of Oyigbo did not go to market in compliance with the sit-at-home directives.
translation.pcm: Awa tori pipo hear say residents of Oyigbo no go market in compliance wit di ait-at-home directives.

translation.en: It was also observed that the entrance gate of the popular Eke Oyigbo Market, mainly dominated by the Igbo traders, was open for business but many of the traders did not open their shops.
translation.pcm: Dey also notice say di gate of di popular Eke Oyigbo Market, wey Igbo pipo plenty for dia, dey open for business but many of di traders no open dia shop

translation.en: Also in Port Harcourt, the popular Diobu Market where most of the traders are Igbos did not also open their stores in compliance with the order.
translation.pcm: For Poer Harcourt, di popular Diobu Market wey most of di trader dia be Igbo no open dia shop in compliance wit di order

translation.en: A trader at Oyigbo Market, Ikechukwu Ibe said that they decided to close their businesses on Monday in honour of the fallen Igbo heroes who died during the Biafran war.
translation.pcm: One trader for Oyigbo Market, Ikechukwu Ibe tok say dey decide to close dia business for Monday to pay respect to heros wey die durin Biafra war

translation.en: Elsewhere in Jos, the Plateau State capital, our correspondent reports that shop owners especially Igbos closed their business premises for fear of reprisal attacks over what is happening in the South-East.
translation.pcm: For anoda area for Jos, di Plateau State capital, awa correspondent report say shop owners especially Igbo close dia business area for fear of reprisal attack ova wetin dey apun for South East

translation.en: Security agents, including police and SSS, were seen in their numbers around the popular Ahmadu Bello Way, trying to avert the eruption of violence in the area and other strategic locations of the state capital.
translation.pcm: Security agents, wey including Police and SSS, plenty for popular Ahmadu Bello Way, as dem dey try avoid violence wey fit occure for di area and oda locations wey dey di state capital

translation.en: Our correspondent who went round Ahmadu Bello Way, Katako Market and other areas within the city reports that apart from the Igbos, other business owners equally closed their business for fear of unforeseen violence that may erupt in the city.
translation.pcm: Awa correspondent wey go round Ahmadu Bello Way, Katako Market and oda area wey dey inside di state capital report say apart di Igbo, oda business owner also close dia business for fear violence wey dem no see say e dey kom wey fit kos kasala for di city.

translation.en: It was observed that many Igbos especially those having their businesses within the heart of the city didnt open their business in the morning, while those who opened later closed in the afternoon.
translation.pcm: Dem observe say igbo especially doz wey get dia business witin di heart of di heart of di city no open dia business for morning, as doz wey open later close for afternoon

translation.en: A Nigerian woman, Oladunni Idowu  Giwa- Osagie, who got married at age 48 and welcomed her first child just days before her 50th birthday.
translation.pcm: A Nigerian woman wey im name be Oladunni Idowu  Giwa- Osagie, wey get married at age 48 and con welkom im first pikin just days before im 50th birthday.

translation.en: A writer and friend of the new mother, Ifeanyi Omeni shared the story on her facebook page.
translation.pcm: Nah one writer wey be friend with di new mother, Ifeanyi Omeni nah im share di tori for im facebook page.

translation.en: Malami announces arrest of Nnamdi Kanu.
translation.pcm: Malami don announce di arrest of Nnamid Kanu.

translation.en: The minister of Justice and Attorney General of the Federation, Abubakar Malami, has announced the arrest of the leader of the proscribed indigenous people of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu.
translation.pcm: Di minister of Justice and Attorney General of di Federation wey be Abubakar Malami, don announce di arrest of di leader of di proscribed indigenous pipo of Biafra, Nnamdi Kanu.

translation.en: Terrorism, greatest threat to human existence, says Monguno.
translation.pcm: Monguno tok say terrorism nah di greatest threat wey human get.

translation.en: The National security Adviser, Major General Babagana Monguno, has stated that beyond the pandemic and climate change, terrorism remain the greatest threat to human existence.
translation.pcm: Di National security Adviser, Major General Babagana Monguno, don state dat beyond di pandemic and climate change, terrorism go still be di greatest threat to human existence.

translation.en: Police arrest native doctor in Delta, recover two skulls.
translation.pcm: Police don arrest native doctor for inside Delta, com recover two skull dem.

translation.en: The Delta state police command has arrested a native doctor, recovering two skulls from him.
translation.pcm: Di delta state police commando don arrest a native doctor, dem recover two skull dem from im hand.

translation.en: The state Police Public Relation Officer, Bright Edafe, disclose this on Thursday in a statement titled
translation.pcm: Di state police Relation Officer wey be Bright Edafe, nah im disclose dis for Thursday inside a statement wey dem call

translation.en: Delta State Police Command arrest a gang of suspected ritualist, arrest a native doctor in possession of two human skulls'
translation.pcm: Delta state police commando don arrest a gang wey dem suspected to be ritualist, dem also arrest a native doctor wey two skull dem dey im hand.

translation.en: According to the statement, the police was alerted on Thursday by one 35 year old Ejiro Okoro who claimed that the corpse of his sister which was buried in 2019, has been exhumed by an unknown person.
translation.pcm: According to di statement, nah one 35 year old Ejiro Okoro alert di police on Thursday im claim say di corpse of im sister wich dem bury inside 2019, bin don dey exhumed by one unknown pesin.

translation.en: FG raised money for Siasia to fight FIFA BAN, says minister.
translation.pcm: FG don raise moni for Siasia make im use am fight Ban, nah so minister.

translation.en: Minister of Youth and Sports Development, Sunday Dare, on Tuesday, insisted that his ministry did not abandon former Super Eagles coach Samson Siasia as being claimed by the former striker.
translation.pcm: Minister of Youth and Sports Development, Sunday Dare, on Tuesday, tok say im ministry no abandon former Super Eagles coach Samson Siasia as di former striker claim.

translation.en: Siasia had claimed that he was abandoned by Dare and the ministry after his FIFA ban for alleged match-fixing.
translation.pcm: Siasia don claim say Dare don abandoned am and di ministry afta im FIFA ban for alleged match-fixing.

translation.en: Respect Kanu's rights, Abaribe tells FG.
translation.pcm: Abaribe tok say make FG respect Kanu's right.

translation.en: The minority leader of the senate, Enyinnaya Abaribe, has advised the Federal Government to apply caution and strict adherence to the rule of law in handling the issue of Nnamdi Kanu.
translation.pcm: Di minority leader of di senate, Enyinnaya Abaribe, don advise di Federal goment make dem apply caution and dey strict to di rule of law wen dem won handle di issue of Nnamdi Kanu.

translation.en: Kanu, the leader of the indigenous people of  Biafra, was arrested, extradited to Nigeria and arraigned at an Abuja court on Tuesday.
translation.pcm: Dem don arrest Kanu wey be di indigenous leader for Biafra pipo, dem extradited to Nigeria and dem don arraign am for Abuja court on Tuesday.

translation.en: Matt Hancock has apologised for breaking social distancing guidance when kissing his aide, even though the law at the time suggest such gatherings were not allowed.
translation.pcm: Matt Hancock do alredy apologise as im don break guidance for social distancing wen im dey kiss im aide, even though di law for dat time suggest say dem no go fit allow dat kin gathering.

translation.en: Effort should be made to reduce the number of in close proximity in the work area and consider if workers can stay in one place or at one workstation when working.
translation.pcm: Dey try make effort make dem reduce di number of in close proximity inside the work area and make dem consider if workers if stay for one place or make dem stay for one workstation wen dem dey work.

translation.en: Normalcy is gradually returning after the Nigerian security forces reportedly shot dead one student and wounded two other in Kaduna state during street protests against tuition fee increment.
translation.pcm: Things don dey bikom normal afta Nigerian security forces don shoot one student dead and injure two odas for inside Kaduna state wen dem dey do street protest against tuition fee wey dem increase.

translation.en: Hundreds of students of the college of Education Gidan-Waya in Kafanchan came out on Monday to demand the reversal of an about 200% increase in fees at tertiary institutions recently announced by the Kaduna state government.
translation.pcm: Hundreds of students wey dey college of Education Gidan-Waya inside Kafanchan dem waka kom out on Monday to demand di revasal of fee wey dem increase by 200% at tertiary institutions wey Kaduna state goment announce.

translation.en: The protesting students say many of their parents cannot afford the school fees due to economic hardship.
translation.pcm: Di student wey dey protest tok say plenty of dia parents no fit afford di school fee bikos of economic hardiship.

translation.en: Nigeria exchange 82 Chibok girls kidnapped by Boko Haram for prisoners.
translation.pcm: Nigeria don exchange 82 chibok girls wey Boko Haram kidnapped for prisoner dem.

translation.en: Nigerians protest demanding for the release of secondary school girls abducted from the romote village of Chibok, in Asokoro, Abuja.
translation.pcm: Nigerians don dey protest dey demand make dem release di secondary school girls wey dem abduct from inside di romote village of Chibok, inside Asokoro, Abuja.

translation.en: Indian plans to increase crude oil imports from Nigeria.
translation.pcm: Indian don dey plan to increase crude oil importations from Nigeria.

translation.en: Indian expects to increase its long-term crude oil sourcing from Nigeria to 3 million tonnes per annum in 2016, Dharmendra pradhan, Minister of state (independent Charge) for petroleum and Natural Gas, said on Thursday.
translation.pcm: Dharmendra pradhan wey be Minister of state (independent Charge) for Petroleum and Natural Gas tok am for thursday say, Indian don dey expect to increase im long-term crude oil sourcing from Nigeria to 3 million tonnes per annum in 2016.

translation.en: As many has 100 were killed by an explosion at a gas plant in southeastern Nigeria, a local journalist at the scene said on Friday.
translation.pcm: The exlosion wey apun for gas plant for inside southeastern Nigeria kil like 100 pipo, a local journalist wey dey at scene nah im tok am on Friday.

translation.en: A bomb blast at a bus station in the northeast Nigerian city of Gombe on Monday killed at least 15 people and wounded 21, an official from the emergency services said.
translation.pcm: A bomb blast wey apun for bus station inside di northeast Nigerian city of Gombe on Monday don kil at least 15 pipo and wound 21, nah one official from di emergency services tok so.

translation.en: There was no immediate claim of responsibility for the attack.
translation.pcm: Nobodi wan claim responsibility for di attack immediately.

translation.en: The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) has denied reports of mass failure in the 2021 unified Tertiary Matriculations Examination (UTME) across the country.
translation.pcm: Di Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) don deny reports of mass failure inside di 2021 unified Tertiary Matriculations Examination (UTME) across di kontiri.

translation.en: The examination body has also insisted that all UTME questions were based on the syllabus prescribed for the UTME saying that it was issued to candidate through the board's Integrated Brochure and syllabus System (IBASS), the CD which is given to candidates after completion of registration.
translation.pcm: Di examination bodi don also insist dat all UTME kwesion dey based on di syllabus wey dem prescribe for di UTME im tok dat dem issue am for candidate through di board's Integrated Brochure and syllabus System (IBASS), di CD wich dem give to candidates afta completion of registration.

translation.en: Academic Staff Union of University (ASUU) threatens industrial action over non-payment of member's salaries.
translation.pcm: Academic Staff Union of University ( ASUU) don threaten industrial action as dem no gree pay member's salaries.

translation.en: The Academic Staff Union of University ( ASUU), Yobe state chapter, is set to commence a two-week warning strike in Damaturu from Tuesday, June 8, 2021.
translation.pcm: The Academic Staff Union of University ( ASUU), Yobe state chapter don set to start two-week warning strike for inside Damaturu from Tuesday, June 8,2021.

translation.en: Umahi suspends 5 permanent secretaries for six months.
translation.pcm: Umahi don suspend 5 permanet secretary dem for six months.

translation.en: Governor David Umahi of Ebonyi on Wednesday suspended 5 permanent secretatries in the state civil service for six months over alleged lack of communities duties.
translation.pcm: Governor David Umahi of Ebonyi on Wednesday don suspend 5 secretary dem for inside di state civil service for six months bikos dem no do community duties.

translation.en: Umahi made the disclosure while swearing in 11 reappointed commissioners,several old and new special Assistants and Senior Special Assistants.
translation.pcm: Umahi torchlight dis while im dey swear in 11 reappointed commissioner dem, plenty old and new Special Assistant dem and Senior Special Assistant dem.

translation.en: We are Nigeria's problem, not our ethnicity, religion, president Buhari.
translation.pcm: President Buhari tok say nah we be Nigeria problem, no be ethnicity, religion.

translation.en: Our problem is not ethnicity or religion, it is ourselves, president Buhari.
translation.pcm: our problem no be ethnicity or religion, nah we be the problem, President Buhari.

translation.en: Schools must guarantee safe learning environments for learning.
translation.pcm: School dem suppose gaurantee environment wey safe for learning.

translation.en: My interest in education comes from my training first as a lawyer, then as a governance specialist and education sector administrator, both in Nigeria and the United states of America (USA).
translation.pcm: My interest for education koms from my training first as a lawyer, Den as a governance specialist and education sector administrator, both inside Nigeria and di United states of America (USA).

translation.en: Leadership involves activities such as making difficult decissions.
translation.pcm: Leadership dey involve plenty things like to dey make difficult decissions.

translation.en: Leadership is crucial because it is a requirement  in most aspect of social life, for instance, leaders are required in the family setting , it is required in business, corporations, in political life, in religious oraganizations, in communities, in countries or in nation-states!
translation.pcm: Leadership dey crucial bikos nah im be di requirement  inside most aspect of social life, for instance, dem dey require leader for inside di family setting , dem require am inside business, corporations, inside political life, inside religious oraganizations, inside communities, inside kontiri dem or inside nation-states!

translation.en: Uk government accused of hypocrisy as health minister quits.
translation.pcm: Dem don accuse UK goment of hypocrisy as di health minister don quit.

translation.en: Nissan to create two thousands jobs with new battery gigafactory in the North East of England.
translation.pcm: Nissan wan create two thousand jobs wit dem new battery gigafactory for inside di North East of England.

translation.en: William and Harry unite to unveil Diana statue  at Kensington.
translation.pcm: William and Harry don unite so dem fit unveil Diana statues at Kensington.

translation.en: The term ranching is not clearly defined in this country, so all intensive or enclosed livestock production systems are categorised as ranching.
translation.pcm: Di word ranching wey we dey tok so neva get clearly define for dis kontry wey we dey so, na why intensive or enclosed livestock production system dem as ranching

translation.en: However, a ranch is a very large area of rangeland that is enclosed where animals roam and openly graze.
translation.pcm: Ranch be big area of rangeland wey dey enclose where animal dey waka and dey openly graze

translation.en: It is in view of that, the Land Use Act recommends allocation of up to 5,000 ha for livestock farming.
translation.pcm: Na reason why, di Land Use Act recommend allocation of 5,000 make dem dey use do livestock farming

translation.en: So, if state governors genuinely believe in ranching, they should put their money where their mouth is and allocate the recommended hectares to ranchers.
translation.pcm: If state goment believe for ranching, make dem put dia moni where dia mouth dey and allocate di recommend hectare to rancher dem

translation.en: The statement that states go into ranching because there is no land is incongruent.
translation.pcm: Di tok say states dey go into ranching bikos say land no dey dey
